headline: Hurumende Yotenga Michina yeMuzvipatara Inodarika Miriyoni yeMadhora ekuAmerica Isingashande
text: Komiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano nhasi iri kutarisirwa kushanyira chipatara cheParirenyatwa kuonoona michina yakanzi navanachiremba vakuru nezuro yakatengwa nehurumende asi isiri kushanda. Michina iyi yakanotengwa kuIndia nemutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano VaJohn Mangwiro, avo vatiwo vakatenga michina iyi vachibatsirana nevashandi vemuzinda weZimbabwe kuIndia. Vachitaura kukomiti iyi, vanachiremba vakuru vari pasi pesangano reSenior Hospital Doctors Association kana kuti SHDA vakati zvinhu zvichiri zvakaita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara uye hakuna michina inodiwa kuzvipatara zvehurumende kuti ibatsire varwere. Mutungamiri weSHDA Amai Shingai Nyaguse vakati pamichina yakatengwa nehurumende iyi zvikamu gumi kubva muzana chete ndiyo iri kushanda. Amai Nyaguse vatiwo kunyangwe hazvo vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwakatengwa michina vakazodanwa kuuya munyika kuzoigadzirisa vakakundikana. Amai Nyaguse vakatiwo pamichina iyi, mizhinji yacho yakamboshanda uye yakatengwa kukambani isingazivikanwi. Vakapawo muenzaniso wekuti mimwe mibhedha yakauya inofanirwa kushandiswa pakusununguka kwemadzimai akazvitakura yakanyorwa kuti ishandiswe nemadzimai asingaremi zvinodarika makirogiramu makumi matanhatu nemashanu, vakati madzimai mazhinji munyika anenge akazvitakura anodarika huremu uhwu. Vachitaurawo kukomiti iyi, VaMangwiro vakaramba kuti michina iyi haisi kushanda vachiti mishoma chete ndiyo ine zvimwe zvaive zvisipo asi vakati zvinhu izvi zvakazogadzirwa uye vamiriri vekambani yekuIndia kwavakatenga michina iyi vari kuuya kuzoisa zvaive zvisipo izvi kuti itange kushande. Imwe nhengo yeSHDA, Doctor Bothwell Mbuvayesango vanoti zvipatara zvinofanira kupihwa mvumo yekuzvitengera michina yazvo. Vanachiremba ava vakaudzawo komiti yeparamende iyi kuti vanhu vazhinji vari kufa nekuda kwekushaikwa kwezvikwanisiro muzvipatara zvehurumende zvinodiwa mukurapwa kwavo. Vanachiremba vakuru ava vakapawo chichemo kudare reparamende kuti ribvise bhodhi rinovamiririra reHealth Services Board iro vanoti harimiririre zvido zvavo. Asi gurukota rinoona nezvehutano VaObadiah Moyo vakati kubviswa kweHealth Services Board kunonetsa kana pasina kuvandudzwa mutemo. VaMoyo vakabvumawo kuti zvinhu zvakaparara munyaya dzehutano vachiti kugadzirisa matambudziko aya kunoda mari yekunze iyo hurumende isina. Komiti inoona nezvehutano iyi yatiwo nhasi ichaenda kunozvionera pamhuno sefodya kuzvipatara zveParireyyatwa pamwe neSally Mugabe kuti zvinhu zvakamira sei chaizvo munyaya dzezvehutano, sezvo pasina kuwirirana nezvekuti michina iyi iri kushanda here kana kuti kwete. No media source currently available

headline: Buy Zimbabwe Yokurudzira Vanhu Kutenga Zvinogadzirwa muNyika
text:
Panguva yezororo reKisimisi negore idzva munyika munopindazvinhu zvakawanda zvakasiyana siyana zvinotengwa kubva kunze. Sangano reBuy Zimbabwe rinoti nyika inrasikirwa nemari yekunze yakawanda uye maindasitiri emuno anotadza kusimukira nekuda kwekutengwa kubva kunze kwenyika kwezvinhu zvinogona kugadzirwa muno. Nekudaro sangano iri riri kukurudzira kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika

Mukuru wesangano reBuy Zimbabwe VaAlois Burutsa vanoti zvakakoshera nyika kuti veruzhinji vatenge zvinhu zvinogadzirwa munyika kuitira kubatsira kuchengetedza mari yekunze iyo inogona kushandiswa pakutenga zvimwe zvakaksoha zvisingagadzirwe muno zvakadai semichina.

VaBurutsa vaudza Studio 7 kuti kubvira zvakatanga sangano ravo muna2011 vanofara kuti chinangwa chavo chabatsira kusimudzira kutengwa kwezvigadzirwa zvemuno munyika. Zimbabwe inoshandisa mari yakawanda gore rega rega mukutenga zvinhu kubva kunze kwenyika. Gore rakapera nyika yakashandisa mabhiriyoni manomwe nemamiriyoni mazana matanhatu kana kuti 7.6 billion zvichienzaniswa ne4.6 billion yakashandiswa muna2020.

Zvimwe zvezvinhu zvinonyanya kutengwa kunze zvinosanganisira mafuta edzimotokari, mafetireza, nemichina asi pane zvimwewo zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa muno zvinobvawo kunze.

Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries VaKurai Matsheza vatsinhirawo kuti zvakakosha kuti veruzhinji vafarire kutenga zvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno vachiti izvi zvinobatsirawo kuti munyika muve nemabasa.

CZI inoti pari zvino maindasitiri emunyika ari kushanda zvinosvika pazvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana uye kushomeka kwemagetsi nderimwe dambudziko guru rinoita kuti asashanda nemazvo.

VaBurutsa vanopokana nemaonero ekuti zvnhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura uye hazvinyatsogadzirwa nemhando yepamusoro sezvinoita zvinobva kunze.

VaFelix Chari, mudzidzisi wezvidzidzo zvepamusoro panyaya yezvehupfumi vanoti vanobvumirana nemaonero ekuti zvinhu zvakawanda zvinogadzirwa munyika zvinodhura vachiti izvi zvinoitika nekuda kwezvikonzero zvakawanda. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vaachishanda nesangano relabour and Economic Developmemt Research Institute of Zimbabwe Dr Prosper Chitambara vatiwo chirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe chakanaka asi zvimwe zvinogadzirwa zvinozodhura sezvo kugadzira zvinhu munyika kuchidhura. Vachitaura pakuparurwa kwevhiki rekukurudzira kutengwa kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa muno muHarare nezuro, mutungamirir wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vakati hurumende inotsigira chirongwa ichi nekuti chinobatsira kudzivirira kuunzwa munyika kwezvinhu zvinogadzirwa kunze
zvinenge zvine mutengo wakadereresa izvo vakati zvinokanganisa budiriro yenyika.  Zvitoro zvikuru zvinosanganisira OK Zimbabwe zvirimowo muchirongwa cheBuy Zimbabwe ichi. Zimbabwe inonyanya kutenga nekutengesearana neSouth Africa, China, United Araba Emirates, Singapore, United Kingdom neRussia. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzedzvehupfumi dzinoti VaMnangagwa vanotaura zvinhu zvisiri kuitwa nehurumende. Semuenzaniso, mushure mekunge zvigadziraw zvemunyika zvawedzerwa mutengo nekuda kwekushaya simba kwedhora remunyika, gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube vakabva vabvumidza vezvitoro kutenga zvinhu kunze pasina kubhadhara mitero.

headline: World Cup: Chabvondoka
text: anonzwa svondo rino kutanga musi weChina apo pasi rose richange rakatarira kunyika yeRussia uko kuri kutambirwa mutambo weFifa Wold Cup 2018.   Mutambo uyu ndiwo mukuru pasi rose wenhabvu nekudaro Kwayedza yakaita ongororo yemitambo yekutanga yezvikwata zvakasiyana izvo zviri kutamba gore rino.   Mutambo wekutanga uchaona Russia – iyo inenge iri pamusha payo – ichisangana neSaudi Arabia kunhandare yeStadion Luzhniki.   Zvikwata zviri izvi zviri muboka rine zvimwe zvinoti Egypt neUruguay asi zvose vashoma vanoona zvichisvika kure mumutambo uyu.   Musi weChishanu ndipo pachange pakabaka apo shasha dzemuEurope – Portugal – ichasangana neSpain iyo yakambohwina mukombe weWorld Cup mugore ra2010 kuSouth Africa.   Uyu mutambo uchange wakatarisirwa nevazhinji sezvo zvikwata zviviri izvi zvinogona kubuda zvose muGroup B zvofambira mberi mumakwishu aya.   Portugal ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pavatambi vanoti Cristiano Ronaldo, Bernardo Silva, Adrien Silva nevamwe. Kozoti Spain, izere nemukaka wevatambi vanosanganisira  Isco, Marco Asensio, Koke, Diego Costa naThiago Alcantara.   Musi weMugovera, Nigeria ichisangana neCroatia, maSuper Eagles chimwe chezvikwata zvakamirira Africa kumutambo uyu uye vatsigiri vazhinji vari kushuvira zvikuru kuti aiite zvinorova kuWorld Cup.   France ichisangana neAustralia neMugovera zvakare, kozoti Argentina ichitatsurana neIceland.   Kuzvikwata zviri kukwikwidza kuRussia gore rino, France neArgentina zvimwe zvine vatambi vakawanda vanotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   France ine vatambi vanosanganisira Kylian Mbappe, Antoine Griezmann, Paul Pogba, Ousmane Dembele naNabil Fekir.   Nerumwe rutivi, Argentina ine vatambi vanoti Lionel Messi, Angel di Maria, Gergio Aguero, Gonzalo Higuain, Paulo Dybala nevamwe vakawanda.   Musi weSvondo shasha dzine mukombe weWorld Cup – Germany – ichatamba mutambo wayo wekutanga apo ichasangana neMexico kuMoscow kuStadion Luzhiniki.   Germany chimwe chezvikwata zviri kutarisirwa kuhwina mukombe uyu asi inofanirwa kutanga yabuda muboka rayo rine zvikwata zvinoti Mexico, Sweden neKorea Republic. Die Mannschaft ine vatambi vakaita saMesut Ozil, Thomas Muller naTimo Werner. Musi uyu zvakare ndiwo uchaona Brazil – iyo yakahwinha mukombe weWorld Cup yakawanda – ichitamba mutambo wayo wekutanga apo ichasangana neSwitzerland kuRostov Arena.   Makore mana adarika, Brazil yakabatiswa pasi pamusha payo apo yakakundirwa musemi-fainari neGermany nekudaro gore rino ichange ine huturu hukuru sezvo iri kuda kuhwina mukombe uyu nepainogona. Samba Boys ichange yakaisa tariro yayo pana Neymar, Gabriel Jesus naRoberto Firmino.

headline: Ishe Makore Vanoti Havana Kufara neZvakaitwa naVaTsvangirai Mudunhu Ravo
text: Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Ishe Makore vekumMasvingo mudunhu reGutu South vanoti havana kufara kuti bato reMDC rakaita musangano waro mudunhu ravo risina kuvapira. Pamusangano wakaitwa kwaGutu nemusi weChipiri, Ishe Makore vakabuda pachena kuti ndeve Zanu PF, vakapika kuti havasi kusiya dunhu ravo richiitirwa misangano neMDC. Pamusangano uyu vanhu vanonzi vakaenda kumusangano wakaitwa naVa Morgan Tsvangirai nemusi we Mugovera vakaudzwa kuti vachaurayiwa. Asi Ishe Makore varamba mashoko aya vachiti ivo chavanopokana nacho, kuitwa kwemisangano ivo vasingazive. Vachitaura pamusangano wakaitwa neChipiri, uyo wakapindwa nemabhuku anosvika makumi matatu, Mambo Makore vakati vari kurwadzikana nevanhu vavo vakaenda kumusangano waVa Tsvangirai vakati havachabvumidzi misangano ye MDC mudunhu ravo. Ishe Makore vakatiwo vachadzinga masabhuku pamwe chete nemakanzura eMDCT akasangana naVaTsvangirai vasina kuziviswa saMambo wedunhu iri. Ishe Makore vakapomera kanzura wemubhuku eumnzvimbo iyi anomirira MDC kuita zviri kunze kwemutemo, vakati vachadzinga kanzura uyu mudunhu ravo. Musangano uyu wakasiya vagari vazhinji vaine kutya sezvo wakavimbisa kudzoka kwemhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika mudunhu iri. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Zimbabwe ine mukana wekuenda kuWC’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu – Carlos ‘Murehwa’ Max – anoti anoshuvira kuona maWarriors achimbotambawo kumutambo weFIFA World Cup uye hakuna chinotadzisa chikwata ichi kuenda kumakwishu aya sezvo chizere nevatambi vanotamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura kunyika dzinosanganisira dziri kuEurope.   Apo mutambo World Cup uri kuenderera mberi kuQatar, Africa iri kumirirwa nenyika shanu dzinoti Senegal, Ghana, Tunisia, Morocco neCameroon.   Murehwa, uyo akambotambira maWarriors, anoti hakuna chinotadzisa chikwata chenyika ichi kuenda kuWorld Cup asi hunge kana zvinhu zvose zvakarongeka.   “Iye zvino senyika takakomborerwa kuti tine vatambi vakawanda vari kutambira nhabvu yavo kuEurope muzvikwata zvikuru saka kana tikarongeka tinoenda kuWorld Cup.   “Chiremerera chikuru kuona nyika yedu ichitamba kuWorld Cup, todawo kuiona iriko saka zvinoda mushandirapamwe kuti zvigokwanisika kuitika.   “Asi chekutanga ndechekuti ngatirwise zvirango zvatakatemerwa neFIFA neCAF zvibviswe tibve tatotanga gadziriro dzemutambo unotevera wa2026. Gadziriro dzinotanga izvezvi,” anodaro Murehwa.   Munhoroondo yenhabvu yeZimbabwe, maWarriors haasati ambobudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup kunyangwe zvazvo akapotsa nepadiki panguva yaairairidzwa naReinhard Fabisch apo akatadziswa nemutambo mumwe chete paakazokundwa neCameroon.   Pachapera mutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar, ndipo panobva patotanga gadziriro dzemutambo we2026 FIFA World Cup iyo icharongwa nenyika nhatu dzinoti United States of America, Mexico neCanada.    Carlos Max apo aitambira chikwata chenyika chemaWarriors   Zvakadaro, Murehwa – uyo akambotambira zvikwata zvenhabvu zvinosanganisira CAPS United, Dynamos neArcadia United – vazhinji havazive kuti zita rake remadunhurirwa iri rakatangira kupi.   Anoti zita iri akaripihwa nevatsigiri vechikwata cheCAPS United panguva iyo aitambira Green Machine.   Anoti iye nevamwe vemuchikwata chake vaitamba nhabvu zvainwisa mvura zvakaona vachipihwa mazita emadunhurirwa nevatsigiri senzira yekuvarumbidza.   “Ndichiri kuCAPS United, kana waitamba nhabvu zvinonwisa mvura, vatsigiri vaikupa zita remadunhurirwa. Ini ndakazoona ndakushevedzwa kunzi Murehwa, ndikangozvigamuchira.   “Taive nevamwe vatambi vakaita saJoel Shacky Tauro akasvika pakushevedzwa kunzi Mr Goals nekuti ainwisa zvaidakadza, vamwe vakaita saNever Chiku ainzi Maswera sei kuchiti Joel Shambo ainzi Headmaster,” anodaro Murehwa.

headline: Voruzhinji Vopiwa Mukana weKupa Pfungwa Dzavo paBhiri reRBZ Amendment Act
text: Gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, nhasi vamisa hurongwa hwavo hwekuda kupasisa muparamende bhiri reReserve Bank Ammendment Act iro rinogadzirisa kushandiswa kwemari yemaBond Notes nechimbichimbi uye vati vatora danho iri mushure mehurukuro dzavaita nevakuru veparamende pamwe nevebato rinopikisa reMDC. NeChitatu VaChinamasa vainge vakumbira paramende kuti zvinhano zvese zvinodiwa kuti bhiri ripasiswe zviitwe musi mumwechete asi nhasi vati vabvisa chikumbiro ichi pamberi pedare reNational Assembly. VaChinamasa vaita izvi mushure menhaurirano dzavaita nemutauriri weNational Assembly, VaJacob Mudenda, avo vabva vazivisa kuti komiti yeparamende inoona nezvemari nebhajeti ichatenderera nyika yese svondo rinouya ichinzwa pfungwa dzevanhu pamusoro pebhiri iri, iro rakanangana nekushandiswa kwemari yemaBond Notes. Mumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiriri weMDC T zvakare vari mumiriri weKuwadzana East mudare reNational Assembly, VaNelson Chamisa, vanoti vano bvumirana nedanho ratorwa naVaChinamasa rekupa veruzhinji mukana wekupa pfungwa dzavo pamusoro pebhiri iri. Vanoti hazvina kunaka kuti hurumende ityore bumbiro remutemo apo ine mutemo wainenge ichida kugadzira vachiti bumbiro rinosungira paramende kuti ipe vanhu mukana apo inenge ichiumba mutemo. Vati kunyange hazvo vachiziva kuti hurumende haiteerere kana kutambirwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji, zvakakosha kuti vanhu vataure zvavanoda. Kunyange hazvo veRBZ vange vari kushambadza zvemaBond Notes, VaChamisa vati nhengo dzeparamende ndidzo dzine mvumo yekubvunzurudza vanhu vadzinomirira. Mumwe mugari wemuHarare, VaMalvin Mukudu vanoti nyaya yekunzwa pfungwa dzeveruzhinji yakanaka chose kunyage hazvo pfungwa dzacho dzisingazotevedzwi. Mukuru weMedia Centre, VaEnerst Mudzengi vanoti danho ratorwa neparamende rakanaka chose uye ndizvo zvinofanira kuitwa pese panoumbwa mutemo. Kunyange hazvo mutungamiriri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakashandisa simba ravo pasi pemutemo we Presidential Powers (Temporary Measures) Act kuti maBond Notes ashandiswe zviri pamutemo, mutemo weRBZ Act unofanirwa kuvandudzwa kuti uenderane neizvi. Nyanzvi dzemutemo musangano reVeritas dzinoti kana RBZ Amendment Act ikapasiswa inotanga kushanda musi wakagazetwa mutemo wemaBond Notes nemutungamiriri wenyika, musi wa31 Gumiguru gore rino. Mutemo wePresidential Powers uri kupikiswa nevanhu nemasangano anoti unopikisana nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kanzuru yeMasvingo Yokurudzira Vagari Vane Zvinyunyuto Kumhan'ara Kwairi
text: Kanzuru yeMasvingo iri kukurudzira vagari vane zvichemo nemashandiro emapurisa ekanzuru kuti vanomhan’ara nyaya dzavo kukanzuru. Izvi zvinotevera kuchema-chema kwevamwe vagari vekuMasvingo vanorarama nekutengesa mbatya dzemumabhero, avo vari kupomera mapurisa eZRP pamwe neekanzuru yeguta mhosva yekuvatorera mbatya dzavo vachizodzishandisa ivo, izvo zvavanoti hazvisi pamutemo. Meya weguta reMasvingo VaHubert Fidze vakurudzira vanhu vane zvichemo nemashandiro emapurisa kuti vamhan’are kana vachifunga kuti pane mhosva yaparwa. “Nemutemo hapana anobvumidzwa kuti kana atora zvinhu anoshandisa. Mutemo unoti zvakaita semuriwo nematomatisi zvinoparadzwa asi zvakaita sembatya hazvibvumirwi kuti zvipfekwe. Saka tinokuridzira kuti vauye vamhangare kana vaona vanoita izvi,” VaPfidze vanodaro. Mashoko aya anotevera musangano wakaitwa svondo rino muMasvingo nesangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy (Zichea). vanotengesera mumigwagwa ava vakati vari kushushikana zvikuru nezviri kuitwa nemapurisa. Muzvare Sharon Magombedze mumwe anoti anogara achitorerwa zvinhu zvake. “Isu sema informal traders tiri kuchema nenyaya yekuti vekanzuru vakatitorera mabhero edu tozoona vavakutengesa kana kuti vakapfeka nhumbi dzedu uye tozoona mhuri dzavo dzava kupfeka.” Vagari ava vanoti kutandaniswa nemapurisa nekutorerwa zvinhu zvavo kutyorwa kwekodzero dzavo sezvo vari kutsvaga kurarama nekutengesa mumigwagwa. Nhamo yapfunya chisero munyika yapa kuti dhorobha rose reMasvingo rizare nevanhu vanenge vachitengesa mbatya dzine mutengo uri pasi mumigwagwa, izvo zvave kuita kuti vanhu vakawanda vasaende kuzvitoro zvikuru kunotenga mbatya. Vamwe vakapinda mumusangano uyu vanoti vashandi vekanzuru vari kutorerawo vanotengesa muriwo nematomatisi zvinhu zvavo vachiendesa kudzimba dzavo. Amai Nelia Gomo vanoti mhuri dzemapurisa dzave kutorarama nekudya zvekupamba. “Vanotengesa zvechikafu matomatisi nemavheji vanotorerwawo futi, vekanzuru havachatengi izvi kudzimba dzavo vanotodaidza madzimai avo kuti vatore vaendese kumba kundobika,” vanodaro Amai Gomo. Asi vagari vanoti kunyangwe kune mutemo wekuti ukatorerwa zvinhu unoenda kukanzuru wonobhadhara faindi, vakaendako vanosvika vachishaiwa zvinhu zvavo nekuti zvinenge zvatoendeswa kudzimba dzevashandi ava. Munyori mukuru weZichea, VaWisborn Malaya vati vanorwadziwa nekushungurudzwa kuri kuitwa nhengo dzavo. “Tatonzwa dambudziko rakakura muMasvingo zvekuti vanhu vanotorerwa zvinhu zvavo, Isu se organization takawana mukana wekutaura nevakuru vekanzuru saka tichashandisa mukana uyu tikwanise kutaura nezvenyaya iyi tine humbowo kuti dambudziko iri rigadziriswe.” Mutauriri we mapurisa muMasvingo Inspector Charity Mazula varamba kutaura neStudio 7 vachiti vainge vasiri muhofisi sezvo vainge vaenda kuHarare. Nyaya yekutengeswa kwembatya idzi inonziwo nevanogadzira nhumbi munyika iri kukanganisa mabasa avo zvakanyanya. Hurumende haibvumidzewo vanhu kutenga mbatya idzi kunze asi vakawanda vanonzi vanongodzipinza munyika zvemukoto. No media source currently available

headline: Dzimwe Mhuri Dzowana Raramo neKugadzira Zvinodzivirira Covid-19
text: Panguva apo vakawanda vari kusiya mabasa vamwe vachienda kumamisha nekuda kwekuvhingidzwa nechirwere cheCOVID-19, dzimwe mhuri dziri kuwana raramo yakanaka nekugadzira mamasiki ayo dzinotengesa. Mumwe mugari wekuSunningdale muHarare, Baba Edson Masoramuvari kugadzira pamwe chete nemudzimai wavo mamasiki avari kutengesera kumakambani pamwe neveruzhinji. Baba Musora, avo vane makore makumi matanhatu nemasere ekuberekwa, vanoti kosi yavakaita yekusona yakavavhurira mukana pakatanga kuvharirwa vanhu mudzimba nekuda kwechirwere cheCOVID-19. Lockdown yauya hatina kusvika pakuitwa lockdown nepfungwa zvese. Takatanga kugadzira ma washable masks taona kuti acho ari kugadzira ari kutengeswa achingoraswa mubhini. VaMasora, avo vane vana vanomwe vanoti bhizimusi ravo riri kufamba zvakanaka nekuda kwemamasiki avo anomhanyirwa neveruzhinji nekuda kwemagadziro akanaka avanoaita pamwe nemutengo wakachipa. Takawana contract yema 100 masks ku Joiner City. Nzira dzekuti zvinhu zvedu zvimhanye ndezvekutsvaga ma orders kubva kuma kambani. Ndizvo zvinoita kuti zvinhu zvedu zvifambe. Mudzimai wavo, Amai Jennifer Masora, vanoti dambudziko ravari kuona nderekuti mamasiki ane ngozi pahutano hwevanhu vane huchapa uye vachifarira akagadzirwa nemicheka ine mavara matema. Ma mask akanaka anotidzivirira COVID asi dambudziko randiri kuona pane vakawanda nderekuti havasati vakuita hutsanana. Unonyatsotarisa oona kuti mask iyi yaane mazuva haizivi kuwachwa. Ndiro dambudziko randiri kuona. Amai Masora vanoti kushingairira pane zvavari kuita kwayambutsa vakawanda. Iye zvino murairidzi chaiye ndinotomukunda kuita mari, kunyanya iyo nguva ino yakaoma kudai. Vese vari mumahofisi ndinovakunda kurarama. Handiende mu queue ku bhanga kunotora mari. Munhu anouya nejira rake ndomusonera, oenda ku bank ouya ondipa mari. Mumwe mudzimai ari kurarama nekutengesa mamaisiki, Amai Naomi Chinhaire, vanoti zvekuzarirwa mumba ne lockdown zvakavapa mazano avakanga vasingambofungiri. Ndinoshandisa ma tailors ekumakambani mahombe vanondipa pfungwa dzekugadzira zvinhu zvakakodzera zvekuti kana uri kunze uku zvinhu zvako zvinotengwa zvakanaka. Ndinoshandisa pattern nyowani yekuti munhu anotenga asingagunun’une. Amai Chinhaire vanoti mhuri yavo yatove neraramo inodarika yavaive nayo kutanga kwegore rino. Handidi kunyepa, zvinhu zvangu zviri kufamba. Dzimwe nguva ndinobuda mumba kuma seven kuseni ndoenda pandinongomira. Panguva diki diki zvinhu zvangu zvinenge zvapera. Pamwe ndinobuda ndine ma masks anosvika 50 asi ndinodzoka ese apera. VaTitus Doyce vanofarira zvigadzirwa zvemamasiki Amai Chinhaire. Ma mask aya tinoada nekuti unonyatsofema zvakanaka, uye kana uri pane vanhu vanenge vachingokubvunza kuti wakaiwana kupi. Kana wakaburitsa mari unofanira kugutsikana nechinhu chaunenge watenga. Pasi pemutemo weZimbabwe munhu wese anofanira kufamba akapfeka masiki kumeso kwake kana ari pane veruzhinji, senzira yekuzvidzivirira kubva kuchirwere cheCovid-19. Sangano rehutano pasi rese reWorld Health Organisation rinoti mamasiki chinhu chinofanira kugara chakashambidzika uye haifaniri kuchinjanwa. No media source currently available

headline: America Yogadzirira Kutumira Vaongorori veSarudzo
text: Muzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe unoti gadziriro dzeAmerica dzekuzongorora sarudzo dzemuZimbabwe dzave pachidanho chepamusorosoro. America inoti chikwata chayo chekutanga chatove muZimbabwe chakamirira chikwata chihombe chevaongorori vesarudzo vachazenge vari muZimbabwe vachiongorora sarudzo. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavaita nemutauriri weNational Assembly, Advocate Jacob Mudenda muHarare, mumwe mushandi mukuru pamuzinda uyu, Amai Jennifer Savage, vati vanofara nezviri kuitwa mukuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo. Asi Amai Savage varamba kutaura pamusoro pekuti vemapato havasi kufara nebhiri rekuvandudza mitemo yesarudzo vachiti vachazopa pfungwa dzavo kana richinge rapasa muparamende. Bhiri iri, iro rakapasa muNational Assembly svondo rapfuura, ratanga neChipiri kuzeiwa mudare reseneti. Amai Savage vati vari kunzwa zvakawanda pamusoro pesarudzo dzegore rino uye tariro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende ichaita zvese zvairi kuvimbisa kuti sarudzo dzinge dzakachena. Amai Savage vati musangano wavo naVaMudenda wange wakanangana nekuvandudza kudyidzana kweZimbabwe neAmerica. Vati America icharamba ichibatsira Zimbabwe mune zvakasiyana siyana uye pari zvino ichangobva mukupa rubatsiro rwemamiriyoni zana nemakumi mashanu emadhora pasi pechirongwa chemutungamiriri wenyika iyi chekurwisana neHIV/AIDS, chePresident’s Emergency Plan for AIDS Relief kana kuti PEPFAR. Zimbabwe iri kuita sarudzo gore rino kekutanga vaimbove mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vabva pachigaro uye mutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnanangagwa vari kuvimbisa sarudzo dzakajeka. VaMnangagwa vanotiwo vese vanoda kuongorora sarudzo idzi vakasununguka kuita izvi uye hurumende yavo yakatokoka nyika makumi mana neshanu nemasangano gumi nemashanu pasi rese kuti vazoongorore sarudzo idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Marian Chombo Vokonzera Mutauro muZim PF Vachitsigirwa naAmai Mujuru?
text: Paita kusimudzirana mapfumo mubato reZimbabwe People First (ZimPF) mudunhu reMashonaland West apo hutungamiri hwedunhu iri hwakambomisa sachigaro waro, Amai Marian Chombo, pamusangano wavakaita neMugovera vachivapomera mhosva yekutadza kubatanidza nhengo mudunhu uye kutonga nedemo zvisina pfungwa dzevamwe. Komiti iyi, iyo yakagara musangano wayo kuHarare, yakabvumirana kuti vakafanobata chigaro chasachigaro, Amai Chombo, vambomira kutungamira sezvo vatadza kutungamira zvakanaka bato iri mudunhu reMashonaland West. Musangano uyu, uyo wakapindwa nenhengo dzakabva kumatunhu gumi nemapfumbamwe pamatunhu makumi maviri nemaviri ari mudunhu rose, wakasunga chibvumirano chekuti Amai Chombo vambomira kufambisa basa mudunhu uye vasamiririre dunhu kukomiti yenyika. Vachitaura neStudio7, murongi wemisangano mubato iri, Muzvare Abgail Sauti, vati kubvira pakagadzwa Amai Chombo, vanga vachidzinga nhengo dzisingabvumirane navo vachiti vainge vatumwa nemutungamiri webato, Amai Joyce Mujuru. Muzvare Sauti vati bato reZimPF harife rakatonga sezvo vanhu vakawanda vaodzwa moyo nevanhu vasingagone kutungamira. Kusawirirana uku kwaitawo kuti dzimwe nhengo dzibude mubato iri dzichidzokera kuMDC-T inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai. VaTendai Musonza, avo vaive mutevedzeri wemunyori mukuru, vanyorera bato reMDC-T vachikumbira kudzokera kubato iri. VaMusonza vanoti vaneta nemahumbwe ari kuitwa kuZimPF. VaMusonza vanoti nyonga nyonga iri kuitika kuZimPF inoratidza kuti ZimPF chibande cheZanu PF. Studio7 haina kunzwa kuna Amai Chombo pavamire, kanawo kubata Amai Mujuru kuti tinzwe divi ravo, Asi mutauriri webato reZimPF, VaJealous Mawarire, vanoti Amai Chombo ndivo vachiri mutungamiri wedunhu reMashonaland West sezvo vakadzingwa zvisiri pamutemo. VaMawarire vanoti chekutanga ndechekuti musangano uyu wakaitirwa kuHarare asi uri wedunhu reMash West uye vanoti nhengo dzakapinda musangano uyu dzakaburitswa mubato pamwe nevamwe vatungamiriri vakaita saVa Rugare Gumbo, VaDydmus Mutasa, Amai Magret Dongo pamwe nevamwe. No media source currently available

headline: European Union Inoburitsa Gwaro reSarudzo dzeZimbabwe dza2018 Ichiyambira Kuti Sarudzo dza2023 Dzinogona Kusagadzikana neKujeka
text: Sangano reEuropean Union raburitsa gwaro raro rekupedzisira riri pamusoro peongororo yarakaita yesarudzo dzakaitwa muZimbabwe muna 2018, richiti kana zvimwe zvine chekuita nesarudzo zvakakomekedzwa kuti zvigadziriswe zvisina kubatwa sarudzo dza2023 dzinenge dzisina kujeka uye dzisina runyararo. Sangano iri rinoti pazvikomekedzwa zvayo zvose zvinokwana kuita makumi maviri nezvitatu, zviviri chete ndizvo zvabatwabatwa. EU inoyambira kuti nhandare yekutsvaga rutsigiro haina kuenzana, asi ichiti kana bhiri rekuvandudza mutemo wesarudzo rakatambirwa riri zvariri, rinogona kuunza shanduko dzinooneka kusarudzo Studio 7 yakundikana kubata gurukota rezvemitemo, VaZiyambi Ziyambi kuti tinzwe pasvika nyika nekuvandidza zviga zvine chekuita nesarudzo izvi. Asi mushandi mukuru anoona nezvezvirongwa musangano reElection Resource Centre, VaSolomon Bobosibunu, vanoti kunyange hazvo sarudzo dzaswedera, pachine nguva yekuti zviga zvakakomekedzwa izvi zvivandudzwe kuti sarudzo dzigoitwa murunyararo. No media source currently available

headline: Mamonya onokwikwidza kuSA
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Powerlifting Federation (ZPF) riri mushishi yekuumba chikwata chenyanzvi 10 dzinosimudza masimbi ekuvaka muviri avo vachaenda kunomirira Zimbabwe kumakwikwi achaitwa kunyika yeSouth Africa munguva inotevera.   Muna Chikumi, nyanzvi dzekusimudza masimbi dzepasi rose dzichange dzichirakidzana masimba mumakwikwi eWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championships ayo achaitirwa kuSun City, kuSouth Africa.   Sachigaro weZPF mupurovhinzi yeHarare, Moses Nyamhotsi, anoti vakatotanga kuita gadziriro dzekuenda kumutambo uyu.   Mumasvondo anotevera, anodaro Nyamhotsi, vachaita mitambo yakawanda yekusarudza chikwata chavo chevatambi 10 – varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu.   “MunaChikumi, tinoda kutumira chikwata chedu kumutambo weWorld Classic Open Powerlifting Championship kuSouth Africa. Mutambo uyu mukuru uye vatambi vose vanoda chaizvo kuenda kunokwikwidza.   “Isu chinangwa chedu kutumira vatambi vedu 10 vanoti varume vashanu nemadzimai mashanu. Saka mumasvondo anotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichisarudza vatambi vedu vatinoda kuti vapinde muchikwata chatichazotumira kuenda kuSun City kunomirira nyika kumutambo uyu.   “Tarisiro yedu ndeyekuti chikwata chedu tinge tapedza kuchisarudza munaKurume,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.   Aka kachange kari kekutanga Zimbabwe ichitumira vatambi kumutambo uyu.   Nyamhotsi anoti vanotarisira kuti chikwata chavo chiende kunobata basa sebasa kumakwikwi aya.   “Kuenda kwatichaita kuSouth Africa, tinoda kuti chikwata chedu chigonobata basa sebasa kwete kuenda kunozadzikisa chete.   Tiri kuda kutonohwina, kunyangwe tichiziva hedu kuti mutoro wacho unenge wakakura sezvo chikwata chedu chichasangana nedzimwe shasha dzepasi rose,” anodaro Nyamhotsi.

headline: Varwere Voshaya Vanovabatsira Muzvipatara Zvikuru zveHurumende
text: Zvinhu zvave kuramba zvichiita manyama amire nerongo muzvipatara zvikuru muguta reBulawayo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara vatangawo kuramwa mabasa senzira yekupa rutsigiro kuna vanachiremba vave nemasvondo maviri vachiramwa mabasa. Studio 7 payasvika pachipatara cheMpilo Central Hospital yawana panzvimbo dzinorapirwa vanhu vanobva kumba kana kuti Outpatient Department pamwe neCasualty Department paine vanhu vashoma zvikuru. Vanhu vazoudzwa kunzi vadzokere kudzimba dzavo mushure mekunge vana mukoti nevamwe vashandi vehurumende vaita musangano apo vatora chisungo chekutanga kuramwawo mabasa senzira yekutsigira vana chiremba avo vakatanga kuramwa mabasa masvondo maviri apfuura. Mumwe murume asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati kubva nemusi weMuvhuro ange achiuya nababa vake kuti vazoongororwa navana chiremba paMpilo asi vasingawane rubatsiro. Murume uyu ati hurumende inofanirwa kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara. Muzvare Dorcas Mpofu avo vange vaperekedza sekuru vavo kuti vazorapwawo paMpilo vati havachaziva zvekuita vakatsinhirawo kuti dai hurumende yaona zvaingaita. Mukuru waana chiremba paMpilo Hospital, Dr Solwayo Ngwenya, vati chimwe chikamu chishoma chavanachiremba chakauya kubasa asi vabvuma kuti vana chiremba pamwe nevamwe vashandi vemuzvipatara havazi kufara uye vakawanda vavo havana kuuya kubasa nemusi weChitatu zvekuti zvinhu zvikaramba zvakadaro, hupenyu hweveruzhinji hunenge hwave munjodzi. Pamashoko ari kubuda mumapepanhau ehurumende ekuti hurumende iri kuunza vana chiremba vemuchiuto muzvipatara, Dr Ngwenya vati havasati vanzwa nezvavo. Sangano reZimbabwe Nurses Association rakaita musangano nezuro muHarare pamwe nemasangano anomirira vashandi vemuzvipatara, vakatora danho rekutangawo kuramwa mabasa kutanga nhasi. Mamiriro ezvhinhu paUnited Bulawayo Hospitals ange ari mamwe chete vana chiremba vakawanda vasiri pabasa uye vanoziva zviri kuitika vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana mukoti vakawanda vange vasiri pabasa. Mumwe murume wechikuru, VaMabuku Ndlovu, avo vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa nachiremba paUBH vati vaudzwa kuti havakwanise kuonekwa nekuti vana chiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Mukuru wavana chiremba pachipatara ichi, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, vati havakwanise kutaura nesu sezvo vange vari mumusangano. Vana chiremba vakawedzera kuramwa kwavo mabasa zvichitevera kupambwa kwakaita Dr Peter Magombeyi avo vange vakafanobata chigaro chemutungamiri wesangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association. No media source currently available

headline: Kaputeni weCaps United Zvirekwi Ochekwa Ruoko paChanza Mushure meTsaona
text: Mutambi weCaps United anovazve kaputeni wechikwata ichi, Hardlife Zvirekwi akakuvara zvakaipisisa munjodzi yemotokari muHarare neMuvhuro mangwanani zvakapa kuti vanachiremba kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals vamudimbure ruoko rwake nechepachanza. Mukuru wechikwata cheCaps United VaCuthbert Chitima vakaudza Studio 7 kuti vanachiremba vainge vavavimibisa kuti achakwanisa hake kuramba achitamba nhabvu kana ave kunzwa zviri nani. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMPARKS Yogura Zvipembere Nyanga Kudzivirira Kuurayiwa Zviri Kunze kweMutemo neVanotsvaga Nyanga
text: Zimbabwe Parks and Wildlife Management Authority, ZIMPARKS, yakaparura zvakare chirongwa chekugura zvipembere nyanga senzira yekudzivirira kuurayiwa kwazvo nevanovhima zvipembere vachida nyanga dzazvo. Mutauriri weZIMPARKS, VaTinashe Farawo, vanoti izvi zvinhu zvavagara vachiita nguva nenguva, uye gore rino vari kuronga kubvisa zvipembere chiuru nyanga, vachitanga nezviri ku Lake Chiwero. VaFarawo vanoti nyanga dziri kubviswa pazvipembere izvi dzichachengetwa kudura ravanochengetera nyanga dzezvipembere kubva mugore ra 1975. Vanonyika yasarirwa nezvipembere zvinosvika chiuru nemazana maviri chete, izvo zviri kuita kuti vakwanise kufambisa chirongwa chekugura nyanga ichi zviri nyore. Asi VaFarawo vanoti izvi hazvisi nyore kuitwa kunzou nekuti nyika ine nzou dzakawandisa zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vagari vekwaMutoko Vonyunyuta neKushaya Cheuviri Kubva muMatombo Anocherwa Mudunhu Mavo
text: Vamwe vagari vekwamutoko vakapinda mumusangano wakaitwa paMutoko Centre neVOA yakabatana neMedia Centre neChitatu chapfuura vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti itore matanho ekusimudzira mararamiro avo. Vagari ava vakaisawo mibvunzo kune mumwe akapindawo mumusangano uyu, VaShame Kativhu, avo vaimbove kanzura, vachida kunzwisisa kuti makanzura anombotaurawo here pamusoro pematambudziko avanosangana nawo mudunhu ravo pavanoita misangano yavo. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vaidawo kunzwisisa mafambisirwo emari dzinobva mukucherwa kwematombo kana kuti black granite mudunhu mavo, vachiti madzishe namasabhuku vanifanirwa kuona kuti vabata nyaya idzi zvine hungwaru. Chirongwa ichi chaikokerwa nemukuru weMedia Centre VaErnest Mudzengi, uye chakanga chakatsigirwa nemuzinda weAmerica muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Chimwe Chirwere Chakafanana neCovid-19 Chinonzi Chatangidza Kubata Vana
text: Vanachiremba vanoti chimwezve chirwere chavanoti chakaita se Covid-19 asi chakanangana nevana, chave kunetsa mumatunhu mazhinji muAmerica neku United Kingdom. Matunhu gumi nemashanu muAmerica anoti arikuongorora chirwere ichi, icho chiri kubata vana asi chisati chazivikanwa zvakakwana, vachiti chirwere ichi chakaita se coronavirus. Gavhuna vedunhu reNew York, VaAndrew Cuomo, vanoti vezvehutano mudunhu reNew York vawana vana vanopfuura zana vanechirwere ichi, icho chinonzi chakafanana nechimwezve chirwere chinonzi Kawasaki Desease. Vati magavhuna ematunhu gumi nemashanu muAmerica vave kuongororavo chirwere ichi mumatunhu avo. VaCuomo vati avo vane vana vakamboenda padyo nemunhu ane Covid-19 masvondo apfuura, vanofanirwa kuziva kuti iyi iyambiro uye vanofanirwa kuenda nemwana kuna vanachiremba nekukurumidza. Vana vatatu vane makore mashanu, makore manomwe neumwe ane makore gumi nemasere vatofa nechirwere ichi mudunhu reNew York. Vachipa humbowo mberi kweparamende ye America nemusi weChipiri, chiremba vanoona nezvezvirwere zvinotapuriranwa, Dr Anthony Fauci, vakayambira hurumende nemagavhuna mu America kuti vangwarire chirwere chave kutanga kuonekwa muvana, vachiti chirwere ichi chinoratidza sekuti chine hukama necoronavirus. Vanachiremba kuUnited Kingdom ndivo vanonzi vakatanga kuona chirwere ichi, vachichifananidza nechirwere chinonzi Kawasaki Disease, chirwere chakaipisisa kuvana vanenge vambobatwa nezvimwe zvirwere. Tabvunza nyanzvi mune zvehutano, Doctor Frenk Guni, kuti varondedzere pamusoro pechirwere ichi chanangana nevana vadiki. No media source currently available

headline: WFP Yowedzera Kubatsira Zimbabwe Mushure Mekunge VaMugabe Vati Nzara Yapfunya Chisero muNyika
text: Mutauriri wesangano reWorld Food Programme kuchamhembe kweAfrica VaDavid Orr vanoti mashoko emutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe ekuti Zimbabwe inyika iri parumananzombe kana kuti state of disaster panyaya yechikafu ave kureva kuti vave kusimbisa mabasa ekutsvaga mari yekubatsira vanhu vemuZimbabwe. WFP yainge yati ichabatsira vanhu vanopfuura zviuru mazana masere munyika asi inogona kuwedzerwa huwandu uhu. Payakati inoda kubatsira vanhu ava zvainzi vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu ndivo vaida chikafu munyika asi ikozvino vave mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mana. Mukuru weChristian Care, rimwe sangano rinobatsira nechikafu richishanda neWFP, Reverend Stanlus Chatikobo vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika uye kuwana zvekudya kuri kunetsa. VaChatikobo vati kana vawana mari vanobatsira vanhu nemadhora gumi pamunhu mumhuri. Vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni makumi matatu kusanganisa kuSouth Africa kusingawanzopihwe chikafu vanonzi vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa kudunhu rekuchamhembe kweAfrica. No media source currently available

headline: Munhu Mumwe Chete Akafa neChirwere CheCovid-19 neSvondo kuMatabeleland South
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo munhu mumwe chete akafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 kuMatabeleland South zvichireva kuti vanhu vafa vachiri chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 1,557. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vabatwa nacho vave zviuru makumi matatu nemasere ane makumi masere nevatanhatu kana kuti 38, 086. Vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri vakapora zvasiya vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu zvine nezana nemakumi maviri nevatatu kana ktui 35, 123. Vanhu vachiri kurwara vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mana nevatanhatu kana kuti 1,406. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga vave zviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nemazana matanhatu kana kuti 336, 600. Vabayiwa nhomba kaviri sezvinokurudzirwa vave zviuru makumi mashanu nematatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere kana kuti 53, 418.

headline: Bazi rezveHutano Rinoti neSvondo Hakuna Akafa neCovid-19 Uye Vatanhatu Chete Ndivo Vakabatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatanhatu chete ndivo vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika yose pavanhu vanodarika mazana matanhatu nevaviri kana 602 vavhenekwa uye hapana kana mumwe chete akafa. Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 ava vose havana nhoroondo yekumboshanya kunze kwenyika. Izvi zvave kureva kuti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi hwasvika pazviuri zvitanhatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevaviri kana kuti 6,412. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika huchiri pazana nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevatanhatu kana kuti 196. Vanhu vapora vanosvika zviuru zvishanu zvine makumi matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 5, 061 zvichitevera kupora kwevanhu vashanu kuMashonaland East. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano nehama dzevafi dzinoti vamwe vanhu vari kufa vangadai vasiri kufa dai vashandi vemuzvipatara kusanganisira vakoti navanachiremba vasiri kuramwa mabasa. Mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga vari kukurudzira vashandi ava kuti vadzokere kumabasa zvichemo zvavo zvichizeyiwa asi zvinenge zvakona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro weHealth Services Board Dr Paulinus Sikosana vatendawo kuStudio 7 kuti hapana chati chafamba muhurongwa hwekuti vashandi mubazi rezvehutano vadzoke kumabasa. Mutungamiri wesangano revakoti reZimbabwe Nurses Association VaEnoch Dongo vanoti havasi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika zvichemo zvavo zvagadziriswa. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 1, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Vafa vasvika zviuru zviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nemazana mana nemakumi matatu kana kuti 29, 430. Vapora vave kuda kusvika zviuru mazana mapfumbamwe zvine makumi matanhau nemapfumbamwe kana kuti 969, 000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu kana kuti 25 million.  Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muAmerica vadarika zviuru zana ne makumi masere nemaviri kana kuti 182,000. Vafa pasi rose vachidarika zviuru mazana masere zvine makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 843, 000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu nezviuru mazana mana kana kuti 16, 4 million.

headline: Kasikana (8) shasha yemotor-cross
text: KASIKANA kemakore masere okuberekwa koita zvinorova mumutambo wemotor-cross izvo zviri kukaona kachitatsurana nevakomana vakuru kwakari mumujaho yakasiyana.   Kare mujaho wemotor-cross waizivikanwa uri wevarume asi kuzouya kwakaita Tanya Muzinda, uyo akwanisa kunokwikwidza kunyika dzakasiyana dzekunze achihwina mikombe yakawanda, kwabva kwavhurira mikana vamwe vasikana vakaita saMufaro Kabasa (8) uyo ave kutevera mumatsimba ake.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza svondo rino, Mufaro anoti chishuwo chake kusimudzira mureza weZimbabwe sezvinoitwa naTanya kuburikidza nekuhwina mibairo yakawanda kunze kwenyika.   “Ndakazviona kuti hapana mutambo unonzi ndewevakomana chete, isu vasikana tinogona kuzviitawo uye pasina chinotikanganisa.   “Ndakazvarwa ndichingofarira kuchovha bhasikoro uye ndichikwikwidza nevakomana kumaraini. Pandakanzwa nezvaTanya ndipo ndakati ndinokwanisa kuzviitawo uye ndokutanga kukwikwidza kuDonnybrook.   “Hapana chinombonditadzisa kusvika kure nekuti zvese zviripo zvinondibatsira kuti ndibudirire,” anodaro Mufaro. Shasha iyi parizvino iri kuita Grade 4 pachikoro cheGroombridge Primary, muHarare uye anoti dzidzo ndiwo musimboti wezvose muhupenyu hwake nekudaro anoikoshesa sezvaanoita mutambo wemotor-cross.   Anoti paanoenda kuchikoro, haasiye mukurumbira waave nawo uchimupinda mumusoro asi anongoita zvefundo yake. “Fundo yakakosha uye ndiwo musimboti wezvese muhupenyu saka ndinotanga ndaita zvechikoro changu, ndapedza ndochienda kumotor-cross kunoita gadziriro dzangu kana ndakatarisana nemujaho.   “Mazuva ano fundo inodiwa pazvose nekuti mune ramangwana kana ndave kuzoenda kunokwikwidza kunze kwenyika handizive kuti zvinofamba sei saka zvakakosha kushanda nesimba kune zvose,” anodaro Mufaro.   Baba vake, Kudakwashe Kabasa uyo anove zvakare maneja wake, anoti chipo chiri pamwana wake chakakosha zvikuru. “Tinokoshesa fundo yaMufaro nemutambo uyu saka ini ndinenge ndiripo nguva dzese ndichimuendesa kuchikoro kana apedza toenda naye kunoita gadziriro dzake. Chishuwo chedu kuona achibudirira mumutambo uyu uye fundo yake achipasa zvakare,” anodaro Kabasa.

headline: Masangano Akazvimirira Okwezva Vanhu Kunonyoresa kuVhota Kuburikidza neMimhanzi
text: Vanhu vane chitsama vaungana mumusha weCowdray Park muBulawayo neSvondo vachiona vaimbi vakasiyana-siyana pamwe nekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota pasi pechirongwa chaitwa nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega. Masangano aya anga achishanda nesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission mukuedza kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota musarudzo dzichaitwa gore rino. Vamwe vevanhu ava, vanosanganisira vechidiki, vange vachinyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kekutanga muhupenyu hwavo. Mumwe wevanhu vakadaro ndiKindness Mukume uyo ati ange asati awana mukana wekunyoresa achitiwo azokwezvwa kuuya kuzonyoresa nenyaya yekuti anga auya kuzoona vamwe vevaimbi vange varipo sezvo achifarira zvemumhanzi. Mumwezve wechidiki Muzvare Shamiso Ncube, avo vane makore makumi maviri nemana ekuberekwa, ndemumwe wevanyoresawo kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota pachiitiko ichi, vachiti vange vasati vanyoresa nekuti vange vave nekanguva vari kuSouth Africa. VaTawanda Chimhini vanove mukuru wesangano reElection Resource Centre, rinove rimwe remasangano ange ari muchirongwa ichi, vati vakatanga kushandisa chirongwa chekushandisa vaimbi kuedza kukwezva vanhu kuti vanyorese kuvhota kubvira gore rapera. Vati chirongwa ichi vari kuchiita senzira yekuedza kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota, kunyanya munzvimbo dzine vanhu vashoma vari kuita izvi. VaChimhini vatiwo kunyange hazvo chirongwa cheMop-Up chave kupera, chirongwa chekuedza kukwezva vanhu ichi chinobatsira sezvo kunyoreswa kwevanhu kucharamba kuchienderera mberi kusvika kumazuva gumi nemaviri mushure mekunge zuva rekuvhota ratarwa zviri pamutemo. Mukuru wezvesarudzo mudunhu reBulawayo Amai Sithembiso Khupe vati chirongwa chanhasi chavabatsira zvikuru pakusimudzira huwandu hwevanhu vauya kuzonyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Chirongwa cheBVR Mop-Up, icho chakatanga musi wa10 Ndira, chinotarisirwa kupera nemusi weChina 8 Kukadzi. Dunhu reBulawayo ndiro rine vanhu vashoma vanyoresa pamatunhu ose ari munyika. Vanhu zvikamu makumi mashanu nezvinomwe kubva muzana ndivo vanyoresa kusvika pari zvino mudunhu iri. Vanhu vanopfuura mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana maviri ndivo vanyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota munyika mose kusvika pari zvino. ZEC inoti yakanga yakatarisira kunyoresa vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu. No media source currently available

headline: Ndasuwa nhabvu: Antipas
text: MURAIRIDZI weChicken Inn, Joey “Mafero” Antipas, anoti asuwa zvikuru mutambo wenhabvu uye kuramba akagara pamba nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 kwakurwadza asi ajaira sezvo zvichibatsira hupenyu hwake nehwevakawanda.   Mafero — uyo akatungamira maGamecocks kuhwina mukombe weCastle Premiership mugore ra2015 — anoti kugara asingarairidze mutambo waanodisisa uye kuuona kwakaoma asi vanhu vanofanirwa kugara mudzimba kuti vange vakachengetedzeka.   “Ndasuwa mutambo wedu asi iye zvino chakakosha kunge takachengetedzeka kuti coronavirus isarambe ichipararira.   “Ngatitevedzere zvinodiwa chete, ini ndiri mumba mangu uye handisi kumbobuda,” anodaro Mafero.   Ari mamwe makore, mitambo yePSL ingadai yakatanga asi yakambomiswa nekuda kweCovid-19 senzira yekuti vanhu vasaungane uye kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire pakati pevanhu.   Antipas anoti mwedzi miviri mutambi asingatambe nhabvu yakawandisa chaizvo saka ari kukurudzira vatambi vake kuti vange vachiita gadziriro vari kudzimba dzavo nekuti hapana anoziva kuti mitambo inotanga rinhi.   “Vatambi venhabvu vanofanirwa kukoshesa miviri yavo saka tiri kutovakurudzira kuti vari kudzimba dzavo vambomhanya uye kuita gadziriro dzakasiyana. Chirwere ichi chatidzidzisa kuti tinofanirwa kufamba nezviripo,” anodaro.

headline: Umwe Mukuru Wesangano Rinomirira Vashandi VeMenisiparati YeChitungwiza Anombomiswa Basa
text: Menisiparati yeChitungwiza yambomisa basa mukuru we St Marys Clinic, Sister Shingirai Tsvangirai, zvichitevera kushanda zvishomazvishoma kwakatangwa kuitwa nevashandi svondo rapera. Vashandi vemenisiparati varikuratidzira vachiti vanoda kupiwa mbatya dzekuzvidzivirira kana vari pabasa, uye vanoda mari yekuenda kumabasa sezvo vamwe vavo vachifamba mamaira matanhatu netsoka kuenda kumabasa avo. Vanotizve havasi kupiwa mihoro yavo. Pamusoro pekuva Sister-In-Charge veSt Mary's Clinic, Sister Tsvangirai mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wesangano rinomirira vashandi, reChitungwiza Municipal Workers Union. Mutungamiri wesangano iri, VaEphraim Katsina, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru mumenisiparati vagara vachishora Sister Tsvangirai vachiti vanotaurisa mumisangano yevashandi. VaKatsina vanoti vashandi vashatirwa zvikuru pavanzwa nezvekumbomiswa basa kwaSister Tsvangirai vakabvumirana kuti vave kuregera zvekuratidzira vachiti vave kutangidza kuramwa mabasa. Taedza kutaura ne vakafanobata chigaro chemunyori weguta reChitungwiza, Dr Tonderai Kasu, vakatitumira gwaro vachiti ichokwadi kuti Sister Tsvangirai vambomiswa basa, vachiti havagoni kutaura zvakawanda sezvo nyaya iyi ichiri kukurukurwa kuona zvakakanganiswa naSister Tsvangirai uye kuona kuti vanorangwa sei kana vaine mhosva. No media source currently available

headline: World Bank Inoti Kuda Kutanga Bhizimisi muZimbabwe Kuchiri Kunetsa
text: Gwaro reWorld Bank rinoratidza mamiriro ezvinhu munyika dzepasi rose panyaya dzekuita bhizimisi munyika idzi rinoratidza kuti Zimbabwe ichiri pachinhano chepasi, zvisinei nechinangwa chehurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa chekuda kuvandudza hupfumi hwenyika pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika. Mugwaro iri, iro rinonzi “Doing business” regore ra2019, Zimbabwe iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neshanu. Mugore rino ra2018 Zimbabwe yange iri pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu nepfumbamwe. Chipangamazano musangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe Doctor Propser Chitambara avo vanovewo nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vanoti dambudziko guru panyaya yekuvandudza hupfumi pamwe nemaitirwo ebhizimisi munyika inyaya yekuti hurumende inotaura zvinhu zvaisingaite. Mauritius iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri ndiyo nyika iri pachinhano chepamusoro-soro panyika dzemuAfrica ichiteverwa neRwanda iyo iri pachinhano chemakumi maviri nepfumbamwe. Panyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica South Africa iri pachinhano chemakumi masere nepiri (82) Botswana iri pachinhano chemakumi masere netanhatu (86). Zambia iri pachinzvimbo chemakumi masere nenomwe (87) kozotiwo Namibia iri pachinzvimbo chezana nenomwe (107). Gwaro iri rinotarisa zvinhu zvakasiyana-siyana kusanganisira kuti zvinotora nguva yakareba sei kuti munhu akwanise kutanga bhizimisi, zviri nyore here kuwana magetsi, nezvimwe zvakadaro. VaReginald Shoko vanove mukuru wesangano reAffirmative Action mudunhu reMatabeleland vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutora muenzaniso wenyika yeRwanda iyo yakabvisa mitemo yakawanda pakuvhura mabhizimisi munyika iyi. VaButler Tambo muongorori wezve budiriro anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti rimwe dambudziko guru rinokanganisa kuvandudzwa kwehupfumi pamwe nekuitwa kwebhizimisi munyika inyaya yemitemo isina kujeka. VaTambo vanotiwo nyaya yekuti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi iri kupa kuti hurumende ingovimbisa zvaisiri kukwanisa kuita. Vati hurumende inofanira kuzvipira kurwisa huori uho huri kukanganisa nyaya yebudiriro kana kukwezva vanoda kutanga mabhizimisi. VaChitambara vanobvumiranawo nemaonero aya. Mugwaro ra2019 nyika yeDjibouti ndeimwe yenyika dzakasimukira zvikuru kubva pachinhano chezana nemakumi mashanu neina kusvika pachinhano chemakumi mapfumbamwe nepfumbamwe. Gwaro iri rinoti nyika iyi yakkwanisa kuita izvi nekuvandudza mitemo yayo kusanganisira kuita kuti vanhu vakwanise kunyoresa mabhizimisi avo munguva pfupi. Bhanga reWorld Bank rinoburitsa gwaro re”Doing Business” gore rega rega. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi, asi ivo nemutungangamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa pasi pedingidzira ravo rekuti Zimbabwe Yakavhura Magonhi ekuita bhizimisi kana kuti "Zimbabwe Is Open for Business" vanotaura nyaya yekurerutsa kuita mabhizimisi munyika sechinhu chavanonyanya kukoshesa.

headline: VaTsvangirai Voita Misangano kuMashonaland East
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMovement for Democratic Change VaMorgan Tsvangirai kutanga nemusi weChishanu vachange vari mudunhu reMashonaland East kwemazuva matatu vachiita misangano nevatsigiri vavo. Bato reMDC-T rinoti VaTsvangirai vari kuitawo misangano iyi kugadzirira sarudzo dzemuna 2018. VaTsvangirai vachange vari paKotwa Growth Point neChishanu vozoita mumwe musangano wechipiri paMutoko Growth Point. Nemusi weMugovera, VaTsvangirai vachange vari kuMarondera kuRudhaka Stadium vasati vasimuka vakananga kuZaire Business Centre kuHwedza. VaTsvangirai mumwedzi yapera vange vachishanyirawo mamwe matunhu akaita seMatabeleland, Mashonaland Central neMasvingo. Mutauriri waVaTsvangirai VaLuke Tamborinyoka vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari kufarira VaTsvangirai vachiti vachavavhotera muna 2018. No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanopinda Muzuva Repiri Vachiramwa Mabasa
text: Vana chiremba vapinda neChina muzuva repiri rekuramwa mabasa. Vana chiremba avo vanoti pamusangano wavaita nebazi rezveutano, hurumende yavimbisa kutambira chinyunyuto chimwe chete chete. Vachitaura neStudio7, mutungamiri weZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, Dr Edgar Munatsi, vati nhengo dzavo zhinji hadzisi pabasa sezvo vakamirira kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe nehurumende. VaMunatsivati vanotorwadziwa zvikuru sanachiremba kuti hupenyu hwevanhu huri parumananzombe nekuda kwekuramwa mabasa kwavo uku. Vakurudzira hurumende kuti ikurumidze kugadzirisa zvinyunyuto zvavo. VaMunatsi vatinhengo dzavo dziri kutyityidzirwa nevamwe vakuru vemuzvipatara asi vati mumusangano wavaita nehurumende nhasi, vavimbiswa kuti kuita kwakadai kuchamiswa. Vana chiremba vanoti pahurukuro dzavaita nhasi nehurumende, hurumende yavimbisa kugadzirisa chinyunyuto chimwechete chekuvawanisa mabasa kana vapedza zvidzodzo zvavo zvepamusoro. Pari zvino hurumende yange ichibatirira kuzvitupa zvana chiremba ava kwegore kunyange hazvo hurumende yange isingavapi mabasa. Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctor’s Association, VaInnocent Zano, vati chinangwa chavo ndechekuti hurumende igadzirise zvinyunyuto zvavo zvese, vonyorerana pasi kuti vadzokere kubasa. Pashanyirwa chipatara cheParirenyatwa, vana chiremba vange vakatogara zvavo vachitaura nyaya nguva dzebasa. Studio 7 yatadza kutaura nevarwere sezvo kwange kuchidiwa tsamba kubva kubazi rezveutano . Asi VaBrian Paradza, avo vashanyira hama yavo kuParirenyatwa vakurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise dambudzo iri vakati murwere wavo kubva nezuro haasati awonekwa nachiremba. Bazi rezvautano rabudisa gwaro rekukurudzira vana chiremba kuti vadzokere kumabasa apo zvichemo zvavo zvinenge zvichigadziriswa. Asi MDC inotungamirwa naVaMorgan Tsvangirai yaburitsa mashoko ichiti haisi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yeZanu PF iyo iri kuvhiringa hutano hwenyika yese nekutadza kugadzirisa zvichemo zvavana chiremba. No media source currently available

headline: RBZ neZimtrade Dzoyedza Kumutsiridza Mabhizimisi emuBulawayo
text: Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe ichishanda neZimtrade svondo rino riri kuparura hurongwa hwekuyedza kumutsiridza maindasitiri ekuBulawayo. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi hadzisi kuwiririrana kuti zviri kuda kuitwa izvi zvinoshanda here kana kuti kwete. Nhumwa kubva kuRBZ neZimtrade dziri kutarisirwa kupinda muBulawayo nemusi weChitatu dzotaura nevemaindasitiri ava kusvika musi weChishanu. Maindasitiri akawanda muBulawayo akavharwa nekusamira zvakanaka kwenyaya dzezvehupfumi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachitungamira zvidzidzo paZimbabwe Ezekiel Guti University, Doctor Gift Mugano, vanoti zvekutumira chikwat kuenda kuBulawayo kupedzera hoko padehwe retsindi sezvo zviri kuda kuitwa zvichizivikanwa. Vati pane ongororo dzakaitwa nemasangano akaita saana Confederation of Zimbabwe Industries dzinotaura zvinoda kuitwa. Vatiwo chiri kunetsa inyaya yemari nekuti maindasitiri anoda mabhiriyoni maviri kuti asarambe achitatarika. Doctor Mugano vatiwo kuti Bulawayo ibudirire inofanira kukwanisa kukwikwidzana nemamwe makambani ari kuchamhembe kweAfrica vachiti mitero inobhadharwa muZimbabwe yakawandisa zvekuti inogona kupa kuti vekunze vasade kuita bhizimisi neZimbabwe. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaCalvin Mdzingiri, avo vanodzidzisa paUniversity of the Free State kuSouth Affrica, vati vanotenderana naDoctor Mugano vachiti zvinoda kuitwa yave garoziva. Vatiwo zvakakosha kuti pave neongororo yekuti maindasitiri anoda kuvhurwa ane zvaanokwanisa kutengesa nyore kuvanhu. Mumiriri weMpopoma-Pelandaba mudare reparamende vari nhengo yeZanu-PF, VaJoseph Tshuma, vati zvinhu zvakakosha kuti maindasitiri emuBulawayo amutsiridzwe. Asi nhengo yeparamende inomirira Bulawayo East mudare reparamende, Muzvare Thabitha Khumalo, vati Zanu-PF iri kuda kubata vanhu kumeso. MuZimbabwe vamwe vakazvimirira vanoti vanhu vanosvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe kubva muzana havana mabasa nenyaya yekuvharwa kwemaindustry. Ongororo yakaitwa ne International Monetary Fund inoratidza kuti Zimbabwe inyika iri pachidanho chechipiri pasi rose kuva nevanhu vanozviitira mabasa emaoko kana kuti informal sector. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Coach wemaWarriors mutsva munaNdira’
text: SANGANO reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti richatanga kutsvaga murairidzi mutsva wemaWarriors munaNdira apo pachange papera kondirakiti yaJoey “Mafero” Antipas uyo akafanobata chigaro chekurairidza chikwata ichi.   Kondirakiti yaAntipas  — uyo anorairidza Chicken Inn zvakare — ichapera nemusi wa31 Zvita.   Antipas akagadzwa kuti afanobata chigaro chekurairidza maWarriors zvichitevera kusiya basa kwakaitwa naSunday “Mhofu” Chidzambwa apo maWarriors aive achangobva kumakwikwi eAfrica Cup of Nations.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, mukushi wemashoko weZifa, Xolisani Gwesela — uyo anove zvakare competitions manager — anoti Antipas ndiye ari kurairidza chikwata ichi kusvika gore rino rapera uye vachazozivisa kuti ndiani achatora chigaro ichi.   “Parizvino Joey Antipas ndiye ari panyanga uye kondirakiti yake yatinayo ichapera musi wa31 Zvita gore rino, kubva ipapo ndipo tichazozivisa nyika kuti tave kufamba sei,” anodaro.   Achibvunzwa neKwayedza kuti parizvino Zifa yambokurukura nevarairidzi vangani kana kuti vangani vakauya kwavari vachitsvaga basa rekurairidza maWarriors,  Gwesela anoti, “Sekutaura kwandaita, tichakuzivisai kana musi wa31 Zvita wadarika apo kondirakiti yedu naAntipas inenge yapera.”   Mwedzi unotevera maWarriors achatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumakwishu e2021 Africa Cup of Nations ayo achaitirwa kuCameroon uye Antipas ndiye ari kutarisirwa kutungamira chikwata ichi.

headline: Varume Vari Kupomerwa Mhosva yeKuuraya Musoja kuChivhu Vanonzi Vapfurwa Vakafa neMauto neMapurisa
text: Varume vaviri vakapfura masoja maviri mumwe wacho akafa muChivhu nezuro\nvapfurwa vakafa nhasi kuNyazvidzi pedyo nekuBuhera. Nunurai Jena\nanotipa nyaya inotevera. Vaviri ava, avo vasati vave kuzivikanwa mazita avo vapfurwa nemasoja achibatsirana nemapurisa. Mutauriri wemapurisa Asst Comm Paul Nyathi vabvuma kuti vaviri ava vapfurwa vose vakafa uye pfuti dzavakatora dzawanikwa vachinadzo. Masoja maviri aya akapfurwa pane imwe kamba yemapurisa diki pedyo neChicken Inn kuChivhu. Kamba yemapurisa iyi ine mauto nemapurisa ari kubatsirana kuona kuti vanhu vatevedzera here kurudziro yekuti vagare mudzimba senzira yekutevedzera mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. VaNyathi vanoti munhu akapfura mauto aya akapinda pakamba apa ndokukumbira mumwe muuto kuti vataura panze ndokuzodzoka mukamba vose achibva apfura nekuuraya mumwe muuto mumwe akakuvara zvakaipisisa asati atiza nemumwe wake. Kupfurwa kwemasoja uku kuri kuuya apo hukama hwevanhu nemasoja husina kumira zvakanaka nekuda kwekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kuri kupomerwa mamwe masoja munyika. Makore maviri apera mugore ra2018 muna Nyamavhuvhu vanhu vatanhatu vakapfurwa vakafa nevanofungidzirwa kuti masoja vachiratidzira asi hapana musoja akasungwa kunyange pakaitwa ongororo yaitungamirwa nevaive mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaKgalema Mothlanthe. Asi vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vakawanda vataura neStudio 7 vati kunyangwe vanhu vakanetsana hapafanire kudeurwa ropa sezvo paine matare anofanira kutonga nyaya dzose. Gweta uye vari mukuru wesangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaDzikamai Bere vanoti hukama hwevanhu nemasoja hauna kunaka zvachose vachiti hukama uhu hunofanirwa kugadziriswa kuti vanhu vakwanise kuyamura mapurisa nemasoja mubasa ravo. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri webato reMDC Alliance VaClifford Hlatswayo vanoti masoja, mapurisa nevanhu vanofanirwa kuremekedzana kuti nyika ifambire mberi zvakanaka. Mamwe magweta ataura neStudio 7 ati kufa kwevanhu vakuraya muuto uku kuchapa kuti nyika isazive kuti chii chaizvo chakapa kuti padeuke ropa asi vachiti zvinonetsa kubata vanhu vanenge vachipomerwa mhosva yekuuraya uye vaine pfuti. Vanhu nemasoja vakamboita hukama hwakasimba apo masoja akabatsira kupidigura vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Robert Mugabe. Asi vamwe vanoongorora nyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vanoti masoja haafanire kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika sezvinokurudzirwa nebumbiro remitemo. Nezure wakare vamwe vanhu vakaonekwa vakatakura nekumhanyisa muuto ainge akuvara kuchipatara.

headline: Hurumende Inomisa Chirongwa Chekupa Vadzidzi Zvitupa neNyaya yeCovid-19
text: Kunyange hazvo hurumende yakamisa neMugovera chirongwa chekuti vana vanoda kunyora bvunzo dzeOrdinary neAdvanced Level vatore zvitupa nekuda kwekutyira kupararira kweCovid-19, nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo dzinoti zvakakosha kuti chirongwa ichi chienderere mberi kuitira kuti pasaita nhubu dzinonyorera vamwe mazamanishoni. Hurumende yainge yaisa parutivi zuro nanhasi semazuva maviri ekuti vaya vanoda kunyora bvunzo gore rino vatore zvitupa, asi yakazomisa chirongwa ichi chave pakati nezuro masikati yave kutyira kuti denda reCovid-19 ringapararire zvakanyanya mushure mekunge vanhu vabuda zvine mutsindo. Bazi rezvemukati menyika pamwe nevakafanobata chigaro chaRegistrar-General, VaHenry Machiri, vakazivisa nezuro kuti vakamisa chirongwa ichi mushure mekunge vanhu vakawandisa vaenda kumahofisi avo kunotorerwa zvitupa. Mapurisa akatozoshevedzwa kuzochengetedza runyararo uye vamwe vakanga vatorara pamahofisi aRegistrar General aya vachida zvitupa. Mumwe mudzidzi wepane chimwe chikoro muHarare, Chipo Zhou, uyo akamukira pamahofisi aRegistrar-General ari paMachipisa mumusha weHigfiled muHarare, audza Studio 7 kuti akawana paine vanhu vaidarirka chiuru vakanga vave mumutseste nechakare uye akazobva asina kutora chitupa mushure mekuudzwa kuti chirongwa ichi chaitirwa vaye vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti private colleges. Mumwe murairiridzi wepane chimwe chikoro mumusha weGlen View uyo aramba kudzomwa nezita, audza Studio 7 kuti ichokwadi kuti chirongwa ichi chinobata vana vanodzidza kuma private collegel. Ati vanhu vari muzvikoro zvehurumende, makunzuru kana zvemakereke havadi zvitupa kuti vanyore bvunzo. Murairidzi uyu atiwo vana vakawanda vaida zvitupa nekuti vanodzidza muzvikoro zvakazvimirira kana kuti zvisina kunyoreswa nehurumende uye zvisingabvumidzwe kunyoresa bvunzo. Nyanzvi munyaya dzedzidzo uye vari mutungamiriri wesangano rinomirira varairidzi reProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, Doctor Takavafira Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvakakosha kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vasingadzidzi muzvikoro vatore zvitupa vachiti izvi zvinodzivirira hutsotsi nechikiribidi pabvunzo. Doctor Zhou, vaudza Studio 7 kuti zvinosuwisa kuti vanhu vanotambura kutora zvitupa munyika vachiti hapafaniri kuitwa zvematongerwo enyika pakutora zvitupa. Mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, vanoti ichokwadi kuti vaya vasiri muzvikoro zvakanyoreswa kana kuti vari kudzidza kuma Non-Formal school, kana kuti vanganzi External Candidates, ndivo chete vanosungirwa kunge vaine zvitupa pabvunzo, kwete vanodzidza musvikoro zviri pasi pehurumende, makanzuru kana mamishoni. Zimbabwe Schools Examinations Council yakazivisa mwedzi wapera kuti vanoda kunyora bvunzo vanofanira kunge vabhadhara mari dzebvunzo musi wa9 Chikunguru uye vano nonoka vanofanira kubhadhara mari iyi musi wa30 Chikungururu. Doctor Zhou vaudza Studio 7 kuti vasina kukwanisa kutora zvitupa nezuro vachinenguva yekutora zvitupa izvi sezvo pachine nguva pazonosvika 30 Chikunguru. Vatiwo Covid-19 inogona kukanganisa kunyorwa kwebvunzo idzi uye semaonero avo, gore rino vana vachafoira zvakanyanya sezvo vasina nguva yekudzidza yakakwana uye varairidzi vasiri kudzidzisa nekuti havasi kufara nemihoro yavanotambira. Hurumende yakambomisa kuvhurwa kwezvikoro nekuti Covid-19 iri kupararira zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mashanu Vanobatwa Vaine Mhando yeOmicron Variant
text: Vanhu makumi mashanu vanonzi vakabatwa vaine mhando itsva yeCovid-19 yeOmicron variant muZimbabwe. Vachitaura pamusangano wavaita nevatori venhau muHarare nhasi, mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvehutano, Doctor John Chamunorwa Mangwiro, vati ropa rakaongororwa iri raive rabva kuvanhu makumi maviri vakabatwa nedenda iri paMasvingo Teachers College, vatambi venhabvu makumi maviri nevaviri vechikwata che Under 17 National team, uye vamwe vanhu vasere. VaMangwiro vati ropa rese makumi mashanu rakavhenekwa rakawanikwa ruine hutachiona hwemhando itsva yeCovid -19 yeOmicron variant. VaMangwiro vatiwo vashandi vese vanoshanda nekurwisana nechirwere cheCovid 19 pamwe nevese vanorarama nezvirwere zvehupenyu hwese vave kufanirwa kubaiwa nhomba yetatu. VaMangwiro vatiwo kukwira kwehuwandu hwevari kubatiwa nehutachiona hweCovid -19 mucherechedzo wekuti nyika yapinda pachikamu chechina kubva zvatanga denda riri kana kuti 4th wave. Vaimbova gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Dr Henry Madzorera, vati ongororo iyi inoratidza kuti mhando yeCovid-19yeOmicron ratova dambudziko guru munyika. Zimbabwe yava pakati penyika dxzinodarika makumi mashanu, idzo dzinosanganisira America, Britain, Brazil nedzimwe dzine vanhu vane chirwere chemhando yeOmicron variant pasi rose zvichitevera kubuda kweSouth Africa pachena mwedzi wapera ichiti yainge yawana hutachiona uhu munyika iyi. Nyika dzakawanda dzakabva dzamisa kutambira vanhu vanobva kunyika nomwe dzekuchamhembe kweAfrica dzinosanganisira South Africa, Zimbabwe, Namibia, Mozambique, Lesotho, Eswatini neBotswana. Zimbabwe inoti iri kutora matanho ekuona kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika kuburikidza nekuti vanenge vapinda munyika vachibva kudzimwe nyika, kusanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe, vazvipatsanure kwemazuva akatarwa nehurumende mushure mekuvhenekwa chirwere ichi pavanopinda munyika. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa nezuro kuti hakuna munhu akafa nedenda iri munyikayose izvo zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vangori pazviuru zvina nemazana manomwe nevanomwe, 4 707. Vanhu chiuru chimwe chete nemakumi mana nevaviri vakabatwa nedenda iri nezuro wakare izvo zvakasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika vava zviuru zana nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu nemazana matatu nemakumi manomwenevapfumbamwe(136,379). Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga munyika vave mamiriyoni matatu ane zviuru mazana masere nemakumi maviri nezvipfumbamwenemazana matanhatu ane makumi matatu nevatanhatu(3 829 636). Vabayiwa nhomba yechipiri vave mamiriyoni maviri ane zviuru mazana\nmasere nemakumi mashanu nechimwe nemazana matanhatu ane makumi maviri nevashanu (2 851 625). Huwandu uhu hunogona kukwira nhasi manheru apo hurumende ichazivisa zvayawana nhasi. Hurumende inoti inoda kubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Democracy Institute Inoti Mauto Achava neShoko reKupedzisira paNyaya yeAchatungamira Zanu-PF
text: Sangano ravanachipangamazano munyika, reZimbabwe Democracy Institute, kana kuti ZDI, raburitsa gwaro rinonzi Zimbabwe political economy review: military factor in Zanu-PF succession politics iro riri kudorongodza nyaya yekupindira mune zvematongerwo enyika inonzi iri kuitwa nevakuru vemauto. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakaudza vatsigiri vebato ravo kumusangano wepagore weNational Conference webato ravo kuVictoria Falls kuti vamwe muchiuto, vasori nemapurisa vave kupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo e nyika. Panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chavo, sangano iri rinoti nyaya yaVaMugabe yekusada kuti pataurwe nyaya yekuti ndiyani anovatsiva ndiyo yapa kuti vechiuto vade kupindirawo. Sangano iri rinoti nesimba rine mauto zvinenge zvoreva kuti ivo chete ndivo vanenge vaine simba rekuti anotora chigaro chaVaMugabe muZanu-PF ndiyani sezvo vaine pfuti. ZDI iri kuyambira kuti nyaya yemauto yekupindira munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika inokanganisawo vekunze vanenge vachida kuuchika mari yavo munyika. Mukuru weZDI, uye vari nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika, Doctor Pedzisayi Ruhanya, avo vanoti zvemuchato weZanu-PF nemauto zvakatanga munguva yehondo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vanourayiwa neMauto Vakawanda Vachikuvara Mukuratidzira muHarare
text: Vanhu vatatu vapfurwa vakafa muHarare apo vatsigiri veMDC Alliance vange vachiratidzira kusafara kwavo nemafambisirwo aeri kuitwa basa rekuzivisa nyika zvakabuda musarudzo dzakaitwa neMuvhuro. Vaona zvaitika vanoti vanhu vapfurwa ava vanhuwo zvavo vabatwa nemhirizhonga yange isineyi nezvavanga vachiita. Mashoko atiri kutambira anoti vamwe vapfurwa vakafa afa madzimai anga achizvifambirawo zvawo. Muguta remuHarare maswera muchiridzwa pfuti nemapurisa achirwisana nevatsigiri veMDC Alliance. Mutauriri wemapurisa, Senior Assistant Commissioner Charity Charamba, vatenda kuti pane vanhu vaurayiwa muHarare mukuratidzira uku uye mitumbi yavo iri kuParirenyatwa Hospital. Mauto anofungidzirwa kuti ndiwo auraya vanhu ava. Zviuru nezviuru zvevatsigiri veMDC Alliance zvapinda mudhorobha mangwanani mazvatanga kuratidzira zvichiti sarudzo dzemusi weMuvhuro hadzina kubatwa zvakanaka neZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Zec. Varatidziri ava vatematema motokari dzeZanu PF nematombo pamwe nekutema mahwindo epamuzinda weZanu PF pamwe neZec. Pasina chinguva mapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo abva atanga kuridza pfuti panze pemahofisi eZanu PF. Panga pachiridzwa pfuti pamahofisi eZanu PF, vamwe varatidziri vaenda kwanga kuchiverengerwa mavhoti asi vazodzingwa nemapurisa avakandira hutsi hunokachidza pamwe nekuridzira pfuti mudenga. Varatidziri ava vabva vaparira nedhorobha rose vachiimba vachiti “tinoda Chamisa”. Chikopokopo chemasoja chazenge chave kutendererawo nepamusoro pevanhu vanga vachiratidzira uye masoja anonziwo anga ave kurova vanhu kune mimwe migwagwa iri pakati pedhorobha. Varatidziri ava vanoti havasi kuzofa vakadzokera kudzimba dzavo kudzamara zvavanoti ndizvo zvechokwadi zvakabuda musarudzo zvaziviswa kwete zviri kuziviswa neZec. Pataenda pamhepo, masoja pamwe nemapurisa anga akapakatira zvombo anga achimhanyisa vanga vachiratidzira ava. No media source currently available

headline: Vemabhizimisi neVanozviitira Mabasa eMaoko Votambira Kunyevenutswa kweMitemo Pakurwisa Covid-19
text: Vamwe vemabhizimisi vanoti vari kutambira nemufaro danho rehurumende rekumbonyevenutsa mimwe mitemo yekuti vanhu vagare mudzimba munguya ino yekuvharwa kwenyika, lockdown, senzira yekumisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, neMuvhuro vakawedzera chirongwa chelockdown nemamwe mavhiki maviri kunyange vakarerutsa zvimwe zvinhu kuitira kuti vakawanda vari mumabhizimisi nevanozviitira mabasa emaoko vakwanise kutanga kushanda. Kunyange hazvo huwandu hwevari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere ichi huri kuti dererei, VaMnangagwa vakati basa richiripo kuona kuti nyika yasvika padanho riri nani zvikuru munyaya dzevanenge vachirwara neCovid-19. Vakatiwo vanhu vanenge vobvumidzwa kufamba kubva na8 mangwanani kusvika na 5:30 manheru. Muhurumende vanobvumidzwa kuenda kubasa zvikamu makumi maviri nezvishanu kubva muzana kubva pazvikamu gumi kubva muzana. Asi vanhu parufu vanofanira kunge vari makumi matatu chete sekare. VaMnangagwa vakati vanozviitira mabasa emaoko vanokwanisa kuvhura vakatevedzera kurudziro dziri kuitwa neWHO dzinosanganisira kugeza maoko, kuvhenekwa hutachiona uye kushanda vari kure nakure. Munyori mukuru musangano reZimbabwe Chamber of Informal Economy Associations, VaWisborn Malaya, vanoti vari kutambira zvakataurwa naVaMnangagwa vachitiwo nhengo dzavo dzange dzaomerwa nehupenyu sezvo dzange dzisiri kushanda kubva gore rapera. Vatiwo vave kuita gadziro yekutanga mabasa avo vachishanda nemakanzuru akasiyana siyana. Mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, Doctor Israel Murefu, vanoti vari kufara kuti mabhizimisi akawanda ave kuvhurwa sezvo zvichibatsira kusimudzira hupfumi uye kuti vanhu vawane raramo. Munyori mukuru musangano revashandi revashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions VaJaphet Moyo . Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvepfumi vachidzidzisa paDurban University of Technology, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanotiwo zviri pachena kuti nyika yave kubvumidza hayo vanhu kushanda kunyange hazvo pachine zvirehwa rehwa zvishoma zvasara zvinofanirwa kugadziriswa. Gurukota rezvemari, Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube, vainge vati vanotarisira kuti hupfumi huwedzere nezvikamu zvinodarika zvinomwe kubva muzana kana kuti 7,5% asi dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzagara dzayambira kuti nekuda kweCovid-19 nezvimwe, izvi hazvikwanisike. No media source currently available

headline: Musangano weKimberly Process Wotanga KuAngola
text: Musangano weKimberly Process Certification Intercessional Plenary Scheme watanga kuLuanda, Angola neChipiri Zimbabwe ichichema nerekuti pane dzimwe nyika dzichiri kurwisa kuti isabvumidzwe kutengesa mangoda ayo. Musangano uyu uri kupera nemusi weMugovera. Vachitaura pamusangano uyu, gurukota rinoona nezvezvicherwa VaWalter Chidhakwa vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vanoti Zimbabwe iri kuita zvose zvinodiwa neKPC mukutengeswa kwemangoda. Vamwe vakuru muhurumende vanoti sangano reWorld Policy Institute rinoda kuti Zimbabwe isatengesa mangoda nekuti iri kutengesa mangoda pamusika wekuDubai zvinonzi zvinogona kupa kuti mari dzemangoda dzigume dzave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. Imwe kambani yekuBelgium inonzi Omega Diamonds yakabhadhariswa mari inosvika mamiriyoni zana nemamukumi mapfumbabwe nemashanu madhora ne KPC ichinzi yaisabhadhara mitero. Mangoda anotengeswa nekuDubai sezvinoitwa eZimbabwe anonzi anozoguma ave mumaoko emakoronyera uye vanhu vashoma ndivo vanoguma vowana mari yemangoda nenyaya yechikiribidi. Asi mukuru wekambani yePartnership Africa Canada, VaAllan Martin, avo vari kumusangano uyu vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakuru vehurumende yeZimbabwe vari kungorova bembera dzenhema panyaya iyi. VaMartin vati KPC inofanira kuona kuti mangoda atengeswa zviri pamutemo uye haafanire kuguma ave mumaoko evanopfurikidza mwero. VaMartin vatiwo Zimbabwe haifanire kungovhunduka chati kwatara. Kunyange hazvo makambani ekuMarange ave nemakore achichera mangoda, vakawanda, kusanganisira mamwe makurukota ehurumende vanoti havasi kuziva kuti mari yacho inofambiswa sei. Vashandi vakawanda kumakambani ekuMarange vari kupedzawo mwedzi vasina kubhadharwa vamwe vachigumurwa. Vakawanda vaifunga kuti mangoda achavandudza hupfumi asi zvinenge zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida. Sachigaro wesangano reResources Exploitation Watch iro rinorerekera zvakanyanya kuhurumende, VaTafadzwa Musarara vanoti zvekunakumisa Zimbabwe kutengesa mangoda hazvishande. No media source currently available

headline: Chevrons, Ireland zvotatsurana
text: CHIKWATA chenyika checricket chemaChevrons, svondo rino chiri kubandana neIreland mumitambo yeOne Day International.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi svondo radarika zvakatamba mitambo yeTwenty20 International Series iyo yakahwinwa nemaChevrons 2-1.   Mumitambo yeT20, maChevrons akahwina wekutanga, Ireland ndokuzohwina wechipiri uye maChevrons akahwina wechitatu uyo wakaaona achisimudza mukombe weT20.   Svondo rino, zvikwata izvi zviri kutatsurana mumitambo yeODI kunhandare yeHarare Sports Club. Mutambo wekutanga uri kutambwa nemusi weChitatu, wechipiri nemusi weMugovera uye wekupedzisira nemusi weMuvhuro (23 Ndira).   MaChevrons anotofanira kukunya dzisimbe kuti akunde mumutambo weODI uyu obva ahwina series yese inoti yeT20 neODI.   Achipedza kubandana neIreland, maChevrons haasi kumbozorora sezvo ari kubva atanga gadziriro dzekusangana neWest Indies mwedzi unotevera mumitambo miviri yetest match kuQueens Sports Club kuBulawayo.   Director wecricket kuZimbabwe Cricket (ZC) — Hamilton Masakadza — anoti nguva yange yareba chikwata chavo chisina kumbotamba mitambo yetest match.   Anoti vakagadzirira kusangana neWest Indies uye chikwata chavo chinoda kuhwina mutambo uyu.   “Tine mufaro kukuzivisai kuti tichashanyirwa neWest Indies iyo yatichatamba nayo mitambo miviri yetest match kuBulawayo.   “Kunyangwe hazvo nguva yange yareba tisina kumbotamba mitambo yetest match, vakomana vedu vachange vaine hukasha vakagadzirira kutamba mitambo iyi. Ndinovimba kuti mumwe mutambo mukuru nechimwe chikwata chikuru uri kurongwa,” anodaro Masakadza.   Zvikwata zviviri izvi zvakapedzisira kusangana mumitambo yetest match series mugore ra2017 iyo yakapera iri mangange.   Asi, mutambo wakazopihwa West Indies kuti yahwina sezvo yainge yakakunda mutambo wekutanga ne117 runs.   MaChevrons akapedzisira kutamba mutambo wetest match mugore ra2021 apo akasangana neBangladesh muHarare.

headline: Vagari vemuHarare Vochemachema neKushomeka kweMotokari dzeKanzuru Yavo Dzinotakura Varwere
text: Vamwe vagari vemuHarare vari kuchema-chema nekushomeka kwemotokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere, kana kuti maamburenzi, dzinova idzo dzine muripo uri nani zvichienzaniswa nedzemakambani akazvimirira. VaTaurai Zviripamwoyo, avo vakarwarirwa mazuva mashoma achangodarika, vanoti kunyangwe hazvo motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dziine muripo uri nani, hadziwanikwi zviri nyore. VaZviripamwoyo vanoti mamwe makambani ane motokari dzinotakura varwere akazvimirira anodhura zvakanyanya. Vachitaura neStudio 7, mumwe zvakare mugari wemuHarare, VaTanatsiwa Dambuza, vati kodzero yehutano iri mubumbiro remitemo yenyika haigoni kuzadzikiswa kana vagari vasiri kuwana motokari dzinotakura varwere dzine muripo uri pasi sedzekanzuru yeHarare. VaDambuza vakurudzira kanzuru kuti igadzirise dambudziko iri. Meya veguta reHarare, VaJacob Mafume, vatendawo kuti motokari dzinotakura varwere muguta ishoma zvakanyanya vachiti pari zvino dzinogona kunga dziri nomwe kana sere. Vawedzerawo vachiti kanzuru yavo ichange ichizeya nezvenyaya yekushomeka kwemotokari dzinotakura varwere kuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Vachipindura mubvunzo wekuti imotokari ngani dzingakwanira kanzuru, VaMafume vati kanzuru inoda mota dzinotakura varwere makumi maviri neshanu. Tsvakiridzo yaitwa neStudio 7 inoratidza kuti motokari dzekanzuru dzinotakura varwere ndidzo dzine mutengo yepasi inogonekwa nevagari vasina mari yakawanda. Pari zvino motokari dzinotakura varwere dzekanzuru yeHarare dzinobhadharisa makumi maviri emadhora ekuAmerica kana kuti US$20.00, vagari vachitenderwa kubhadhara nemari yemunyika. Ukuwo, makambani akazvimiririra achibhadarisa varwere mari inogona kusvika kuzana remadhora kana kuti US$100.00, kutakura murwere panguva yega yega. No media source currently available

headline: Nhomba yeKutanga yeCovid-19 Yotarisirwa muNyika neMuvhuro Kubva kuChina
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika uye vari gurukota rezvehutano VaConstantino Chiwenga ndivo vachagashira nhomba yeCovid 19 yakapihwa Zimbabwe neChina panhandare yendege yeR.G. Mugabe International Aiport muHarare nemusi weSvondo. Nhomba iyi, inosvika zviuru mazana maviri, inonzi Sinopharm iri kutarisirwa kusvika muZimbabwe nenguva dza 3 mangwanani. Kunyangwe dzimwe nyanzvi dziri kuti China haisi kunyatsobuda pachena nezvenhomba iyi, nyika dzakaita seTurkey, Indonesia neBrazil dziri kuishandisa dzinoti iri kushanda nezvikamu makumi mashanu kusvika pamakumi mapfumbamwe nerimwe kubva muzana kana kuti 50% to 91%. Hurumende inotiwo veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe vachaongororawo kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda here usati wabayiwa vanhu. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano Dr Brighton Chireka vakurudzira vanhu kuti vatambira nhomba iyi kuti chirwere chisarambe chichipararira zvakanyanya. Tichiri panyaya iyi, huwandu hwevanhu vari kufa nekubatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 huri kuramba huchiderera uye bazi rezvehutano rinoti nemusi weSvondo kwakafa vanhu vaviri nechirwere ichi. Izvi zvinorevea kuti vanhu vafa kubva chirwere ichi zvachakatanga kupararira vave vave chiuru chimwe chete nemazana mamana kana kuti 1, 400. NeSvondo vanhu makumi matanhatu nevasere kana kuti 68 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru makumi matatu nemashanu anezana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 35, 172. Vanhu mazana mashanu negumi nevaviri kana kuti 512 vakapora kubva kuchirwere ichi nezuro zvasiya vanhu vapora vave zviuru makumi matatu nemazana matanhatu nemumwe kana kuti 30, 601. Vanhu vachiri kurwara zviuru zvitatu nezana nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kana kuti 3, 171. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 3,7 million vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zviuru makumi mapfumbamwe nemanomwe nemazana masere nemakumi manomwe kana kuti 97, 870. Vapora muAfrica vadarika mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana maviri kana kuti 3,2 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica.
