Dunhu reSADC ndirozve rine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 1,7 million. North Africa ine vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi vadarika miriyoni imwe chete. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika zana remamiriyoni nemasere kana kuti 108 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vanodarika zviuru mazana mana nemakumi masere nevatatu zvine mazana matanhatu kana kuti 483, 600 vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemanomwe ane zviuru zvishanu kana kuti 27, 5 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana matatu kana kuti 2,3 million. Asi vapora pasi rose vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nezviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 60, 7 million. No media source currently available

headline: Mabhindauko Oraramisa Vamwe Vari Kunze kweNyika
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zvakabuda munyika zvichinotsvaga mafuro manyoro munyika dzakapoteredza Zimbabwe, zviine tarisiro yekuti zvinhu zvichakasika kunaka kumusha zvodzokera. Asi tarisiro iyi inenge yaramba chave chiroto chisingabatiki, izvo zvoita kuti vamwe vakaita saVaLovejoy Chinhema, avo vari kuMaputo, kuMozambique, vatange mabhindauko anopa raramo. VaChinhema vanoti vakabatana nevamwe vana veZimbabwe vakavhura zvitoro zvinotengesa zvinhu zvakasiyanasiyana zvinosanganisira mbatya nemagumbeze. VaChinhema vanoti ivo nevamwe vavo vatanhatu vanotenga zvinhu kuSouth Africa neSwaziland zvavanozotengesa kuMozambique. VaChiinhema vanoti vane vashandi vavakatopinzawo mabasa vanove zvakare vana veZimbabwe. Asi VaChinhema vanoti kudhonha kwemari yekuSouth Africa kwakambozunguza bhizimusi ravo zvishoma sezvo vakanga vasisakwanisi kunotenga zvinhu zvemuzvitoro zvavo kuZimbabwe nekuti mari yekuAmerica inonzi ndiyo iri kunyanyodiwa muZimbabwe yakange yave nesimba rakanyanya. Asi vanoti vari kukwanisa zvavo kuraramisa mhuri dzavo zvichienzaniswa nekunge dai vari kumusha. “Tinonyanyohodha ma duvet nembatya zvinozotengeswa mumarukisheni nevanhu vatakapawo mabasa,” VaChinhema vanodaro. Vanoti madzimai avo kumusha akasara achiitawo mabhindauko ekusona mbatya dzekutengesa. Asi vanoti chishuvo chavo chikuru ndechekuti dai zvinhu zvakasika kunaka kuitira kuti vadzokere kumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Zvizvarwa Zviri Kunze Zvowana Mukana weKupinda Muchirongwa Chinorerutsa Zvinhu Munguva yeKushaikirwa
text: Zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika mukupera kwesvondo zvakave nemukana wekunzwisisa pamusoro pechirongwa chekuvigana kana munhu achinge ashaya, cheSahwira International Plan chiri pasi peNyaradzo Life Assuarance Company. Mukana uyu wakavepo kuburikidza nemusangano wakaitwa padandemutande reZoom nevari kumirira kambani iyi kunze kwenyika, vekambani yeMKI, iri pasi pezvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri muAmerica. Mumwe mukuru wekambani yeMKI, VaEsau Mavindidze, vanoti vanhu vanodarika zana vakakwanisa kupinda mumusangano wavo uyu vachibvunzawo mibvunzo yakakosha zvikuru pamusoro pechirongwa ichi, icho chakanangana nekurerutsira vari kunze munguva yekushaikirwa. VaMavindize vanoti chirongwa cheSahwira International Plan ichi chinorerutsa ndima zvikuru kana mufi achida kuendeswa kunoradzikwa kumusha. Vanoti munguva zhinji hama neshamwari dzemufi vanozopinda mudambudziko rekuunganidza mari kuti vakwanise kuzadzisa zvido zvemufi zvekunoradzikwa kwaakasarudza achiri mupenyu. VaMavindize vanoti musangano wavo wavakaita uyu wakaratidza kuti vanhu vave kutarisira kuchirongwa ichi, uye vave kusununguka kutaura nezveremangwana ravo kana vachinge vazosiya pasi rino, izvo zvagara zvichionekwa nevamwe sechinhu chisingataurike nezvacho nguva zhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust Yopa Chiedza Kune Vanotambura Kumusha
text: Basa rekubatsira vanoshaya chinhu chinonzi nechimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe chiri mudunhu reTexas muAmerica, Advocate James Bayanai, chiri muropa ravo. Kubva muna 2010, Advocate Bayanai kuburikidza nesangano ravo reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust, vari kubatsira vana vechikoro pamwe nemhuri dzinoshaya vari mumaruwa muZimbabwe kuburikidza nekuunganidza rubatsiro rwakasiyanasiyana rwunosanganisira mabhuku nezvimwe zvinodiwa mukudzidza. Advocate Bayanai vanoti kubva nguva yavakatanga sangano reZimbabwe Youth Development Foundation Trust iri, vakwanisa kubatsira zvikoro zvakawanda kwazvo zvemunharaunda yeChirumhanzu mudunhu reMidlands pamwe neHurungwe kuMashonaland West. Vanoti kuburikidza nesanganpo ravo, vana vezvikoro zvakawanda vanoitawo makwikwi ezviperengo, kana kuti Spelling Bee Competition, ayo anozoita kuti vanenge vabudirira vazonokwikwidzana nevamwe vana vanobva kunyika dzakasiyanasiyana dzemuAfrica. Mwedzi wapera Advocate Bayanai nesangano ravo vakatambanudza rubatsiro rwavo vachi[inda mumajeri umo vakawanikwa vachipa rubatsiro rwechikafu pamwe ne wheelchair kuvasungwa vekujeri reChikurubi Maximum Security Prison. Vanoti vakaberekerwa kwaChirumhanzu vakadzidza kuzvikoro zveko pamwe neMutasa mumusha weHighfield, vachizodzokera zvakare kwaHama Secondary School kuChirumhanzu kunoita zvidzidzo zvesekendari, pashure vakazoenda kuUniversity of Zimbabwe kwavakanoita zvidzidzo zvehugweta. Muna 2015 Advocate Bayanai vakazobuda muZimbabwe vachienda kuAmerica kunoita zvidzidzo zvavo zvepamusorosoro zvehugweta paTulane University Law School kudunhu New Orleans, vakazonogara kuDallas mudunhu reTexas mushure mekupedza zvidzidzo zvavo. Advocate Bayanai ndemumwe wezvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvakawanda zviri kunze kwenyika zviri kubatsira kusimudzira hupenyu neraramo zvevanhu vari kumusha paine tarisiro yekuvapa ramangwana rakajeka. No media source currently available

headline: Vanoongorora zveMatongerwo eNyika Vozeya Nyaya yeKusatorerwa Matanho kwe"Mashurugwi"
text: Nyaya yezvikwata zviri kurwisa pamwe nekuponda vanhu zvichishandisa mabhemba, izvo zvave kuzivikanwa nerekuti “mashurugwi” yanetsa munyika yose zvichitevera kupararira kuri kuitwa zvikwata izvi mumatunhu ose emunyika. Mukutanga, zvikwata zvevanhu vemabhemba izvi zvainyanyowanikwa munzvimbo dzinocherwa zvicherwa zvakaita semangoda negoridhe, asi pari zvino vanhu ava vanonzi vave kungowanikwa chero mumapurazi kana mumamisha, umo vari kurwisa vanhu vavanenge vanetsana navo, kana kushandisa mabhemba avo mukubira vanhu. Mashurugwi anonzi akonzerawo kusagadzikana kwevanhu mumatunhu akawanda, kusanganisira mumadhorobha. Mashoko ari kubuda mumadandemutande anoti chikwata che"Mashurugwi" chakarwisa imwe mhuri kuChegutu neChitatu manheru vanhu vaviri vakafa vamwe vatatu vakakuwara zvakaipisisa. Vanhu ava vanonziwo vakanorwisa kamba yemapurisa kuNembudziya kuGokwe vachiedza kununura mumwe wavo akanga asungwa. Asi mapurisa anonzi akazokwanisa kusunga vanhu vanosvika makumi mana. KuMazowe kunonziwo kwakasungwa vanhu gumi nevana, mabhemba gumi nerimwe pamwe nezvimwe zvombo zvakasiyanasiyana zvakawanikwa. Mazuva mashoma adarika vanhu ava vakaponda mumwe mupurisa kuBattlefields, kuKadoma, vatanhatu vavo vakasungwa nemapurisa. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vari mukuru wesangano reCentre for Natural Resource Governance, VaFarai Maguwu, vanoti vari kunzi mashurugwi ava havaneyi nedunhu reShurugwi, asi kuti izita rakabva kuchikwata chakamboshungurudza vanhu kwaMarange chainzi "magombiro". Vanoti mapurisa haasi kutora matanho sezvo vanhu ava vari pasi pevamwe vakuru vari muchipurisa nemuchiuto. VaMaguwu vanoti zvinozivikanwa nevanhu vose munyika kuti vanotyora mutemo vasingasungwi inhengo dzeZanu PF, zvichireva kuti vanenge vachichengetedzwa nevezvematongerwo enyika vane masimba. Asi vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti zviri kuitwa nevanhu vari kunetsa ava hazvineyi neZanu PF kana zvematongerwo enyika, asi kuti inhubu dzevanhu dziri kuisa mutemo mumaoko adzo. VaChirumhanzu vanoti chimwe chinoita kuti vati hazvineyi nezvematongerwo enyika ndezvekuti kusvika nhasi hapana bato rezvematongerwo enyika rati rambobuda richiti rine nhengo dzakapondwa nevanhu ava, asi kuti vari kuponda vanhuwo zvavo. No media source currently available

headline: Kupararira kweCoronavirus Kune Vasina Kubuda muNyika Kwotemesa VanaChiremba Musoro
text: Mumwe chiremba Dr Edgar Munatsi vanoti vanhu vanofanira kungwarira zvikuru kupararira kwave kuita chirwere checoronavirus munyika zvikuru kune vanhu vasina nhoroondo yekumbobuda munyika kana kusangana nevane chirwere ichi vanozivikanwa. Dr Munatsi vanoti kurwara kwevanhu kuMhondoro, Mrewa neChegutu vasina nhoroondo yekushanya kunze kwenyika idambudziko guru chaizvo zvinogona kuti hurumende haisi kuita zvakakwana kuvheneka hutachiona uhu. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muZimbabwe hwasvika pamakumi matatu nematanhatu kana kuti 36. Vanhu vapora kubva muchirwere ichi vapfumbamwe uye vafa vachiri vana. Tichiri panya iyi, huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni mana nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 4,1 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere. Vanhu vafa vave kuda kwechirwere ichi vadarika zvuru mazana maviri zvine makumi masere nematatu 283, 000. Asi pavanhu ava vapora ndivo vakawanda vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mana kana kuti 1, 4 million. Mashoko atumirwawo Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kubazi rezvehutano resangano iri reAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zvuru makumi matanhatu nematatu, 63, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica uye vashaya zvuru zviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe  2, 290. Vapona vanosvika zvuru makumi maviri nechimwe 21, 000. No media source currently available

headline: Ticharwa semvumba: Siyachitema
text: MURAIRIDZI weGlow Petroleum Queens, Perpetua Siyachitema, otsidza kuti chikwata chake chicharwa semvumba mwaka wegore rino zvichitevera kuhwina kwachakaita mukombe weRainbow Amateur Netball League (RANL).   Svondo radarika, Glow Petroleum Queens yakapihwa mubairo weUS$3 000 nemenduru yegoridhe pamabiko akaitwa muHarare ekupemberera shasha dzakahwina mwaka wadarika weRANL.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti chikwata chake chakatamba zvinonwisa mvura mwaka wadarika izvo zvakachiona chichingokundwa mumutambo mumwe chete murwendo rwavo rwekurwira mukombe weRANL.   Siyachitema, uyo aimbove mutambi wechikwata ichi nechenyika chemaGems, anoti mwaka uno vanoda kurwa semvumba kuti vachengetedze mukombe wavo naizvozvo vanofanirwa kupedza mwaka wose vasina kumbokundwa.   “Sechikwata, tiri kufara nekuhwina kwatakaita mwaka wadarika, zvainge zvakaoma nekuti takazomirira pazuva rekupedzisira kuziviswa kunzi tisu shasha dzeRANL dza2021.   “Saka tichienda mumwaka wegore rino, tinoda kurwa semvumba tihwine mitambo yedu yose uye zvimwe zvikwata zvizive kuti hatisi kuita zvekutamba asi kuti tiri shasha chaidzo. Tikahwina mitambo yedu yose, tinoziva kuti hatizobatire hana dzedu mumaoko sezvatakazoita pazuva rekupedzisira remwaka wadarika apo takange tave kuda kuti ZRP Mambas Queens ikundwe kuitira kuti tizogadzwa humambo hwedu,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Zvichitevera kuhwina kwakaita chikwata chake mukombe weRANL, Siyachitema ndiye akabva asarudzwa kuve murairidzi wemwaka wa2021 (Coach of the Year).   ZRP Mambas, iyo yakapedza iri pechipiri, yakahwiniswawo US$2 000 kuchiti Correctional Queens ikapihwa US$1 500 mushure mekutora nhamba yechitatu. Mutambi weCorrectional Queens, Kudakwashe Mushonge, ndiye akahwina mubairo wePlayer of the Season, Judith Mudekwe weTenax akatora weRookie of the Season uyewo Pauline Jani weZRP Mambas Queens ndiye akahwina weGolden Hand.   Zvakadaro, mwaka weRANL wa2022 uri kutanga svondo rino.

headline: Dare raMejastiriti Robvumidza Crisis in Zimbabwe Coalition Kuratidzira Mushure Mekumborambidzwa neMapurisa
text: Dare ramejasiatiriti muHarare nemusi weMuvhuro rakatura mutongo wekubvumidza sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition kuti riratidzire kusafara kwaro nekunonoka kuri kuitwa nehurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo munyika. Mutongi wedare ramejasitiriti VaLanzini Ncube vakatura mutongo wekuti sangano reCrisis In Zimbabwe Coalition rienderere mberi nehurongwa hwaro hwekuratidzira muHarare neChitatu mushure mekunge sangano iri rarambidzwa nemapurisa kuratidzira richinzi rinozokanganisa runyararo muguta. Mutongi wedare ati kuratidzira uku kuri kuenderere mberi vachiti bumbiro remitemo rinobvumidza vanhu kuratidzira uye mapurisa haafanire kufungidzira kuti vanhu vachapara mhosva ivo vasina chokwadi nazvo. Sangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition rakarambidzwa kufora muHarare nemapurisa mushure mekuvazivisa kuti nhengo dzaro dzichazofora dzichiratidza kusafara kwadzo nekunonoka kuri kuita hurumende kuvandudza mitemo inobata sarudzo. Sangano iri rinoti mitemo yesarudzo inofanira kuvandudzwa kuitira kuti iringane nebumbiro idzva renyika pamwe nezviga zvinobata nyaya dzesarudzo zvakatarwa nesangano renyika dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica re SADC kana kuti SADC Principles Governing the Conduct of Democratic Elections. Mutauriri weCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaThabani Moyo vanoti vafara zvikuru nemutongo waturwa nedare. Zvichakadaro, imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika uye vachishanda vakazvimirira VaDavid Nyamanhindi vaudza Studio 7 kuti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa zvekurambidza misangano izvi zvinhu zvagara zvino zivikanwa kuti ndizvo zvavanoita pose panenge pave kuendwa kusarudzo vachiti mapurisa haafanire kuve nedivi raanorerekera. Zvichakadaro, mutongi wedare uyu audza mapurisa kuti achengetedze nhengo dzeCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition padzichange dzichifora muHarare neChitatu. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vashanu Vanofa Zvichitevera Mhirizhonga Iri Kuitika muSouth Africa
text: Mapurisa emu South Africa ashandisa zvombo zvemabara asingauraye senzira yekuti vanhu vanga vachiratidzira mumigwagwa yeAlexandria, vaparare. Vanhu ava vanga vachiratidzira vachiti havadi kuti zvizvarwa zvedzimwe nyika zvinge zvichigara nekushanda munyika iyi. Zvinonzi vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi, uye vanhu vanodarika zana vasungwa munyika yose vachipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Mutungamiri we South Africa, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vashora zvikuru mhizhonga iri kuitika munyika mavo, vakati vachaita musangano negurukota rezvemapurisa, Va Bheki Cele, kuti patsvagwe nzira dzekugadzirisa dambudziko iri. Va Cele vabvuma kuti kune vanhu vashanu vafa mumhirizhonga iyi. Mumiriri we Zimbabwe mu South Africa, Va David Hamadziripi, vati havana ruzivo kana pavanhu vafa ava, pane zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe here kana kuti kwete. Asi vavimbisa kuti vachaunganidza zvavanenge vawana vozivisa veruzhinji. VaRamaphosa vati zviri kuitwa nezvizvarwa zve South Africa zvekurwisa nekushungurudza vabvakure, hazvisi zvinhu zvinokurudzurwa kuitwa. Vati izvi zvinofanirwa kumiswa izvozvi, vachiti vanhu vemuSouth Africa vanogara kugara murunyararo. Zvitoro zvevanhu vanobva kunze kwe South Africa zvakapwanywa kana kupiswa mudunhu reGauteng. Ukuwu mutungamiri wedunhu re Gauteng, Va David Makhura, vashanyira musha weAlexandria neChipiri masikati vachiona kuparadzwa kwakaitwa zvitoro. VaMakhura vakurudzira kuti mudunhu ravo muve nekugadzikana. Zvichakadaro, gurukota rezvekudzivirirwa kweSouth Africa, Amai Nosiviwe Mapisa Nqakula, vati kuparadzwa kwezvitoro kwakanangana nekuzvibisa chimiro cheSouth Africa. Mhirizhonga iyi inonzi yakatanga ku Tshwane svondo rapera, isati yapararira mu Johannesburg nenzvimbo dzakapoteredza guta iri. Sachigaro weZimbabwe Exiles Forum, VaGabriel Shumba, vanoti vanhu vana varasikirwa nehupenyu pamusoro pevatatu vakashaya nemusi weMuvhuro, asi havazivi kuti vanhu vangani vanobva kuZimbabwe vangave vakabatwa nemhirizhonga iri. VaShumba varatidzawo kushungurudzika nemaitiro emhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa, iyo vati haina kubatana izvo zviri kupa kuti masangano anomirira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe atadze kuve neruzivo pane zvirizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogona kunge zviri kuvhiringwa nemhirizhonga iyi. VaShumba vakurudzira mhuri yeZimbabwe iri muSouth Africa kuti itumidzire padandemutare reZEF, kana vachinge vasangana netsaona munguva yemhirizhonga iyi. Mukuru wesangano rinomiririra mabhizimisi emhuri yeZimbabwe mu South Africa, reProudly 263, VaStan Makwara, vanoti vanoshungurudzika nezviri zvikuru bezviri kuitika muSouth Africa sezvo zvichivhiringidza mabhizinesi pakati peZimbabwe neSouth Africa. VaMakwara vaenderera mberi vachiti vari mubishi kuzivisa nhengo dzavo nzvimbo dziri kuitika mhirizhonga iyi kuitira kuti vagare vari kure. Vatiwo sangano ravo riri kushanda nemuzinda weZimbabwe muSouth Africa pachitsvagwa nzira dzekupedza dambudziko iri. Zvichakadaro, kune gwaro raburitswa riri kukurudzira zvizvarwa zvekunze, kuti zviratidzire mangwana, pamusangano we World Economic Forum on Africa, uyo uri kutanga nemusi weChitatu muguta reCape Town. Ratidziro iyi, ichange iri yekukurudzira vatungamiriri venyika dzemuAfrica vachange vari pamusangano uyu, kuti vatore matanho akaomara kunyika yeSouth Africa nekutadza kwayo kwairi kuita kuremeredza kodzero dzevanobva kunze kwenyika iyi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vatove muCape Town kuti vazopinda mumusangano uyu. No media source currently available

headline: Mutungamiri Mutsva weZCTU Anoti Chinangwa Chake Ndechekurwirwa Kodzero dzeVashandi
text: Mutungamiri mutsva wesangano guru revashandi munyika reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions (ZCTU), anova zvekare mudzimai wekutanga kutungamira sangano iri Amai Florence Mutasa, vanoti hapana nguva yekutarisa zvakaitwa kare musangano ravo, vachiti pane basa zhinji rinofanirwa kuitwa. Amai Taruvinga vaudza Studio 7 kuti kusimudzira hupenyu hwemushandi zvinoda mushandirapamwe musangano ravo. Vati chinangwa chesangano ravo ndechekuchengetedza nekurwira kodzero dzevashandi vose, zvisinei kuti basa ravanoita nderipi. Sangano reZCTU rakaita kongiresi yaro kupera kwesvondo rikasarudza hutungamiri hutsva uho hwakaona VaPeter Mutasa vachikundwa musarudzo yemutungamiri wesangano iri kuchisarudzwa Amai Taruvinga. No media source currently available

headline: ZEC Yotarisira Kupeta Gwaro Idzva reVavhoti Mukupera kweGore
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission kana kuti ZEC Amai Rita Makarau vanoti vanotarisira kuti panopera gore rino vanenge vave negwaro idzva revavhoti. Izvi zviri kuitwa sezvo nyika iri kutarisira kuita sarudzo gore rinouya. Vanotiwo mukupera kwemwedzi uno vanenge vave nemichina yose inodiwa mukunyoresa vavhoti. Nemusi weChishanu, ZEC inoti yakakwanisa kupihwa michina mazana mana pamichina zviuru zvitatu zvakatengwa nehurumende kubva kukambani yeLaxton Group yekuChina. Amai Makarau vanotiwo vanhu vanokwanisa kuvhota nezvetupa zverata musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Mashoko aya anotevera zvainge zvambotaurwa namabharani mukuru wehurumende vaTobaiwa Mudede avo vainge vati vanhu havakwanise kuvhota kana vasina zvitupa zvebepa. Amai Makarau vanoti kana vachinge vapedza kugadzira gwaro revavhoti vanofunga kuti sarudzo dzinenge dzokwanisa kuitwa. No media source currently available

headline: POLITICAL PANEL
text: Vana veZimbabwe vakawanda vanoti vari kushuvira kuti dai munyika maitwa nhaurirano dzekutsvaga nzira dzekugadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nenyika. Izvi ndizvowo zviri kukurudzirwa nevatungamiri vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nemapato avo, vachiti iyi ndiyo yega nzira inokwanisa kugadzirisa matambudziko ari munyika, anosanganisira ezvematongerwo enyika pamwe nezveupfumi. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa kutanga kwemwedzi uno vakashevedzera musangano wekutanga wenhaurirano dzakadai, uyo wakapindwa nevemamwe mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, kunze kwebato guru rinopikisa reMDC nemutungamiri waro VaNelson Chamisa. Vemakereke vakashevedzerawo musangano wenhaurirano asi mutungamiri wenyika VaMnangagwa havana kupinda musangano uyu, kunyange hazvo VaChamisa vakapindawo rwendo rwuno. Asi vakawanda vanoti neimwe nzira VaMnangagwa vakapinda musangano uyu sezvo vakanga vakamirirwa nasachigaro webato ravo, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri pamwe nevamwe vakuru mubato ravo reZanu PF. VaMnangagwa vanonzi vashevedza zvakare mapato ose akapinda mumusangano wekutanga kune dzimwe nhaurirano dzechipiri mangwana, idzo diznonzi dziri kuitirwa zvakare kumuzinda wavo weState House. Kunyange hazvo mamwe mapato audza Studio 7 kuti achaenda kumusangano uyu, MDC inotungamirirwa naVaChamisa inoti zvakare haisi kuenda kumusangano uyu. Izvi zvave kuita kuti vana veZimbabwe vabvunzane kuti saka matambudziko ari munyika anogadziriswa sei kana paita kudhonzerana kwakadai? Mukuzeya nezvenyaya iyi, tabata munyori mukuru weMDC, VaDouglas Mwonzora, pamwe nenhengo yeCentral Committee ye Zanu PF VaJoseph Tshuma. Tatanga nekubvunza vaMwonzora kuti sei vasiri kuenda kumusangano uyu.

headline: Hurumende Inoti Hapana Mwana weChikoro Afa neCovid-19 Kunyangwe Vakawanda Vabatwa neChirwere Ichi
text: Mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwechirwere cheCovid-19 munyika Dr Agnes Mahomva vanoti kunyangwe huwandu hwevana vechikoro vari kubatwa neCovid-19 huri kuramba huchikwira, hapana mwana ati afa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino. Vana vechikoro mazana masere nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 839 vabatwa nechirwere cheCovid-19 mumavhikimnaviri adarika chete. Pavanhu zana nemakumi manomwe nevaviri vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nemusi weSvondo, makumi maviri nemumwe vana vechikoro. Izvi zvasiya vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga kupararira vave zviuru mazana maviri zvine makumi matatu nemashanu nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nemashanu kana kuti 235 975. Nemusi weSvondi bazi rezvehutano rinoti hakuna munhu akafa nechirwere ichi zvasiya vafa nacho vachingori zviuru zvishanu nemazana matatu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevana kana kuti 5 394. Bazi rezvehutano rinotiwo vanhu mamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi mashanu nezvishanu nemazana mashanu nemakumi masere kana kuti 4 355 580 vabayiwa nhomba yekutanga yeCovid-19. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba kaviri vave mamiriyoni matatu nezviuru mazana matatu zvine makumi masere nezvipfumbamwe nemazana mashanu nemakumi mapfumbamwe nevanomwe kana kuti 3 389 597. Vanhu vabayiwa nhomba katatu vave zviuru zana nemakumi maviri zvine mazana matanhatu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 120 673. Bazi rezvehutani rinoti rine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi nhomba kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuti inyatsoshanda zvakanaka. Hurumende yave kukurudzirawo kuti vana vane makore gumi nemaviri kuti vabayiwe nhomba zvanzi naDr Mahomva zvinogona kubatsira kuti vana vakawanda vasabatwe neechirwere ichi.

headline: Khama Billiati naPeter Ndlovu Vopinda Munhoroondo yeNhabvu neSundowns
text: Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaJacob Zuma nemusi weMuvhuro vakatenda zvikuru chikwata cheSundowns chemuSouth Africa nekukunda Zamaleck yekuEgypt 3-1 mufainari yemukombe weCAF Champions League nemusi weSvondo. Chikwata cheSundowns chinotambirwawo naKhama Billiat wekuZimbabwe uye china Peter Ndlovu samaneja. Vaviri ava ndivo zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvekutanga kusimudza mukombe uyu. Zvichakadaro, chikwata cheHighlanders chakabuda mumakwikwi eChibuku Super Cup mushure mekurowa 1-0 neNgezi Platinum Stars nemusi weSvondo. Ngezi Platinum yave kutamba neFC Platinum mumafinals. FC Platinum yakakunda Harare city 3-0 nemusi weMugovera. Fainari yeNgezi Platinum Stars neFC Platinum ichatambwa musi wa 5 Mbudzi. Asi vePremier Soccer League havasati vazivisa kuti fainari iyi ichatambirwa kupi. Muongorori wezvemutambo wenhabvu VaAndrew Rwodzi vanoti mutambo uyu waive wemhando yepamusoro vachiti ivo vakanakidzwa zvikuru. Mutsigiri wenhabvu VaLainos Chimenya vanoti vaive vasingatarisire kuti Ngezi Platinum Stars ingarove Highlanders sezvo ivo vaingoti Ngezi chikwata chidiki VaRwodzi vanoti vachitarisa FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum Stars vari kuona Ngezi ichitora mukombe nemhaka yekuti ine vatambi vakawanda vane ruzivo rwenhabvu yepamusoro. Pakapedzisira kusangana FC Platinum neNgezi Platinum Stars zvikwata izvi zvakaita mangange 1-1 muMandava Stadium. VaChimenya vanoti FC Platinum ingadai yakarohwa mumutambo uyu vachiti ivo izvi ndizvo zvichaitika mufainari. Chikwata chichatora mukombe uyu chichamirira nyika muCAF Confederation Cup.

headline: Vateereri veStudio7 Voshuvira Gore Idzva Richange Riri Nani
text: Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti zvine tarisiro yekuti gore rinouya richange riri nani kupfuura makore apfuura. Vataura paStudio7 vanosanganisira VaJonathan Banda naVaTangai Mapfumo avo vari muBotswana; VaRobert Muchadenyika kuZimbabwe, Amai Alima Shumba Mapfumo vari kuSouth Africa; pamwe naVaTapiwa Makuni vari kuAustralia. Vanhu ava vanobvuma kuti gore ra 2017 ranga rakaomera vanhu vari muZimbabwe. As vanoti shuviro yavo ndeyekuona gore ra 2018 rakarerukira veruzhinji. No media source currently available

headline: Iran Inorwisa Mizinda Inogara Mauto eAmerica muIraq
text: Iran yakakanda zvombo zvema ’missiles’ zvinopfuura gumi nezviviri kumizinda inogara mauto eAmerica mu Iraq neChipiri manheru. Asi hazvisati zvazivikanwa kana paine mauto aurayiwa kana akuvadzwa. Iran inoti yaita izvi senzira yekutsiva kuurayiwa neAmerica kwakaitwa General Qassem Soleimani svondo rapera. Muzinda mukuru wemauto eAmerica, we Pentagon, pamwe chete nemuzinda wemutungamiri wenyika, weWhite House, yazivisa kuti haisi kuzotaura pamusoro penyaya iyi nevatori venhau sezvo mutungamiri wenyika, VaDonald Trump, vachataura kune veruzhinji.. VaTrump Asi vanyora paTwitter pavo kuti zvinhu zvese zvakanaka, vachiti vachataura kuvanhu pamusoro pezvenyaya iyi nemusi weChitatu. Nhengo yeZanu PF muWashington DC, VaFrenk Guni, avo vari kutevera kufamba kuri kuita nyaya iyi nguva dzese, vanoti America inofanira kuziva kuti kana ikatanga hondo neIran, inofanira kuziva kuti hondo yacho haiperi sezvatiri kuona muIraq neAfghanistan. No media source currently available

headline: SADC Inoti Yakwanisa Kudzikamisa Zvinhu kuMozambique muHondo neVanopfurikidza Mwero
text: Mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa nezuro vakabatana nevatungamiri venyika dziri muSADC Troika uye dzakatumira mauto kuMozambique kunorwisa vanopfurikidza mwero mudunhu reCabo Delgado. Mutungamiri wenyika yeSouth Africa VaCyril Ramaphosa ndivo vaive sachigaro pamusangano waiirirwa padandemutande uyu. Mumashoko kuvatori venhau SADC yakati ichibatsirwa nemauto eRwanda yakwanisa kudzikamisa zvinhu mudunhu iri kunyangwe paine kurwisana pano neapo asi ikati yave kubatsira kuunza budiriro mudunhu iri. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachidzidzisa paAfrica University kwaMutare Doctor Iris Shiripinda vaudza Studio 7 kuti vamwe vatungamiri venyika yemuSADC haisi kunyatsozvipira kupedza hondo yemuMozambique sezvo vachitia sekunge vanoona chouviri pazviri. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Vatambi vePSL havaoni mambure’
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mumutambo wenhabvu ichitambira Black Rhinos – Maronga “Bomber” Nyangela – anoti vatambi vekumberi vezvikwata zvakasiyana vanozunza mambure havasi kunyatsobikwa izvo zvaona muPremier Soccer League muchishaya anonwisa kanodarika ka20 mumwaka mumwe chete sezvakapedzisira kuitwa mugore ra2010 naNorman Maroto achitambira Gunners FC.   Bomber, uyo vatsigiri vazhinji venhabvu vanomuziva achizunza mambure zvakamuona achihwina mubairo weGolden Boot kanodarika katatu, anoti nhabvu iri kutambwa muPSL inonwisa mvura asi dambudziko guru nderevatambi vekumberi vanokwanisa kunwisa kakawanda mumwaka mumwe chete.   “Nhabvu iri kutambwa muPSL mwaka uno iri kunakidza uye varairidzi varipo vari kuziva zvavari kuita.   “Asi dambudziko rimwe chete nderevatambi vekumberi, havasi kunyatsozunza mambure. Vatambi vekumberi varipo vakatosiyana nevekare vataiona avo vainyatsozunza mambure zvaiita kuti nhabvu iwedzere kunakidza.   “Kuti chikwata chihwine mukombe wePSL, chinofanirwa kuve nemutambi wekumberi anonyatsozunza mambure sezvaiitwa nevatambi vakaita seni, Moses Chunga, Madinda Ndlovu nevamwe vakasiyana. Izvezvi tinoona Top Goal Scorer achipedza mwaka anwisa ka14 chete, hapana kwatinenge tichienda.   “Paye patinozotumira zvikwata zvedu kunze kwenyika, kana tisina vatambi vekumberi vanogona kunwisa, ndipo patinongosvika tichirohwa,” anodaro.   Nyangela anoti zvakakosha kuti zvikwata zvemuPSL zvishande nevatambi vakaita mukurumbira vabatsire nekupa ruzivo kuvatambi vekumberi kuti vadzidze.   “Vatambi vakaita mukurumbira vakakosha saka zvikwata ngazvivashandise vapote vachivashevedza kuzoshanda nevatambi vachivadzidzisa zvidavado zvekunwisa izvo vaive nemukurumbira nazvo.   “Hatisi kuti toda kuuya mazuva ose, kwete. Tinopota tichiuya pano neapo kuzoshanda navo,” anodaro.   Pari zvino, Nyangela – uyo anogara kuMufakose muguta reHarare – anoti ari kusumudzira vechidiki vane tarenda renhabvu vachigadzira ramangwana ravo mumutambo uyu.   Tsvakurudzo yakaitwa neKwayedza svondo rino, inotaridza kuti mwaka uno parwendo rwekurwira mubairo weGolden Boot – kubva pamitambo 19 yePSL yatambwa – Brian Muza weChicken ndiye ari kutungamira pavatambi vanwisa kakawanda sezvo anwisa ka10.    Brian Muza   Muza anoteverwa naNyasha Tito Chintuli weManica Diamond naWilliam Manondo weCAPS United avo vese vakwanisa kunwisa kapfumbamwe pamumwe nemumwe wavo.   Vamwe vari murwendo rwekurwira mubairo uyu ndiJayden Barake weWhawha naThandolwenkosi Ngwenya weFC Platinum avo vanwisa kasere mumitamo yavatamba.   Clive Augusto, uyo aitambira Chicken Inn, ndiye akapedzisira kuhwinha mubairo weGolden Boot muna2019 apo akanwisa ka14 kubva mumitambo 17 iyo ainge atambira maGamecocks.   Augusto akazoenda kunotambira Maritzburg United yekuSouth Africa mwaka wePSL muno uchiri pakati.

headline: Zvikwata 4 zvorwira mukombe
text: HAKUDANWE anonzwa nemusi weMugovera uye neSvondo apo zvikwata zvina zvasara mumutambo weDivision One Axis Solutions Super 8 zvinoti Simba Bhora FC, Herentals Under-20, Golden Eagles neTrojan Stars zvichatatsurana musemi-final.   Musi weMugovera , kuchatambwa semi-final yekutanga iyo ichaona Herentals U-20 ichibandana neSimba Bhora FC kunhandare yeMorris Depot muHarare kuchiti musi weSvondo Golden Eagles (Gondo Harishaye) ichatamba neTrojan Stars kuEllis Robins muHarare zvekare.   Murairidzi weSimba Bhora FC, Arthur Tutani, anoti chikwata chake chiri kutokunya zvakasimba sezvo vari kuda kuhwina mumutambo uyu.   Achitaura pamusoro pekukundwa kwavakaitwa neChegutu Pirates, Tutani anoti mikombe yakaita seAxis Solutions Super 8 mikuru uye vari kuukoshesa sezvo vachida kupedza mwaka uno vaine mikombe yakawanda.   “Sechikwata, tiri kufara nematambiro atiri kuita mwaka uno. Mitambo yakaita seweAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup uyu unotibatsira kuti tipe vamwe vatambi mikana sezvo rwendo ruchiri rurefu kusvika tapedza mwaka wegore rino.   “Takanangana nemutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup, tiri kuda kuuhwina. Asi, tichange tichitora mutambo sekuuya kwaunenge uchiita dzamara tasvika kufainari. Hakuna asingade kuhwina mukombe uye isu tiri kuudawo mukombe uyu,” anodaro Tutani.   Kuchiti murairidzi weGondo Harishaye, Gilbert Mushangazhike – uyo chikwata chake chakaumburudza Ngezi U19 svondo radarika kunhandare yeBaobab uko chakahwina 2-1 – anoti vari kudawo mukombe uyu zvakanyanya.    Gilbert Mushangazhike   Gondo Harishaye ichasangana neTrojan Stars iyo yakakunda Commando Bullets 2-1 svondo radarika mumutambo wakatambirwa kuTrojan, kuBindura.   Mushangazhike anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru kufambira mberi kwe[1]chikwata chake mumutambo uyu.   “Mwaka wakareba uye kune vamwe vatambi vasiri kuwana mukana wekutamba saka ndivo vatiri kupawo mukana mumutambo uyu apo tiri kuzama kubata zvinangwa zvedu zvose zvemwaka uno.   “Tave kutarira mitambo yedu iri mberi uye ticharwa semvumba kuti tihwine mutambo wedu wesemi-final kusvika kufainari.   “Kutamba mitambo yemikombe zvinopa mukana wekunyora nhoroondo. Nenyasha dzaMwari, ticharwa kuti tihwine mukombe uyu,” anodaro Mushangazhike.   Murairidzi weTrojan Stars, Clifford Sakala, anoti mutambo wechikwata chake neGolden Eagles uchange wakaoma sezvo Gondo Harishaye ichitamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura.   “Tiri kutarisira zvikuru kusangana neGolden Eagles mumutambo wedu wesemi-final uyo tinoziva kuti unenge usiri nyore. Asi chatinoziva ndechekuti ticharwa kuti tifambire mberi. Tiri kugadzirira zvakasimba mutambo wedu watakatarisana nawo,” anodaro Sakala.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kudzika Mitemo Inomanikidza Vanhu Kubaiwa Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Sachigaro vekomiti yeparamende inoona nezvehutano, Dr Ruth Labode, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushandisa nzira dzose dzainokwanisa, kusanganisira kudzika mitemo inosungira kuti munhu wese abaiwe nhomba yekudzvirira denda reCovid-19 iro radzika midzi munyika. Mumashoko avo kugurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube,mushure mekunge VaNcube vazivisa mafambiro aita bhajeti regore rino kusvika pakati pegore kana kuti Mid Term Budget Review, Dr Labode vanoti nhomba dzapinda munyika pari zvino dzinoita kuti vanhu mamiriyoni matatu vabaiwa nhomba mbiri dzekudzivirira Covid-19. Dr Labode vanoti nekuda kwaIzvozvo hurumende inofanirWa kushandisa nzira dzose dzaiNOkwanisa, kusanganisira kumanikidza vanhu kuti vabaiwe nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Dr Labode vanotiwo Covid-19 yaunza hurombo hwakanyanya munyika uye hurumende inofanirwa kumbomisa kubhadharisa vanhu muzvipatara zvayo nemamakanzuru zvisinei kuti munhu ane Covid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Gwaro richangobva kuburitswa neWorld Bank rinoratidza kuti vanhu mamiriyoni manomwe nezviuru mazana masere vari kurarama muhurombo hunotyisa nekuda kwedenda reCovid-19. Munyori musangano remagweta anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association for Doctors for Human Rights, Dr Norman Matara, vanoti sesangano havabvumirani nenyaya yekuti vanhu vamanikidzwe kubaiwa nhomba vachiti izvi zvinofanira kuitwa chete sedanho rekupedzesera. Makambani akawanda munyika kusanganisira hurumende, ave kutomanikidza vanhu kubaiwa nekuomesera vaye vasina kubaiwa izvo zvave kuita kuti munhu wese aende kunobaiwa nhomba. Dr Matara vati Covid-19 iri kufamba nenzira dzinotyisa zvekuti kunyange munhu aine kodzero yekuramba kubaiwa, kodzero iyi inogona kuzopinza vamwe munjodzi. Nyika dzakawanda pasi rose dziri kuongorora mitemo yadzo dziine chinangwa chekumanikidza munhu wese kubaiwa nhomba senzira yekudzivirira zvachose chirwere ichi. Bazi rezvemitemo muAmerica, re Department of Justice, rakaita ongororo yemitemo rikabuda nechisungo charakapa muzinda weWhite House kuti hapana mutemo unorambidza hurumende kana makambani kubuda nezvisungo zvinoita kuti vanhu vasatapurirane zvirwere apo vanenge vari pabasa. Pane tsvakiridzo dziri kuitwawo nenyika dzakabudirira dzekupedza zvachose denda reCovid-19, dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehutano dzichikurudzira kuti vanhu vabayiwe nhomba katatu sezvo vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba kaviri vari kubatwa zvakasimba nehirwere ichi. Zim,babwe inoti ine chinangwa chekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana zvevanhu vese munyika senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. VaNcube vakaudza paramende nezuro kuti mwedzi unouya kuchauya dzimwe nhomba mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu uye dzimwe mamiriyoni maviri nezviuru mazana mashanu dzichauya muna Gunyana. Mune imweo nyaya kambani yeOld Mutual inoti homwe yekusimbudzira vechidiki yeKurera-Ukondla Youth iyo yainge yambomiswa ichatanga zvakare munguva pfupi inotevera pasi pehurongwa hutsva. Vachipa humbowo kukomiti yeparamende inoona nezvevechidiki, mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muOld Mutual, VaIsaih Mashinya, vati homwe iyi yakamiswa muna 2014 sezvo yainge isiri kufamba sezvainge zvakatarisirwa. Homwe iyi yakaumbwa muna 2011 iine mamiriyoni gumi emadhora ekuAmerica uye payakamiswa vechidiki vainge vaine zvikwereti zvemamiriyoni mana nezviuru mazana mana zvemadhora ekuAmerica. Asi vati zvichitevera danho rekumisa kushanda kwehomwe iyi pakati pekambani yavo nebazi rezvechidiki, vakabvumirana kuparadza komiti kana kuti Trust yafambisa homwe iyi kuitira kuti vatange patsva izvo zvavave kuita pari zvino. Vati Trust ine nhengo dzeOld Mutual nebazi revechidiki yakatoumbwa uye basa rayo radzorerwa mushaure nedenda reCovid-19. VaMashinya vati bhanga ravo reCABS ndiro richaramba richipa zvikwereti kune vechidiki asi rwendo runo zvikwereti izvi zvichange zvave mumaRTGs. Payatanga homwe yeKurera-Ukondla yaipa vechidiki zvikwereti zvinotangira pamadhora mazana mashanu kusvika pazviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora ekuAmerica. VaMashinya vati Trust yakaumbwa kumutsiridza homwe iyi ndiyo ichagara pasi yoona kuti homwe iyi ichange iine marii pamwe nekuti vanhu vangapihwa zvikwereti zvakakura sei. Mukuru wesangano revechidiki reZimbabwe Youth Forum, VaAshton Bumhira, vuadza Studio7 kuti vanotarisira kuti homwe iyi ichapa mukana kune vechidiki mumatunhu ese munyika kuitira kuti vatange mabhizimizi. Pakamiswa homwe iyi vechidiki zviuru makumi maviri nezveviri ndivo vainge vanyorera kuCABS vachida zvikwereti asi vakabudirira vaive zviuru zvitatu nemazana matanhatu nemakumi matatu. Pavanhu ava zvikamu makumi matanhatu nezvinomwe kubva muzana vaive varume zvikamu makumi matatu nezvitatu vari vakadzi. Vazhinji vevanhu ava vaive vemuHarare, ichiteverwa neBulawayo uye Matabeleland South ndiyo ine vanhu vashoma vakabatsirikana pasi pehomwe iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Tarakinyu omirira Zim kuChina
text: SHASHA yemarathon — Moses Tarakinyu — ndiye achanomirira Zimbabwe kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon kuChina munaMbudzi zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita mumakwikwi eTanganda Half Marathon svondo radarika kwaMutare.   Mujaho uyu ndiwo unoshandiswa kusarudza shasha yemarathon inomirira nyika kuWorld Half Marathon izvo Tarakinyu akakwanisa kuita svondo radarika apo abvuta mukombe kubva kuna Misheck Sithole uyo akapedza ari pechitatu.   Achitaura mushure mekukunda mumakwikwi aya, Tarakinyu anoti chiremerera chikuru kuhwina mujaho uyu pamwe nekuwaniswa mukana wekunomirira nyika kuChina.   “Handisi kugona nekufara nekuti sevamhanyi ndizvo zvatinotarisira pose patinenge tichikwikwidza mumijaho yakasiyana.   “Ndiri kufara zvikuru sezvo ndave nemukana wekunomirira nyika yangu kuChina kumujaho weWorld Half Marathon uko ndoziva kunenge kune shasha dzakawanda dzinobva pasi rose,” anodaro Tarakinyu.   Mutungamiri weNational Athletics Association of Zimbabwe (NAAZ), Tendai Tagara, anoti vachatsigira Tarakinyu zvakazara apo achaenda kumomirira nyika kuChina.   “Tarakinyu gore rino ange achimhanya zvinonwisa mvura nekuti ahwina mijaho yakawanda chaizvo. Saka tinoziva kuti paachaenda kuChina achanorwa semvumba uye isu tichamutsigira mugadziriro yake,” anodaro Tagara.   Zvakadaro, kune mimwe mijaho, Olivia Chitate akakwanisa kuchengetedza mukombe waakatora mugore ra2019 apo akahwina mujaho wemadzimai we21km Kuchiti mumujaho we10km wevarume, wakahwinwa naWellington Varevi apo wemadzimai ukahwinwa naAnne Chirisa.   Shasha yemujaho wewiricheya, Elford Moyo, akarakidza kuti haasi kuzosiya humambo hwake mumujaho uyu zvichitevera kuhwina kwaakaita zvakare.   Nerimwewo divi, kumadzimai ari kusimukira, Stella Jongwe, akahwina mujaho weTanganda Half Marathon kekutanga.

headline: Varimi Votambira Kurudziro Yekuti Varimi Vatengese Dzimwe Mombe
text: Rimwe sangano revarimiri, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Rimwe sangano revarimi, reZimbabwe Commercial Farmers’ Union, ZCFU, rinoti varimi vanofanirwa kutambira kurudziro yehurumende yekuti vatapudze zvipfuwo zvavo munguva ino yekushaikwa kwemafuro, kuitira kuti vasazorasikirwa nepfuma yavo. Mukuru wesangano iri, VaJeremiah Tevera, vanoti sangano ravo ragara richikurudzira varimi vari mumatunhu ane nzara kuti vatengese zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavo kuitira kuti vawane mari yekutenga chikafu chekupa kune zvimwe zvipfuwo zvavanenge vasara nazvo. “Ishoko rakanaka ravari kutaura asi isu sesangano tinoona sekunge ranga ranonoka kuuya nekuti zvipfuwo zviri kufa,” VaTevera vanodaro. Mutevedzeri wegurukurota rezvekurima vakanangana nezvipfuwo, VaPaddy Zhanda, vanonzi nedandemutande renhau reThe Source vari kukurudzirawo varimi kuti vaite nhimuramiswe, vasachiva kuverenga mombe dzakawanda asi idzo dzichizofa dzoga nenzara. Vazhanda vanonzi vari kutarisirwa kushanya kumatunhu eMatabeland South neMatabeleland North neChitatu kuti vasangane nevarimi kuti vakurukure nezvemamiriro akaita zvinhu pamwe nezvekurudziro yavo iyi. Takundikana kubata VaZhanda kuti tinzwe nezvehurongwa hwavo uhwu. Mombe dzinodarika zviuru zvinomwe dzinonzi dzafa mukati memwedzi mina yapfuura nekuda kwekushaiwa mafuro. Hurumende mwedzi wapera yakaparura chirongwa chekubatsira varimi nechikafu chezvipfuyo zvavo mudunhu reChiredzi, asi vamwe varimi vanonzi vari kukundikana kuwana madhora masere ekuti vatenge tsaga rimwe chete rechikafu ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Vatsigiri vava kutenderwa munhandare
text: VATSIGIRI venhabvu vakabaiwa majekiseni ose ekudzivirira Covid-19 vave kutenderwa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup. Sangano reSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) rakanyorera kuZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) richazivisa kuti chikumbiro chavo chekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup inge iine vatsigiri 2 000 munhandare chatambirwa.   Mutsamba yakanyorwa neSRC, akafanobata chigaro chadirector general – Sebastain Garikai – anoti vatsigiri 2 000 vachaona mitambo iyi vanofanirwa kunge vakabaiwa nhomba dzeCovid-19 uye pose pavanoenda kumitambo iyi vagare vakapfeka mamasiki nekutevedzera matanho ose ekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere ichi.   “Chikumbiro chenyu chekuti vatsigiri vaone nhabvu vari munhandare chatambirwa. Saka vatsigiri vose vari muZone 3 neZone 4 vanofanirwa kuuya nemakadhi anoratidza kuti vakabaiwa majekiseni ose eCovid-19 pamwe nezvitupa zvavo kunhandare pavanenge vachipinda. “Naizvozvo, tinokurudzira kuti matikiti ekupinda mumitambo iyi atengeswe mitambo isati yatanga kuitira panhandare pasazoita nyonga-nyonga uye tinotarisira kuti pave nemagedhi akasiyana anopinda nekubuda nevanhu.   “Mazita evatsigiri aya anofanirwa kunge akatonyoreswa kare zvekuti pakupinda munhandare pane vanenge vachiongorora. Kana munhu zita rake risipo, haatenderwe kupinda munhandare macho.   “Mitemo iyi nemimwe ikoshesei uye ngaitevedzerwe nekuti mukasaitedzera zvinotituma kuti timise vatsigiri vacho kuuya kuzoona mitambo iyi,” anodaro Garikai.

headline: Tinoda var muZim
text: nyaya dzenhabvu munyika reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) rinoti riri kutevera gwara reFederation International de Football Association (Fifa) nekuunza muchina weVideo Assistant Referee (VAR) muZimbabwe uyo unobatsira varidzi vepembe mukuita basa ravo.   Kumutambo weFifa World Cup 2018 uri kutambirwa kuRussia pari zvino, kwaona michina yeVAR ichishandiswa kekutanga uye iri kubatsira zvikuru varidzi vepembe kuona zvimwe zvavanenge vapotsa zvinosanganisira kuvabatsira kupa mapena kana kubvisa mamwe magobhora apo mutambi anenge anwisa ari offside.   Mukushi wemashoko weZifa – Xolisani Gwesela — anoti sangano ravo riri pasi peFifa saka richange richitevedzera zvose zvinoitwa neFifa nechinangwa chekuramba vachivandudza nhabvu munyika muno.   “Isu seZifa tiri pasi peFifa tinotevedzera zvese zvainoita, saka tarisirai michina yeVAR muno nekuti muchina uyu wakanakisa uye uchabatsira varidzi vepembe.   “Nhabvu iri kuita ichishanduka, zvakawanda zviri kuuya zvichange zvichibatsira mutambo uyu kuti ukure uye urambe uchienda kure,” anodaro Gwesela.   Anoti nhabvu yemazuva ano yasiyana neyekare nekuda kwekuti iri kusanduka nekukasika nekudaro vatsigiri vemutambo uyu vanofanirwa kutarisira zvakawanda zvinoita kuti urambe uchinakidza.

headline: Transform Zimbabwe Yoda Kuti Zuva reSarudzo dzeBy-Election Rive Zororo
text: Bato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe rinoti ringangoenda kudare repamusorosoro reConstitutional Court kuti dare iri rimanikidze mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kutara zuva resarudzo dze by-election, remusi wa 10 Chikumi sezororo kuitira kuti vashandi vakwanisewo kuenda kunovhota vakasununguka. Munyori anoona nezvekuburitswa kwemashoko muTransform Zimbabwe, Doctor Sungai Mazando, vanoti bato ravo rakanyorera VaMugabe tsamba richisvitsa chinyunyuto chavo ichi vachivapa mazuva manomwe ekuti vapindure. Asi mazuva aya akatodarika neMuvhuro. Bato iri riri kutsigirwawo nerimwe bato rinopikisa reNational Constitutional Assembly, NCA, iro rinotiwo rinofunga kuti VaMugabe vakatara zuva iri vaine chikiribidi chavari kuitira. Mutauriri weNCA, VaMadock Chivasa, vanoti VaMugabe vanofanirwa kuendesa zuva iri mukupera kwesvondo kana vatadza kuti riitwe zororo. VaMugabe vakatara musi wa 10 Chikumi sezuva richaitwa sarudzo dzekutsiva nhengo dzeMDC Renewal Team dzakadzingwa mudare reparamende mumatunhu gumi nemana, kozotiwo kudunhu reHwedza North chigaro chakasiiwa nenhengo yeZanu PF, VaSimon Musanhu, avo vakashaya kutanga kwegore rino. Sarudzo dzichaitwawo kuHurungwe West kuMashonaland West neHeadlands kutsiva vaive nhengo dzeZanu PF vakadzingwa vanoti VaTemba Mliswa naVaDidymus Mutasa. Mapato ezvematongerwo enyika masere pamwe nevakazvimirira ndivo vachapinda musarudzo idzi, idzo dzakarambwa nemapato ose eMDC achida kuti mitemo ine chekuita nesarudzo itange yagadziriswa. Doctor Mazando vanoti chimwe chichemo chavachasvitsa kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission ndechemapepa avo ekutsvaga rutsigiro ayo vanoti ari kubvarurwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vatsigiri veZanu PF. Vanotiwo vatsigiri vavo vari kushungurudzwawo zvekuti mumwe akatorohwa akakuwara zvekupinda muchipatara mumusha weGlen View. Asi VaChivasa vanoti nhengo dzavo hadzisati dzashungurudzwa kusvika pari zvino sezvo dziri kukwanisa kutsvaga rutsigiro dzakasununguka. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba naVanamukoti Vobatsira Vakawirwa neDambudziko reCyclone Idai
text: Vana chiremba navana mukoti vanoti vari mubishi rekubatsira vanhu vekuChimanimani neChipinge vakawirwa nedambudziko redutumupengo reCyclone Idai masvondo maviri apfuura. Mumwe wevanachiremba ava, Doctor Matthew Wazara, vanoti vanhu vakawanda vari munzvimbo dzakaparadzwa nedutumupengo nemafashamu emvura, havachina mishonga yekupodza kana kunyaradza zvirwere zvinenge shuga, diabetes, ne High Blood Pressure. Dr Wazara vanoti vanhu vakawanda vakakuvara uye vazhinji vanofanirwa kudzorerwa pamapiritsi avainwa, uye vamwe vavo vanotoda kuitwa maoparesheni, sezvo vakakuvara zvakaipisisa. Dr Wazara vanoti vagari vanofanirwa kunwa mvura uyakachena, sezvo mvura iri munzvimbo iyi yasangana netsvina yezvitunha, mhuka izvo zvinokwanisa kukonzera zvirwere zvinofamba nemvura zvakaita semanyoka kana korera. Pamusoro pedambudziko rekushaya mvura yakachena, Dr Wazara vanotiwo madzimai ari kusanganawo nedambudziko rekushaya zvinhu zvavanoshandisa pamazuva avo ekutevera. Dr Wazara vanokurudzira kuti mumatunhu aya munofanirwa kuvakwa misasa yakawanda yemakiriki kuitira kuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro nekukurumidza. Dr Wazara vanoti kune vanhu vakawanda vari kurwadziwa nezvakaitika zvokuti vachada kunyaradzwa naana mazvikokota nenyanzvi dzinoona nezvirwere zvepfungwa kuti vagamuchire tsaona dzakavawira. Vanotiwo kune dzidziso zvakare iri kuitirwa vafundisi vemakereke akasiyana kuti vakwanise kunotaura zvokunyaradza kune vose vakasangana nedambudziko iri. Mumwe mugari wemuTynwald North, Amai Gertrude Magwaniza, vanoti vane hama yavo inogara kuChimanimani iri kutodawo mishonga yavanorarama nayo sezvo yavaive nayo yakayeredzwa nemvura yakasiya yaparadza kumabvazuva kwenyika. Cyclone Idai yakatanga musi wa 14 Kurume ikasiya yaparadzawo misha nehupenyu hwevanhu muMalawi neMozambique. Sangano reWorld Health Organization rinoti vanhu vanosvika zana nemakumi mana vafa nechirwere chekorera kuMozambique. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi regurukota rezvehutano, Va Obediah Moyo, kuti vachaita seyi padambudziko rehutano hwevanhu vari kuChimanimani neChipinge. No media source currently available

headline: Bhajeti reKanzuru yeMasvingo Rinoramba Kutambirwa neVagari Vakawanda
text:
Vagari vemuguta reMasvingo vari kuramba kutambira bhajeti rekanzuru yavo regore rinouya remadhora mabhiriyoni mana vachiti rakakurisa zvikuru uye vagari vazhinji vachatadza kubhadhara mitero nekuda kwekuoma kwakaita hupenyu munyika.

Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure mekuitwa misangano yekunzwa dzevanhu pabhajeti iri, vagari ava vanoti ivo zvikamu mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe nezvishanu kubva muzana zviri kuda kukwidzwa mitero zvakakurisa sezvo vanhu vakawanda vachatadza kubhadhara mitero iyi. Mumwe mugari, Amai Beatrice Hamdziripi, vemumusha we Runyararo West, vanoti ivo kukwidzwa kwemitero uku kunomesera vagari vazhinji avo vasiri kuwedzerwa mari kwavanoshanda nekudaro vanozonetseka kubhadara mari idzi kana dzikakwidzwa nekanzuru.

Mumwe mugari, VaHardlife Tangayi wekuHillside, vanoti zvakaoma kuti kanzuru iwedzere mitero nezvikamu zvakadaro panguva iyo ruzhinji rwevagari rwuri kuvharirwa mvura nekutadza kubhadhara mari iri kudiwa izvozvi, nekudaro gore rinouya dhorobha rose rinogona kuzotadza kubhadhara mvura kana mitero iyi ikakwidzwa.

Gore rino vagari vazhinji vari kubhadhara mari yemvura iri pakati pezviuru
zvitatu nezviuru zvitanhatu zvemadhora pamwedzi. Mari iyi ikakwidzwa gore rinouya, vagari vanenge vobhara mari inotangira pazviuru zvisere nemazana masere ane makumi mashanu emadhora kusvika pazviuru gumi nezvinomwe nemazana manomwe emadhora emaRTGS. Meya weguta reMasvingo, VaCollen Maboke, vanoti kanzuru yakatarisa
zvinhu zvakawanda isati yakwidza mitero iyi, zvinosanganisira kukwira
kwemafuta emotokari dzebasa nemitengo yemishonga yekuchenesa mvura iyo inotengwa kunze kwenyika nemari yekunze.

Asi sangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate
Payers Alliance (MURRA) rinoti kunyange zvinhu zvakakwidzwa mitengo semafuta edzimotokari chikamu chekanzuru chakangokurisa uye vagari vazhinji kwavanowana mari haina kukwidzwa nezvikamu zvakadaro. Anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muMURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai
Magurupira, vanoti kanzuru iri kuda kusiya mugari ari parumananzombe.

Vamwe vagari vanoti zve chinonyanya kuvarwadza ndechekuti
vanokwidzirwa mari asi mvura yacho ichinetsa kuuya mudzimba dzavo. Mvura inouya kwemaawa mashoma shoma makuseni oga oga yobva yaenda voswera vasina mvura izvo zvinozoita kuti vashandise zvibhorani zviri mumawadhi asi panouya mapepa emvura, mitengo inenge yakakwira zvikuru. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti Voshanyira Dr Patson Dzamara neVamwe Vari muHusungwa
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTendai Biti nhasi vaenda kuHarare Central Prison nekuChikurubi uko kune nhengo gumi neimwe dzakasungwa dzichiratidzira muAfrica Unity Square. Vakasungwa ava vanosanganisa Muzvare Linda Masarira, Tatenda Mombeyarara, Dr Patson Dzamara, Pride Mukono, Muzvare Pamela Mawire, Makomborero Haruzivishe, Muzvare Irene Takavada, Shadreck Dhliwayo naBrian Kansunzuma. Vechidiki ava vaida kuratidzira kwemazuva gumi nematanhatu vachiti havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vari kutonga nedemo. Kudare ramajastiriti vakanzi vabhadhare mari yechibatiso inosvika chiuru chemadhora inonzi nemagweta yakawandisa. No media source currently available VaBiti vati vanhu vari muhusungwa ava vari kunetseka zvikuru nekuti hapana vari kukwanisa kuunganidza mari inosvika zviuru zvisere zvemadhora zvemari yechibatiso. Madzimai ari kuChikurubi anonzi ari kunetsekawo nekushaya zvokudya uye mvura yakachena. Mumwe mudzimai ane mwana ane mwedzi mitatu anonzi akatomurumura nekuda kwekusungwa uku.

headline: Vatyairi veMarori vemuZimbabwe Vochema Chema Nekumanikidzwa Kushandisa Zambuko reKazungula
text: Zvimwe zvarwa zveZimbabwe zvino gara muSouth Africa zvichityaira marori zvatotanga kuchema chema nenyaya yekumanikidzwa kushandisa zambuko reKazungula nekuregedza kushandisa muganhu weBeitbridge. VaRight Moyo, mumwe wevatyairi ava, uyewo vakamirira sangano reZimbabwe All Truckers Association, vanoti kusadarika nemuZimbabwe vari pabasa kwave kupa kuti vatadze kuonana nehama dzavo uye kutakura zvinhu zvekutengesa zvinodiwa kuZiVambabwe kuti vawanewo chouviri. Asi mumwewo mutyairi asina kuda kudomwa nezita ati hapana chakaipa kushandisa , izvi zvichayamura makambani emarori akawanda sezvo mafuta anoshandiswa nemarori, akachipa muBotswana. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti danho iri richakanginisa zvikuru mhuri yeZimbabwe inoita zvekutenga nekutengesa pakati peZimbawe ne South Africa. VaKuchera vati nyika yeZimbabwe icharasikirwa zvikuru nehupfumi kuburikidza nemitero naizvozvo inofanira kugadzirisa mamiriro emuganhu weBeitbridge kana ichida kukwikwidzana nezambuko reKazungula. VaStan Makwara, sachigaro weProudly 263, sangano rinosimudzira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvine mabhisimisi achiri kusimukira muSouth Africa, vanoti nhengo dzavo ndidzo dzicharasikirwa zvikuru nedanho iri. Zambuko reKazungula rakavakwa neBotswana neZambia dzichibatsirwa nezvikwereti kubva kuAfrican Development Bank neJapan International Cooperation Agency. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano ravanaChiremba reZADHR Roshora Mabatirwo eNhengo dzeZanu PF Dziri muHusungwa
text: Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemabatirwo ari kuitwa vamwe vevaimbove vakuru-vakuru mubato re Zanu-PF, avo vakasungwa svondo rapera. Munyori mukuru we sangano iri, Dr. Evans Masitara, vanoti sangano ravo rinoshora zvakasimba zvakaitwa nemauto nemapurisa kuvasungwa ava uye vari kuedza zvikuru kuti vapiwe mvumo yekuzvionera voga vasungwa ivavo sezvo vainzi havana kubatwa zvakanaka pavakanga vari muhusungwa, umo vanonzi vakashungurudzwa nokurohwa. Dr Masitara vanoti zviri kuitwa nemapurisa kuvasungwa hazvibumidzwe nebumbiro yemitemo. VaChombo, avo vari kupomerwa mhosva dzehuwori, vakasungwa pamwe nemunyori muboka revechidiki muZanu PF, VaKudzanai Chipanga, pamwe nemurongi wemisangano muboka revechidiki, VaInnocent Hamandishe. VaChombo naVachipanga vari kumirirwa negweta rine mukurumbira, Muzvinafundo Lovemore Madhuku, uye vari kutarisirwa kudzoka mudare nemusi weMuvhuro 27 Mbudzi. No media source currently available

headline: Nyakupfura VaPatrick Kombayi Muna 1990, VaChivamba, Vanoshaya
text: Mutevedzeri wasachigaro weZanu-PF mudunhu reMidlands Province, VaKizito Chivamba, avo vange vari nhengo yeparamende inomirira Chiwundura, vakashaya kuchipatara cheGweru nemusi weChitatu. VaChivamba vakatanga kuva nhengo yeZanu muna 1972 uye vanoti vainge vari mujibha kubva muna 1977 kusvika muna 1979. Vange vari nhengo yeparamende kubva muna 2008. Mufi anonzi ange arwara kwenguva yakareba. Kunyange hazvo veZanu-PF mudunhu iri vari kuchema vachiti vaive gamba, vamwe vanopikisa vanoti nyaya yavo yekupfura muchakabvu Patrick Kombayi vachibatsirana naVaElias Kanengoni musori, avo vakaitwa gamba renyika munongedzo wekuti muZimbabwe hamuna hutongo hwejekerere. Muna 1990 munguva yesarudzo, VaChivamba naVaKanengoni vakapfura VaKombayi vainge vari kubato reZimbabwe Unity Movement. VaKombayi vaikwikwidzana nevaimbova mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu Simon Muzenda kuGweru. Dare repamusoro soro rakavatongera kugara mujeri kwemakore manomwe asi mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakabva vavaregerera vachishandisa masimba avo semutungamiri wenyika. Munguva yehondo yeChimurenga, VaKombayi vaibatsira zvikuru varwiri verusununguko vainge vari kuZambia. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu, VaDewa Mavhinga, avo vanoshanda nesangano reHuman Rights Watch, vanoti tsika yehurumende yeZanu-PF yekuregerera vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu iri kudzosera hutongo hwejekerere kumashure. No media source currently available

headline: Zanu PF Yoramba Kubvisa Mari kuKanzuru yeMasvingo
text: Nhengo dze Zanu PF dziri kufamba nemotakari dzakanamirwa maposita emutungamiriri wenyika, VaEmerson Mnangagwa, vanonzi vari kuramba kubhadhara mari yekupaka motokari dzavo muguta. Vashandi vekanzuru vanoita basa rekubhadharisa vatyairi vemotokari vanoti vatsigiri veZanu PF vari kuva shungurudza sezvo mutemo uchiti munhu wose anofanira kubhara mari iyo inozoshandiswa nekanzuru kugadzirisa migwagwa mudhorobha. Varidzi vemotokari vanobhadhariswa masenzi makumi mashanu pamaminetsi makumi matatu, kana dhora paawa imwe chete kuti vapake motokari dzavo. Vamwe vevashandi vataura neStudio7 asi varamba kudomwa mazita avo nekutyira hupenyu hwavo vanoti vatsigiri veZanu PF vari kufamba ne motokari dzakanzi #ED has my Vote vari kuramba kubvisa mari idzi. "Isu vashandi vekanzuru mashandiro edu ari kurwadza nekuti period yatapinda ndeye ma elections zvekuti vanhu vari kufamba vane motokari dzakanamirwa ma sticker akanzi ED has my vote emutungamiriri wenyika vakasvika pama bay varikuramba kubhadhara parking vachiti tisu vebato riri kutonga, izvi zvakunzoeresa kuti vamwe wo vanhu varambe kubhara avchiti ve party havasi kubhadhara," adaro mumwe mushandi. Vamwe vashandi vanoti vanotya kusunga motokari idzi neganjo(clamping), dzinenge dzaramba nekuti Zanu PF inozivikanwa nemhirizhonga nekudaro vanotyira hupenyu hwavo. Vagari veMasvingo vari kunyunyuta nemaitiro aya vachiti ivo vakaramba kubhadhra mota dzavo dzinosungwa neganjo votadza kufamba. Mukuru webasa kuMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance, VaAnoziva Muguti, vashoropodza zviri kuitwa neZanu PF, vachiti zvinotyora mitemo yenyika. Meya weGuta reMasvingo, VaHubert Fidze, vati nyaya iyi yava kwavari uye vachatora matanho sekanzuru. "Tiri kunzwa nyaya iyo saka tiri kuti kuvana vedu ma marshal vatipe ma reports aiwawo then ini ndichaenda nawo kukanzuru, ndozotaura neve Zanu PF ende chinondishamisa ndechekuti munhu anosvika pakushandisa zita re President ED Mnangawa achiramba kubhdhara 50 cents chaiyo," vadaro VaFidze. Mutauriri weZanu PF muMasvingo, VaRonald Ndava, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti manyepo ari kutaurwa nevashandi vekanzuru vachiti bato ravo rine vanhu vane hunhu vasingaite zvisina basa nezita remutungamiri wavo. Vashandi vekanzuru vanoti nekuwanda kwaita motokari dzebato reZanu PF, kanzuru inogona kurasikirwa nemari yakwanda kana mokokari idzi dzisingabhadhare mari sezvinoitwawo nevamwe vatyairi. No media source currently available

headline: Huori Muhurumende Hoendesa Nyika kuMawere
text: Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Nyaya yehuori yanetsa munyika zvikuru mumakambani ehurumende ayo ari kupomerwa mhosva yekuita chikiribidi munyaya yematenda ane mari inosvika mabhiriyoni emadhora. Huori hunonzi nevakawanda huri kupawo kuti nyika irambe iri mumadhaka. Mapazi ehurumende akaita seremhando dzemoto anonzi akapa basa kunhengo yeZanu-PF, VaPsychology Mazivisa, rekushambadzira kambani iyi kunyangwe paine vanhu vari kuita basa iri. Kambani yeZesa inonziwo iri kupa VaWicknel Chivhayo mamiriyoni emadhora ekuita zvinonzi nevamwe zviri kuitwa nechikiribidi. Vakuru kumakambani akaita seZimra neAnti-Corruption Commission vari kuferefetwa pari zvino nenyaya dzehuori. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakatendawo kuti mari inosvika mabhiriyoni gumi nemashanu yemangoda yakatsakatira kwachiyadzwa. Sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Coalition on Debt and Development VaJoy Mabenge, vanoti mutungamiri wenyika anofanira kuona kuti nyaya yehuori yapararira. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Zvimbokoma zvaJoshua naWilder zvombomiswa’
text: anofanirwa kumira kwegore rese asati arwa naDeontay Wilder mumutambo weWorld Heavyweight Title Unification, sekutaura kwaBarry Hearn.   Asi, Hearn – uyo ane makore akawanda ari munyaya dzekuronga mitambo anoti achange asipo pachaitwa hurukuro dzekuronga nezvemutambo uyu pachasangana shasha iyi iyo ine mabhande eWBO, IBF neWBA naJoshua svondo rinotevera apo vacharonga remangwnaa rake mumutambo uyu.   Sachigaro weMatchroom – Hearn – akagadza mwana wake, Eddie, kuti agotungamira Joshua mumutambo uyu nenyaya dzake dzese asi anenge achiraira hake pano neapo zvese zvinenge zvichidiwa kuti basa riende kumberi.   Wilder, uyo ane bhande reWBC, mwedzi wadarika akanyorera Joshua padandemutande achitaura kuti vamiriri vake vane mari inosvika 35.9 miriyoni paunzi yekuronga kuti mutambo uyu uitwe pakati pavo gore rino.   Eddie akatsanangura kuti vane zvakawanda zvavanoda kuti vatange vavimbiswa vasati vasaina kuti mutambo uyu uenderere mberi.   Asi baba vake vakataura kuti nhandare yeManchester United yeOld Trafford ndiyo inogona kurongerwa kuitwa mutambo uyu vachiti, “Zvinogoneka”.   “Ndine musangano naAnthony Joshua svondo rinotevera naEddie, Eddie asati aenda kuNew York kunoronga mutambo uyu.” – SportsMail Boxing

headline: Vamwe muZimbabwe Vanoti Morocco Inokwanisa Kusimudza Mukombe weWorld Cup
text: Chikwata cheMorocco chasimudza chivimbo kuti mukombe weWorld Cup ungangouya kuAfrica kekutanga munhoroondo yemakundano aya. Morocco yasimudza chivimbo chakasimba muvatsigiri venhabvu muZimbabwe nemuAfrica yese mushure mekupinda musemi fainari ye2022 World Cup nekurova Portugal 1-0 mumutambo wekota fainari. Mukuita izvi maAtlas Lions aita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika musemi fainari yeWorld Cup kubvira makundano aya aparurwa muna 1930. Dzimwe nyika dzakaita zviri nani mumakundano aya dzakagumira mumakotafainari uye dzinoti Senegal, Ghana neCameroon. Mutsigiri wemutambo wenhabvu VaSaymore Mandara vanoti Morocco ichashamisa vakawanda nekuunza mukombe weWorld Cup kuAfrica. Muna 1986, Morocco ndiyo zvekare yakaita chikwata chekutanga muAfrica kusvika muRound of 16 yemakundano aya. Morocco nemusi weChitatu iri kusangana neFrance iyo yakarova England 2-1 mukota fainari nezuro manheru. Chivimbo muchikwata ichi chasimuka mushure mekunge Morocco yakapunzira pasi zvikwata zvine mukurumbira zvinoti Belgium, Spain nePortugal. Mumwe mutsigiri wenhabvu VaVincent Bushu vanoti kuti Morocco ichasvika mufainari yeWorld Cup iyi. Pamusoro pezvo, Morocco haisati yakundwa pamitambo misere yakateverana uyezve yanwiswa chibodzwa chimwechete chete pamitambo iyi. Morocco ir ikurairidzwa nemurairidzi we munyika iyi Walid Regragui. Muongorori wemutambo wenhabvu VaGibson Nyikadzaramba vanoti Africa yese iri kuda kuti Morocco iite zvakanaka, Ruzhinji rwuri kuda kuti Morocco idarike pairi apa nekuti yatoita kare zvanga zvisingatarisirwe. Asi mutambo neFrance wakaoma sezvo nyika iyi iri kuda kuva nyika yekutanga kusimudza mukombe weWorld Cup mumakwikwi akatevedzana zvakapedzisira kuitwa neBrazil muna 1962. Uye nevatambi vakaita saOlivier Giroud naKylian Mbappe, mutambo uyu wakaoma zvikuru kuMorocco iyo yawisa hayo mikono yakawanda kuQatar.  Imwe semi fainari pakati peArgentina neCroatia iriko musi weChipiri. Croatia iyo yaimbenge iri pasi peYugoslavia yakatanga kuzvitonga muna 1992 ikatanga kukwikwidza muWorld Cup yakazvimirira muna 1998. Kubva mumakore aya yasvika mumasemi fainari katatu. Mutambi wayo ane mukurumbira ndiLuca Modric weReal Madrid. Argentina yakasimudza mukombe uyukaviri, muna 1978 uye 1986 ichitungamirirwa namushakabvu Diego Maradona. Iko zvino chitsvambe chiri kuna Lionel Messi uyu ari kufunguiudzirwa kuti ave kutamba makwikwi ake ekupedzisira muWorld Cup sezvo ave nemakore makumi matatu nemashanu. Fainari ye2022 World Cup iriko musi wesvondo, svondo rinouya. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi Vazhinji Vanoti Havatarisire Kupiwa Mabhonasi Gore Rino
text: Sangano rinomirira vashandi reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions, ZCTU, rinoti haritarisiri kuti vashandirwi vachanyima vashandi vavo mari dzekuvatenda dzemabhonasi gore rino sezvo zviri muzvibvumirano zvemabasa zvakanyoreranwa pasi pakati pemapoka maviri aya kuti vashandi vanobhadharwa mabhonasi. Mamwe makambani anotanga kubhadhara vashandi mari dzemabhonasi mwedzi uno waGumiguru, asi gore rino zvakanyarara nekuda kwemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Munyori mukuru weZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vanoti makambani mashoma kwazvo anobhadhara mabhonasi nekuti zvinobva pakuti gore iroro awana marii yakawanda zvakadii. Mukuru wesangano revashandirwi, reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, EMCOZ, VaJohn Mufukare, vaudza Studio 7 kuti panyaya dzemabhonasi, sangano ravo rinowanzo kuzvisiira kuboka rimwe nerimwe kuti rinokwanisa zvakadii kubhadra vashandi varo mabhonasi avo. No media source currently available

headline: Vagari veMuChinhoyi Vofarira Kugadzirwa kweMigawagwa
text: Vagari vakawanda vemuChinhoyi vanoti vari kufara nekugadzirwa kuri kuitwa migwagwa yeguta ravo iyi yange yaipa nekuda kwekupedza nguva isina kugadziriswa. Vazhinji vataura neStudio 7 vanoti kunyange hazvo zvinhu zvakaoma kanzuru yavo iri kuita zvinhu zvinobatika sekugadzirisa migwagwa iyo yanga yave nemakomba makomba akawanda izvo zvanga zveve kukonzera njodzi uye kuuraya motokari dzavo. Mumwe mutyairi wemotokari inotakura veruzhinji VaMacdonald Chareya vanoti zvinofadza kuti kanzuru iri kugadzira migwagwa izvo vanoti zvave kuchengetedza motokari dzavo uye kusasimuka kwehuruva iyo inokonzera zvirwere. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaLazarus Tembo avo vanoti motokari dzavo hadzichafa nekuda kwekufamba mumakomba. VaChareya vanoti dambudziko ravepo nderekuti vamwe vatyairi vave kumhanyisa motokari sevari pamakwikwi nekudaro vanoti paiswe mahambu mumigwagwa. Meya weguta reChinhoyi VaDyke Makombe vebato reMDC inotungamirwa naVaNelson Chamisa vanoti vave kukwanisa kugadzira migwagwa nemari iri kubva kubazi rinoona nezve kugadzira kwemigwagwa munyika reZimbabwe National Road Authority kana kuti ZINARA. VaMakombe vanoti kanzuru yavo yave kushandisa mari yeZINARA pabasa ravanenge vapihwirwa mari kwete kuishandisa zvimwe. Asi mumwe mugari Amai Mercy Tapfumaneyi vanoti vanotenda maruva vadya chakata sezvo kanzuru ichimbotanga zvinhu asi yotadza kupedza nekuti kwavanogara kuWhite City hakusati kwagadzirwa. Mutauriri wekanzuru VaTichaona Mlauzi vanoti nzvimbo dzisiri kugadzirwa gore rino dzichagadzirwa munaNdira gore rinouya sezvo vakapihwa mari inosvika miriyoni nechidimu neZINARA yekushandisa gore rinouya. VaMlauzi vanoti parizvino vari kushandisa mari inosvika miriyoni kugadzira makiromita mapfumbamwe. Zvichakadaro mune imwewo nyaya sachigaro webato reZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West VaZiyambi Ziyambi vakazivisa nezuro kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vachatanga kutenda vanhu nekuvavhotera kwavakaita. VaZiyambi vanoti VaMnangagwa vachatanga nekutenda vanhu vekwaZvimba neMugovera sezvo vainge vasingafungidzire kuti vanokunda mudunhu iri sezvo kuri kumusha kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe.

headline: VaTsvangirai neVatungamiri veMapato ari muMDC Alliance Vanoita Musangano Wavo weKutanga
text: Vatungamiri vemapato manomwe ari mumubatanidzwa wemapato anopikisa weMDC Alliance vaita musangano wavo wekutanga muHarare nhasi mutungamiri weMDC VaMorgan Tsvangirai vari sachigaro. Mapato manomwe anoti MDC-T, MDC, PDP, Zanu Ndonga, Zimbabwe People First, Transform Zimbabwe neMutiracial Democratic Party, akasaina chibvumirano chekuumba mubatanidzwa uchakwikwidzana nebato riri kutronga reZanu PF. VaTsvangirai ndivo vakasarudzwa kuti vamirire mubatanidzwa uyu vachikwikwidzana nemutungamiri weZanu PF, VaRobert Mugabe. Mutauriri weMDC Alliance, uye vachitungamira Transform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume vanoti musangano wavo wekutanga uyu wanga uri wekuchitanga kuronga hwaro hwekutevera kugadziriro yavo yesarudzo dzegore rinouya. VaNgarivhume vanoti vawiriranawo kuti vaenderere mberi nekuparura mubatanidzwa uyu mumatunhu ose emunyika, vachitanga nekuBulawayo musi wa 26 mwedzi uno. Vatiwo zvakare nhaurirano dzekuti ndiani vachamirira mubatanidzwa musarudzo dzenhengo dzeparamende nedzemakanzuru dzichiri kuenderera mberi mumubatanidzwa wavo. No media source currently available

headline: Kukwira Kwaita Mitengo yeZvinhu Munyika Kworwadza Vakawanda.
text: Veruzhinji vari kuchema chema zvikuru nekukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu inonzi yakwira zvakanyanya kubva payanga iri mumazuva ehurumende ya va Robert Mugabe. Vataura ne Studio7 vati saga refotireza ravaitenga madhora makumi matatu, nhasi vave kuritenga madhora makumi matanhatu. Vanoti shangu dzevana vechikoro dzavaitenga madhora makumi maviri, vave kudzitenga nemadhora makumi masere. Vanhu ava vanoti zvinhu zvese zvakwira mitengo uye hupenyu hwaomera vanhu zvisineyi nekuti unoenda kubasa kana kuti kwete. Muzvare Portia Katiyo, avo vari ku Kadoma, vanotiwo zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka munyika zvekuti hupenyu hwava kuvaomera. Izvi zviri kuitika panguva iyo vana chiremba vari kuramwa mabasa uye varairidzi vachiti vachaenda kubasa mazuva maviri chete pasvondo nekuda kwekuomerwa nehupenyu. Munyika muri kutaridza kuti hamuna kugadzikana nekuda kwekunetseka kuri kuita vanhu. NeMuvhuro vashandi vemumigodhi vaitiwo vave kuda kubatana nevarairidzi, navana chiremba mukukanda mapadza pasi. Vezvitoro vanonzi vave kutiwo vanoda mari dzekunze kwete kutambiriswa bond notes izvo zviri kuita kuti veruzhinji vatambure zvakanyanya. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vomanikidzwa Kutenga Hupfu neZvitupa
text: Vamwe vagari vemuChinhoyi vanoti havasi kufara nedanho rakatorwa nevamwe vanotengesa hupfu rekuti munhu aburitse chitupa chake kuti atenge hupfu. Zvitoro zvakaita seN. Richards, Gain Wholesale neOK Zimbabwe zvave kutengesera hupfu kune munhu anenge ayine chitupa chete. Danho iri riri kushorwa nevakawanda avo vari kuti zvinosiya vanhu vakawanda vasina zvitupa vachifa nenzara. Mumwe mugari wemuChinhoyi VaBasildon Kanonge vanoti zvekudya ikodzero yemunhu nekudaro haafanirwe kutadza kudya nekuti haana chitupa. Izvi zvatsigirwa naVaIsrael Nyandoro avo vanoti vanhu vakawanda havasikupihwa zvitupa kwamudzviti zvichinzi havana mapepa anogadzira zvitupa. Asi vamwe vakaita saAmai Cornilia Matekenya vanoti kutenga hupfu munhu aburitsa chitupa zviri kuita kuti hupfu hutengwe nevanhu vakawanda uye zvinoderedza huori. VaDesire Mapfumo vanoti zvose zviri kuitika zvinoreva kuti chikafu chishoma munyika nekudaro hurumende inofanirwa kuunza hupfu hwakawanda kuvanhu. Mukuru wechitoro cheN. Richards VaJohn Matikiti vanoti vari kuti munhu anoda hupfu anofanirwa kuuya nechitupa kuti vazvichenure kana vazobvunzwa kuti vakatengesera ani hupfu. Hupfu hweRoller Meal uhwo hwavekutengwa nemadhora makumi manomwe emabhondi kana RTGS sezvo vanohugaya vachipihwa mari nehurumende huri kunetsa munyika yose. Hurumende iri kufungawo kupa vanhu vanoshaiwa makuponi ekutenga hupfu senzira yekupedza huori munyaya dzezve kugaya nekutengeswa kwehupfu. Vamwe vanhu vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutanga hupfu muzvitoro nemari iri pasi vonoutengesa nemutengo wepamusoro pamukoto. World Food Programme inoti vanhu vanoda kusvika mamiriyoni masere vakatarisana nenzara inotyisa munyika uye vanoda kupihwa chikafu nechimbi chimbi. Izvi zvinonzi nesangano iri zvakakonzerwa nekusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura uye mitemo yehurumende iri kungovandudzwa chero nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Mapurisa neVasori Vogara Vakadzipakatira Sezvo Kugunun'una neHurumende yaVaMugabe Kwowedzera
text: Hurumende inonzi yati vanochengetedza mukati menyika vagare vakadzipakatira kana kuti "high alert" sezvo zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo. Vamwe vakuru mumapurisa vataura neStudio 7 vati zvinhu hazvina kugadzikana munyika nenyaya yekusamira zvakanka munyaya dzezvehupfumi asi vati vakagadzirira kuona kuti hakuna kuratidzira kuchaitika. Vanhu vakawanda kusanganisa vechidiki, mapato ezvematongerwo enyika, vana muzvinabhizimisi uye vemachechi vave kubuda pachena kuti havasi kufara nezviri kuitwa nehurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe. Mapurisa anodzivirira mvongamupopoto akawanda ave kuendeswa kumadhorobha akawanda sezvo kuratidzira kwakatangira muHarare Nemusi weChishanu vesangano revechidiki richangoumbwa rinonzi veTajamuka iro rine vechidiki kubva kumasagano ezvematongerwo enyika akasiyana siyana, vadzidzi nevemamwe masangano rakendesa tsamba yenyunyuto kumahofisi eInternational Monetary Fund muHarare uko vanonzi vakasvika kwakazara vesangano revasori avo vakatanga kuvatevera. Tsamba yakasiiwa iyi yaikurudzira IMF kuti isadyidzane nehurumende yaVaMugabe yyavanotio iri kutyora kodzero dzevanhu nekuita zvehuwori. KuMasvingo mapurisa anonzi akaramba kupa mvumo kuvemachechi nevamwe, vemasangano akazvimirira nevezvematongerwo enyika vange vachida kuratidzira vachiti havasi kufara nehutongi hwaVaMugabe. Officer commanding Masvingo Superitendent Philip Ncube vaKAudza vanhu ava kuti havasi kuzotenderwa kuratiudzira pasi pemutemo wePublic Order and Security Act kana kuti POSA. Nemusi weChina vamwe vechidiki veTajamuka vakarohwa zvakaipisisa nemapurisa mushure mekuratidzira muHarare. Vamwe vairatidzira muAfrica Unity Square mavhjiki apera vakambosungwa ndokuendeswa kuChikurubi neHarare Remand asi vakazobuda nemusi weChishanu muhure mekunge vabhadhara mari yechibatiso. Vana muzvinabhizimisi vane chitsama vari kunzi vari kubvunzurudzwa nemapurisa kana vachinge vangotaura kuti nyika yaenda kumawere. Bato guru rinopikisa reMDC-T riri kuratidzirawo mumadhorobha akasiyana siyana. Mubato riri kutonga reZanu-PF maberekerawo pongwe sezvo paine kunetsana kwakanyanya kuti ndiyani achatora chigaro chaVaMugabe avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri asi pasina kujeka kuti achatora chigaro chavo ndiyani kana vasiya basa. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika Vajoy mabenge vanoshanda nesangano recrisis in zimbabwe coalition vajoy mabenge. No media source currently available

headline: Tinosvika kure: Mudimu
text: MUTAMBI wemaWarriors neCefn Druids yekuWales Republic, Alec Mudimu, anoti shuviro yake kugadzwa kuve kaputeni wechikwata chenhabvu chenyika zvachose.   Mudimu ndiye akambofanopihwa chinzvimbo chekutungamira maWarriors mumitambo miviri yawo yadarika apo akasangana neSomalia mumutambo wekurwira kunokwikwidza ku2022 Qatar FIFA World Cup. Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Mudimu anoti ari mudenga rechinonwe nekuda kwechiremerera chaakapihwa naAntipas chekufanobata chinzvimbo chakaputeni wemaWarriors.   “Handisi kugona nemufaro, ichi chiremerera chikuru chinoshuvirwa nemunhu wese kutungamira nyika yako. Ndiri kufara chaizvo kana mhuri yangu haisi kugona nemufaro. Ndoda zvirambe zvakadaro, kana zvichiita ndoda kuramba ndirini mutungamiri ndichitungamira vamwe vatambi apo tichatanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kunokwikwidza ku2022 Qatar Fifa World Cup,” anodaro Mudimu.   MaWarriors svondo radarika akapona nepaburi retsono kuti abudirire kuenda kumapoka ekurwira tikiti rekunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup nekudaro Mudimu anoti ino yave nguva yekubika chikwata chakasimba chichanokwikwidza nezvimwe mumutambo uyu.   “Ishuviro yemutambi wese kutamba kuWorld Cup uye ini ndichiri mwana mudiki ndichiona paTV vamwe vachitamba ndaingoshuvira ndichiti nerimwe zuva ndodawo kuzotambawo ikoko, saka ino yave nguva yekushanda nesimba. Tinoda kuenda kuQatar uye tikashanda nesimba tinoenda,” anodaro.   Mutambi uyu akazvarirwa muno asi ave nemakore mashanu akabva aenda kunogara kunyika yeEngland uko akazokurira achigara kuLondon kunove ndiko kwaakatanga kutambira nhabvu.   Akatambira zvikwata zvakasiyana zvinosanganisira Stalbridge Celtic, Radcliffe Borough, Nortwich Victoria, Stockport Town neCefn Druids iyo ari kutambira parizvino.   “Zimbabwe ndiyo nyika yangu uye ndinodada nayo, ndakazvarirwa muno uye mhuri yedu kunyanya vabereki vangu vanogara vachiuya kuno kuzoshanya nguva nenguva. Ndinotoziva nzvimbo zhinji dzemuno kusanganisira kuOld Highfields tine hama dzimwe dzinogara ikoko,” anodaro.   Achibvunzwa pamusoro pechikafu chaanofarira kudya, Mudimu anoti, “Zviri pachena kana ndauya muno ndinofarira kudya sadza uye nederere.”   Mudimu akatanga kutambira maWarriors gore radarika apo akashevedzwa neaimbove murairidzi wechikwata ichi – Sunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa – akatamba kumutambo we2018 Four Nations Tournament uyo wakaitirwa kuZambia.   Gore rino, aivemo muchikwata chemaWarriors chakakwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations kuEgypt uko akakwanisa kutamba mitambo miviri yekutanga.   “Semutambi wenhabvu, ndichikura chandaingoda chete kupfeka jezi remaWarriors uye pandakapihwa mukana uyu ndakafara zvandisati ndakamboita uye zvikafadza zvakare mhuri yangu, vabereki vangu. Chinhu chandinoshuvira zvikuru kuti ndiite zvakanaka ndichitambira maWarriors,” anodaro Mudimu.

headline: Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission Inoti Zanu-PF Iri Kuita zveMatongerwo eNyika paNyaya yeChikafu
text: Komisheni inoona nezvekodzero dzevanhu yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commision nhasi yazivisa kuti ongororo yayakaita inoratidza kuti vanhu vemapato anopikisa vari kunyimwa chikafu, mbeu nezvekurimisa nevashandi vehurumende pamwe nevatsigiri vebato riri kutonga reZanu PF. Vachizivisa zvakabuda mukuferefeta kwavakaita zvichetevera zvichemo zvakaturwa kukomisheni iyi nevanhu vakawanda kubva kumatunhu eBikita East, Mazowe Central, Muzarabani North neSouth neBuhera North, sachigaro we komisheni iyi, VaElasto Mugwadi vati kunyange hazvo mutungamiriri wenyika vakati hapana munhu anofanira kunyimwa chikafu, vanhu vari kunyimwa nemhaka yekuti havasi nhengo dzebato reZanu PF. VaMugwadi vati zviri kuitwa izvi kutyora kodzero dzevanhu ava pamwe nebumbiro remutemo wenyika. Vati hurumende kuburikidza nebazi revashandi nekuchengetedzwa zvakanaka kwevanhu rinofanira kuona kuti vashandi varo vapa vanhu chikafu vasingaite zverusarura uye vanenge vaita rusarura vanofanira kurangwa. Vati mapurisa eZimbabwe Republic Police anofanira kushanda asina divi raakarekera uye vati zvinofadza chose kuti mapurisa akaosunga nhengo dzeZanu PF dzakarova mumwe kanzura webato reMDC kuBuhera North panyaya dzechikafu. VaMugwadi vatiwo makanzura nenhengo dzeparamende vanofanira kumirira vanhu vese kwete nhengo dzemapato avo. Vatiwo zvavakawana muongororo yavo zvichapihwa kune vese vane chekuita nazvo nechinangwa chekuti vagadzirise dambudziko iri. Mapato anopikisa, nemasangano anoshanda akazvimiriria agara achitaura kuti chikafu nezvekurimisa zviri kugovewa nerusarura. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vachishanda musangano reHuman Rights Watch, VaDehwa Mavhinga, vati Zimbabwe Human Rights Commission yaburitsa pachena rusarura rurukuitika panyaya dzechikafu munyika. Vaenderera mberi vachiti chasara kuti hurumende ichigadzirisa dambudziko iri uye komisheni iyi inofanira kumanikidzira mapurisa kuti aite basa ravo nemazvo. Vamwewo vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu VaVivid Gwede vanoshanda nesangano reZIMRIGHTS vaudza Studio 7 kuti gwaro reZimbabwe Human Rights Commission richaita kuti masabhuku nemadzishe achinje maitiro awo. Gurukota rinoona nezvekuchengetedzwa kwevanhu Amai Priscah Mupfumira vakamboramba kuti izvi zviri kuitika vachiti vanenge vaine humbowo vauye nahwo kumahofisi avo. Kana mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakambotaurawo kuti hapana vanofanira kunyimwa chikafu. Asi mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reMDC-T VaMorgan Tsvangirai vanoti vatsigiri vavo vari kunyimwa chikafu. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nenzara inotyisa uye pane vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni mana varikuda rubatsiro rwechikafu. Chikafu chekubatsira vanhu ava chiri kutengwa nehurumende uye chimwe chirikubva kunyika dzakasiyana siyana dzakaita seAmerica pamwe nemasangano anobatsira akaita se World Food Program. No media source currently available

headline: VaChiyangwa Vokurudzira VaTsigiri veNhabvu Kuti Vanotambira maWarriors kuNhandare yeNdege
text: Mutungamiri weZIFA VaPhilip Chiyangwa vari kukurudzira vanhu vose munyika kuti vaende kunhandare yendege yeHarare International Airport neChipiri masikati kunotambira chikwata cheZimbabwe Warriors icho chakashura mare nekudambura Zambia 3-1 kuSouth Africa nemusi weSvondo chichibva chasimudza mukombe weCOSAFA Castle Cup. Vachitaura neStudio 7, VaChiyangwa vati uyu mukombe wavo wekutanga vachitungamira sangano renhabvu reZIFA nekudaro vane mufaro mukuru. Vavimbisawo kuti vachaona kuti voitirei vakomana vemaWarriors ava.
