VaChiyangwa vakasarudzwa kuti vatungamire ZIFA muna 2015 mushure mekukunda musarudzo VaTrevor Carelse Juul, VaLeslie Gwindi naVaJames Takavada.

headline: Mahofisi eMauto, Mapurisa neVamwe Ovharwa Mvura KuMasvingo neNyaya yeZvikwereti
text: Kanzuru yeMasvingo yakatanga chirongwa chekuvharira vemabhizimusi nemapazi ehurumende mvura pakati pedhorobha kuti vabhadhare zvikwereti zvavo zvakakura, Godfrey Mtimba anotipa nyaya inotevera. Izvi hazvina kutambirwa zvakanaka nevanoshandira mudhorobha vachiti zvinogona kukonzera kupararira kwezvirwere zvakaita secholera netyphoid mudhorobha sezvo zvivakwa zviri kuvharirwa mvura zvichishandira vanhu vakawandisa. Meya weguta reMasvingo VaCollen Maboke vati vari kuvhara mvura nekuti mapazi ehurumende nevemabhizimusi ndivo vane zvikwereti zvakakura.\n\nVanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rinomirira vagari reMasvingo United Residents and Rate Payers Alliance kana kuti MURRA, Muzvare Rumbidzai Magurupira, vati kunyange hazvo vasinga kurudziri kusabhadharwa kwemvura nani zvake, kuvhara mvura pakati peguta kunogona kukonzera zvirwere uye kutyora kodzero dzevanhu. Kanzuru yeMasvingo inoti mapazi ehurumende nevemabhizimusi vane zvikwereti zvinoda kusvika mazana maviri nemakumi manomwe emadhora emunyika kana kuti $270 000. Mapazi ehurumende anezvikwereti zvikuru anosanganisira, mauto, mapurisa pamwe nezvipatara. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko Amai Monica Mutsvangwa kuti tinzwe divi ravo panyaya iyi sezvo nharembozha yavo yange isiri kudairwa.

headline: NPRC Yonzwa Humbowo paNyaya yeGukurahundi Kutanga kweMwedzi Uno
text: Komisheni inoona nezverunyararo nekuregererana, yeNational Peace and Renciliation, nhasi yazivisa kuti ichatanga kunzwa humbowo kubva kune veruzhinji pamusoro peGukurahundi pakati pemwedzi uno kana ichinge yapedza kutsanangurira veruzhinji gwara rairi kutora mukuita basa rayo kana kuti maOuthreach Programs ayo iri kuitwa mumatunhu ese munyika. Vachitaura pamusangano waitwa nekomisheni iyi muHarare, imwe nhengo yekomisheni iyi, Amai Netty Musanhu vati kana chirongwa chavari kuita parizvino munyika yese chapera, vachatanga kunzwa humbowo kubva kune veruzhinji munzvimbo dzakaitika Gukurahundi. Vati komisheni yavo iri kutora danho iri nekuti veruzhinji vakaratidza kuti vachivimba nekutenda basa rekomisheni iyi kana ikange yagadzirisa nyaya yeGukurahundi. Asi mumwe apinda mumusangano uyu asina kuda kudomwa nezita, aratidza kusafara nenyaya yekuti pane vamwe vakaurayiwa paGukurahundi vave kutofukunurwa komisheni isina kuzivisa veruzhinji. Asi makomishina eNPRC ati komisheni yavo haisati yatanga kuita zvekufukunura makuva evakafa. Ati svondo rapfuura komisheni yakakokwa neimwe mhuri kuTsholotsho kuti ipe huchapupu apo imwe mhuri yaichera makuva ehama dzavo dzakapondwa panuva yeGukurahundi. Zvinofungidzirwa kuti pane vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri vakaurawa panguva yegukurahundi kumatunhu eMatabeleland neMidlands. Amai Emerenzia Chitsaka vaudzawo komisheni iyi kuti mabhizimisi avo anoparadzwa panguva yemhirizhonga uye inyaya yavanoda kuti komisheni yavo igadzirise. Komishina Musanhu vati kunyange hazvo komisheni yavo iri kutanga kunzwa humbowo panyaya yeGukurahundi, pane nyaya dzakawanda dzakabuda mumatunhu akasiyana siyana dzichaongororwa nekomisheni yavo. Vati nyaya yeGukurahundi yakabuda zvakanyanya kumatunhu eMidlands, Bulawayo, Matabeleland North neSouth uye kumatunhu eMashonaland East, Central neWest nyaya dziri kunetsa vanhu inyaya dzemhirizhonga panguva yesarudzo kozoti kuManicaland vanhu veko havasi kufara nemafambisirwe akaitwa nyaya dzemangoda ukuwo kuMasvingo vagari vachiti havasi kufara nenyaya yekuti vakabviswa munzvimbo dzavaigara kuti pavakwe madhamu akaita seTokwe Mukosi kana mamwe mabasa ebudiriro asi vasingapihwe muripo sezviri mubumbiro remutemo. Komisheni iyi yati ichaongorora nyaya idzi dzose nekutora matanho ese anodiwa akaita sekuti vakapara mhosva varipe kana kusungwa uye vati vachashanda neveruzhinji oanguva dzose. Komishina Geoffrey Chada vati vanhu vakasununguka kupa humbowo kutokomisheni yavo uye pasi pemutemo imhosva kurambidzidza kana kutyisidzira munhu anenge apa humbowo komisheni yavo. Vati nekuda kwaizvozvo vese vachapa humbowo kukomisheni iyi vachange vakachengetedzwa nemutemo. No media source currently available

headline: Nyanzvi Dzoyambira Kuti muNyika Muchaita Mhirizhonga VaMugabe Vakasavandudza Matongero avo
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano reZimbabwe Democracy Institute Dr Pedzisayi Ruhanya vanoti hurumende ikasagadzirisa matambudziko akatarisana nevanhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi nyika ichaguma yasvika kumazivandadzoka. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe National Liberation War Veterans Association VaDouglas Mahiya vati zvave kuitika munyika hazvisi kuvashamisa nekuti vakagara vataura kare kuti hurumende yemutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe inenge yagumirwa. Asi ko chii chaizvo chiri kukonzera mhirizhonga iri kuitika munyika? Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu vari chipanamazano musangano reHuman rights Watch VaDewa Mavhinga vanoti mapurisa ndiwo ari kukonzera kuti munyika muite mhirizhonga nekusatevedzera bumbiro remutemo. Asi Gurukota rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwemukati menyika Dr Ignatious Chombo vanoti handi chokwadi kuti mapurisa ari kukonzera mhirizhonga. Zimbabwe yakatarisana nesarudzo muna 2018 asi dzime nyanzvi munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kuyambira kuti pakasaita nhaurirano nyika ichaita mhirizhonga inotyisa. Vesangano ravanaSorojena reThe Elders rine nhengo dzakaita sevaimbova munyori mukuru weUnited Nations Vakofi Anna, avaive mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica VaJimmy Carter nevamwe vari kukurudzira kuti SADC Ipindire kugadzirisa nyaya yeZimbabwe. SADC iri kusangana kupera kwemwedzi uno kuSwaziland. Sangano reInternational Crisis Group rinoti kuti nyaya yeZimbabwe igadzirike zvave kuda kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe avo vave nemakore makumi mapfumbamwe nemaviri vasiye chigaro. Asi veZanu-PF vanoti VaMugabe havana kwavari kuenda. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Makumi Mashanu Vomiswa Mumatare Vachipomerwa Kuita Chioko Muhomwe
text: Vachuchisi vemuAmerica vari kupomera vanhu makumi mashanu mhosva yekuita zvehuori kuburikidza nekubhadhara mari dzechioko muhomwe kuitira kuti vadzidzi vane vabereki vakapfuma vawane nzvimbo dzekudzidza muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro zvine mukurumbira. Vachuchisi vanoti izvi zvaiitwa pasi pehurongwa hwaitungamirwa nesangano rakazvimirira reEdge College & Career Network. Vachuchisi vemuBoston mudunhu reMassachusetts vakapomera neChipiri mukuru wesangano iri, VaWillaim “Ricky” Singer, mhosva yekuita huori. Vachuchisi vakapomerawo mhosva dzehuori vamwe vatambi munyaya dzemafirimu vane mukurumbira vanosanganisira Felicity Huffman na Lori Loughlin, pamwe nevadzidzisi vemitambo muzvikoro zvepamusoro soro muAmerica. Zvikoro izvi zvinosanganisira Georgetown muWashington DC, Yale University mudunhu reConnecticut, Stanford neUniversity of Southern California mudunhu reCalifornia nezvimwe. Mari dzaibhadharwa dzsechioko muhomwe dziri pakati pezana rezviuru zvemadhora kusvika kumamiriyoni matanhatu emadhora. Sangano raVaSinger rinonzi rakawana mari inosvika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nemashanu emadhora mukati memakore manomwe kubva muna 2011 kusvika 2018. Muzvinafundo pa Devry University ku Ohio, Va Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvakaitwa izvi hazvina kunaka zvachose sezvo zvichikanganisa vadzidzi vari pazvikoro izvi pamwe chete nekudzikisa huremu hwezvikoro izvi. Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti vadzidzi vese vakapinzwa muzvikoro izvi pachishandiswa chioko muhomwe vanofanirwa kubviswa muzvikoro izvi sezvo kuramba vari muzvikoro izvi kuchizokanganisawo vamwe vadzidzi. No media source currently available

headline: Hama dzaVaMugabe Dzinoti Hadziwirirane naAmai Grace Mugabe
text: Hama dzevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, dzinoti hadziwirirane nemuroora wadzo, Amai Grace Mugabe, nekuda kwekusakudza vakuru mumhuri, uye kutsvinyira kwavanoita vemumhuri, pamwe nekutaura zvisina maturo izvo vanoti zvakakonzeresawo kusawirirana mubato reZanu PF. Hama dzaVaMugabe dzinosanganisira mhuri yekwaMugabe, kwaJenami pamwe neyekwaMatibiri, dzinoti Amai Mugabe munhu asingatsiurike sezvo vaine pamuromo pasingamharwi nenhunzi. Hama idzi dzinoti nekuda kwekusaremekedza vakuru vemumhuri, vainge vasisa fambidzane nemuroora wavo uyo asisaende kumusha kwaZvimba nekuti hapana anomufarira. VaBen Matibiri vanoti Amai Mugabe munhu anotaura zvisina maturo nguva dzakawanda. VaMatibiri vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vainge vakasiyana zvikuru nemudzimai waVaMugabe wekutanga mushakabvu, Amai Sally Mugabe, uyo vanoti Ainge akanyarara uye aine rudo nevanhu vose. Imwe hama yaVaMugabe yechidiki, Va Clemence Matibiri, vanoti Amai Mugabe vane nharo uye vanopikisana nevakuru mumhuri izvo zvakaita kuti vasagamuchirike kumusha kwaZvimba. Mumwe muvakidzani waVaMugabe kumusha kwaZvimba, VaFidelis Chinhyanyi, vanoti vanoziva mudzimai waVaMugabe wekutanga Amai Sally zvakanyanya vachiti hunhu hwaAmai Sally hwaiyemurwa zvakanyanya nevemhuri pamwe nemunyika yose. Asi VaMunyanyi vanoti Amai Grace Mugabe vaizivikanwa nekutuka kunyange zvinonyadzisira pavanhu nekudzikisira vanhu vakuru. VaMunyanyi vanoti Amai Grace munhu aida kutonga tonga pese pavanenge vari izvo zvazokonzera kusawirirana mubato ravo reZanu PF. Mumwe mugari wekwaZvimba asina kuda kudomwa nezita anoti Amai Grace Mugabe vanoita senzena nenyaya yekutukirira vanhu vose vavasingawirirane navo. Vamwe vanoti zvakaita Amai Grace Mugabe zvekudyara mhodzi yekusawirirana mubato reZanu PF zvakazonakirawo nyika nekuti ndizvo zvakazoita kuti paite kudzingana mubato reZanu PF izvo zvakazokonzera kuti mauto atore masimba munyika, chiitiko chakafadza ruzhinji rwevanhu. Wongororo yakaitwa neStudio7 inoratidzawo kuti vanhu vakawanda mubato reZanu pamwe nemunyika vakabatanidzwa nechishuwo chekumisa Amai Grace Mugabe kuti vasatore chigaro chemutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika icho vanga voda kutora pamusangano mukuru webato reZanu PF mwedzi unouya. Amai Grace Mugabe vanga vopihwa mazita emadunhurirwa akawanda anosanganisira mazita akaita saMarujata rinoreva mudzimai anotaurisa uye anokonzeresa kusawirirana kwevanhu mumusha. No media source currently available

headline: Coronavirus Youraya Vanhu Vanodarika Mazana Mana muAfrica
text: Zimbabwe nhasi yapinda muzuva rechipfumbamwe vanhu vachikurudzirwa kugara mudzimba senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus icho chauraya vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nezvitatu pasi rose. MuZimbabwe mune vanhu gumi vakabatwa nechirwere ichi uye mumwe chete akafa.Vachitaura neStudio 7, mukuru anoona nezvehutano mukanzuru yeHarare Dr Prosper Chonzi vati vari kutyira zvikuru kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezvitatu vakabva kuSouth Africa painge ponzi vanhu munyika iyi vagare mudzimba vanogona kuwedzera huwandu hwevanhu vachabatwa nechirwere ichi munyika. Vatiwo huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere hunogona kunge wakaderera nekuti varikuvhenekwa vachiri vashoma. Mashoko atumirwa kuStudio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kusangano rinoongorora nyaya dzezvirwere reAfrica Centres for Disease Control Prevention anoratidza kuti muAfrica mafa vanhu vanodarika mazana mana nemakumi mana nevaviri. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi muAfrica vadarika zviuru zvipfumbamwe nemazana mana uye vakawanda vacho vari muSouth Africa umo mafawo vanhu gumi nemumwe chete kusvika parizvino. Dunhu reSADC rine vanhu vanodarika chiuru chimwe chete nemazana manomwe nemakumi matanhatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Asi kunyika dzekumawirira ndiko kune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwaJohns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iri kuongorora chirwere ichi inoti vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana maviri vabatwa nechirwere ichi. America iyo ine vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi vafa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi kunyangwe vakawanda vafa pasi rose vachiri vekuItaly kwashaya vanhu vanodarika zviuru gumi nezvitanhatu nemazana mashanu. Mutungamiri wehurumende yeBritain VaBoris Johnson avo vakabatwa nechirwere ichi vaendeswa kunorapwa vari kurwarisa kana kuti Intensive Care Unit mushure mekusimbirwa zvakanyanya nechirwere ichi. Kunyangwe zviri pachena kuti kukurudzira vanhu kuti vagare mudzimba kunobatsira kuderedza huwandu hwevanhu vanofa nechirwere ichi, vamwe muZimbabwe vave kugunun’una kuti vave kufa nenzara sezvo vemabhizimisi vakawedzera mitengo yezvekudya zvakanyanya.

headline: Vaigara Mupurazi reManzou Voramba Vachishungurudzwa naAmai Mugabe
text: Vagari vepa purazi reManzou, kuMazowe vanoti kunyange hazvo vakaita musangano nekomisheni yezvesarudzo vachitaura nezvekutyorerwa kodzero dzavo nemapurisa anonzi akatumwa naAmai Grace Mugabe kuti avabvise nechisimba papurazi iri, kushungurudzwa kwavo kuri kuenderera mberi. Sachigaro wekomisheni yeZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, VaElasto Mugwadi, vanoti chikwata chavakatumira kuManzou chiri kuita ongororo yekuona kuti kodzero dzevanhu ava dziri kutyorwa here kana kuti kwete. Rimwe sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights rashorawo zvikuru nyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu nemapurisa papurazi iri. ZimRights inoti Amai Mugabe nemapurisa vanofanira kutevedzera bumbiro remitemo yenyika. Dare repamusoro rakambotongawo kuti vanhu ava vasabviswe asi hapana akazviteerera uye mapurisa ari kupomerwa mhosva yekutowedzera kushungurudza nekurova vanhu ava. Vagari ava vakatanga kugara papurazi iri muna 2000 asi gurukota redunhu reMashonaland Central, VaMartin Dinha, vanoti purazi iri rakazopihwa Amai Mugabe kuti vachengetere mhuka. Asi vamwe vanoti purazi iri rine goridhe rakawanda rinogona kuva riri iro rakapa kuti paite mutauro wakanyanya. Mumwe mugari wepapurazi iri, Amai Susan Kufakunesu, vanoti zvitangwena zvavange vavaka zvakaputswa pamwe nematanga emombe. Vanoti vave kutorara pamhene nguva dzose nevana vavo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende naVanaChiremba Voyambira Vanhu nezveMushonga waVaMagaya weHIV
text: Bazi rezvehutano raburitsa mashoko kuvatori venhau richikurudzira vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheHIV/AIDS kuti varambe vachinwa mishonga yavo vachiongorora mashoko evamwe ekuti vakawana mushonga wekurapa chirwere ichi pamwe nechegomarara. Bazi iri harina haro kudoma nezita Muporofita Walter Magaya vekereke yePHD Ministries avo vakazivisa nezuro kuti vainge vawana mushonga yemiti inowanikwa muMozambique neIndia yekurapa zvirwere izvi. Bazi iri rati iro ndiro rinoongorora kukodzera kwekushandiswa kwemishonga kunyangwe yechivanhu pasi peMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe. Zvichakadaro, sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu, reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights-ZADHR- rinoti rapa VaMagaya mazuva matatu kuti vadzore mashoko avo ekuti vainge vawana mushonga unorapa chirwere chegomarara pamwe neAIDS. Sangano ravana chiremba vanorwira kodzero iri rinoti VaMagaya vakatadza kuita izvi richavasungisa. VaMagaya vakaudza nhengo dzechechi yavo nezuro kuti vakawana mushonga uyu vachishanda nevamwe vavo vanobva kunyika yeIndia.\nVaMagaya vanoti zvakatora makore maviri etsvakiridzo kuti vawane mushonga uyu, uyo unogadzirwa kubva pamiti inowanikwa muno munyika nekunyika yeMozambique. Asi sangano reZADHR rinoti zviri kuita VaMagaya hazvina kunaka sezvo zvichigona kukonzera kuti vateveri vavo nevamwewo vanhu vazorega kunwa mishonga yavakapihwa navanachiremba votevera zviri kutaurwa naVaMagaya izvi. Mashoko aVaMagaya ashoropodzwawo nevanhu vakawanda munyika.\nVaBigboy Manatsa vanoti kuita kwaVaMagaya kuchauraisa vanhu vakawanda vanovatevera. Izvi zvinotsigirwa naVaElvis Karonga avo vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kuzozvirova dundundu kana mushonga wavo wagamuchirwa nebazi rezvehutano munyika. Mumwe mugari wekuKaroi, VaTinashe Mhazi, vanoti VaMagaya varatidza kuti havasi vemweya sezvo vave kushandisa midzi yen’anga nekudaro havafanirwe kuteererwa. VaKaronga vanoti VaMagaya vanofanirwa kushanda nebazi rezvehutano votora vanhu vari kurwara nechirwere cheAIDS vovarapa zvonyatsowonekwa kuti vapora vasati vazvipembedza. Asi mumwe mutendi VaRenius Rambanepasi vanoti vanhu vasakurumidze kusvora VaMagaya sezvo Mwari vachigona kushandisa munhu kuuya nemushonga wezvirwere zvisingarapike. Bazi reNational Aids Council, NAC, rabudisa chiziviso chekuti vose vari pachirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa hutachiwana hweHIV varambe vachinwa mapiritsi avo sezvavakataurirwa kumakiriniki nekuzvipatara. Bazi iri razivisawo kuti hapasati pawanikwa mushonga wechirwere cheAIDS vachiti kana paine munhu anoti ave nemushonga wakadaro unofanirwa kuongororwa nanamazvikokota nekubvumidzwa nebazi rehurumende rezvehutano. Pari zvino vanhu vanosvika miriyoni imwe chete nechidimbu munyika vari pasi pechirongwa chekunwa mapiritsi ekudzikisa utachiwana. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yoshorwa neKuda kuBhadhara IMF Ichitadza kuBhadhara Vashandi
text: Zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika hazvina kumira zvakanaka zvopa vamwe kuti vayambire kuti nyika inogona kuguma yaenda kumazivandadzoka zvakaitika kuZaire pasi pehutongo hwaMobuto Sese Seko zvakapa kuti nyika iite donga Watonga muzinda wenyuchi. Nyaya iri kunetsa ndeyekuti hurumende iyo isina kana kobiri yobhadhara here kana kuti kwete mari yechikwereti kuInternational Monetary Fund nemamwe mabhanga nenyika dzekunze kana kuti kubhadhara vashandi vayo. Gavhuna weRBZ Dr. John Mangudya vanoti vakawana mari kubva kubhanga reAfrican Export Import. Asi hazvina kujeka kuti Zimbabwe ichapihwa here imwe mari kana yakabhadhara mitero pazvikwereti zvayo. Mutauriri weIMF VaGerry Rice vanoti Zimbabwe ikabhadhara chikwereti hapana chivimbiso chekuti ichapihwa imwe mari sezvo pari kudiwa kuti itange yagadzirisa zvimwe zvinhu zvakaita sezvegwara rehupfumi nezvematongerwo enyika. Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa rePeople’s Democratic Party VaTendai Biti, avo vaimbova gurukota rezvehupfumi, vanotenderana nemaonero aya. VaBiti vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanira kubvuma kuti yakundikana yoedza kugadzirisa zviri kunetsa. Asi Zimbabwe yobhadhara chikwereti chekunze ichi here kana kuti yobhadhara vashandi vayo? Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe VaProsper Chitambara vanoti hurumende inofanira kukoshesa vashandi. Kubhadhara vashandi kuchanetsawo sezvo Zimbabwe Revenue Authority kana kuti ZIMRA yave kukundikanawo kuunganidza mari dzemitero dzinoshandiswa kubhadhara vashandi. Mumwedzi mina yapfuura, ZIMRA yakakundikana kusvitsa mari yayainge yakatarisira. Zimbabwe iri kukundikanawo kukwezva vokunze vane mari yekutanga mabhizimisi. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi nenyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika dziri kuyambirawo kuti Zimbabwe yakasagadzirisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu, nyika inogona kuzoguma yaenda kunataisireva sezvakaitika kunyika dzakaita seZaire neAfghanistan uko kwakapedzisira kwoita kurwisana. Kuti izvi zvisaitike, sangano reInternational Crisis Group rinoti Zimbabwe inofanira kugadzirisa zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika. Sangano ravanachipangamazano iri rinoti panofanira kutaurwa pachena kuti VaMugabe vakasiya basa ndiyani achatora masimba uye panofanira kuitwa nhaurirano pakati pebato reZanu-PF nemapato ano pikisa pamwe nemamwe masangano akazvimirira, kuti vanyukure nyika mumoto mayavekudondera. No media source currently available

headline: Zviri kuramba: Dynamos…l Tinoda kuhwinha: Lodza , Zviri kutivhara: Mubaiwa ,Bhadharai vapfanha: Romario
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI weDynamos FC, Kenias “Kenny” Mubaiwa, anoti vari kuzama nepavanogona kuti chikwata chavo chihwinhe mitambo yacho yemuPremier Soccer League asi zviri kukona n’anga murapwa achida.   Kubva mumitambo minomwe yatambwa neDeMbare, haisati yahwina kana mumwe zvawo sezvo yakwanisa kuita mangange mitatu ndokukundwa mina izvo zviri kuona iri imwe yezvikwata zvakasenga zviri pasi pelog. Mubaiwa anoti chikwata chavo chinotambira kuhwina asi zviri kurambawo mwaka uno uye havazive kuti chii chiri kumbonetsa.   “Isu chedu chatinoziva ndechekuti tiri kuedza nepatinogona kuti tirwe, tihwine asi zviri kuramba. Tinogadzirira mitambo yese uye topinda tichida kuhwina asi zviri kuramba, hatipinde mumutambo kuzokundwa, asi kuhwina,” anodaro.

headline: Vanotakura Zvinhu Zvinopfuura nePamuganhu weNyika Voshora Mitemo Mitsva yeZimra
text: Vatyairi vemotokari dzinofamba neveruzhinji vachienda kunze kwenyika vanoti mutemo wakaiswa nebazi reZimbabwe Revenue Authority, Zimra, wekuti vazivise hurumende mazita evanhu nezvinhu zvavanenge vakatakura maawa matatu vasati vasvika pamuganhu wenyika wakaitwa zvechimbichimbi veruzhinji vasina kupihwa mukana wekupa pfungwa dzawo. Izvi zvinotevera chiziviso chakaitwa neZimra ichiti iri kutora danho iri senzira yekugadzirisa dambudziko rekunonoka kubatsira vanhu vanenge vachida kupinda munyika pamwe nekuti nyika ikurumidze kuwana mari yemitero yainenge ichitora kuvanhu nemakambani. Zimra inoti munhu anotadza kutevedza mutemo uyu anosungwa achibhadhariswa faindi. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Union of Drivers and Conductors, VaFradreck Maguramhinga, vanoti pabepa mutemo uyu unoratidza kuve wakanaka asi nguva zhinji mitemo iyi haitevedzerwi nehurumende. VaMaguramhinga vanotiwo zvakakoshawo kuti dai vedzimotokari dzinotakura veruzhinji vachipihwa mukana wekuisawo pfungwa dzavo panenge pachiiswa mitemo mitsva inovabata. VaMaguramhinga vanoti zvinganetsa pamutemo uyu inyaya yekuti vatyairi vanenge voda kuti vashandise michina inoratidza zvinenge zviri mumabhegi evafambi sezvo vachikwanisa kunyeberwa zvinenge zvakatakurwa nemunhu. Imwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi vachishanda nesangano re Labour Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti kuti mutemo uyu ushande zvakanaka, panoda kunyatsotsanangurwa nzira dzekuti mazita evanhu nezvakatakurwa izvi zvinosvitswa sei kuZimra. Asi imwewo nyanzvi inoongorora zveupfumi, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti havaoni mutemo uyu uchibudirira nekuti Zimra haisati yavanemishina yechizvino zvino inoita kuti zvairi kuda zvive nyore. Hurongwa hweZimra huri kuitwa zvichitevera mari yayakapihwa nebhanga reAfrican Development Bank kuitira kuti ivandudze mashandiro ayo kuburikidza nekutenga mishina yechizvino zvino inoita kuti Zimra ikurumidze kuwana mari yemitero inobhadharwa nevanhu nemakambani vanenge vachipinda nezvinhu kubva kune dzimwe nyika. Bhanga reAfrican Development Bank rakapa Zimra mamiriyoni masere emadhora ekuAmerica kuitira kuti bazi iri risimbaradze mashandiro aro pakubhadharwa kwemitero. Gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, vakati mari iyi ichabatsira kusimbaradza ZIMRA panyaya dzekutambira mitero pamwe nekurerutsira veruzhinji nemakambani kubhadhara mitero. Vachitaurawo pakasainiranwa chibvumirano chekubatsira Zimra nemamwe mapazi ehurumende, Commissioner General we Zimra, Amai Faith Mazani, vakati mari yavakawana iyi ichavabatsira zvikuru pakuvandudza michina yavo nemabasa avo pakubhadharisa mitero yakasiyana siyana. No media source currently available

headline: Vanotengesa Mumigwagwa Vochema Zvichitevera Kuputsirwa paVanotengesera
text: Sangano rinomirira vanotengesera mumigwagwa reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, (VISET) rinoti riri kushoropodza zvikuru danho rekanzuru yeguta reHarare rekuparadza kwayakaita misika yevanhu pamwe nekuparadza zvinhu zvavo panzvimbo yemabhizimusi yeBudiriro 5 svondo rino. Mugwaro raraburitsa, sangano iri rinoti rakawana humbowo hwekuti kuparadzwa kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku kwakapiwa mvumo nekanzuru pamwe neboka reEnvironmental Management Agency, EMA, uye VISET inotiwo ine humbowo hwekuti zvakaitwa izvi zviri kunze kwemutemo. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reEMA panyaya iyi. Izvi zvinoitika mushure mekunge kanzuru yatora danho rimwechetero svondo rapera payakaputsa zvivakwa zvevanhu vaitengesera paKamunhu Business Centre kuTafara/Mabvuku, uye kuedzawo kuputsa nzvimbo inoitirwa mitambo yeMoto Republik iri mukati meHarare. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru VaMichael Chideme vanoramba mashoko ekuti kanzuru yavo iri kuputsa zvinhu zvavanhu, vachiti chiri kuitwa nekanzuru yavo kuchenesa guta. VaChideme vanotiwo kanzuru yavo ine hurongwa hwekusangana nevaridzi veMoto Republik kuti vaone kuti vangaenda mberi sei. Izvi zvinotevera kupera kwemazuva manomwe akanga apiwa nekanzuru ekuti varidzi veMoto Republik vaparadze voga zvivakwa zvavo. VaChideme vanoti kambani iyi yakanga yaisa zvivakwa zvayo zvema container izvo zvisingabvumidzwi nemutemo wekanzuru yavo. No media source currently available

headline: ZESN Yokurudzira Kuti Veruzhinji Vawaniswe Dzidziso Yakakwana Pamusoro peSarudzo
text: Sangano rinoongorora sarudzo munyika reZimbabwe Election Support Network, ZESN, rinoti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe Electoral Commission, ZEC, vane chekuita nesarudzo, pamwe nemasangano akazvimirira vape dzidziso yakasimba kuvanhu pamusoro pesarudzo. Sangano iri rinoti ZEC inofanirwawo kubuda nenzira dzekupedza nadzo mhirizhonga yezvematongerwo enyika, pamwe nekutyisidzirwa kwevavhoti kuitira kuti sarudzo dzigoitwa murunyararo. Izvi zvinotevera sarudzo dzekutsvaga mumiriri weChimanimani West dzakaitwa mukupera kwesvondo, idzo dzakakundwa naAmai Nokuthula Matsikenyere veZanu PF, idzo dzinonzi vanhu vakawanda vakaenda munzvimbo dzekuvhotera dzisidzo, pamwe nekudzorwa vasina zvinodiwa zvakakwana. ZESN pamwe nemamwe mapato akapinda musarudzo idzi anoti NCA neRDZ vanoti vanhu vaityisidzirwa nenhengo dzaZanu PF, mauto, vasori pamwe nemadzishe nemasadunhu munguva yekutsvaga rutsigiro. Vanotiwo Zanu PF yakashandisa chikafu senzira yekukwezva nayo vavhoti, danho rinonnzi nemukuru weZESN Amai Rindai Chipfunde-Vava kutenga mavhoti. "Sarudzo iyi yakafamba zvakanaka, zvikuru pane zvema poling materials zvaifanirwa kunge zviripo. Voters' roll takaona aripo nemamwe ma materials, uyezve yakatanga kuvhotwa nguva dzanga dzakatarwa. Asi chatakazoona chaingonetsa ndeche free election, mavhoti asati aitwa kune vanhu vaingopiwawo wana rice, zviya zvatakaona kuNorton yatinoti vote buying," Amai Chpfunde-Vana vanodaro. Vanoti sezvavanoita musarudzo dzose, vakanyorawo zvavakaona zvakaitika musarudzo idzi vakazvisvitsa kuZEC, uye vanotarisira kuti ichagadzirisa zvinetswa izvi sarudzo dzimwe dzisati dzaitwa. Amai Matsikenyere veZanu PF vakawana mavhoti zviuru gumi nechimwe nemazana mana ane makumi mananematanhatu, VaEdmore Mtetwa vakakwikwidza vakazvimirira vakawana mavhoti zviuru zvitatu negumi nezvisere, VaPeter Gudyanga veRDZ vakawana mavhoti zana nemakumi masere nematatu, kuchitiwo VaPesanai Musakanuka veNCA vachiwana mavhoti zana nemakumi manomwe nerimwe. Sarudzo idzi dzaive dzekutsiva vende rakasiiwa naVaMunacho Mutezo, avo vakadzingwa mubato reZanu PF vachipomerwa mhosva yekutsigira Amai Joice Mujuru. No media source currently available

headline: Mumwe Mutori weNhau Opinda muSarudzo dzeMutungamiri weNyika
text: Mutori wenhau anoshanda akazvimirira zvakare vachiitawo zvekutsikisa mimhanzi, VaTonderai Makaniwa, vanoti vari kukwikwidza sarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika vakamirira bato ravo richangobva mukuumbwa reZimbabwe Word of Yaweh Expression, kana kuti Zimbabwe WOYE. VaMakaniwa, avo vakamboshanda kuZimbabwe Broadcasting Corporation, Joy TV, Munhumutapa African Broacasting Corporation vanoti vakagara vachida kuita zvematongerwo enyika asi kuti hutongo hwevaive mutungamiriri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, hwekumbunyikidza vanopikisa ndihwo hwaiita kuti vasiyane nezvematongerwo enyika panguva iyoyo. Vanoti kuenda kwaVaMugabe kwakavapa mukana wekutanga bato ravo reZimbabwe WOYE iro vati rinomirira vechidiki uye vati rinokurudzira mabasa evaimbi, vana nyanduri pamamwe nemabasa emitambo yemafirimu nezvimwe. VaMakaniwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo richakwikwidza sarudzo dzeparamende mumatunhu eBulawayo, Harare neManicaland uko rine nhengo dzakawanda pamwe nemukana wekukunda. Patavabvunza kuti vakagadzirira here kuita izvi, VaMakaniwa vati vakagadzirira uye vatove nenhengo dzichamira Zimbabwe WOYE munzvimbo idzi. Vati basa ravo harinei nekutungamira nyika. VaMakaniwa vaudza Studio 7 kuti vakatozivisa kuti vanoda kupinda musarudzo kuZimbabwe Electoral Commission uye pari zvino vakatounganidza mari nazvose zvinodiwa nedare reZEC rinonyoresa vanoda kukwikwidza reNomination Court. Bato raVaMakaniwa nderimwe remapato anodarika zana nemakumi mana akatarisirwa kukwikwidza musarudzo dzegore rino. Zvichakdai, vechidiki mubato reNational People Party rinotungamiririrwa naAmai Joice Mujuru vanoti namangwana vachapaurura chirongwa che#Joice is My Choice, chinove chirongwa chekutsvagira mutungamiriri webato ravo rutsigiro. Vanoona nezvekurongwa kwemisangano mubazi revechidiki muNPP, VaIan Hamandishe, vaudza Studio7 kuti chirongwa ichi chichaparurwa naAmai Mujuru kuBorrowdale. Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo yemutungamiriri wenyika, dzeparamende nemakanzuru mukati memwedzi mishona inotevera. VeZEC vakatozivisa kuti vakanyoresa kuvhota vanofanira kunongorora kuti mazita avo ari mugwaro revavhoti here kutanga musi wa19 kusvika musi wa 29 mwedzi uno. No media source currently available

headline: Bhanga Guru Rinoparura Hurongwa Hutsva hweMari
text: Bank guru renyika, reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe (RBZ), raparura hurongwa hwemari hutsva kwekuti mabhanga munyika atange kutenga mari yekunze izvo rinoti zvichauraya musika mutema. RBZ inoti hurongwa hutswa uhu huchaita kuti mari yekunze iwande munyika, kudzikisa mutengo wemari yekunze, pamwe nekudzikisa mitengo yezvinhu izvo zvange zvave kuvhiringa raramo yevanhu munyika. Vachiparura hurongwa hwawo hweMonetary Policy, gavhuna weRBZ, VaJohn Mangudya, vati kuti izvi zvitange kuitika, mari yese yeReal Time Gross Settlement (RTGS) nemabhondi iri mumabhanga, yave kutorwa semaRTGS dollars uye mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kuchinjwa nemadhora ekuAmerica kana dzimwe mari dzekunze. Vati mari iyi ndiyo ichange yave kushandiswa kutenga mari yekunze pamusika wemumabhanga kana kuti Inter-Bank Foreign Exchange Market. VaMangudya vati bhanga ravo ratora matanho ekuti mutengo wemari yekunze hausi kuzokwira zvakanyanya uyewo vati vachange vachiongorora kuti mabhanga ari kutenga nekutengesa mari yekunze zviri pamutemo. Vatiwo veruzhinji vachange vave kukwanisa kutengesa mari yavo yekunze mumabhanga. Vatiwo vaya vanotumirwa mari kana kutambira mari kubva kunze kwenyika vacharamba vachipihwa mari dzavo ari madhora ekuAmerica. VaMangudya vati vanoona sekuti matanho avatora achabvisa musika mutema wemari, kudereredza mutengo wemari yekunze, izvo vati zvichaderedza mitengo yezvinhu munyika. Vatiwo izvi ndozvange zviri kudiwa nevemabizimisi. Muzvinabhisimisi, VaOswald Binha, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvaitwa naVaMangudya ndizvo chaizvo zvavange vakatarisirira sezvo zvange zviri pachena kuti huremu hwema bond notes hauenderani nehuremu hwemadhora ekuAmerica. Asi vati pachine mamwe matanho anofanira kutorwa nehurumende kuti zvinhu zvinyatsofamba zvakanaka munyaya dzemabhizisimisi. Vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi, VaPersistence Gwanyanywa, vaudza Studio7 kuti danho ratorwa neRBZ rakanaka chose uye zvinogona kuti nyika iwane mari yekunze yakawanda. Asi vati RBZ inofanira kushanda zvakanyanya kudzivirira zvipingaidzo zvinogona kumuka apo matanho aya anotanga kushanda. VaMangudya vati vemakambani vakawanda vange vave kutenga mari yekunze pamukoto kuitira kuti vatenge zvinhu zvinokosha. Pari zvino dhora rimwe rekuAmerica rinokosha mana mana kana kudarika pamukoto. VaMangudya vati matanho avatora achaderedza mutengo uyu zvakanyanya uye kana izvi zvaitika, mitengo yezvinhu ichadzikirira. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, nyanzvi munyaya dzekufambiswa kwemari, uye vaimbove gurukota rezvemari muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, VaTendai Biti, vanoti zvataurwa nehurumende zvinoratidza kuti dhora remuZimbabwe radzoka pachishandiswa rimwe zita. VaBiti, avo vakayambira nyika kuti hurumende iri kuda kudzosa dhora remunyika nerweseri, vanoti havasi kufara nehurongwa hwagavhuna webhanga guru, sezvo mari dzevanhu dziri mumabhangi dzasiyiwa dzisina kuchengetedzwa nehurongwa hwaturwa nhasi. VaBiti vanotiwo vanhu vanofanirwa kutarisira kukwira kwemitengo yezvinhu uye kushaikwa kwezvinhu zvizhinji munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kushaiswa Bhonasi Kokonzeresa Mutauro
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, neMuvhuro vakazivisa kuti hurumende haisi kuzobhadhara vashandi vayo mari dzebhonasi kwemakore maviri anotevera. VaChinamasa vanoti hurumende yaremerwa nezvinhu uye haichakwanisi kuti irambe ichimanikidza makambani kuti abhadhare mari dzemitero sezvo iwo ari kutatarikawo. VaChinamasa vanoti mugore ra 2014, hurumende yakabhadhara mabhonasi nemari inosvika zana nemakumi manomwe nemaviri emamiriyoni emadhora. Asi mapato anopikisa hurumende akaita seMDC-T, Nationalm Constitutional Assembly, pamwe nemasangano akaita seRural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe ari kushora zvikuru danho rehurumende iri achiti kuita izvi kuomesera mushandi. Hurumende iri kumbotiwo iri kuda kugumura vamwe vashandi kubva pavashandi vayo vanonzi vanosvika mazana mashanu ezviuru. Mutungamiri weProgressive Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, VaTskavafira Zhou, vanoti danho rehurumende iri rinoodza moyo. Asi mutungamiri wesangano reEmployers Confederation of Zimbabwe, VaJohn Mufukari, vanoti zvakaoma kuti hurumende irambwe ichibhadhara vashandi vayo mari nemitero yemakambani ari kunetsekawo. No media source currently available

headline: Amai Nyagomo Voronga Kudzokera kuZimbabwe Kuitira Kuti Vakwikwidze Musarudzo
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reProgressive Democrats of Zimbabwe, Amai Barbra Nyagomo, vanoti vari kumboshandira vari kubBritain pari zvino kuitira kuti vakwanise kutsvagira nhengo dzavo mari yekuti dzikwanise kukwikwidza panoitwa sarudzo munyika. Asi vanoti vane hurongwa hwekuzodzokera kumusha kuti vanyotsopinde mundima yezvematongerwo enyika. Bato rePDZ range richipindawo musarudzo dzema by-elections dzange dzichiitwa munyika. Kunyangwe mamwe mapato makuru anopikisa akaita seMDC ange achiramba kupinda musarudzo idzi, Amai Nyagomo vanoti vange vachipinda kuti vakwanise kuona kuti zvinhu zvinofamba sei uye kugadzirira sarudzo huru dza 2018. No media source currently available Vanoti vakasarudzwa kutungamira vachakurudzira kuti vanhu vazviitire mabasa avo emaoko kuti vawane chouviri. Vanotiwo hurumende haina zvakawanda zvairi kuita mukugadzirisa hupfumi hwenyika.

headline: Dambudziko reMvura Rotyirwa Kuunza Zvirwere zveManyoka muShamva
text: Mukuru wechikoro cheShamva Primary School, VaEdson Chuwe, vanoti vari kukumbira kuboka reZimbabwe National Water Authority, ZINWA, kuti rivhure mvura yarakavhara pachikoro chavo, iyo vanoti yakavharwa nekuda kwechikwereti chemari isina kubhadharwa. Chikoro cheShamva Primary School chinonzi chiri pasi pemugodhi weShamva Gold Mine, uyo uye chikwereti kuZINWA. Chikumbiro chaVaChuwe ichi chinotevera kurwara nemanyoka kwakaita vana vechikoro vatanhatu nemusi weChitatu svondo rino, kunyange hazvo chipatara cheShamva chakati manyoka aya haasi echirwere chekorera kana typhoid. Dambudziko remvura iri rinonzi rakabatawo zvakare musha weveruzhinji weShamva Gold Mine, izvo zvaita kuti vagari vedzimba dzemugodhi uyu vanyore gwaro kudare reparamende vachida kuti ripindire mukuona kuti ZINWA yavhura mvura yakavharwa kubva kutanga kwemwedzi wapera, sezvo iri kodzero yemunhu wese yekuti awane mvura yakachena. Vagari ava vanoti kuvharwa kwemvura kwave kuita kuti vanhu vashandise mvura inobva munzvimbo dzisina hutano, izvo zviri kuwedzera hurwere kwemanyoka. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZINWA kanawo kubva kumugodhi weShamva Gold Mine. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Votarisirwa Kutanga Kubayiwa Nhomba yeSinopharm neMusi weChina
text: Hurumende iri kutarisirwa kuparura chirongwa chekubaya vanhu nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19 nemusi weChina uye inoti vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga chechirongwa ichi vanosanganisira machiremba, vakoti nevamwe vashandi vezvehutano. Izvi zvinotevera kupedza nemusi weChitatu kwekudzidziswa kwemashandisirwo enhomba iyi kwaitwa vashandi vehutano munyika yose. Gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemshoko, Seneta Monica Mutsvangwa, vanoti vashandi vehutano vange vari kudzidziswawo zvinhu zvakaita sekuti mishonga iyi inochengetwa sei. Mutungamiriri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnock Dongo, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nhengo dzesangano ravo dziri kupinda muzvidzidzo izvi munyika yose. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura nevamwe vapinda muzvidzidzo izvi asi VaDongo vati hapana chakanyanyooma pazvidzidzo izvi sezvo vakoti vagara vachibaya nhomba dzezvimwe zvirwere. Vati vange vachitarisira kuti zvidzidzo izvi zvivape vakoti ruzivo pamusoro pemashandiro enhomba yeSinopharm. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota neChipiri manheru, Amai Mutsvangwa vakati nhomba iyi ichaendendeswa kumatunhu pachishandiswa nzira dzinoendeswa mimwe mishonga. Vakatiwo kunze kwevashandi vehutano, vamwe vachabayiwa pachikamu chekutanga mauto, mapurisa nemagadhijere uyewo vashandi veZimbabwe Revenue Authority pamwe neAgritex. Pachikamu chechipiri pachabaiwa varairidzi vezvikoro zvepasi nezvepamusoro uye vamwe vese vachabaiwa pasi pechikamu chekupedzesera. Amai Mutsvangwa vanoti vese vachabaiwa vachanyorwa mazita avo pasi uye vachaudzwa kuti vachazobaiwa riini zvekare sezvo vachifanira kubaiwa kaviri. Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya vanhu mamiriyoni gumi izvo zvichaita mari inodarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru mazana manomwe zvemadhora ekuAmerica. South Africa yakaparura hurongwa hwayo hwekubaya nhomba iyi neChitatu mutungamiriri wenyika iyi, VaCyril Ramaphosa, vachibaiwa veruzhinji vachiona. . No media source currently available

headline: Madhokotera Anodarika Mazana Mana Anodzingwa Basa, Mitumbi Ichiorera Mumamochari
text: Hurumende inonzi yadzinga basa vana chiremba mazana mana nemakumi matatu nevashanu basa vari kuramwa mabasa pakusvika mukuvira kwezuva remusi weChitatu. Madhokotera aya ari kudzingwa basa zvichitevera kuwanikwa vaine mhosva yekutyora mitemo yebasa nekomiti inoranga vanokanganisa pamabasa. Sangano reHealth Service Board rinoti madhokotera aya arikudzingwa basa pachitevedzwa mitemo inobata vashandirwi nevashandi vavo. Sangano reCommunity Working Group on Health rinoti zvitunha zvave kuworera mumamochari emuzvipatara zvehurumende nekushaya vanachiremba vanovhiya kuti pabude chirwere chinenge chapa kuti murwere afe. Sachigharo wesangano reHealth Service Board, Dr. Paulinus Sikosana, vaudza Studio 7 kuti matare ekunzwa mhosva dziri kupomerwa vanachiremba ava kuzvipatara zvavo ari kuenderera mberi uye vakawanda vari kutarisirwa kudzingwa basa pamusoro pevadzingwa basa ava. Panyaya yekuti ndiyani achatora mabasa evari kudzingwa ava, Dr. Sikosana vati vainge vanyora tsamba kumunyori mubazi rezvehutano, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, kuti vaone kuti zvipatara zvingashande sei. Asi Dr. Mahomva vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo,apo taedza kunzwa divi ravo. Vanachiremba vakatanga kuramwa mabasa musi wa 3 Gunyana vachiti mari dzavari kutambiriswa hadzisi kuvakwanira. Mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vamwe vanhu vave kungorwara nekufira kumba vamwe vachienda kuzvipatara zvinenge zvichiri kushanda zvakaita seKaranda Hospital kuMt Darwin. No media source currently available

headline: Sangano reARTUZ Ronyunyuta Kuti Nhengo Dzaro Dziri Kuramwa Mabasa Dzave Kutyisidzirwa
text: Kuramwa mabasa kwenhengo dzesangano revarairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers’ Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, kwapinda muzuva rechina nhasi, sangano iri richiti dzimwe nhengo dzaro dzinosanganisira munyori mukuru, VaRobson Chere, dzave kutyisidzirwa nevanofungidzirwa kuti vasori pamwe nenhengo dzebato reZanu PF. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa divi reZanu PF kanawo divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Asi mutungamiri weARTUZ, VaObert Masaraure vanoti kune vakaita musangano ku Acturus mudunhu reMashonaland East kunove kunodzidzisa VaChere, vachida kuti mudzidzisi uyu abviswe pachikoro ichi. VaMasaraure vanotiwo hakusi kuActurs chete kwavari kusangana nekutyisidzirwa kwenhengo dzavo, sezvo varairidzi vari kusangano nedambudziko iri mune mamwe matunhu. Asi vanoti huwandu hwevarairidzi vari kuramwa mabasa huri kuramba huchiwedzera zuva nezuva vachiti ongororo yavo inoratidza kuti varairidzi vangangoda kusvika pazvikamu makumi mana kubva muzana ndivo chete vaenda kumabasa mune zvimwe zvikoro. Varairidzi vanoti vari kuda kuti mihoro yavo idzoserwe pamari dzavaitambira muna Gumiguru 2018, uye kuti vanyorerane zvibvumirano nehurumende zvekuti vabhadharwe kunyoresa vana bvunzo. Studio 7 yakundikana kubata mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro, kuti tinzwe kuti kuramwa mabasa uku kwakanganisa zvakadii dzidzo muzvikoro? No media source currently available

headline: VaMatemadanda Vopomera VaMugabe Mhosva Yose yeGukurahundi
text: Munyori wesangano revakamborwa hondo yerusununguko, VaVictor Matemadanda, vanoti hapana zvazvinobatsira kuti nyika irambe ichitsvaka munhu wekupomera mhosva yeGukurahundi izvo zviri pachena kuti vaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, ndivo vanofanirwa kubvunzwa uye kutsanangura mhosva yavakapara iyi. VaMatemadanda vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vanofanira kutaurira vanhu kuti zvipangamazano zvavo vaive vanaani panguva yeGukurahundi. Vanoti VaMugabe ndivo vaive mukuru wemauto, kana kuti "Commander-in-Chief", panguva iyi, uye semukuru wemauto, mutungamiri wenyika ndiye anotanga kana kumisa hondo. “Hapana minister kana commander wemauto ane simba rekutanga hondo. Hondo inotangwa napresident, yomiswa napresident,” VaMatemadanda vanodaro. Vanoti hurongwa hwemauto eFifth Brigade hwakatoshevedzerwa varairidzi vakabva kuNorth Korea, nekudaro hazvishandi kuramba vanhu vachinyenyeredza dambudziko rakatarisana nenyika. Asi dzimwe nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika dzinoti mashoko aVaMatemadanda ekuda kuedza kuchenura mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa haana zvaanobatsira, sezvo VaMnangagwa vaive ivo gurukota rezvekugadzikana kwenyika vachiona nezvevasori panguva iyi. Nyanzvi idzi dzinoti maoko aVaMnangagwa akangosvibawo sezvakaita aVaMugabe panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: Kusaenda kuMabasa kwaVanachiremba Kwoomesera Varwere Zvakanyanya
text: Hupenyu hwevarwere hworamba huri munjodzi sezvo vana chiremba vari kuramba vakashinga nerekuti havazi kuzodzokera kumabasa kusvika hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo.\n\nPasvika Studio 7 pachipatara chikuru chemuBulawayo cheMpilo Central nhasi mangwanani vanhu vashoma vange vari kuzvikamu zvinorapwa varwere vanenge vachibva kumba, kwange kuchibatsirwa navana mukoti vachiri kudzidzira basa. Mumawadhi mange muine varwere vashoma vange vachionekwawo navana mukoti. Mumwe murwere anorarama nehurema, VaMalcolm Ndlovu, vati vave nevhiki vachirwara nemudumbu uye vange vauya kuti vazoonekwa navana chiremba asi vanzi vadzokere kumba sezvo vanachiremba vange vasiri pabasa. Studio 7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kubva kumukuru wavana chiremba paMpilo Central, Doctor Solwayo Ngwenya, sezvo vange vachinzi vari mumusangano. Asi Doctor Mthabisi Bhebhe, vanove munyori weMpilo Doctors Association, vati vanachiremba vepachipatara ichi pamwe nevekuUnited Bulawayo Hospitals uye munyika mose, havazi kuzodzokera kubasa kusvikira hurumende yagadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Doctor Bhebhe, avo vakambovewo mutauriri wesangano ravanachiremba vemuzvipatara zvehurumende reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association, vatiwo pari zvino hurumende haisati yaita zvinobatika pakugadzirisa zvichemo zvavo. Pakuti zvinhu zvakamira sei muzvipatara kana kwakatariswa varwere, Doctor Bhebhe vati havakwanise kuziva sezvo vasiri kuenda kubasa, asi vati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti hurumende igadzirise zvichemo zvavo nekukasika kuti vakwanise kudzokera kubasa vabatsire varwere. Hatina kukwanisa kunzwa divi rehurumende panyaya iyi. Kuramwa mabasa kwavana chiremba kwasvika muzuva rechimakumi maviri nemanomwe. Mune imwewo nyaya, kanzuru yeguta reBulawayo inoti iri kushushikana nekuti vagari vari kuramba vachishandisa mvura yakawanda izvo zvinogona kuzosiya madhamu anopa mvura muguta iri asisina mvura. Vachitaura neStudio 7 mushure memusangano nevagari pamusoro pemamiriro akaita zvinhu muguta panyaya dzemvura, munyori wekanzuru, VaChristopher Dube, vakurudzira kuti vagari vashandise mvura zvine mwero. Guta reBulawayo rinowana mvura kubva kumadhamu matanhatu anosanganisira Inyankuni, Lower Ncema, Upper Ncema, pamwe neUmzingwane, uye kwasara zvikamu makumi maviri kubva muzana zvemvura mumadhamu ari kushanda pari zvino. Dhamhu reUpper Ncema rakatomiswa kushandiswa pari zvino nekuda kwekushomeka kwemvura uye kanzuru inoti Umzingwane rinogona kumiswawo munguva pfupi inotevera. Panyaya yekuwedzerwa kwemari inoshandiswa nekanzuru kana kuti supplementary budget yakaparurwa nekanzuru svondo rapera, VaDube vatsanangura kuti bhajeti iyi ichashanda chete kana yapasiswa nehurumende. Pabhajeti iyi kanzuru inoti inoda kukwidza mitero nezvikamu zvinosvika mazana matatu kubva muzana uye vamwe vagari vari kutsutsumwa kuti mari iyi yakawandisa. No media source currently available

headline: VaChamisa Vanoshanyira Zvipatara Vachiona Varwere
text: Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaNelson Chamisa, vari kukurudzira hurumende kuti igadzirise matambudziko ari kusangana nanachiremba nevana mukoti munyika kuitira kuti nyika isarasikirwe nehupenyu hweveruzhinji. Vachitaura nevatori venhau mushure mekushanyira chipatara chehurumende cheHarare Central uko vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa vachigunun’una nemari dzemihoro, VaChamisa varatidza kushushikana zvikuru nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehutano. Mumwe murwere anga ari muchipatara, VaFungai Mahachi, vati havasi kunyatsorapwa zvakakwana sezvo vana chiremba nevana mukoti vari kuramwa mabasa. VaChamisa varumbidza vana chiremba nevakoti vashoma vanga vari pabasa nhasi vachibatsira vanhu vakazvitakura pamwe nevanga vachisununguka vachiti tsiye nyoro dzavari kuita dzekubatsira vanhu ava panguva iyo vari kuramwa mabasa chinhu chinokudzwa zvikuru. VaChamisa vati kana bato ravo richinge rapinda mumasimba vachaedza kugadzirisa matambudziko ose ari kusangana nenyika zvikuru sei munyaya dzehutano. Zvichakadai, sangano rinomirira vanachiremba reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association raburitsa mashoko ekuti nhengo dzaro dzicharamba dzakakanda mapadza pasi kudzamara nhuna dzavo dzanzwikwa nehurumende. Sangano iri rinoti vana chiremba vanodarika chiuru havasi pamabasa sezvo vari kuda kuti zvichemo zvavo zvigadziriswe. Studio7 haina kukwanisa kunzwa kudivi regurukota rezvehutano, Va David Parirentatwa. Vana chiremba vava nemasvondo anodarika maviri vachiramwa basa sezvo vasiri kuwirirana nehurumende panyaya dzemihoro. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Karate handi zvimbokoma’
text: SHASHA yekarate, Sensei Thomas Chiwomba, anoti mutambo uyu hausi wekukurudzira vatambi kuti varwe nevanhu asi kuti unotodzidzisa uye kukurudzira runyararo nekuzvibata.   Anoti vatambi vekarate vane tsika yekurwa nevamwe vakatorasika zvikuru.   “Mutambi wekarate pazvimbokoma haana kumira zvakanaka izvozvo tinozviziva nekuti anogona kukuvadza munhu.   Asi isu hatikurudzire mhirizhonga pakarate yatinofundisa, kwete. Tinoda runyararo uye kuzvibata saka vaye vanoita karate yemhirizhonga vakatorasika zvikuru.   “Saka tinotovakurudzira kuti huyai kuZKU tikudzidzisei karate yemazvo,” anodaro Chiwomba.   Anoti zvirongwa zvegore ra2020 zvose zvakaenda mudondo nekuda kwechirwere cheCovid-19 icho chakakonzeresa kuti mitambo yose imbomiswa senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kwacho.   Chiwomba, uyo anove technical director kuKyokushin Nakamura iri pasi peZimbabwe Karate Union (ZKU), anoti gore ra2020 vatambi vazhinji vekarate vaifanirwa kunokwikwidza kune mitambo yakawanda munyika muno nekunze kwenyika asi zvose hazvina kubudirira nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Gore rino, tarasikirwa nemitambo yakawanda uye mitambo iyi ndiyo mimwe yange ichiraramisa vatambi vakawanda. Asi chatinoziva ndechekuti hupenyu hwevanhu ndihwo hwakakosha uye tinohutungamidza pamberi.   “Vatambi vekarate vanopedza nguva zhinji vachiita gadziriro dzavo saka vanozoda kuenda kunokwikwidza kumitambo yakasiyana kuti vawane zvinovararamisa,” anodaro Chiwomba.   Anoti iye zvino apo nzvimbo dzinoitirwa karate dzakambovharwa vave kutyira kuti vatambi vazhinji vanogona kufuririka vakagara kudzimba dzavo pasina zvavari kuita.   “Chinhu chave kutyisa kuti vatambi vedu vanogona kufuririka vari kumaraini kwavanenge vari ikoko, vakasatariswa vanorasika uye tinovatyira zvikuru.   “Vanoda kugara vachingotariswa uye vachipihwa mabasa ekuita kuti vasarasike muhupenyu hwavo,” anodaro Chiwomba.

headline: Mutambi wenetball oita zve‘fuel’
text: Mutambi wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems — Ursula Ndlovu — anoti mutambo uyu wamuvhurira mikana yakawanda muhupenyu hwake izvo zvakaona achipinzwa basa neimwe kambani inotengesa mafuta ezvifambiso.   Ndlovu, uyo anove mumwe wevatambi vemaGems vakanetsa zvikuru kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup gore radarika kuLiverpool, ave kutambira Glow Petroleum Queens iyo yakabva yamupa basa rekushanda pane imwe service station kuArdbennie muHarare.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Ndlovu anoti hupenyu hwake huri kugara huchishanduka kuburikidza nenetball.   “Zvinhu zvinofadza kuona kuti kune vanokoshesa isu vanhukadzi vari mune zvemitambo. Kusimudza kwatakaita mureza wenyika ini kwandibatsira zvikuru nekuti zvandivhurira mikana yakasiyana.   “Ndave kuenda kubasa uye hupenyu hwangu hwave kushanduka. Hazvirevi kuti handichatamba netball kwete nekuti ndiri kuita zvese sezvo netball ndiyo yakandiwanisa basa iri,” anodaro.   Ndlovu anoenderera mberi achiti, “Ini ndakakura ndiri munhu akashinga, ndinofarira kuita mabasa akawanda saka kwandiri zviri nyore kuita zvose kuenda kubasa uye nekutamba netball. Kubva Muvhuro ndinenge ndiri kubasa kusvika musi weChitatu ndozoti Chitatu ndapedza basa ndotopinda munzira kuenda kuKwekwe kunopinda mukembi nevamwe ndipo patinoita gadziriro dzedu dzemutambo wesvondo iroro.   “Ndiri kufara hangu chaizvo nekuti zvinofadza kuti madzimai kunyaya vari mune zvemitambo tiri kuwaniswa mikana yakasiyana uye tiri kuremekedzwa mabasa edu atinenge takaita,” anodaro Ndlovu.

headline: Vanozvibatira Mabasa eMaoko Votambira neMufaro Kuvhurwa kweNzvimbo dzeKutengesera muHarare
text: Kanzuru yeguta reHarare inoti boka revanorarama nekuzviitira mabasa emaoko ravhurwa zvakare muguta iri asi pachiteverwa zvakasimba mitemo yezvehutano yekudzivirira kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19. Kanzuru yazivisa nezvekuvhurwa kwemusika weCopacabana Traders Mall, uko vachange vachitengesera mumusika uyu vachange vachibhadhara madhora mashanu emari yekuAmerica pazuva. Kanzuru yazivisawo kuti musika mukuru weMbare wave pedyo nekuvhurwa zvichitevera kuvandudzwa kwawanga uchiitwa kuti ufambirane nenyaya dzekuchengetedzwa kwehutsanana. Vanorarama nekutengesa vanoti vanotambira nemufaro kuvhurwa zvakare kwenzvimbo dzekutengesera uku vachiti vazhinji vavo vanga vave kunonga svosve nemuromo kubva pakadzikwa mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu senzira yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Mukuru wesangano reVendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, VaSamuel Wadzayi, vanoti vanotambira danho iri nemufaro asi vanofunga kuti madhora mashanu ari kunzi vanhu vabhadhare pazuva imari yakawandisa. Asi mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vaudza Studio 7 kuti musika weCopacabana Traders’ mall hausi pasi pekanzuru yeHarare izvo zvinoita kuti vasave nechekuita nekutarwa kwemari dzinobhadharwa nevanhu pazuva. Vakafanobata chigaro chemukuru weSurvival Vendors Union of Zimbabwe, VaObey Mwariwangu, vatiwo sesangano vanotambira danho rekuvhurwa zvakare kwemisika iri, asi vanoona sekunge mitemo yekudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19 yakanyanya kuomera vanhu. VaMwariwanguu vanoti vanotengesa ava ndivo vachange vachitarisirwa kutenga voga mishonga inouraya hutachiwana pamwe nema face mask, izvo vanoti zvinogna kudhurira vakawanda. Hatina kukwanisa kubata varidzi veCopacabana Mall kuti tinzwewo divi ravo panyaya iyi. No media source currently available

headline: VaBiti, Vakuru veZCTU Vomiswa Pamberi peMatare
text: Vaimbova gurukota rezvemari VaTendai Biti vanova mutevedzeri wasachigaro mubato reMDC vari kutarisirwa mudare repamusoro nhasi vachikumbira kuti dare iri rimbovapa gwaro ravo rekufambisa kuti vaende kunorapwa kuSouth Africa. Izvi zvinotevera mutongo wamejastiriti VaFrancis Mapfumo wekuramba kuvapa gwaro iri mukupera kwemwedzi wapera vachityira kuti vanogona kuzotadza kudzoka. VaBiti vari kupomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wesarudzo vachinzi vakaburitsa zvakabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa.Asi vari kuramba mhosva iyi. Zvichakadaro, vamwe vatungamiri vevashandi uye nhengo dzesangano reZimbabwe Congress of Trade Unions vakasungwa nezuro vari kutarisirwa kumiswa pamberi pedare redzimhosva nhasi zvekare vachipomerwa mhosva yekuda kukonzera kusagadzikana kana kuti “disorderly conduct.” Vakasungwa vanosanganisa mutungamiri weZCTU VaPeter Mutasa, munyori mukuru wesangano iri VaJaphet Moyo nedzimwe nhengo dzavo. VaBiti neveZCTU ava vari kumiririrwa nemagweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights kana kuti ZLHR. Mutauriri weZLHR VaKumbirai Mafunda vati vane chivimbo chekuti vachawana mitongo inogutsa panyaya mbiri idzi. No media source currently available

headline: Sarudzo Dzinotarisirwa Kuitwa Muna Chikumi Kana Chikunguru
text: Sachigaro weZimbabwe Electoral Commission, Amai Priscilla Chigumba, vanoti sarudzo dzichaitwa pakati pa31 Chikumi na 31 Chikunguru. Asi vanoti zuva chairo pamutemo richaziviswa nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. ZEC inoti vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni mashanu nezviuru mazana matatu ndivo vakanyoresa kuvhota musarudzo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Electoral Commission Amai Rindai Chipfunde Vava vanoti zviri kutaurwa naAmai Chigumba ndizvo zviri mumbiro remutemo wenyika. No media source currently available Zvichakadaro, sangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, iro rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu nekusimudzira runyararo, rinoti pamazuva ari pakati pa10 Gumiguri 2017 na8 Kukadzi 2018, sangano ravo rakawana kutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu kunoita zviuru zvishanu nemazana manomwe nemanomwe munguva yekunyoresa kwevanhu kuti vagovhota musarudzo dzegore rino. Vanoona nezvemabasa musangano reHeal Zimbabwe Trust, Muzvare Sithabile Dewa, vanoti zvinhu zvakawanda zvine chekuita nesarudzo hazvina kunyatsomira zvakanaka uye Zimbabwe Electoral Commission inofanira kuzvigadzirisa sarudzo dzisati dzaitwa. No media source currently available

headline: Mutambo wakandikoshera, anodaro Sikandar Raza
text: CHIKWATA checricket chemaChevrons chiri kupinda mu”hondo” svondo rino apo chichatatsurana nePakistan mumitambo mitanhatu inoti mitatu yeOne Day International series (ODI) nemimwe mitatu zvakare yeT20 International.   Mitambo iyi ndeyekutanga yeSuper League iro richangoparurwa uye yekurwira kuenda kumakwikwi e2023 International Cricket Council (ICC) World Cup achaitirwa kuIndia.   Mutambi wemaChevrons, Sikandar Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kunyika yePakistan anoti ari kutarisira zvikuru mutambo uyu uye sechikwata vanoda kukunda sezvo shuviro yavo iri yekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Mumakwikwi ekupedzisira eWorld Cup ayo akaitwa mugore ra2019, maChevrons akakundikana kuenda kunokwikwidza kuEngland neWales mushure mekunge akundwa mumitambo yekurwira tikiti rekuenda kumutambo uyu.   “Toda kushanda nesimba kuti tiende kuWorld Cup.   Chishuvo chedu kuti tihwine mitambo yeSuper League tibve taenda kuWorld Cup. Hatisi kuda zvekuzotamba mimwe mitambo nekuti paWorld Cup yekupedzisira takatadziswa kuenda nemaruns maviri chaiwo. Saka zvinhu zvakatirwadza kutadza kuenda kumitambo iyi apa isu taitamba cricket yepamusoro-soro,” anodaro Raza   Raza, uyo akazvarirwa kuPakistan asi akazokurira muZimbabwe, anoti mutambo wezvikwata zviviri izvi unoreva zvakawanda kwaari sezvo uchange uri wenyika mbiri dziri pamwoyo wake.   “Ndinoyemura zvikuru nzvimbo ino. Ndiri chizvarwa chekuPakistan asi ndichitambira Zimbabwe saka zvinhu zvinondifadza kudzoka kumusha kuzotamba mutambo uyu.   “Chinhu chakanyanyonakisa ndechekuti nyika mbiri idzi, Pakistan neZimbabwe, dzose dzakanditambira zvandiri,” anodaro Raza.   Mutambo wekutanga wePakistan nemaChevrons uriko nemusi weChishanu chino uye wechipiri uchizotambwa musi wa1 Mbudzi kozoti wechitatu musi wa3 Mbudzi.   Mitambo iyi ichange iri yeODI uye ichingopera chete mitambo yeT20 yobva yatanga musi wa7, 8 na10 Mbudzi.   Mitambo yeSuper League ichange iine nyika 13 dzichibandana kurwira kuenda ku2023 India World Cup. Zvikwata zvinomwe zvichapedza zviri pamusoro pamwe chete neIndia zvinobva zvatowaniswa tikiti rekuenda kuWorld Cup.   Zvimwe zvishanu zvacho zvinenge zvasara zvichazotatsurana mumutambo uchazorongwa pachitsvagwa zvikwata zviviri izvo zvinozotevera zvimwe zvisere zvagara zvinenge zvatobudirira kuenda kuWorld Cup.

headline: Bazi reMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe Rinopa Mvumo Yekuti Vana Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Vanoona nezvekushandiswa kwemishonga munyika, veMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe (MCAZ), vanonzi vakapa bazi rezvehutano mvumo yekuti vana vane makore ari pakati pegumi nemana negumi nemanomwe vange vachibaiwa nhomba yekudzivirira Covid-19. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano nekurerwa kwevana, VaDonald Mujiri, vanoti bazi ravo rakatarirwa zviga neMCAZ zvarinofanirwa kutanga razadzisa risati raparura chirongwa chekubaya vana nhomba yeCovid-19 iyi. Vanoti MCAZ yakakomekedza kuti bazi rehutano ritange raita ongororo inganzi paChirungu Phase 3 clinical trial, yekuona kuti mushonga uyu unoshanda sei muvana vezera iri risati raparura chirongwa ichi. VaMujiri vanoti pari zvino bazi ravo riri mushishi kuzadzisa zvakatarwa neMCAZ izvi kuitira kuzoparura chirongwa ichi. Hurumende yakazivisa masvondo maviri adarika kuti vana vemazera aya vave kuzobaiwa nhomba yakakosha iyi, yekudzivirira Covid-19. Pari zvino vanhu vari kubaiwa nhomba dzeavo vane makore anotangira pagumi nemasere zvichikwira. Mukuru werimwe sangano rinoshanda nenharaunda munyaya dzezvehutano, reCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti vanogamuchira zvikuru danho ratorwa neMedicines Control Authority of Zimbabwe iri, vachiti rinobatsira kuchengetedza vana vadiki ava. VaRusike vanoti vana vane makore ari pasi pegumi nemasere vave kubatwawo zvakare nehutachiwana hunokonzera Covid-19, zvikuru hweseDelta Variant, izvo zvavanoti zvinoisa vana ava munjodzi huru. asi VaRusike vanoti vana ava vasati vabaiwa kana kupinda muchirongwa chekuongorora kana nhomba iyi ichishanda zvakanaka kumazera avo, vana ava vanofanirwa kutanga vapiwa mvumo nevabereki vavo kana vanovachengeta vasati vabaiwa., sezvo vari pasi pemakore ekuzvimirira. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Vana Chiremba Vanoti Zimbabwe Inokwanisa Kubatsira Vana Vane Otizimu
text: Sedzimwe nyika zhinji, Zimbabwe iri kutarisana nechirwere cheotizimu icho chinonyanya kubata vana, zvikuru vanakomana. Bazi rinoona nezvekudzivirirwa kwezvirwere, reCenters For Disease Control, rinoti munhu mumwe chete pavanhu makumi masere nevasere munyika dzese ane otizimu. Vabereki vazhinji vanotadza kuwana zvikwanisiro kuvana vavo vane chirwere ichi izvo zvinozoita kuti vana ava vasainda kuchikoro. Mutauriri wesangano reZimbabwe Association of Doctors For Human Rights, Dr Fortune Nyamande, vanoti Zimbabwe ine vana chiremba vazhinji uye vanhu vakadzidziswa kubatsira vana vane otizimu kunyange hazvo paine zvimwe zvapingaidzo zvavanosangana nazvo munyika. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vopokana neRBZ paHuwandu hweMari Ichatumirwa Gore Rino Kumusha
text: Bhanga guru renyika reReserve Bank of Zimbabwe rakazivisa svondo rapera kuti gore rino nyika iri kutarisira kuwana mari inogona kudarika bhiriyoni rimwe chete remadhora kubva kuzvizvarwa zvayo zviri kunze kwenyika. Mari iyi yakwira kubva pa $837m yakawanikwa gore rapera. Mari yakawanda inonzi inobva kuzvizvarwa zvenyika zviri kuSouth Africa, ichiteverwa neUnited Kingdom, United States nedzimwe nyika dzakawanda dzakapararira vana veZimbabwe. Bhanga iri rakazivisawo kuti ravhura nzira dzakawanda dzekuti vanhu vari kunze kwenyika vakwanise kutumira mari kumusha, kuburikidza nekuwanisa mikana yakawanda vamwe vanoda kupindawo mubhizimusi rekupinzwa nekubuda kwemari munyika. Asi zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvizhinji zviri kunze kwenyika zvinosanganisira vanoongorora zvamatongerwo enyika uye vachidzidzisa paTswane University of Technology, kuSouth Africa, VaRicky Mukonza, zvinoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yagadzirisa hukama hwayo nevana vayo vari kunze kuitira kuti pave nechivimbo pakati pavo. VaMukonza vanotiwo hurumende inofanirwa kujekesa nyaya ye Dual Citizenship, iyo iri kuramba yakahwandiswa, kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo rakaitambira. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi uye vari mukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, VaGofrey Kanyenze, vanoti havaoni mari iri kutarisirwa neRBZ iyi ichipinda munyika yose nenzira dzakatsarukana, sezvo vazhinji vevana vari kunze kwenyika vachishandisa nzira dzepasi kutumura mari dzavo. VaKanyenze vanoti vanotsinhira nyaya yekuti hurumend iwumbe hukama hwakanaka nevana vayo sezvinoitwa nedzimwe nyika dziri kusimukira nekuda kwemari dzinotumirwa nezvizvarwa zvadzo. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotanga Zvakare Kugadzira Mabhazi
text: Sangano rinomirira vemabhazi, reAmalgamated Bus Operators nemakambani eAVM Africa neQuest Motors nhasi vasainirirana chibvumirano chekuti makambani aya agadzire mabhazi muZimbabwe izvo zvinotarisirwa kupedza dambudziko rezvekufambisa rakatarisana neveruzhinji munyika. Vachitaura mushure mekusaina chibvumirano ichi, sachigaro weAmalgamated Bus Operators, VaSamson Nanhanga, vati kugadzira mabhazi muno kuchaita kuti nyika ichengetedze mari yekunze pamwe nekuwanisa zviuru zvevanhu mabasa. VaNanhanga vati mari yavange vachishandisa kutenga mabhazi kunze kwenyika ndiyo yavave kushandisa kugadzira mabhazi muno. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Passenger Transport Orgnaisation, VaFungai Makoni vaudza Studio 7 kuti vari kushandisa mari yekunze yakawanda kutenga mabhazi kunze kwenyika asi munyika muine hunyanzvi kwekugadzira mabhazi. VaMakoni vati chirongwa ichi icho chichatanga mwedzi unouuya chinotarisirwa kupinza mabasa vanhu vanodarika zviuru makumi maviri nechimwe kana kudarika. Vatiwo vanotarisira kunge vachigadzira mabhazi mazana mashanu pagore vachishandisa mamiriyoni manomwe kusvika kumamiriyoni gumi emadhora eku America pagore. Vatiwo kugadzirwa kwemabhazi muno kuchaita kuti vakwanise kushanda nekambani yehurumende yeZUPCO iyo iri kukoka makambani akazvimirira kushanda nayo pakutakura vanhu mumaguta nekumaruwa. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu, VaMike Madiro, vati hurumende iri kugadzirisa migwagwa yese munyika, vakakurudzira makambani aya kuti agadzirewo mabhazi akasimba zvekufamba kumaruwa. Vanoona nekufambiswa kwemabasa musangano rePassenger Association of Zimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Goliati, vatambira zvaitwa nhasi nemufaro vachiti zvichabatsira veruzhinji zvakanyanya. Munyori anoona nezvekutakurwa kwezvinhu muMDC Alliance, VaSettlement Chikwinya, vati sebato vanokurudzira zvikuru kuti makambani akazvimirira atanga mabasa anoita kuti munyika muve nemabasa. Vanhu vakawanda munyika vakatarisana nedambudziko rekushaya zvekufambisa sezvo ZUPCO isina mabhazi akakwana. ZUPCO inoti inoda mabhazi zviuru zviviri kuti ikwanise kuita basa rayo nemazvo asi pari zvino ine mabhazi mazana maviri nemakumi matanhatu nemaviri chete. Makambani munyika akamira kugadzira mabhazi muna 1993 mushure mekunge hurumende yabvumira veruzhinji kupinza makombi matsaru munyika izvo zvakawisirawo ZUPCO pasi. Pari zvino hurumende yakarambidza makombi nemamwe mabhazi kutakura vanhu kunze kwekunge achiita izvi ari pasi peZUPCO. No media source currently available

headline: Munyika Moita Kusagadzikana neNyaya yeRufu rwaVaShiri Uye Kuratidzira
text: Munyika hamuna kugadzikana zvichitevera hurongwa hwekuratidzira kuri kuda kuita nevanopikisa nemusi weChishanu uye kushaya kwegurukota rezvekurima, VaPerence Shiri. Nemusi weChitatu, Politburo yeZanu-PF yakapomera dzimwe nhengo dzebato iri mhosva yekushanda nevanopikisa kuratidzira kuti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vabviswe pachigaro. Vakafanobata chigaro chemutauriri webato reZanu-PF, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakaudza vatori venhau neChitatu kuti nhengo yePolitburo, Amai Cleveria Chizema, vainge vamiswa kuva nhengo yebato nekuda kwekuti vainge vachishande nevamwe vavengi vebato kuda kupidigura hurumende. Vane ruzivo nezviri kuitika vanoti mubato mune mapisha pisha uye kupumhana huori. Gweta rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu uye vari mukuru weHuman Rights Watch kuchamhembe kweAfrica, VaDewa Mavhinga, vanoti munyika hamuchina kugadzikana nenyaya yekunetsana mubato reZanu-PF kwopa kuti hurumende ingogara ichiti mauto agare akadzipakatira. Asi nhengo yeZanu-PF inomirira Makonde, VaKindness Paradza, vanoti vekunze ndivo vari kuita kuti munyika musaite kugadzikana. No media source currently available

headline: Tsiva yakandidzidzisa kuzvibata: Makumbe
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mutsiva yechidzimai, Diana Makumbe, anoti mutambo uyu wakamubatsira chaizvo kuti akwanise kuchengeta amai vake nevekumhuri yavo mushure mekunge akundikana kuchikoro.   Makumbe, uyo parizvino ave muridzi wepembe najudge wetsiva, mumwe weshasha dzechidzimai dzakaita mukurumbira munyika muno izvo zvakamuona achihwina mitambo 23 achikundwa mumwechete muboka reAmateur.   Asi, paakazoenda padanho repamusoro reProfessional akakwanisa kuhwina mitambo mitatu chete pa15 yaakatamba ndokukundwa mipfumbamwe, achiita mangange katatu.   Pakukura kwake, Makumbe aive nembiri yekumhanya mumakwikwi emujaho zvekuti anoti vamwe vanhu vaimukurudzira kuti aende kuchiuto.   Anoti paakakundikana bvunzo dzake dzeO-Level, ndipo paakatanga kutamba tsiva ndokuzoenda kuArmy School Sports uko akanotamba tsiva zvakare achiedza kuti zvimwe angagone kupinda basa rehusoja.   “Ndichikura, ndaida chaizvo kuita musoja nekuti ndakakura ndiri shasha pamujaho wekumhanya uye vanhu vaindiona vaitoti kwandiri kana wakura enda kuchisoja unogona kupinda basa saka ndaida chaizvo kuita musoja.   “Zvose zvakazoshanduka pandisina kubuda zvakanaka pabvunzo dzangu izvo zvakazondituma kuti nditange kukwikwidza mutsiva.   “Mutambo uyu wakandibatsira chaizvo nekuti ndakange ndave kukwanisa kuchengeta amai vangu uye nevekumhuri kwavanobva,” anodaro.   Makumbe anoti paakange ave kukwikwidza pachidanho cheProfessional, akasangana nezvakawanda zvinosanganisira kubirirwa achinzi akundwa mumutambo asi iye ahwinha izvo zvakaita kuti asvike pakuramwa kutamba tsiva.   Mutambo wake wekupedzisira waive mugore ra2016 paakasangana naEllen Simwaka wekuMalawi apo akakundwa.   Anoti tsiva yakamudzidzisa kuzvibata muhupenyu hwake izvo nanhasi zvinomubatsira pane zvose zvaanoita.   “Tsiva izere nekubirira uye unobirirwa kuti ukundwe zvigobatsira kugadzira zita remumwe mutambi uyo mapuromota vanenge vachida kuti asimukire.   “Saka ini ndizvo zvimwe zvakandituma kuti ndichisiya tsiva nekuti ndakange ndaneta kubirirwa apa unenge uchipihwa mari isingatenge futi,” anodaro Makumbe.   Anoti basa rake semuridzi wepembe najudge wetsiva riri kumuona achienda kune dzimwe nyika dzakaita seZambia achinoridza kumitambo yeko.   MuZimbabwe, Makumbe aridza pembe pamwe nekuve judge pamitambo yevatambi vetsiva vakasiyana vanosanganisira Charles Manyuchi.   Anoti anoda kushandura tsiva pamwe nekusimudzira vatambi vanenge vachibirirwa kuti vasabirirwe.   “Ndave muridzi wepembe uye judge wetsiva saka ndinoda chaizvo kuti ndiridze mutambo uyu zvisina kubirira mukati. Vamwe varidzi vepembe vanobirira vachida kufadza puromota, manje ini handiite izvozvo.   “Saka ndinoona kunge ndizvo zvakatuma vekuZambia kuti vandishevedze kuzoridza pamutambo waEmily Kubwalo wemuno uyo akarwa naCatherine Mulyata wekuZambia munaZvita,” anodaro.   Kubva achisendeka zvekurwa tsiva, Makumbe anoti akapinda zvekare mune zvemhanzi uye ari kuridza musambo wembira nechikwata cheBlack Survivors.   Anoti vanotarisira kuparura dambarefu ravo rekutanga nguva pfupi inotevera.   Makumbe akakomborerwa nemwanasikana ane makore 14 okuberwekwa uyo waanoti ane zvipo zvemitambo yakasiyana uye parizvino anokwikwidza mumujaho nekutamba nhabvu yevasikana.   “Vana havadi kuudzirwa zvekuita. Isu tinofanirwa kuvarakidza gwara chete tichivakurudzira kuita zvese mitambo nekudzidza. Dzidzo ndiyo inofanirwa kuenda pekutanga zvimwe zvese zvozotevera,” anodaro Makumbe.

headline: Mitumbi yeVakafa muTsaona yeCyclone Idai Yofukurwa Kubva muMadhaka
text: Mumiriri weManicaland muparamende pasi pehurongwa hwe Proportional Represenation, Amai Lynette Karenyi, veMDC, vanoti basa rekutsvaga mitumbi yevanhu vangadai vakafuchirwa nemadhaka mutsaona yeCyclone Idai pamwe nevamwe vangadai vachiri vapenyu riri kuenderera mberi muChimanimani neChipinge. Amai Karenyi vanoti dzimwe mhuri dziri kuita zvekufukura mitumbi yehama dzadzo dzakafushirwa mumadhaka nematombo pakawondomoka gomo, pamwe nepasi pedzimba dzakaparadzwa vanhu vareremo, mimwe mitumbi ichiwanikwa munzizi. Asi vanoti dambudziko guru richiripo nderekuti vanhu vawane rubatsiro, zvikuru rwechikafu, sezvo vanhu vakawanda vari kunzvimbo dziri kure dzakaita sekwaMutsvangwa, vachinzi havasati vakwanisa kuwana rubatsiro rwezvekudya. Vanotiwo mishonga, zvikuru yemaARV, yakwanisa kusvitswa pakirinika yeMutsvangwa, uyewo madzimai matatu pamadzimai gumi nevatatu vakazvitakura vari pakirinika iyi vanonzi vakwanisa kusunuguka zvisina dambudziko. No media source currently available

headline: Shaya ari muchipatara
text: naMilcah Nhakura SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu, George ‘Mastermind’ Shaya, anoti anogamuchira zvakaitika kwaari zvekudamburwa gumbo rake rekurudyi zvichitevera kunetseka kwaakange aita nechirwere chepasi petsoka chinozivikanwa nekuti ganrene.   Achitaura neKwayedza svondo rino ari muchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals, muHarare, Shaya anoti anoisa zvose mumawoko aMwari.   “Muhupenyu hwedu chinenge chaitika tinofanirwa kuzvitambira. Mwari variko uye hatizvirambe.   “Munhu unofanirwa kugara wakagadzirira zvese zvese muhupenyu zvinogona kuitika,” anodaro.   Paakashanyirwa neKwayedza, Shaya aive ane mudzimai wake – Agnes Shaya – uyo anoti murume wake akange atambudzwa zvikuru nechirwere chaive pagumbo rake apo raingopera nekudyika kubva nekutsoka.   “Baba vange varwadziwa hama, gumbo rakavashungurudza iri saka tiri kutozviona kuti zvakange zviri nani kuti vari bviswe pane kurwadziwa kwavakange vachiita vainaro gumbo racho.   “Iye zvino tinoona kuti vasununguka manje, havacharwadziwe vave kunzwa zvakanaka pane zvavakange vari kunzwa. Isu semhuri tave kungotambira zvakaitika.   “Asi hatidi kunyepa zvakatirwadza nekuti gumbo racho ndiro ravaitamba naro nhabvu, vachiita zvidavado zvavo,” anodaro Agnes.   Anoti murume wake haasi kuzomusiya ari ega uye achamira naye achimubatsira pane zvese zvaanenge achida.   “Mumwe wangu uyu ini ndini ndinomubikira uye kumuwachira, ndicharamba ndakamira naye ndichiona kuti akagara zvakanaka here nekuti panguva ino tinofanirwa kuramba takamira tese.   “Zvakaitika izvi tinongozviisa mumawoko aMwari. Asi vachibuda muno vanofanirwa kuenda kuRehab centre kuti vambonogara vachitariswa nekuti vakangonanga kumba vanogona kunozvikuvadza rimwe gumbo racho,” anodaro Agnes.   Shaya mumwe wevatambi venhabvu vakaita mukurumbira uye munhorondo yemutambo uyu ndiye ega akakwanisa kuhwina mubairo weSoccer Star of the Year kashanu.   Zvakadai, imwe shasha yakambonetsa ichitamba nhabvu kuzvikwata zvinoti Dynamos FC nemaWarriors, David ‘Yogi’ Mandigora – uyo akadamburwawo gumbo rake muna 2017 nekuda kwedenda regomarara – anoti munhu anofanirwa kugamuchira zvose zvinoitika muhupenyu hwake.   “Muhupenyu munhu anofanirwa kugara akagadzirira zvese nekuti hatizive kuti mangwana unomuka uripi. Zvese zvese zvinogona kuitika uye usingafungire.   “Kana zvaitika sezvandakasangana nazvo zvekugurwa gumbo izvi wotongozvitambira nekuti ndizvo zvinenge zvavepo panguva yacho,” anodaro Yogi.   Anoti achazoshanyira Shaya kumba kwake kana achinge abuda muchipatara.   PIX: George Shaya   Caption: George Shaya aine mudzimai wake Agnes Shaya kuchipatara cheParirenyatwa Group of Hospitals nemusi weChipiri svondo rino.

headline: Zanu PF Inoudzwa neMatare Kuti Isashandise Vana veChikoro Mumisangano Yayo
text: Zanu PF yaudzwa nedare repamusoro kuti haifanirwe kumanikidza vana vechikoro kuenda kumisangano yayo, uye kuti isashandise midziyo yezvikoro. Vachipa mutongo wavo panyaya yakakwidzwa kudare nesangano rinomirira varairidzi vekumaruwa, reAmalgamated Rural Teachers Union of Zimbabwe, ARTUZ, VaJoseph Mafusire varambidza Zanu PF kuitira misangano yayo yekukwezva rutsigiro pazvikoro uye kushandisa midziyo yezvikoro yakaita semabhazi. Mushure mekunzwa mativi ose kubva kugweta ranga richimirira Zanu PF, VaMichael Mushangwe, negweta re ARTUZ, VaDoug Coltart, VaMafusire vati dare raona paine humbowo hwakadzama hwunoratidza kuti kodzero dzevana vechikoro nevadzidzisi dzainge dzichimbunyikidwa neZanu PF uye kutyorwa kwemubumbiro remitemo yenyika. VaMafusire vati kumanikidza vana kuenda kumisangno iyi kunogona kukuvadza pfungwa dzavo zvisingazogadzirisiki nekudaro hapana anofanira kuramba achivamanikidza. VaColtart vati vagamuchira mutongo wedare nemufaro vachiti mutongi aremekedza kodzero dzevana vechikoro uye vadzidzisi. Asi VaMushangwe vati havana kufara nemutongo uyu vachiti hauna kuitwa zvakanaka. Vanoona nezvekufambiswa kwemabasa muARTUZ muMasvingo, Muzvare Precious Manyoka, vanoti vatambira mutongo uyu nemufaro. Vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu vanoti Zanu PF inofanirwa kuremekedza mutongo wapihwa nedare redzimohosva. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Voshandisa Social Media Vachikurudzirana Kunyoresa Kuvhota
text: Mamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika ari kushandisa ‘social media’ kukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Asi izvi zviri kusiya vamwe vaine mubvunzo wekuti kuita izvi kunobatsira here kuti vanhu vanyorese vagovhota nehuwandu hwavo. Mapato ezvamatongerwo enyika pamwe nemamwe masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega uye vanhuwo zvavo vari kushandisa ‘social media’ kunyanya paWhatsApp senzira yekukuridzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Izvi zvave kuita kuti vamwe vabvunze kuti kuita izvi kungabatsira here panguva iyo pane maonero ekuti vamwe veruzhinji vari kushaya hany’a nekunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Nyanzvi muhumhizha hwekufambiswa kwemashoko, VaNigel Gambanga, vanoti vanoona ‘social media’ ichibatsira zvikuru mukukurudzira vanhu kuti vanyorese kuti vagovhota sezvo humboo hunobva kuboka rePost and Telecommunications Regulatory Authority huchiratidza kuti vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kushandisa social media kunyanya WhatsApp. VaGambanga vanotiwo nekuda kwekuti dzimwe nhepfenyuro nemamwe mapepanhau zviri pasi pehurumende, kushandisa ‘social media’ kunopa masangano anoshanda akazvimirira ega, pamwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika, mukana wekuti vaitewo kurudziro yavowo pasina kumbunyikidzwa. VaVictor Chimhutu ndivo sachigaro wesangano reZimbabwe Yadzoka iro rine chirongwa chinonzi Zvimakire zama vhota/ Decide Your Destiny Vote Campaign. Pasi pechirongwa ichi veZimbabwe Yadzoka vari kushanda nevamwe vaimbi vakasiyana siyana munyika vachikurudzira vanhu, kunyanya vechidiki, kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota. Mudzidzisi wezvekutapanhau paFalmouth University kuUnited Kingdom, VaHayes Mabweazara, vanoti kushandisa social media kunogona chose kubatsira kukurudzira vanhu kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota, asi vanotiwo vakawanda vanowana mashoko ekurudziro yakadaro, vanhu vari kunze kwenyika vasingakwanise kunyoresa kuti vagokwanisa kuzovhota musarudzo dzegore rinouya. Dzimwewo nyanzvi mune zvekufambiswa kwemashoko dzinoti kunyange hazvo vanhu munyika vave kushandisa social media zvakanyanya, kushandisa nzira iyi kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vanyorese kuti vagokwanisa kuvhota kunogona kushaya basa sezvo vanhu vane tsika yekusatevedzera zvavanenge vawona kana kunzwa pa’social media’ apa. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vokurudzira Kuti VaMnangagwa Vabvume Kuti Hurumende Yavo Yakundikana
text: Mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika nezveupfumi haachina kugadzikana izvo zvave kupa kuti vamwe vakurudzire kuti hurumende yaVaEmmerson Mnangagwa nebato ravo reZanu PF vabvume kuti vakundikana kufambisa nyika. Mitengo yezvinhu inonzi iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru zuva nezuva, mari hadzisi kuwanikwa nyore, zvitoro nemakambani zviri kuvhara zuva nezuva, nyika haina mafuta ekufambisa nezvimwe zvinodiwa pazuva nevanhu. Ukuwo, hurumende inonzi iri kuramba ichikwereta mari kunze senzira yekuedza kugadzirisa dambudziko iri. VeZanu PF vari kuramba kutambira kuti ndivo vari kukonzera matambudziko ari munyika aya, vachinongedza minwe kune vanopikisa, avo vavari kuti ndivo vari kuomesa zvinhu vachida kuti vanhu vapandukire hurumende. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika vari nhengo yeZanu PF, VaGadzira Chirumhanzu, vanoti chiri kuita kuti zvinhu zviome munyika kushaikwa kwehunyanzvi kune vanotungamira makambani ari munyika, izvo zviri kuzokonzera kuti zvinhu zviparare munyaya dzezveupfumi. Asi nyanzvi mune zvematongerwo enyika vachitungamira sangano revarairidzi rePTUZ uye vari nhengo yeMDC, Doctor Takavafira Zhou vanoti vanhu havafanirwe kurova imbwa vakaviga mupinyi vachiti VaMnangagwa nehurumende yavo ndivo vakundikana kufambisa basa. Doctor Zhou vanotiwo chikuru chinofanirwa kuitwa ndechekuti muhurumende muve nekudhonza pamwechete, kwete zvakaratidzwa neveZanu PF avo vakabuda vachiti vakanga vasina kunzwikwa pfungwa dzavo negurukota rezveupfumi, VaMthuli Ncube pavakaburitsa hurongwa hwavo hwemari. No media source currently available

headline: Zimbabwe Yotambira Dzimwe Nhomba dzeCovid-19 Kubva KuChina
text: Zimbabwe nemusi weMuvhuro yakatambira dzimwe nhomba dzedenda reCovid-19 kubva kuChina panguva iyo paine kurudziro yekuti hurumende ishande zvakasimba kuti nhomba idzi dzitengwe dzakawanda kuitira kuti dzikwanire veruzhinji. Zimbabwe yawana dzimwe nhomba zviuru mazana manomwe (700 000) dzeSinopharm dzabva kuChina. Nhomba idzi dzasvika munyika manheru ano mushure mekusvika kwenhomba zviuru mazana masere (800 000) dzakabva kuChina zvakare. Mukuru anoona nezvechirwere cheCovid 19 muhofisi yemutungamiri wenyika, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaudza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kushanda zvakasimba kuti nhomba dzeCovid 19 dziwande munyika kuitira kuti dzishandiswe mukurwisa denda iri. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vanofanira kuramba vachienda munzvimbo dzose dziri kubayiwa nhomba idzi kuitira kuti vakwanise kubayiwa vozvidzivirirawo kudenda reCovid 19. Asi vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori anoona nezvehutano muMDC Alliance, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vatiwo hurumende inofanira kutenga nhomba dzakawanda nguva imwechete kuitira kuti veruzhinji vasanetseke kuwana nhomba idzi. Hurumende inoti vanhu vakabayiwa nhomba yekutamba kusvika mukupera kwezuva reChitatu vave miriyoni imwe nezviuru mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nezviviri nemazana maviri nemakumi masere nevashanu (1 562 285) uye vakabayiwa nhomba yepiri vave zviuru mazana manomwe zvine gumi nezvitatu nezana rimwe chete nemakumi matatu nemumwe chete (713 131). Vanhu vakabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva pachakatanga kupinda munyika ichi vave zviuru zana nezvitatu zvine mazana mashanu nemakumi matanhatu nevanomwe (103 567) uye vapora vave zviuru makumi manomwe nechimwe nemazana matatu ane makumi masere nevatatu (71 383). Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu makumi matanhatu (60) vakafa nezuro zvabva zvasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nechirwere ichi muZimbabwe pazviuru zvitatu nemazana matatu nemakumi mana (3 340). Hurumende inoti ine hurongwa hwekubaya nhomba kuvanhu mamiriyoni gumi kana kuti zvikamu makumi matanhatu kubva muzana kuitira kuti chirwere ichi chisarambe chichipararira munyika. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMASCO Yodzinga Mhuri Mudzimba Pamusaka Perendi
