text: Mhuri mazana maviri nemakumi mashanu dziri kudzingwa mudzimba dzekambani yezvicherwa yeZIMASCO dzadziri kugara nekuda kwetadza kubhadhara mari dzerendi. Kambani yeZIMASCO yakapa vagari ava magwaro ekuvazivisa kuti vabude mudzimba idzi musi wa31 Zvita gore rapera usati wasvika kana kuti vabhadhare mari dzezvikwereti zverendi dzose. Asi vagari ava vanoti vakakundikana kubhadhara mari dziri kudiwa nekambani iyi nekuti vazhinji vavo havasevenzi, sezvo vakagumurwa pamabasa nekambani iyi kare. Vakawanda vevanhu ava vane zvikwereti zverendi zviri pakati pemadhora mazana matanhatu kusvika pachiuru chemadhora. Vagari ava vanobhadhara madhora makumi matatu nemanomwe pamwedzi. Chiri kushamisa nekurwadza vagari ava ndechekuti mapurisa ekambani yeZIMASCO haasi kuburitsa midziyo yavo panze asi kuti vari kuvharira midziyo iyi mudzimba vachiisa svumbunuro dzavo. Mumwe wevavharirwa imba ndiAmai Stella Ngandu avo vanoti vakagara paimba yavharwa iyi kwemakore makumi maviri apfuura sezvo murume wavo asina kupihwa mari dzake dzose nekambani yeZIMASCO. Amai Ngandu vanoti havarambi kuti vane chikwereti cherendi chinosvika mazana masere emadhora asi vanoti havana kwekuenda. Sachigaro wemadzimai mubato reZanu PF munzvimbo iyi, Amai Edna Chimwanza, vanoti vanzi vabudewo mumba kana vakasabhadhara mari inoita madhora mazana mana sezvo chikwereti chavo chiri chiuru chemadhora. Asi Amai Chimwanza vanoona ruoko rwezvematongerwa enyika mukudzingwa mudzimba idzi. Izvi zvinotsigirwa nasachigaro wedunhu reMutorashanga muZanu PF, VaMaricosi Mapuraganda, avo vanoti vanhu vanodzingwa gore rese rinenge riine sarudzo munyika. VaMuparaganda vanotyira kuti nhengo dzavo dzichatadza kuvhota dzadzingwa. Asi patabvunza VaMuparaganda kuti sei vachifunga izvozvo sezvo kanzura wenzvimbo iyi iri nhengo yeZanu PF, vati kanzura Amai Ellen Mwachirimba vari kushanda nekambani yeZIMASCO. Vatiwo Amai Mwachirimba vaitsigira chikwata cheLacoste icho chairwisana neG40 kuti vatore masimba apo vaimbove mukuru wenyika VaRobert Mugabe vakanga vasati vabviswa pachigaro gore rapera muna Mbudzi. Asi Kanzura Amai Mwachirimba vanoti vanhu vanga vajaira kugara mahara mudzimba dzeZIMASCO vachishandisa zita reZanu PF vachiramba kubhadhara. Amai Mwachimbira vanoti munhu anofanirwa kubhadhara mari yerendi kana kunotaurirana nevaridzi vedzimba kuti anobhadhara sei. Mukuru wekambani yeZIMASCO kuMutorashanga, Amai Fadzai Gono, varamba kutaura nevatori venhau vachiti havabvumirwe nemutemo webasa. Havasi vashandi veZIMASCO chete vari kutarisana nedambudziko iri, sezvo vashandi vemumigodhi vakawanda vari kudzingwa mudzimba dzavaigara vasati varasikirwa nemabasa avo. No media source currently available

headline: Vanopikisa Hurumende Voronga Kuratidzira muKupera kweMwedzi Uno.
text: Mapato anopikisa, masangano anorwira kodzero dzevanhu, masangano evashandi pamwe nevamwe vemakereke vanonzi vari kuronga kuratidzira kwevana veZimbabwe nyika yose musi wa 31 Chikunguru, unove mwedzi uno, vachinyunyutya nekwavanoti kutadza kutonga kwehurumende yeZanu PF. Mumwe wevari kutungamira hurongwa uhwu, uye vari mutungamiri webato rinopikisa reTransform Zimbabwe, VaJacob Ngarivhume, vanoti hurumende yeZanu PF yakundikana kumisa huwori pamwe nekumutsiridza hupfumi hwenyika, izvo zvaisa vana veZimbabwe mukutambura kukuru. VaNgarivhume vanoti vari kushanda nemapato ose anopikisa nemamwe masangano anomirira vana veZimbabwe mumapoka akasiyanasiyana mukuronga kuratidzira uku, vachiti kunyange nhengo dzeZanu PF dziri kukokwawo kuti dzibatane nevamwe vanoda hutongo hwakanaka munyika. Asi mutauriri webato reMDC Alliance, Advocate Fadzai Mahere vaudza Studio 7 kuti bato ravo harina kunge rakokwa zviri pamutemo, kunyange hazvo, sezvakataurwa nemutungamiri wavo VaNelson Chamisa neSvondo, vachabatana nevose vanoda kuti munyika muve neshanduko. Mutauriri weMDC-T, VaKhalipani Phugeni vatiwo bato ravo harisi muhurongwa hwekuratidzira uhwu. VaNgarivhume vanoti vane hurongwa hwekuzivisa mapurisa nezvekuratidzira kwavo neChipiri, uye vanotarisira kuti vacharatidzira murunyararo. No media source currently available Mukuru anoona nezvekufambiswa kwemashoko mubato riri kutonga reZanu PF, VaTafadzwa Mugwadi, vanoti kunyange hazvo bumbiro remitemo richibvumidza vanhu kuratidzira, zviri kurongwa nevanopikisa izvi kutungana kwembudzi. VaMugwadi vanoti vari kurongwa kuratidzira vari kuziva kuti kune mutemo unorambidza kufambafamba kwevanhu nekuda kwechirwere che Covid-19 ndipo powoona vamwe vachida kupinda mumigwagwa kuti zvinhu zviparadzwe nekubiwa. Vanoti vanochengetedza mutemo havasi kuzorega zvakadaro zvichiitika. VaMugwadi vanoti kunyange hazvo nyika iine matambudziko ekushaikwa kwezvakawanda, hapana asingazive kuti izvi zviri kukonzerwa nezvirango zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nenyika dzekumawirira. No media source currently available

headline: Hatikwate: Chegutu Pirates
text: CHIKWATA chenhabvu cheChegutu Pirates chinoti hachina chimwe chachinovhunduka apo chatarisana nekusangana neSimba Bhora FC mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament svondo rino.   Mitambo iyi ichaona zvikwata zvange zviri muTop 8 zvichibandana apo ligi reNorthen Region Soccer League (NRSL) rakamboenda pazororo. Mumitambo iyi, kunze kweChegutu Pirates ichisangana neSimba Bhora FC, Herentals U20 FC ichatamba neBlack Mambas FC, Golden Eagles ichitatsurana neNgezi U19 FC uye Commando Bullets ichibandana neTrojan Stars FC.   Munyori mukuru weChegutu Pirates, Jeffrey Wachiseka, anoti vagadzirira mutambo uyu uye hapana chikwata chavanotya.   “Zvikwata zvose zvikuru, kusanganisira iyo Simba Bhora, tiri kusangana nayo svondo rino mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament, takatombosangana nayo tikasvitsana kumiganhu.   “Haina kutikunda uye hatisati tambokundwa nezvikwata zvikuru, taitozvikunda. Saka tiri kuzvitemba kuti tine mukana mukuru wekufambira mberi mumutambo uyu,” anodaro Wachiseka.   Murairidzi weNgezi Under-19 FC, Klifton Kadurira, anoti chikwata chavo chiri kutamba nhabvu inonwisa mvura uye vanoda kubika vatambi vechidiki avo vanozotumira kuchikwata chevakuru.    Klifton Kadurira   “Isu tinofara kuve pakati pezvikwata zvisere zvakabudirira kuti zvigokwikwidza mumutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Tournament. Zvinorakidza kuti basa ratiri kuita rekubika vechidiki riri kufamba negwara chairo.   “Kutaura kuno, tine vatambi vatatu avo vave kutotambira muchikwata chevakuru. Saka ticharamba tichisevenza nevechidiki tichivabika.   “Mutambo weAxis Solutions Super 8 Cup tiri kuona kuti uri kusimudzira vatambi vedu vazhinji,” anodaro Kadurira.   Zvakadaro, neMugovera svondo rino apo Simba Bhora FC iri kutamba neChegutu Pirates, nemusi weSvondo kuchasangana Herantals U20 neBlack Mambas.

headline: Hurumende Yoomerwa Sezvo Hupfumi Huri Kuparara
text: Apo vanhu vakawanda munyika vari kuyaura nhenhamo, zvinhu zviri kuramba zvichioma uye hurumende iri kuramba ichiomerwa zvekuti yave kutadza kuita basa rayo pamwe nekutadza kubhadhara shandi vayo. Hurumende iyo inowana mari yekushandisa kubva kumitero yakasiyana siyana yakaita semutero unowanikwa pakutengeswa kwezvinhu, Value Added Tax, mitero yemakambani, Corporate Tax, pamwe neyavashandi kana kuti Paye As You Earn, inoti mari iri kuwanikwa nehurumende iri kuramba ichidzikira. No media source currently available Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi dzinoti hapana tariro yekuti zvinhu zvichanaka munguva pfuti inotevera. Mumashoko avo emashandisirwo akaitwa mari nehurumende kusvika pakati pegore rino, gurukota rezvemari, VaPatrick Chinamasa, vakati mari inowanikwa pamitero iyi yakadzikira zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, VaNyasha Muchichwa, vanoti mari iyi kusanganisira PAYE icharamba ichidzikira sezvo makambani ari kuramba achivhara vashandi vachidzingwa mabasa. Nemamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, hurumende inotarisirwa kunge yave kutadza kubhadhara vashandi vayo pakupera kwegore rino. VaMasimba Manyanya, avo vakamboshanda mubazi rezvemari mumakore ekuma 1990s, vanoti izvi ndizvo zvinoitika kana hurumende ikatadza kuvandudza hupfumi munyika. VaManyanya vanoti zvinhu zvinogona kusamira zvakanaka mukati menguva pfupi inotevera. Vamwewo vanoongorora nyaya dzehupfumi vachishanda vakazvimirira, VaJames Johwa, vanoti matanho mazhinji ari kutorwa nehurumende mukuedza kugadzirisa hupfumi haasi kushanda uye chave kudiwa kuti vari kutonga vabude pachena kuti vatadza kuitira kuti vanhu vemunyika nemapato nemasangano akasiyana siyana ashandire pamwe mukusimudzira hupfumi. Pari zvino hurumende yakaremerwa zvekuti pane mashoko asina kutsinhirwa ekuti iri kutopona nekutora mari kubva kune mamwe makambani ayo kuti ikwanise kuita basa rayo. Sachigaro wekambani ye Mbada Diamonds inove mubatanidzwa wehurumende neimwe kambani yekuSouth Africa, VaRobert Mhlanga, vakaudza paramende gore rapfuura kuti kambani yavo yakambosvika pane imwe nguva yekuti yaipa hurumende mamiriyoni makumi matatu emdhora pasvondo kuti ibhadhare vashandi vayo. Asi VaManyanya vanoti kunyange hazvo hurumende yange ichitora mari kumakambani emangoda nemamwe, zvinhu zvave kuoma kwese uye ichasara isisina kwekuenda. Pari zvino, hurumende iri kushandisa zvikamu makumi masere nezvitatu zvemari yese yebhajeti mukubhadhara vashandi izvi zvinoita kuti isare isina mari yekushandisa muzvipatara, zvikoro pamwe nemamwe mabasa. Semuenzaniso gore rapfuura, bazi rezvemari rakapa zvipatara zvese munyika mamiriyoni makumi maviri nematatu emadhora yekushandisa gore rese asi zvipatara izvi zvaive nechikwereti chemamiriyoni makumi matatu nematanhatu emdhora zvinoreva kuti mari yese yakaenda kunobhadhara zvikwereti. Makambani akawanda munyika kusanganisira ehurumende haasi kubhadhara mitero iyo inove nzira inowana hurumende nayo mari. Nyanzvi munyaya dzehufpumi dzinoti hurumende inofanira kusimbisa kubhadharwa kwemitero kuti iwane mari yekushandisa. Semuenzaniso gwaro raAuditor- General rinoti makambani ehurumende ange aine zvikwereti zvemutero zvemazana mashanu emamiriyoni emadhora gore rapfuura. VaChinamasa vanoti vakapa simba rekutevera mari dzese dzemutero dzisina kubhadharwa uyevo vanoti hurumende ichabata mitero pane mari dzimwe dzinowanikwa nevashandi vemakambani neakazvimirira kuti mari dzekubatsirikana dzibatirwe mitero. Asi VaMuchichwa vanoti hapana chinobuda nekuti vanhu havana chivimbo nemashandisirwo ari kuitwa mari nehurumende ndosaka kana makambani anokwanisa asiri kubhadhara mitero. Kunze kwemitero, nyika inokwanisa kukwereta kana kuwana rubatsiro kubva kunyika kana masangano ekunze. Asi VaManyanya vanoti izvi hazvikwanisike pari zvino nekuti hurumende iri kutadza kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo uye hukama hwayo nenyika zhinji dzinopa rubatsiro dzakaita seAmerica neBritain hauna kumira zvakanaka. Zimbabwe haisiwo kuwana rubatsiro kubva ku World Bank ne International Monetary Fund sezvo iri kukundikana kubhadhara zvikwereti zvayo zvinodarika mabhiriyoni gumi emadhora Nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nezvematongerwo enyika dzinoti kana hupfumi hwenyika hukadonha, zvinhu zvinogona kushata munyika zvinogona kukonzera kuti sarudzo dziitwe nguva yadzo isati yasvika muna 2018. Zimbabwe National Statistics Agency inoti vanhu vanodarika makumi matanhatu munyika varombo uye zvikamu makumi manomwe kubva muzana zveavo vachiri pamabasa vanotambira mari iri pasi pemadhora mazana matatu nemakumi mashanu emadhora pamwedzi. Kumatunhu akaita seMatabeleland North, kune hurombo hunotyisa zvekuti vanhu vanodarika makumi masere kubva muzana kunzvimbo iyi vari kuyaura nenhamo.

headline: Voronga kusimudzira netball
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa mumutambo wenetball, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti iye nevamwe vakambotamba mumutambo uyu vane hurongwa hwekuusimudzira nechinangwa chekubika vatambi vechikwata chenyika chemaGems chemangwana.   Siyachitema vazhinji vanomuziva nechiremerera chaakapihwa icho chichagara munhoroondo yemutambo wenetball munyika muno izvo zvakamuona achitungamira vatambi vemaGems kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup akaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland, munaChikunguru gore rapera.   Achibva kumakwikwi aya, Siyachitema akasvika ndokusendeka kutamba netball ndokutanga kurairidza mutambo uyu.   Parizvino ari kurairidza chikwata cheGlow Queens icho chinokwikwidza muNetball Super League.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Siyachitema anoti ari kumhanya-mhanya zvikuru kuronga nevamwe vakambotamba mutambo uyu vekumapurovhinzi akasiyana kuti vasimudzire netball.   “Masvondo adarika, takasangana sevatambi vakambotamba netball kare tikambobandana mumutambo uyu. Tapedza, takagara pasi ndokukurukura kuti todii kuti tibatsirane pakusimudzira mutambo uyu. Ini ndave kurairidza mutambo uyu saka ndinoda chaizvo kuti vandakatamba navo kare vandibatsire muhurongwa hwangu uhu kuti ndifambe naho,” anodaro.   Siyachitema anoti shuviro yake kuti vese vakambotamba mutambo uyu vawanikwe vachiita mabasa akasiyana anosanganisira kurairidza kana kupinda muzvigaro zvekutungamira netball.   “Sevatambi vakambotamba mutambo uyu, zvakakosha chaizvo kuti tiwanikwe tichitora mabasa akasiyana uye tichironga kuti mutambo uyu wofamba sei. Isu takambotamba uye tinoziva zvinenge zvichiitika saka tinofanirwa kupinda mumutambo uyu toitawo mabasa ekuusimudzira.   “Saka tiri kutenderera mapurovhinzi akasiyana tichitamba nekukurukura neshasha dzakambotamba netball tichironga kuti toita sei kuti netball iende kumberi,” anodaro Siyachitema.

headline: National Economic Consultative Forum Yokurudzira Kurwiswa kweHuwori muNyika
text: Sangano rinotarisa nyaya dzehupfumi munyika reNational Economic Consultative Forum nhasi raparura gwaro idzva rinotarisa mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyika munyaya dzezvehupfumi richi kuridzira kuti huwori hupere kuitira kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire. Gwaro raparurwa iri rinoti hupfumi hwenyika huri kutadza kukura pamusana pehuori hwatekeshera munyika. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachishanda nesangano reNECF, VaGodwin Murehwa, vanoti huwori hukaramba hwakapfunya chisero munyika zvinhu zvinoramba zvakamira nemusoro munyika. VaMrehwa vati imwe nyaya inofanira kusimbaradzwa kuti hupfumi hwenyika husimukire inyaya yekurima. Vanga vari muenzi ano remekedzwa pakuparurwa kwegwaro reNECF iri uye vari mutevedzeri wemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mngangagwa vati huwori hukapera munyika zvinoitawo kuti hurumende ikwanise kudyidzana nedzimwe nyika pamwe nemasangano anobatsira nemari. “Tinofanira kushanda zvakasimba kuti huwori hupere munyika. Kupera kwehuwori munyika kunoitawo zvakare kuti vanoda kuzosima mari dzavo munyika vauye vakasununguka,” VaMnangagwa vanodaro. Mashoko aVaMnangagwa aya anouyawo apo mumwe wevatedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika VaPhelekezela Mphoko vari kutsoropodzwa nevamapato anopikisa pamwe nevemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira. VaMphoko vanonzi vari kuvhiringidza kurwisana nenyaya dzehuwori nenyaya yekuvhariridza kwavanonzi vakaita kuferefetwa kwenyaya yegurukota rezvedidzo yepamusoro, Muzvinafundo Jonathan Moyo. VaMphoko vanonzi vakapindira kuti VaMoyo vasasungwe nevekomisheni inorwisana nehuori yeZimbabwe Anti-Corruption Commission. VaMoyo, avo vanove zvakare nhengo yeparamende inomirira Tsholotsho, vanonzi vakatora mari inoda kusvika kuzviuru mazana mashanu zvemadhora kubva kuhomwe yeZimbabwe Manpower Development Fund, iyo vakashandisa mukutenga mabhasikoro akapiwa madzishe nevamwe kuTsholotsho. Asi vari kuzvidzivirira vachiti vakatora mari iyi kuti vabatsire vanhu vanotambura vachizvifananidza naRobin Hood, mbavha yekuEngland yaibira vapfumi ichipa varombo kunyika iyi. VaMphoko vakati kusunga VaMoyo kwaizokonzera kusagadzikana muhurumende. Zvichakadai, munyori mukuru musangano revashandi reZimbabwe Industrial Revolution Workers Federation, VaPascoe Chakanetsa, vaudza Studio 7 kuti nyaya yehuwori inonetsa kupedza munyika kana pane makororo anobatwa sezai. Zvichakadai, VaMnangangwa vakurudzira kuti pave nekutaurirana pakati pehurumende, vemabhizimusi, vashandi nevashandirwi nechinangwa chekutsvaga nzira dzekupedza huwori munyika. NECF inotiwo chimwe chiri kuita kuti zvinhu zvisafambe zvakanaka mukuitwa kwemabhizimusi munyika inyaya dzekuti vemabhizimusi havasi kukwanisa kuwana mari kumabhanga pamwe nekunonoka kunoita mapazi ehurumende mazhinji kufambisa mapepa anenge asvitswa kwaari nevemabhizimusi. Zvichakadai, VaMnangagwa vati hurumende ichaedza pose painogona kugadzirisa matambudziko ese ataurwa aya kuitira kuti zvemabhizimusi munyika zviite mutserendende. No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rinoti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19 nezuro kuHarare, Bulawayo neMasvingo. Vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi kusvika parizvino vave mazana maviri nemakumi mapfumbamwe kana kuti 294. Vanhu zana nemakumi maviri nemumwe kana kuti 121 vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro. Vanhu vose vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro ava Havana nhoroondo yekubuda munyika. Matababeland North ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vakabatwa nechirwere ichi nezuro vanove makumi manomwe nemana, Bulawayo ine makumi matatu nevaviri, Midlands gumi uye mumwe chete kuMasvingo. Vanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga vave zvuru gumi nemazana masere nemakumi matatu nevapfumbamwe kana kuti 10, 839. Vanhu vapora kusvika parizvino zvuru zvisere nemazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevaviri kana kuti 8, 972 mushure mekunge vanhu makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri vapora nezuro. Vanhu vachiri kurwara churu chimwe chete nemazana mashanu nemakumi manomwe nevatatu kana kuti 1, 573. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa studio 7 neafrican union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni maviri nezvuru mazana maviri kana kuti 2, 2 million vabatwa nechirwere checovid-19 muAfrica. Vanhu vafa vasvika zvuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana masere nemakumi mashanu nevatatu kana kuti 53, 853. Vapora vadarika miriyoni imwe chete nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 1,9 million. South Africa ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi muAfrica. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni makumi matanhatu nemanomwe ane zviuru mazana manomwe kana kuti 67, 7 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muamerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nekufa nechirwere ichi. Vafa muAmerica vadarika zvuru mazana maviri nemakumi masere nematatu kana kuti kuti 283, 000, vabatwa nechirwere ichi vachidarika mamiriyoni gumi nemana nezvuru mazana mapfumbamwe kana kuti 14, 9 million. Pasi rose, vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu kana kuti 1, 5 million. Asi vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni makumi mana nematatu kana kuti 43 million.

headline: Chikwata cheIMF Chinopeta Rwendo kuZimbabwe Chichirumbidza Mabatirwo eHupfumi, Asi Chichiti Haisati Yave Kukodzera Kupiwa Rubatsiro Rwemari
text: Chikwata che International Monetary Fund (IMF) chichitungamirirwa naVaDhaneshwar Ghura, neMuvhuro chakapeta rwendo rwacho rwemazuva masere muZimbabwe, umo chaiita hurukuro nevakuru vehurumende, vakuru vebhanga guru renyika pamwe nevemabhizimusi pamusoro peshanduko dziri kuitika mune zvehupfumi pamwe nemamiriro ahwo. Mugwaro ravakaburitsa mushure mekupeta rwendo urwu, VaGhura vakati hupfumi hweZimbabwe hwaratidza kusimba kukuru nekumuka kwahwo munguva yakaoma. Vakati hondo iri pakati peRussia neUkraine, kusanaya zvakanaka kwemvura pamwe nemitengo yezvinhu iri pamusoro zviri kukanganisa hupfumi nemagariro evanhu muZimbabwe, izvo zvakasakadzwa kare nedenda reCovid-19. IMF yakapembedzawo matanho ari kuitwa nehurumende ekudzikamisa mutengo wemari yekunze, asi ichitiwo panodiwa mamwe matanho ekunyatsodzikamisa hupfumi ane hupenyu hunoenda mberi. Kunyange hazvo Zimbabwe yakapembedzwa neIMF nekukwanisa kubhadhara chikwereti chayo kuIMF muna 2016, sangano rinokweretsa mari iri rakati haisati yasvika pakuti ikwanise kupiwa rubatsiro rwemari nekuda kwekukundikana kubhadra kwayo zvikwereti zvayo zvekunze. Nyanzvi mune zvehupfumi pamwe nekudyidzana kwenyika dzepasi rose, Muzvinafundo Elliot Masocha, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti IMF yakarumbidza Zimbabwe nematanho ayakatora ekukwanisa kuraramisa hupfumi hwenyika, panguva iyo dzimwe nyika pasi rose dzaitarisana nematambudziko aitosvitsa pakubviswa kwevatungamiri pazvigaro. Asi Muzvinafundo Masocha vanoti havaoni hurumende ichibudirira kuzdzisa zvayakakomekedzwa kuti izadzise nekuti zvinhu zvave nemakore ichiudzwa nezvazvo asi isina matanho ainotora. No media source currently available

headline: ZITF Inotanga muBulawayo Vakawanda Vasina Mufaro
text: Vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti havachawone kukosha kwegungano remabhizimisi rinoitwa pagore rega rega reZimbabwe Internatiomnal Trade Fair ratanga muguta reBulawayo neChipiri. Vamwe vagari vemuBulawayo vanoti havachawone kukosha kwegungano remabhizimisi rinoitwa pagore rega rega reZimbabwe Internatiomnal Trade Fair kana kuti ZITF, iro ratanga muguta reBulawayo neChipiri. Vamwe vagari vataura neStudio 7 vati gungano reZITF raivapa mukana wekuti vaende nemhuri dzavo kunoona zvakasiyana siyana kuZITF asi vati mamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzezvehupfumi ave kuita kuti vasaona kukosha kwechiitiko ichi. Mumwe weavo vataura neStudio 7 ndemumwe mugari uyo angozvidoma nezita rekuti Amai Tawonga. Amai Tawonga vati ZITF iri kuuya panguva iyo vari kutotemwa nemusoro kuti vabatanidze mari yekubhadharira vana vavo chikoro sezvo zvikoro zviri kuvhurwa svondo rinouya. Mumwewo mugari, Muzvare Clara Moyo, vati vanosiendawo nevana vavo kuTrade Fair asi vati pari zvino zvinhu zvakavawomera, vakatsinhirawo kuti vari mushishi rekutsvaga mari yechikoro yevana vavo. VaTaipanei Mutadza vaimboshandira imwe yaive kambani hombe yaigadzira mbatya muBulawayo asi yakazovhara. VaMutadza vati vaive mumwe wevashandi vekambani iyi vaigara vachienda kuTrade Fair kunoratidza zvinhu zvaigadzirwa nekambani iyi. VaMutadza vanoti ivo semunhu ave kuedza kutangawo kuzvishandira pachavo vega, vanoona gungano reZITF rakakosha sezvo richivapa mukana wekuwana mazano ebhizimisi kune vamwe. Mumashoko avo kuvatapi venhau muBulawayo, sachigaro weZITF, VaBekhithemba Nkomo, vati kunyange hazvo mamiriro ezvehupfumi munyika asina kumira zvakanaka, vari kufadzwa nezviratidzwa zviri pagungano reZITF regore rino vachiti zviratidzwa izvi ndezvemhando yepamusoro kupfuura mamwe makore mashoma apfuura. Gungano reZITF richavhurwa zviri pamutemo nemusi wechishanu uye mutungamiri wenyika yeTogo ndiye achange ari munyarrikani pachiitiko ichi. No media source currently available

headline: Mhuri yaVaMugabe Yokurudzira VaMnangagwa Kuti Vaone Kuti Mutumbi waVaMugabe Haufukunyurwe
text: Mhuri yevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika mushakabvu VaRobert Mugabe, inoti mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vanofanirwa kuzivisa nyika yose kuti vachazadzisa zvavakavimbisa kuti VaMugabe varadzikwe kunodiwa nemhuri yavo uye mutumbi wavo hausi kuzofukunyurwa sezvakatarwa nematare nezuro. Mutauriri wemhuri uye vari muzukuru waVaMugabe, VaLeo Mugabe vaudza Studio 7 kuti VaMnangagwa vanofanirwa kuzivisa nyika nepasi rose kuti vacharemekedza zvido zvemhuri yaVaMugabe zvekuvaviga kumusha kwavo uye kuti havasi kuzovafukunyura sezvavakambovimbisa. Izvi zvinotevera kuraswa kwechikumbiro chevana vaVaMugabe chekuti vasafukunyurwe nekunovigwa kumarinda anovigwa magamba kuHarare nedare ramejasitiriti muChinhoyi nezuro. Vachipa mutongo wavo nezuro Muzvare Ruth Moyo vakarasa chikumbiro chevana vaVaMugabe vanoti; Bona Mugabe, Tinotenda Robert Jnr naBellaimine Mugabe chekuti dare rimise kufukunyurwa kwemutumbi wababa vavo sezvakanga zvatongwa naMambo Zvimba muna Chikumi. Mumwe mugari wekwaZvimba, VaDonmore Gombe, vati vanoshamiswa nemitongo yematare yekuda kumanikidza kuti VaMugabe vafukunyurwe vachinovigwa kuHeroes Acre asi pasingataurwe zvevamwe vakaitwa magamba asi vakavigirwa kwaidiwa nehama dzavo saVaDumiso Dabengwa nevamwe. Hatina kunzwa divi rehurumende kana raVaMnangagwa panyaya iyi sezvo mutauriri wehurumende uye vari gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, kana mutauriri waVaMnangagwa, VaGeorge Charamba, vanga vasingadavire mbozhanhare dzavo. Asi bazi rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko razivisa paTwitter kuti rakanzwa nezvemutongo wakaitwa kuChinhoyi uye hurumende kana mutungamiri wenyika havaneyi nezviri kuitika mumatare panyaya iyi. Zvichakadaro, gweta revana vaVaMugabe, VaFungai Chinwamurombe, vati mushure mekutaura nevana vaVaMugabe vari kupikisa mutongo wamejasitiriti muChinhoyi nekukwidza nyaya iyi kudare repamusoro nemusi weMuvhuro. VaMugabe vakashaikira kuSingapore muna Gunyana 2019 uko kwavaigara vachienda kunorapwa. VaMugabe, avo vakatonga nyika kubva muna 1980, vakabviswa pachigaro zvechisimba nemauto muna Mbudzi 2017, izvo zvakaona VaMnangagwa vachigadzwa semutungamiri wenyika vachitora chinzvimbo chaVaMugabe. No media source currently available

headline: VaMudzvova Vofunga Kunotariswa Kunze kweNyika Mushure Mekubayiwa Jekiseni neVanofungidzirwa Kuti Vasori
text: Nhengo yesangano reTajamuka yakaitwa kafiramberi muHarare VaSilvanos Mudzvova vanoti vave kutarisira kuti vanorapwa kunze kwenyika sezvo zvisiri kuzivikanwa kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni rainge riinei. Vanoti vesangano reZimbabwe Doctors for Human Rights vakavakurudzira kuti vanotariswa navanamazvikokota vekunze sezvo pasina ari kuziva kuti vakabayiwa jekiseni reyi. Vati nyaya iyi iri kuvadya moyo nekuti havazive kuti hutano hwavo huchange hwakamira sei. VaMudzvova vakapambwa nemusi weChipiri svondo rapera kumba kwavo nevanhu vatanhatu vanofungidzirwa kuti vasori vakatochwa pedyo neNharira Hills kuNorton. Vanhu vakapamba VaMudzvova vainge vakapakatira pfuti. Pari zvino VaMudzvova avo vari kuchipatara cheAvenues Clinic muHarare vanoti vave kutyira hupenyu hwavo asi vachitiwo vakavhiyiwa neMuvhuro kugadzirisa matumbu avo ainge asina kumira zvakanaka kubva zvavakarohwa. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Inonzi Haisati Yapindura Magwaro Akakwidzwa Mudare rePamusoro naVana Chiremba
text: Gurukota rinoona nezvehutano, Dr David Parirenyatwa, nemunyori mukuru mubazi ravo, Dr Gerald Gwinji, vanonzi havasati vapindura magwaro ari kudare repamusoro akaendeswa navanachiremba vachiti danho ravakatora rekuvabvisira mari dzemihoro mushure mekuratidzira rainge risiri pamutemo. Kuratidzira uku kwakapfuura mavhiki maviri uye kwakatanga muna Gumiguru kukazopera muna Mbudzi. Vanachiremba vainge vakanda mapadza pasi vachiti havasi kufara nemari dzavaitambiriswa uye kushaya zvikwanisiro zvekushandisa. Sangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association rinoti vanachiremba vakabatirwa mari dzinopfuura mazana mashanu emadhora. Gweta ravanachiremba ava, VaEmmanuel Samundombe, vanoti zvakaitwa nehurumende zvekubvisira vanachiremba mari kutyora bumbiro remitemo. No media source currently available Asi hurumende mutsamba yakanyorwa naDr Gwinji yakaudza vanachiremba ava kuti kuratidzira kwavo kwainge kusiri pamutemo nekudaro vaizobatirwa mari sezvinoitirwa vanenge vaenda havo pazororo risiri pamutemo. Hurumende yave nemakore ichinetsana navanachiremba nenyaya yemari dzavanotambira asi dambudziko iri harisi kupera.

headline: WC yakandivhura mhanza: Perpetual
text: KAPUTENI wechikwata chenyika chenetball chemaGems, Perpetual Siyachitema, anoti zvekutamba mutambo uyu zviri muropa uye kuenda kwavakaita kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup yakaitirwa kuLiverpool, kuEngland nguva yadarika kwakavavhurira mikana yakasiyana.   MaGems akanyora nhorowondo kuve chikwata chekutanga kubva muZimbabwe kuenda kunokwikwidza kuWorld Cup uko chikwata ichi chakanotamba zvinodakadza.   “Hakuna zvimwe zvikwata zvevarume zvemuno zvakamboenda kuWorld Cup sesu asi ndinoti kuburikidza nekuenda kwatakaita kumakwishu aya kwakativhurira mukana uye netball yave kutsigirwa.   “Kubva ndakatanga kutambira maGems mugore ra2009, ndaingoshuvira kutambira netball kumakwishu makuru uye ndakazokwanisa kuzviita. Kumutambo uku ndaiziva kuti kwaizouya shasha kubva kuzvikwata zvakasiyana, kunyanya zvekuAustralia kuzonditarisa ndichitamba,” anodaro Siyachitema.   Siyachitema akazvarwa mugore ra1983 kuChitungwiza uko kwaakakurira.    Akadzidza kuzvikoro zvinoti Tasimukira Primary School, Seke 5 High neSeke 3 High.   Anoti achiri kuchikoro, ndipo paakatanga kutamba netball achitevera matsimba amai vake nemukoma wake avo vakambotambawo mutambo uyu.   Shasha iyi yakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana sezvo baba vake – Fanuel Siyachitema – vaimbove mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kunyika yeZambia.    Amai vake nemukoma wake vese vaitamba netball muNetball Super League.   “Ndakazvarirwa mumhuri yevatambi vemitambo yakasiyana, baba vangu vaive mutambi wenhabvu ane mukurumbira kuZambia kozoti amai uye mukoma wangu vese vakatamba netball muSuper League.   “Vabereki vangu vaitoti ramba uchiita zvemitambo nekuti zvichazokupa pundutso uye ndiri kutozviona zvichitoitika iye zvino,” anodaro.   Anoti mwanasikana wake – Gugulethu – uyo ane makore 16 ekuberekwa, ari kutambawo netball pamwechete nebasketball.   “Mwanasikana wangu anotambawo netball nebasketball saka ndinofara chaizvo kuti tine zvatinofarira pamwechete.   “Iniwo ndichikura ndaimbotamba basketball panguva yandaitamba netball asi ndakazosiya basketball nekuti netball ine zvakawanda zvakayakanakira sezvo une mukana wekuzopinda basa.   “Tiri kumba, ndinoshanda nemwana wangu ndichimubatsira zvakasiyana zvemutambo uyu, ndinoda chaizvo kuti azosvike kure mumutambo uyu,” anodaro.   Shasha iyi yakwanisa kutambira zvikwata zvinosanganisira Matiza Queens, Honde Queens, Telecel Queens, ZRP PPU, Gathsmine, Trojan Mine Bindura, Railstars Bulawayo, ZPC Hanngwe uye parizvino ari kutambira pamwe nekurairidza Glow Petroleum Queens.   Siyachitema anoti murume wake ndiye chiremba wake uye anomutsigira zvikuru mumutambo uyu.   “Murume wangu haadi neni, ndiye chiremba wangu anombondibatsira kana ndakuvara. Anonditsigira zvikuru kunyangwe hazvo ndichipedza nguva ndefu ndisipo ndichifamba nemutambo uyu,” anodaro Siyachitema.

headline: Argentina Yosimudza Mukombe weWorld Cup keChitatu
text: Argentina yasimudza mukombe weFIFA World Cup kechitatu munhoroondo yenyika iyi mushure mekurova France 4-2 mumapenalties kuQatar. Argentina yakasimudza mukombe uyu kekutanga muna 1978 pawakatambirwa munyika iyi ichi ichitungamirwa nakaputeni wayo Daniel Passarella. Yakarova Netherlands 3-1. Yakazosimudza mukombe uyu zvekare muna 1986 ichitungamirirwa naDiego Maradona. Argentina yakarova West Germany 3-2 kumakwikwi akatambirwa kuMexico. Mumutambo wanhasi wange uchinakidza zvikuru, France neArgentina dzaita mangange 3-3 dzisati dzaenda kumapenalties. Argentina ndiyo yatanga kutungamira 2-0 muchikamu chekutanga mushure mekunge Lionel Messi anwisa penalty papera mamaminitsi makumi matatu nerimwe, (31’ mins), Angel Di Maria akanwisa chechipiri mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nematanhatu, (36’mins).  Asi muchikamu chechipiri, Kylian Mbappe anwisa mushure memaminetsi makumi masere uye makumi masere nerimwe, (80’ ne 81’). Mutambo uyu wazoenda munguva yemuwedzeredzwa kana kuti extra time. Messi anwisa mushure memaminetsi zana nemasere (108’), Mbappe achizonwisa mushure nemaminetsi zana negumi nemasere (118’) . Nezvibodzwa zvitatu izvi, Mbappe ndiye anwisa zvibodzwa zvakawanda kudarika vamwe vatambi vose kuWorld Cip aine zvibodzwa zvisere achiteverwa naMessi ane zvinomwe. Mbappe apihwa mukombe wekurova mambure kakawanda kana kuti Golden Boot. Messi ndiye apihwa mukombe wekukunda vamwe vose kumakwikwi aya kana kuti Golden Ball.  Emiliano Martinez wekuArgentina ndiye akunda vamwe vabati vepagedhi vose kana kuti Golden Glove Award. Akunda vamwe vatambi vechidiki vose kana kuti Best youngster mutambi weArgentina zvekare Enzo Fernandez. Ane makore makumi maviri nerimwe.

headline: Vanhu Gumi neVashanu Vofa neKudya Hohwa hweMusango Hune Muchetura
text: Vanhu vana kubva kumhuri imwe chete vakafa mushure mekudya hohwa une muchetura kumusha weThandanani kuFilabusi Matabeleland South. Vamwe vanhu vana vanonzi vari kurwara zvakaipisisa vari muchipatara. Izvi zvave kureva kuti vanhu vanosvika gumi nevashanu vafa nekudya hohwa usingafanire kudyiwa nevanhu uhu. Bazi rinoona nezvehutano rinoti vanhu havafanire kungodya chero hohwa hwemusango sezvo humwe huchiuraya. Vamwe vanhu gumi nemumwe vakafawo kuMberengwa, Midlands svondo rapera mushure mekudyawo hohwa hune muchetura.

headline: Vakaremara Votarisira Kuti VaNcube Vaise Mari yeKuvabatsira muBhajeti ra2022
text: Vakaremara vari kukurudzira gurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vari kuparura bhajeti rehurumende ra2022 nemusi weChina, kuti vawedzere mari dzekuvasimudzira sezvo vaomerwa nehupenyu zvakanyanya. Vanoongorora nyaya dzezvehupfumi, vachirwirawo kodzero dzevakaremara uye vasingaone, VaMasimba Kuchera, vaudza Studio 7 kuti pari zvino vakaremara vari kupihwa madhora zviuru zvitatu zvemunyika pamwedzi. Ongororo yakaitwa nesangano reUnited Nations Educational, Scientific and Cultural Organization, kana kuti UNESCO, yakaburitsa pachena kuti vakaremara ndivo vakanyanya kuomerwa nehupenyu munguva yeCovid-19 muZimbabwe sezvo vainge vokundikana kuzviitira mabasa emaoko kana kupemha. Vasikana vakaremara vanonzi vari kumbunyikidzwawo zvakanyanya munguva dzino dzekurwisa denda iri. Vakaremara vanonzi neongororo iyi vari kutadza kuenda kuchikoro kana kuzvipatara. VaKuchera vati zvakakosha kuti paiswe mari parutivi yekuti vakaremara vakwanise kurapwa nyore. No media source currently available

headline: Vanorarama neKutengesa Vonyunyuta neKusiiwawo muHurongwa Hwemari yeKubatsira veMabhizimusi
text: Sangano Vendors Initiative for Social and Economic Transformation, kana kuti VISET, rinoti riri kushushikana zvikuru nemashoko egurukota rezvemari Muzvinafundo Mthuli Ncube ekuti mari yekubatsira vemabhizimi munguva yekurwisa denda reCovid-19 yakaiswa parutivi nehurumende inosvika mabhiririyo gumi nemasere kana kuti 18 billion RTGS haisi kuzopihwa vanozviitira mabasa emaoko. VaChitaura mudare reparamende svondo rapera, VaNcube vakati mari iyi ichakwereteswa vemabhizimisi makuru kuburikidza nemabhanga uye RBZ iri kuisa mari yechibatiso inosvika zvikamu makumi mashanu kubva muzana. VISET inoti vemabhizimi madiki nevanozviitira mabasa emaoko vari kudawo rubatsiro sezvo vari kutatarika kumutsiridza mabhizimisi avo akanganiswawo nechirwere cheCovid-19. Mukuru weVISET VaSamuel Wadzayi vanotiwo hurumende inokwanisa kushanda nemakanzuru kugadziridza misika yekuti vakwanise kushanda vakasungunuka. Hatina kukwanisa kubata VaNcube sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Victoria Falls Inokwanisa Kubaya Nhomba Vanhu Vakawanda Zvekukwanisa kuDzivirira Kupararira kweCovid-19
text: Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa neSvondo kuti munhu mumwechete akafa neCovid-19 uye vamwe vanhu makumi maviri nevaviri kana kuti 22, vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vafa nyika yose pachiuru chimwe nemazana mashanu ane makumi mashanu nevanomwe, kana kuti 1 557. Ukuwo, vanhu vasere, vazhinji vavo vari vana vechikoro, vanonzi vakaiswa kwavo voga (quarantine) kuBulawayo mushure mekuwanikwa kwedenda reCovid-19 pachikoro cheMzilikazi Primary School. Mukuru wezvehutano mudunhu reBulawayo, Dr. Edwin Sibanda, vaudza bepanhau reChronicle kuti vasere ava vakaendeswa kuchipatara cheThorngrove neku Elangeni Training Centre mushure mekuona kuti vamwe vevanhu ava vanogara mudzimba diki izvo zvinovatadzisa kuzogara kwavo voga. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvakachatanga hwakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvisere zvine makumi masere nevatanhatu, kana kuti 38 086. Ukuwo, bazi rezvehutano rakazivisawo kuti vanhu zviuru gumi nezviviri nezana negumi nevaviri, kana kuti 12 112, vakabaiwa nhomba yekutanga neSvondo izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru mazana matatu nemakumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matanhatu, kana kuti 336 600. Vamwe zviuru zvishanu nemazana masere nevanomwe, kana kuti 5 807, vakabaiwa nhomba yepiri zvakasvitsawo huwandu hwevabaiwa nhomba iyi pazviuru makumi mashanu nezvitatu zvine mazana mana negumi nevasere, kana kuti 53 418. Izvi zviri kuuya panguva iyo dhorobha reVictoria Falls rakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vakwanisa kubaiwa nhomba dzose pazvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana, kana kuti 77 percent. Izvi zvinopa kuti Victoria Falls, iyo inonzi ine vanhu vanokodzera kubaiwa nhomba vanosvika zviuru makumi maviri nezvishanu, kana kuti 25 000, rive dunhu rekutanga munyika kudzivirirwa kubva mukupararira kwedenda iri, kana kuti herd immunity. Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, avo vakabaiwa nhomba yavo yekutaga vari kuVictoria Falls, varumbidza zvikuru danho rakatorwa nedhoorobha iri rekubaya vanhu vakawanda kudaro nhomba. Studio 7 yabata mukuru anoona nezvekudzivirirwa kweCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva kuti tinzwe zvizhinji, asi vati vanga vari mumusangano. Asi mukuru weCommunity Working Group on Health, VaItai Rusike, vanoti zvinofadza chose kuti Victoria Falls yakwanisa kuwana vanhu vakawanda kudaro vabaiwa nhomba, asi vanoti dhorobha iri rakakwanisa kuita izvi sezvo rakangotanga nekubaya munhu wese. VaRusike vanoti mamwe madhorobha nemaguta vakatanga kubaya nhomba iyi muzvikamu zvikamu, izvo zvakaita kuti vanhu vaibaiwa vave vashoma. Asi vanoti kubayiwa nhomba kwevanhu vanosvika zvikamu makumi manomwe nezvinomwe kubva muzana uku kunogona kushaya basa kana vashanyi pamwe nevanhu vanobva munzvimbo dzakapoteredza dhorobha iri vasina kubaiwawo sezvo vachikwanisa kusiya zvakare hutachiwana hweCovid-19 pavanopinda nekubuda mudhorobha iri. Dhorobha reVictoria Falls rinonzi rakawaniswa nhomba inoita makumi matanhatu ezviuru, zvichireva kuti vagari vanosvika makumi matatu ezviuru vanokwanisa kubaiwa nhmbo dzose dziri mbiri. No media source currently available

headline: Zifa inokara mari: Shereni
text: SHASHA yakambonetsa ichitambira nhabvu maWarriors, Dynamos nezvimwe zvikwata zvekuEurope — Harlington Shereni — anoti vakambotamba mutambo uyu vanovharirwa kunze pose pavanoda kuita zvirongwa zvekusimudzira nhabvu nesangano reZimbabwe Football Association (Zifa) iro raanoti rizere nevanhu vane makaro emari.   Shereni mumwe wevakatamba nhabvu yepamusoro izvo zvakamuona achitambira kuEurope kwemakore akawanda kuzvikwata zvinosanganisira SR Delemont yekuSwitzerland kozoti Istres, Guingamp, Nantes neStrausborg zvekuFrance.   Muchinda uyu aive muchikwata chemaWarriors chekutanga kuenda kunokwikwidza kuAfrica Cup of Nations kuTunisia.   “Isu sevakambotamba nhabvu kare tine rudo rwekusimudzira mutambo uyu asi tinopedzisira tasvika pakuneta nekuti hutungamiri hwenhabvu yemuno vanokupedza simba. Havana rudo nenhabvu asi chavanongoda imari chete, kunyangwe pakauuya vatsva vanoshanda semashandiro aiita vanenge vabva.   “Kuti zvinake, panodiwa munhu akatamba nhabvu yepamusoro kwete munhu wese wese,” anodaro Shereni.   Parizvino Zifa iri kutungamirirwa naFelton Kamambo uyo akambotamba nhabvu kuchikwata cheMhangura Football Club.   Asi, mumaonero aShereni anoti chigaro ichi chinoda munhu akatamba nhabvu yepamusoro-soro.   “Ndofunga yasvika nguva yekuti isu takambotamba nhabvu tikwikwidze musarudzo idzi dzekusarudza mutungamiri weZifa   “Uye munhu anofanirwa kunge akaona nekutamba nhabvu yepamusoro kuti aunze shanduko munhabvu yemuno,” anodaro.   Shereni — uyo akaberekerwa ndokukurira kuChiredzi —  anoti anoda kusimudzira mutambo wenhabvu kuChiredzi.   “Ndiri kushanda kuti ndisimudzire nhabvu kuChiredzi kwandakabva uye kutanga gore rinotevera tichange tichiita mitambo yakasiyana tichibika tarenda revatambi vari kusimukira. Tiri kutsvaga vanokwanisa kukotsvera kuti basa iri ritange,” anodaro Shereni.   Mutauriri weZifa Xolisani Gwesela anoti havasati vakamboona chinyorwa chinobva kunaShereni chekuti anoda kusimudzira mutambo wenhabvu muno.   “Hatisati tamboona kana zvaakambonyora achiti anogona kushandura nhabvu muno saka zvaari kutaura zviri kubvepi? Mari ipi iri kudyiwa?   “Nhabvu yakavhurika kumunhu wese uye tinotambira pfungwa dzevamwe idzo dzinoshandura nhabvu  zvichiita kuti ikure,” anodaro Gwesela.   Anoenderera achiti, “Hapana akambomurambidza kuti akwikwidze musarudzo dzekusarudza hutungamiri hweZifa uye kana achiona kuti anogona kutungamira akasununguka kukwikwidza musarudzo dzinotevera, asi hunge kana achizadzikisa zvinodiwa zvinotarisirwa kuti ukwikwidze musarudzo dzeZifa.”

headline: VaMugabe Vokurudzira VaTrump Kusaita Zvemangoromera
text: No media source currently available Mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, vakakatyamadza vanhu vakawanda pasi rose nemusi weChina nekushora kwavakaita mutungamiri wenyika yeAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vachiti vanofanira kukurudzira runyararo pasi rose kwete kuda kuita zvemangoromera. VaMugabe vakataura mashoko aya kuNew York muAmerica kumusangano mukuru wepagore weUnited Nations General Assembly, UNGA. Mutungamiri wenyika haana kutaura nezvenyaya dzezvirango zvavanoti zvakatemerwa Zimbabwe nyaya inova yange yave rwiyo rwavo kumusangano uyu. VaMugabe vakati hapana chakaipa kuti VaTrump vazviridzire hwamanda asi vakati inofanira kunge ichitaura nezverunyararo pasi rose. VaTrump vakasiya vamwe vatungamiri venyika dzepasi rose vasina neremuromo mushure mekunge vayambira North Korea kuti vaigona kuiparadza ikaramba ichipinda nemwenje mudziva ichisvokosva America neshamwari dzayo nekupota ichivhundutsira nekukanda zvombo zvemuchadenga. Mutungamiri weAmerica akatsoropodzawo Iran, Venezuela nedzimwe nyika dzavakati hadziremekedze kodzero dzevanhu. VaMugabe vakasetsa vamwe vatungamiri mudare iri apo vakafananidza VaTrump naGoriyati wemubhaibheri anongoziva kushandisa chisimba. Vakatyorazve vanhu mbabvu apo vakati VaTrump vanofanira kuridza havo hwamanda yavo asi vachiita izvi mukuunza runyararo munyika dzepasi rose. VaMugabe vakashorawo America nekubuda muchibvumirano chakanangana nekuchengetedza mamiriro ekunze cheParis Climate Agreement. Asi VaMugabe vakati Zimbabwe haisi kuzongorega nyika dzakabudirira idzi dzichityora zvisungo zvechibvumirano ichi. VaMugabe vakatiwo Zimbabwe ine hukama hwakanaka nesangano reUnited Nations asi vakati shuviro yavo ndeyekuti bazi rakakosha reUnited Nations Security Council rivandudzwe. Dare reSecurity Council rine nyika shanu chete dzisingabude mudare iri uye dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dzinoti Russia, America, China, France neBritain, uye nyika gumi dzisina masimba dzinoita majanho kugara mudare iri kwemakore maviri. Panyika gumi idzi pane nyika nhatu chete dzemuAfrica dzinoti Ethiopia, Senegal neEgypt. Asi Africa nedzimwe nyika dzinoda kuti nyika dziri mudare iri dzine masimba ekuchinja zvinhu dziwedzerwe kubva pashanu dziripo. Sachigaro weMDC-T muAmerica, VaDen Moyo, vashora zvikuru VaMugabe vachiti vanoda kupindira nyaya dzisinei neZimbabwe uye vanoshora vatungamiri vavanoti vanotyora kodzero dzevanhu asi ivo kunyika kwavo vasingaremekedze vanovapikisa uye vachitonga nedemo. Mashoko aya atsinhirwa naMuzvare Tsitsi Chiriseri, chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe icho chakaratidzira muNew Yorl chichishora matongero aVaMugabe. Muzvare Chiriseri vanoti muromo hauzarirwe nerwizi nekuti dai VaMugabe vaiita zvavanotaura, dai Zimbabwe isiri mukanwa mamupere. Asi mumwe muzvinafundo paMalone University kuOhio muAmerica, VaMoses Rumano, vanoti vafadzwa zvikuru nemashoko aVaMugabe ekutsiura VaTrump. Kunyange hazvo zvakabuda pachena kuti VaMugabe vakange vachinetsekana nekufamba pavakange vachienda kunotura mashoko avo kudare reGeneral Assembly, vakawanda vanoti vange vachiratidza kuti hutano hwavo huri nani. Musangano weUNGA uyu ndewechimakumi manomwe nembiri.

headline: Mamwe Makambani Ozorwa Mafuta eNguruve Yaasina Kudya paNyaya yeKuburitswa kweMari Kunze kweNyika
text: Vamwe vana muzvinabhizinesi vari kushora zvikuru hurumende nekubudisa mazita evanhu nemakambani anonzi akabudisa mari kunze kwenyika zvisiri pamutemo vachiti hurumende haina kuita tsvakiridzo yakakwana sezvo vamwe vane mazita akabudiswa vasina mhosva dzavakapara. Izvi zvabuda pamusangano wakokerwa neZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce neChina muHarare vamwe vemabhizimusi vachiti vakasvibiswa mazita avo zvakanyanya nehurumende izvo zvokanganisa mabhizimusi avo. Mukuru weGlobal Solar LED Bulbs, VaJeffree Rugare, vati vakatoshamiswa vachiona kambani yavo yakanyorwa pavanhu vanonzi vakabuditsa mari asi ivo vachizvichenura panyaya iyi. VaRugare vaudza musangano uyu kuti chinonyanyovarwadza ndechekuti izvi zvakasvibisa kambani yavo kunyange hazvo vachiti hazvina chokwadi mukati. Mukuru weZNCC, VaChristopher Mugaga, vatiwo shuviro yavo ndeyekuti zvabuda mumusangano wavaita zvisvike kumutungamiri wenyika kuti azive kuti vamwe vevari kupomerwa kubudisa mari zvisiri pamutemo vakachena panyaya idzi. VaMugaga vatiwo mabhizimusi ari kunyunyutawo zvikuru achiti hurumende inenge iri kukoshesa mabhizimusi ekunze ichitsikirira vemabhizimusi emuZimbabwe. Mutevedzeri wegurukota rinoona nezvemari, VaTerence Mukupe,vati hurumende yakaita zvayaifunga kuti ndozvingabatsira nyika. VaMukupe vati vose vari kuti vakachena vanofanirwa kutora matanho ekuratidza humbowo hwekuti havana mhosva. Vachipindura kunyaya iri kupomerwa hurumende yaVaMnangagwa yekuti vanhu vakabudisa mari zhinji huye vachizivikanwa munyaya dzezvematongerwo enyika havana kunyorwa mazita avo, VaMukupe vati vanhu vane ruzivo nezvevamwe vakabudisa mari ngavazivise hutungamiriri pamwe nemapurisa. Gweta rine mukurumbira munyika, VaTendai Biti, vatiwo mutemo yenyika haina kugadziriswa zvakakwana kuti ubate vanobudisa mari, uye vakurudzira kuti kunyatsonyorwa mutemo unobata vanobudisa mari. Vemabhizimusi vatiwo hapana tsananguro yakazara inoratidza kuti chinonzi externalization yemari chii huye chii chinonzi nehurumende “Illicit Financial Flows.” No media source currently available

headline: Vanhu Vatatu Vofa neKuda kweMafashamu eMvura kuManicaland
text: Mafashamu emvura nedutumupengo remhepo zvinonzi zvakauraya vanhu vatatu nekuparadza misha yakawanda kuManicaland asi zvave kuenda zvichiita nani. Dutumupengo rakabva nekuMozambique iri rinonzi Eloise. Ku Chipinge neChimanimani zvikoro zvakawanda zvapwanywa nemafashamu emvura aya uye vamwe vanhu vari pedyo nerwizi Save vave kutamiswa kuenda kwakakwirira. Kunaya zvakanyanya kwemvura kwapawo kuti mamwe madhamu maviri anoti Manyuchi neTugwi Mukosi azarise zvopa kuti mvura ivhurwe kuti irasike. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development VaClaris Madhuku avo vanoti dzimwe nzvimbo hadzisi kusvikika nekuda kwemiti yakadonhera mumigwagwa. No media source currently available

headline: Nhabvu yadzoka zvakare
text: SANGANO rePremier Soccer League (PSL) rinoti riri kufara zvikuru nekupihwa kwavakaita mvumo yekuti mutambo weChibuku Super Cup uenderere mberi uye izvi zvinotevera kumiswa kwainge kwamboitwa mitambo yose nguva pfupi yadarika nechinangwa chekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere cheCovid-19.   Chinyorwa chakatumirwa kubva kuSports and Recreation Commission (SRC) svondo rino chakazivisa kuti mitambo inoti nhabvu, cricket nerugby zvave kutenderwa kutambwa nechinangwa chekuzadzikisa mitambo yakasiyana apo zvikwata zvenyika zvichanokwikwidza kunze.   Mukushi wemashoko wePSL — Kudzai Bare — anoti havasi kugona nemufaro nekupihwa kwavakaitwa mvumo yekuti mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup ienderere mberi.    Kudzai Bare   “Tiri kufara kuti tave kuenderera mberi nenhabvu yedu. Tiri pakati pekuita hurukuro nezvikwata zvose tichivazivisa kuti vachitanga gadziriro dzavo dzekuti mutambo usimudzirwe pawange wasiirwa. “Toda kupa zvikwata zvose mukana wekuita gadziriro dzakakwana tobva tasimudzira mutambo uyu. “Hatisati tave nezuva rekuti ndiro rekusimudzira, asi mumazuva anotevera tichange tichizivisa nyika tapedza kuita hurukuro nezvikwata zvose,” anodaro Bare.   Shasha yekutsigira nhabvu ine mukurumbira, Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa, anoti anotenda zvikuru Hurumende nekutendera kuti mitambo ichitanga kutambwa zvakare.    Chris ‘Romario’ Musekiwa   “Nhabvu ibasa semamwe mabasa ose nekuti iri kuraramisa mhuri dzakawanda. Vakomana vedu kana vasingatambe vanenge vari panzara sezvo vachiraramiswa nemari dzavanowana kubva kunhabvu. “Naizvozvo ndinopa kutenda kuhutungamiri hwedu hweSRC neHurumende vakatendera kuti nhabvu ienderere mberi. Isu tinoda kuona vakomana vedu vachitamba uye zvikwata zvedu zvichihwina.   “Paye nhabvu payakambomiswa kwenguva ndefu kubva gore radarika, vakomana vazhinji vakambotambudzika zvikuru. Vamwe vange vave kutengesa pamusika chaipo kuti variritire mhuri dzavo zvinova zvinhu zvinosiririsa. Asi iye zvino nhabvu zvayadzoka tinoziva kuti hupenyu hwavo hwave kuchiendeka manje,” anodaro.   Apo chikwata chemaWarriors chiri kutanga gadziriro dzekuenda kumutambo weCosafa Cup uchatambirwa kuSouth Africa nekuzotanga kurwira tikiti rekuenda kumitambo yeQatar 2022 World Cup, Romario anoti kudzoka kwenhabvu kuchabatsira murairidzi wechikwata chenyika ichi, Zdravko ‘’Loga’’ Logarusic, kutarisa vatambi vakawanda vekuzosarudza.   “Takatarisana neCosafa kuSouth Africa mumasvondo anotevera saka kana nhabvu ichitambwa zvinobatsira zvikuru kuti Loga atarise vatambi vakawanda onyatsosarudza simbi dzebasa dzekutakura kuenda nadzo kumutambo uyu dzisingazononyadzise. Hatidi kunyadziswa kuSouth Africa kuCosafa nekuti tagara tichizivikanwa tichitamba zvinodadisa mumutambo uyu.   “Manje-manje tiri kufanira kusangana neSouth Africa mumutambo wekurwira kuenda kuWorld Sup saka kana nhabvu ichitambwa zvinotibatsira zvikuru kuumba chikwata chakasimba chinosimudzira mureza wenyika,” anodaro Musekiwa.   Maneja wemaWarriors — Wellington Mpandare — anoti vane mutoro mukuru pakusarudza vatambi vanopinda muchikwata chaLoga chichanokwikiwdza kumutambo weCosafa Cup.   Mutambo weCosafa Cup uchatanga musi wa7 Chikunguru uye maWarriors anofanirwa kutanga gadziriro dzavo svondo rino musi weSvondo apo vatambi vachasarudzwa naLoga vachapinda mukembi.   Mpandare anoti zviri kuremera Loga nevatevedzeri vake kuti vasarudze chikwata chinoenda kumutambo uyu nekuti pakamiswa mitambo akange asati awana nguva yekuona zvikwata zvose zvichikwikwidza. Loga anonzi akangokwanisa kuona mitambo yeChibuku Super Cup yakatambirwa uye ange achironga kuti aende Bulawayo Mutare neMidlands kunoona vatambi vezvimwe zvikwata apo pakabva pamiswa mitambo iyi.    Wellington Mpandare   Mpandare anoti kumiswa kwakaitwa nhabvu kwakabva kwadzorera basa rose kumashure.   “Cosafa Cup iri kutanga manje-manje saka tinofanirwa kunge tave kupinda mukembi nevatambi vatinenge tasarudza. Asi iye zvino zviri kutiomera nekuti hatina kuona mitambo yakawanda. Loga akangokwanisa kuona mitambo yemuHarare chete, haana kuzoenda kune mamwe mapurovhinzi achinoona mitambo yaitambwa ikoko,” anodaro Mpandare.   Kumutambo weCosafa, maWarriors akaiswa muboka rine zvikwata zvinosanganisira Senegal, Mozambique neNamibia.   Kusvika pari zvino, maWarriors ndiwo ari kutungamira pakuhwina mukombe uyu sezvo akwanisa kuuhwapura katanhatu.   Chikwata chenyika ichi chakapedzisira kutora mukombe uyu mugore ra2018 apo chairairidzwa naSunday ‘Mhofu’ Chidzambwa.

headline: Amnesty International Yosimbaradza Kodzero dzeVavhoti Musarudzo
text: Sangano reAmnesty International raparura gwaro rezvekodzero dzevanhu rarinoda kuti ritevedzwe nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika kuitira kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakachena pamwe nekuti munyika muve netsika yekuremekedza kodzero dzevanhu. Chipangamazano chikuru muAmnesty International kudunhu reSouthern Africa, VaLlyod Kuvheya, vanoti zvinhu izvi zvinosanganisira kunyangaritswa kwevanhu, kuremekedza kodzero dzevanhukadzi nevanasikana nezvimwe, zvikaitwa nyika inoita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwewo zvinodiwa neAmnesty International kuti mapato, hurumende nevari kukwikwidza vaiite kuti mapurisa nemauto vamirire kushungurudza vanhu, kumira kubvisa vanhu nechisimba kubva munzvimbo dzavanogara, kupa vanhu mukana wekutaura zvavanoda pamwe nekuremekedza kodzero dzevatori venhau. Vatiwo nyika inofanirwa kutevedza zviga zvese zvekucherechedza kodzero dzevanhu zvakaita seAfrican Charter on Human and People’s Rights. Munyori muZimbabwe Human Rights Commission, Doctor Makanatsa Makonese, vati gwaro raparurwa nhasi rakakosha chose sezvo pasina chinofamba munyika kana pasingaremekedzwi kodzeo dzevanhu. Vati zvakakosha kuti vese vemapato ezvematongerwo enyika vaise kodzero dzevanhu pamberi apo vanenge vachitsvaga rutsigiro kubva kubva kuvanhu. Sachigaro veZimbabwe Election Support Network, VaAndrew Makoni, vaudza Studio7 kuti zvakakosha kuti Zimbabwe iite sarudzo dzakachena kuti nyika ifambire mberi. Vakuvheya vati gwaro iri richapihwa kumapato ese ari kupinda musarudzo, mapurisa, masoja nevese vane chekuita nesarudzo sezvo vachida kuti nyika iite sarudzo dzakasiyana nesarudzo dzakadarika idzo dzaiita mutauro nekuda kwekupondwa, kurohwa nekutyorwa kwekodzeo dzevanhu. Zimbabwe ichaita sarudzo kupera kwemwedzi uno uye vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira vanoti mamirira akaita zvinhu pari zvino zvinoratidza sekuti sarudzo idzi dzichange dziri nani panyaya yekutyorwa kwekodzero dzevanhu. No media source currently available

headline: Gumbo adzingwa basa kuBotswana
text: CHIKWATA cheSua Flamingoes chekuBotswana chadzinga basa murairidzi wacho Rahman Gumbo zvichitevera kusatamba zvinogutsa kwachange chichiita.   Kukundwa kwakaita chikwata ichi 3-2 svondo radarika neEleven Angels, izvo zvakaona chichigara pechi15 palogo chiine zvibodzwa zvitatu chete kubva pa18 zvachaigona kuwana, zvatuma Sua Flamingoes kudzinga basa murairidzi wemuZimbabwe uyu.   Sua Flamingoes, iyo iri kutamba muPremiership mumwaka wayo wechipiri, yakazivisa nezvekudzinga kwayakaita Gumbo nemusi weChipiri.   “Sua Flamingoes FC inozivisa vatsigiri vedu vakatikoshera, vane chekuita nechikwata chedu, vatori venhau nemhuri yese yenhabvu kuti taparadzana nemurairidzi wedu Rahman Allen Gumbo.   “Chikwata chinotora mukana uno kutenda Gumbo nebasa raakaita mukukura kwechikwata chedu izvo zvakamboona chichipedza chiri pechisere mwaka wadarika mumwaka wedu wekutanga muElite league,” chinodaro chikwata ichi muchinyorwa.   Kopane Phakedi ndiye ambofanogadzwa kuti arairidze chikwata ichi.   Zvange zvichimomotera Gumbo uyo chikwata chake chakakundwa mitambo mishanu yachatamba mwaka uno wa2022/23 uye changokwanisa kuhwina mumwe chete apo chakakunda Morupole Wanderers 1-0.

headline: Handirohwe muno: Manyuchi
text: CHARLES Manyuchi anoti kunyangwe zviite sei haafe akakundwa mutambo waanorwira muno pamberi pevatsigiri vake.   Shasha yetsiva iyi yange iri kutarisirwa kusangana naMudamad Sebyala wekuUganda munaChivabvu achirwira kuchengetedza bhande rake reWorld Boxing Federation.   Mushure mezvo, ange achifanirwa kuzorwa zvakare naSebyala vachirwira bhande reWorld Africa Boxing Association Supreme Middleweight.   Vaviri ava vaitarisirwa kusangana nemusi wa4 Kubvumbi kuHarare International Conference Centre (HICC).   Mutambo uyu hauchaenderera mberi nekuda kwedanho rakatorwa neHurumende rekumbomisa mitambo yose uye kuungana kwevanhu senzira yekurwisa kupararira kwechirwere checoronavirus.   Manyuchi anoti akagadzirira zvikuru mutambo uyu.   “Pandinorwira muno ndinenge ndiri pamusha saka handisiye munhu achiuya kuzondidherera uye handimbofe ndakakundwa ndiri mumba mangu.   “Muno ndimo muZimbabwe mumba mangu uye zvakafanana nekuti haungaregere munhu achiuya mumba mako okudherera oita zvaanoda newe.   Ini izvozvo handimbozvitendere kana kamwechete, ndinorwira kuchengetedza zita rangu uye kusimudza mureza wenyika wangu,” anodaro.   Kubva Manyuchi zvaakakundwa naQudratillo Abdukakhorov wekuUzbekistan mugore ra2017 apo akatorerwa bhande rake reWBC Silver Welterweight, akwanisa kutamba mitambo mishanu ndokuhwina mina achikundwa mumwechete.

headline: Hurumende Yokundikana Kugara Dare Kutonga Vakoti Vayakamisa Basa
text: Hurumende, iyo yange yadaidza neChina chikwata chekutanga chevakoti pachipatara cheUBH kuBulawayo kuti chimire pamberi pedare, kana kuti tribunal, vachipomerwa mhosva yekutyora mutemo wevashandi, yati nyaya iyi yave kuzonzwikwa svondo rinouya sezvo pane zvimwe zvanzi zvichiri kuda kuitwa. Dare remakurukota rakati rine hurongwa hwekuranga vakoti churu nezana nemakumi maviri nevasere vari kuti havana kwanise kushanda kwemazuva mashanu nekuti havana mari. Mukuru wechipatara cheUBH, Dr Narcisius Dzvanga, mutsamba yavakatumira vakoti vakamiswa basa musi wa 30 Gumiguru, vakati vakatyora mutemo we Labour (National Employment Code of Conduct) Regulations, Statutory Instrument 15 of 2006 nekuti vakange vaudzwa kuti vashande mazuva mashanu vakatsika madziro. Vakoti ava vakanzi vasauye kubasa sezvo vachigona kuvhiringidza zvapupu zvisina kudomwa. Magweta eZimbabwe Lawyers for Human Rights, VaJabulani Mhlanga naMuzvare Prisca Dube, ndivo vari kumirira vakoti ava. Hatina kukwanisa kubata munyori mubazi rezvehutano, Air Commodore Jasper Chimedza, vanzi vange vari mumusangano asi vakaudza dare reparamende svondo rino kuti bazi ravo riri kupihwa mari yebhajeti shoma zvave kuri kanganisa kuita mabasa. Asi mutungamiri weZimbabwe Nurses Association, VaEnoch Dongo, vanoti hurumende iri kumbunyikidza kodzero dzevashandi. No media source currently available

headline: America Inombomisa Vanhu Kupinda Munyika kweMazuva Makumi Matanhatu
text: Mutungamiri weAmerica, VaDonald Trump, vasaina gwaro rinombomisa vanhu vekune dzimwe nyika kupinda muAmerica kwemazuva makumi matanhatu. Gwaro iri haribati avo vanemapepa ekugara munyika zviri pamutemo asi richarambidza avo vasati vave nemavhiza pari zvino kuti vapinde mu America. Vachinyora paTwitter pavo, VaTrump vati mutemo uyu wakaunzwa nechido chavo chekurwisana nemuvengi asingaonekwi, kureva Coronavirus, uye nechido chavo chekuchengetedza mabasa ezvizvarwa zveAmerica. Mutemo uyu haubati vanoshanda mune zvehutano kana vabereki vezvizvarwazveAmerica. Hazvisati zvave pachena kuti mutemo uyu uchabatsira papi uye kuti waitirwei sezvo vanhu varikuuya mu America vave vashoma pamusoro pechirwere cheCoronavirus. Vanoongorora zvematongerwo enyika uye vachiita dzidzo dzepamusorosoro paHoward University, VaCalvin Manduna, vanoti mutemo uyu hauna zvaunobatsira, vachiti VaTrump vanongoda kufadza vatsigiri vavo sezvo vakatarisana nesarudzo muna Mbudzi gore rino. No media source currently available

headline: VeChidiki veZanu-PF Vopika Kufa Vachirwira VaMugabe
text: Vechidiki vanotsigira bato reZanu PF mudunhu reMashonaland West vanoti vakazvipira kufira kudzivirira mutungamiri wenyika VaRobert Mugabe kuvanhu vari kuda kuvabvisa pachigaro nekuratidzira. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wavo muChinhoyi, mumwe wevechidiki ava, VaKingstone Bakasa vakati vakasunga zvisungo zvinosanganisira kupira hupenyu hwavo vachirwisa dzavanoti mhandu dziri kuratidzira kuti VaMugabe vasiye basa nguva yavo isati yakwana. VaBakasa vanoti kubva parizvino vachange vachipinda mumigwagwa kudzivirira vanamai nanababa vavanoti vari kushungurudzwa nevanhu vari kuratidzira munyika. VaBakasa vanotiwo vechidiki veZanu PF vachaita kuti nhengo dzavo dziongorore zvose zvinenge zvichiitika pamisika nepose panokwirirwa mota dzekufambisa mumadhorobha. VaBakasa vanoti vachatora nzvimbo idzi sezvo dziri idzo dzinotanga mhirizhonga. Asi mumwe wechidiki webato rezimbabwe People First VaEldon Cherai vanoti havasi kuzobvuma kutyisidzirwa nevechidiki vezanu PF. Zvisungo zvakawanda zvakabuda nevechidiki iri zvakanangana nekusimbaradza bato rezanu-PF.

headline: Vanhu Vabatwa neCoronavirus muHarare Voda Kusvika paZana
text: Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muHarare chete hwasvika pamakumi mapfumbamwe nemasere kana kuti 98 apo bazi rezvehutano rinoti huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus munyika yose hwasvika pamazana maviri nemakumi manomwe nemapfumamwe kana kuti 279. Vanhu vafa vachiri vana uye vapora vave makumi matatu nevatatu kana kuti 33. Vanhu gumi nevana vakabatwa nechirwere ichi neMugovera vose vakadzoka kubva kuSouth Africa. Harare ndiyo ine vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi, ichiteverwa neMatabeleland South ne Masvingo. Nyazvi munyaya dzezvehutano dziri kuyambirawo kuti munzvimbo dzinochengeterwa vanenge vadzoka kubva kunze kwenyika zvikuru vanouya nemabhazi hadzina kushambidzika uye kune huori hunotyisa vamwe vachinzi vabhadhare mari yechiokomuhomwe vasati vabuditswa kana kuti kuvhenekwa. Munyori mubazi rezvehutano VaNick Mangwana vachinyora padandemutande ravo vakatenda kune munhu akadzingwa basa paBelvedere Teachers College nenyaya yehuori uye inyaya yavanoda kuferefeta. Mutungamiri wesangano reCommunity Working Group on Health VaItai Rusike vanoti hurumende inofanira kuona kuti munzvimbo dziri kugara vanhu vanenge vadzoka kubva kune dzimwe nyika kana kuti maqurantine centres dzive dzine hutsanana kuti chirwere ichi chisapararire. Zvichakadaro, mashoko atumirwa Studio 7 neAfrican Union achibva kuAfrica Centers for Disease Control and Prevention anoratidza kuti vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi masere nemana nematanhatu kana kuti 184, 000 vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus muAfrica. Vashaya vadarika zviuru zvishanu nemakumi manomwe nemumwe kuti 5,071. Vapora vanodarika zviuru makumi manomwe nemasere kana kuti 81,000. Huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere checoronavirus pasi rose hwadarika mamiriyoni matanhatu nezviuru zvipfumbamwe kana kuti kuti 6,9 million. Johns Hopkins University yemuAmerica iyo iri kuongorora kupararira kwechirwere ichi pasi rose inoti muAmerica ndimo mune vanhu vakawandisa vabatwa nechirwere ichi. Pasi rose vanhu vafa nechirwere ichi vanodarika zviuru mazana mana kana kuti 400,000. Vapora vachidarika mamiriyoni matatu kana kuti 3 million. No media source currently available

headline: Argentina Yomirira Morocco Kana France
text: Mutambi ane mukurumbira pasi rose, Lionel Messi nezuro akatungamira nyika yake yeArgentina kurova Croatia 3-0 mumasemifainari emutambo weWorld Cup kuQatar. Argentina yamirira kuona kuti ichatama nenyika ipi pakati peMorocco neFrance idzo dziri kutamba nhasi, Chitatu. Messi akanwisa chibodzwa chekutanga mushure mekunge nyika yake yapihwa penalty kwapera maminetsi makumi matatu nemapfumbamwe-39" mins. Zvimwe zvibodzwa zviviri zvakanwiswa naJulian Alvarez mushure memaminetsi makumi matatu nemana-34" mins uye muchikamu chechipiri kwapera maminetsi makumi matanhatu nemapfumbamwe-69' mins. Nyika inenge yakuandwa ichatamba neCroatia pakuona kuti ndechipi chikwata chinotora chinzvimbo chechitatu mumakundano aya. Mutambo uyu uriko musi weMugovera nengubva dza5 manheru. Mutambo wekupedzisir weWorld cup uri kutambwa nemusi weSvondo nenguva dza5 manheru.

headline: Chirwere cheTyphoid Chovhiringa Vakawanda muMbare
text: Chirwere che typhoid chanyuka muHarare zvakare zvave kupa kuti veruzhinji vatyire hupenyu hwavo sezvo kanzuru iri kutadza kutakura marara pamwe nekugadzirisa pombi dzinotakura tsvina munzvimbo dzakawanda muguta iri. Mutauriri wekanzuru yeHarare, VaMichael Chideme, vanoti zvipatara zvekanzuru yavo zvarapa vanhu vakawanda mumusha unogara veruzhinji weMbare mushure mekuwanikwa vaine chirwere che typhoid. Kunyange hazvo pasina vati vafa nechirwere ichi, vagari vemuMbare vakaita saMuzvare Vongai Mbedzi vanoti chirwere che typhoid hachingarege kubata vanhu sezvo pombi dzinotakura tsvina yemuzvimbuzi dzichigara dzakatushuka. Mumwe mugari wemuMbare makare, VaTitus Nhongonhema, vanoti kusatakurwa kwemarara nekusagadzirwa kwepombi dzinotakura tsvina kuri kukonzerawo kuti zvirwere zvakaita se typhoid zvipfunye chisero muMbare vachiti vave kutyira kuti chirwere ichi chichapararira neguta rose kana dambudziko iri rikasagadziriswa. Zvichakadai, VaChideme vanoti kanzuru yavo yakaisa dumba riri kushandiswa sechipatara kuMatapi muMbare richange risingavharwe kunyange nehusiku kuti vanhu vakwanise kurapwa. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura naMeya weHarare kuti tinzwe kuti sei kanzuru yavo iri kutadza kutakura marara pamwe nekugadzirisa pombi dzinotakura tsvina yemuzvimbuzi. Asi mumwe kanzura mukanzuru yeHarare, VaCharles Nyatsuro, vakurudzira veruzhinji kuti vasarasire marara pese pese vachiti izvi zvinoita kuti chirwere che typhoid nezvimwe zvirwere zvinokonzerwa nekusashambidzika kwenzvimbo zvisapararire. VaNyatsuro vati kanzuru yavo iri kutadzawo kutakura marara sezvo isina motokari dzakakwana kunyange hazvo vakatenga dzimwe motokari svondo rapera. Gurukota rezvehutano, VaDavid Parirenyatwa, vaudza Studio7 parunhare kuti bazi ravo richashanda zvakasimba nekanzuru yeHarare kuedza kupedza chirwere chetyphoid kuMbare. Gore rapera pane vanhu vaviri vanonzi vakaurayiwa nechirwere che typhoid muHarare. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Voenda kuChina Mukuyedza Kugadzirisa Hupfumi hweNyika
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vainge vachitarisirwa kusimuka manheru eChishanu vachienda kuChina kumusangano weForum on China-Africa Cooperation. Musangano uyu wakanangana nezvekutengeserana kweChina nenyika dzemuAfrica. VaMnangagwa vakatarisana nedambudziko guru rekugadzirisa nyaya dzezvehupfumi munyika. Zviri kubuda kubva kubazi reZimbabwe National Statistics Agency kana kuti Zimstats zviri kuratidza kuti zviri kutengwa neZimbabwe kunze kwenyika zvakawedzera nezvikamu makumi matatu nezvitanhatu kubva muzana. Mari yezviri kutengwa kunze kusanganisa mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nemagetsi nezvimwe zvirimwa yasvika pabhiriyoni imwe chete nezviuru mazana mashanu emadhora zvichienzaniswa negore rapera mukati memwedzi minomwe pasingaverengwe Ndira nemwedzi wapera sezvo michina yeZimra inonzi yaisashanda zvakanaka. Asi mukuru weConfederation of Zimbabwe Industries, VaSifelani Jabangwe, vanoti Zimbabwe yakakwanisawo kuti wedzerei zvayakatengesa kunze uye ine zvakawanda zvainokwanisa kudzidza kubva kuChina. Vati China yaimbotatarika seZimbabwe isati yatanga kugadzirisa zvinhu kuburikidza nekuvandudza makambani ayo ichitora mienzaniso kubva kune dzimwe nyika. No media source currently available

headline: Kubviswa kweLockdown Kuchanetsa Sezvo Vanhu Vakawanda Vasati Vaongororwa Covid-19
text: Sangano ravanachiremba vanorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimbabwe Association of Doctors for Human Rights rinoti danho rekuwedzera kana kusawedzera mazuva ekuti nyika irambe yakavharwa, richanetsa kutora sezvo vanhu vazhinji munyika vasina kuongororwa kuti vane chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete. Izvi zvinoitika apo hurumende ichiti yave kutora matanho matsva ekuti vanhu vakawanda vaongororwe, zvikuru vari munzvimbo dzine vanhu vakabatwa neCovid-19. MuZimbabwe mava nevanhu makumi maviri nevatatu vabatwa nechirwere ichi, uye vanhu vatatu vafa nacho, asi pasi rose riine vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvinomwe vafa neCovid-19 kubva zvayakatanga kuChina gore rapera. Munyori musangano iri, Doctor Norman Matara, vaudza Studio7 ruzhinji rwevanhu munyika harwuna kuongororwa kuti rwune chirwere cheCovid-19 here kana kuti kwete panguva iyo nyika yakavharwa kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe akatarwa nemutungamiri wenyika zvichaita kuti hurumende itemeseke musoro kuti nyika yoramba yakavharwa here kana kuti kwete pachapera nguva yakatarwa naVaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Pari zvino, bazi rezvehutano rinoti raongorora vanhu mazana matanhatu nemakumi matanhatu nevashanu chetekuti vane chirwere ichi here kana kuti Havana munyika ine vanhu vanodarika mamiriyoni gumi nematanhatu. Nekuda kweizvi, VaMatara vati zvinonetsa kuti hurumende itore danho rine hudzamu isina humbowo hwakati tsvikiti hwekuti zvinhu zvakamira sei munyika pamusoro pechirwere ichi. Vaimbove gurukota rezvehutano uye vari munyori wezvehutano muMDC, Doctor Henry Madzorera, vanoti huwandu hwevanhu vaongororwa kusvika pari zvino hunoratidza kuti kuvharwa kwakaitwa nyika hakuna chakwabatsira. Mutauriri wesangano reCrisis in Zimbabwe Coalition, VaMarvelous Khumalo, vakurudzirawo mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, kuti vambomira kufamba-famba kwavari kuita. Asi VaMnangagwa vanoti vari pakati pahurongwa hwekutenderera nenyika yose vachiona mamiriro akaita zvinhu pamusoro pechirwere cheCovid-19 ichi uye kuona kuti veruzhinji vari kutevedzera here kurudziro yavo yekuti veruzhinji vagare kudzimba senzira yekuderedza kuapararira kwechirwere ichi. VaMnangagwa vakazivisa kutivachazoongorora pakupera kwemazuva makumi maviri nerimwe avakatara kuti veruzhinji vange vari kudzimba senzira yekuderedza mikana yekupararira kwechirwere ichi kuti zvinokodzera here kuti veruzhinji varambe vari mudzimba kana kuti kwete. Hatina kukwanisa kutaura negurukota rezvehutano, VaObediah Moyo, sezvo vanga vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. Asi munyori mubazi ravo, Doctor Agnes Mahomva, vaburitsa mashoko ekuti komiti yakaumbwa nemutungamiri wenyika kuti itungamire nyaya dzekurwisa chirwere che Coronavirus yeInter-Ministerial Taskforce on Covid-19 inotungamirwa nemumwe wevatevedzeri vemutungamiri wenyika, VaKembo Mohadi, yakabvumirana kuti patorwe matanho akasimba ekuti vanhu vazhinji munyika vaongororwe kuti havana chirwere cheCvoid-19 here. Gwaro raburitswa naDoctor Mahomva iri rinoti vanhu vese vanga vachienda kumabasa panguva iyo nyika yanga yakavharwa, kunyanya vashandi vehurumende, vachaongororwa kuti havana kutapukirwa nechirwere ichi here. Doctor Mahomva vati munhu wese anofungidzirwa kuti ane chirwere ichi anosungirwa kuongororwa, uye vose vari kupinda munyika vachibva kunyika dzine chirwere ichi pamwe nevane zvirwere zvedzihwa vanofanira kuongororwa zvakare. Doctor Mahomva vatiwo vanhu vakwegura vane makore makumi matanhatu zvichikwira vari muzvipatara vane zvirwere zvakaita se asthma, shuga, BP, nezvirwere zvemoyo vanofanirawo kuongororwa zvakare. Vati zvose izvi zvichaitwa kuti hurumende inyatsoziva kuti nyika yakamira papi chaizvo pachirwere cheCovid-19. Pari zvino, chirwere cheCovid-19, icho chakatangira kuChina, chinonzi nehurumende chauraya vanhu vatatu munyika, uye kubata vanhu gumi nevasere, ukuwo pasi rose, vanhu vanosvika mamiriyoni maviri vabatwa neCovid-19, uye vanhu vanodarika zviuru zana nemakumi maviri nezvonomwe, vafa nechirwere ichi pasi rose. No media source currently available

headline: Dhora reMunyika Rotanga Kudonha Zvakanyanya
text: Dhora remuZimbabwe riri kuramba richishaya simba zvakanyanya zvave kupa kuti mitengo yezvinhu irambe ichiita chamurambamhuru sezvakamboitika kumakore ekuma2007 na2008. Dhora remuAmerica riri kutengwa nemadhora makumi matatu nemaviri kusvika makumi mana. Zvekudya, mafuta ekufambisa dzimotokari nezvinhu zvakawanda zvave kudhura zvakanyanya zvekuti vamwe vave kuti danho rekushandisa dhora remunyika raramba kushanda. Vachitaura kuKuwadzana pahurongwa hwekuchengeta nzvimbo iyi muna Ndira, mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vakati vainge vodzora dhora remunyika sezvo pasina nyika ingararame isina mari yayo. Asi mutungamiri webato guru rinopikisa, VaNelson Chamisa, vakatiwo zvekuda kushandisa dhora remunyika haishande. Asi nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti vezvematongerwo enyika panyaya yemari handivo vanoudza musika wemari zvekuita. Mutungamiri wesangano reConfederation of Zimbabwe Retailers, VaDenford Mutashu, vatendawo kuti zvinhu zvave kutengeswa nemari yekunze. Mukuru weZimbabwe National Chamber of Commerce, VaChris Mugaga, vanotiwo panoda kutoisa musoro pamwe chete kuti dhora rishande zvakanaka. Asi Muzvinafundo Mugano vanoti hapana chembwa tenzi vararira mutakura nekuti kana iyo hurumende yave kuramba kutambira dhora remunyika. Munyori mukuru musangano reZCTU, VaJaphet Moyo, vatiwo kumushandi zvinhu hazvina kumira zvakanaka. Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi dzinoti Reserve Bank of Zimbabwe, RBZ, iri kupota ichidhindha mari izvo zvinogona kuti nyika irambe iri kumawere. Asi gavhuna weRBZ, Dr John Mangudya, vanoti aya manyepo. Zimbabwe yakatanga kushandisa mari dzekunze kusanganisira dhora rekuAmerica muna 2019 asi ikazoti yave kudzokera mukushandisa dhora remunyika chete gore rapera. No media source currently available

headline: ZIMTA Inoti Covid-19 Yava Kupararira Kubva Muzvikoro Ichienda Kumisha
text: Rimwe sangano rinomirira varairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers’ Association (ZIMTA) rinoti kunyange haro richirumbidza basa riri kuitwa nehurumende mukurwisa kupararira kwedenda reCovid-19 muzvikoro, zvikwanisiro zvishoma uye mari yezvikoro yekuti zvirwisane nedenda iri pamwe nekuchengetedza hutano hwevana vechikoro nevadzidzisi haisi kusvika kuzvikoro. Mutungamiri weZIMTA, VaRichard Gundani, vaudza Studio 7 kuti vana vechikoro vanofanirwa kupiwa zvikamu zvavo zvemushonga wenhomba uye zvikoro zvinofanirwa kupiwa zvikwanisiro zvose zvinodikanwa, vachiti chirwere ichi chavakupararira kubva muzvikoro chichiendeswa kumisha nevana vechikoro. VaGundani vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kushanda nesimba kuti panovhurwa zvikoro gore rinouya, vana vasazonzi vadzidze vari kudzimba dzavo, vachiti hurumende inogonawo kuchitanga kugadzirisa zvose zvinodiwa kana vana vechikoro vakazonzi vadzidze pamadandemutande vari kudzimba dzavo. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi rezvedzidzo, VaTaungana Ndoro, vauza Studio 7 kuti hurumende iri kuzvirova dundundu nekuti irikugona kurwisa denda reCovid-19 muzvikoro. No media source currently available

headline: Kudyiwa muma’pena’ inenge njuga: Ndiraya
text: CHIKWATA cheDynamos FC chakaburitswa mumutambo weChibuku Super Cup neFC Platinum zvichitevera kukundwa kwachakaitwa 4-2 kumapena apo mutambo wainge wapera uri mangange 0-0 nezuro. Aka kave kechipiri Dynamos ichiburitswa neFC Platinum padanho iri sezvo yakaburitswa zvekare mumutambo wegore radarika.   Achitaura zvichitevera kukundwa kwakaita chikwata chake, murairidzi weDeMbare, Tonderai Ndiraya anoti zvinovarwadza zvakanyanya.   “Zvinorwadza, ukatarisa basa rainge rwaitwa nevakomana uye matambiro avaita mumutambo uyu. “Zvinorwadza kuti mutambo uyu wakazosvika kumapena. Mapena anonetsa, anenge njuga. “Asi zvinowanikwa mumutambo. Tatamba zvakanaka mumamitsi 90. Zvinorwadza kukundwa mutambo nenzira iyi. Zvinowanikwa mumutambo, asi tingaitei?” anodaro Ndiraya.   Mune mumwe mutambo wakatambwa nezuro, Black Rhinos yakakunda Chicken Inn 11-10 kumapena mushure mekunge mutambo wavo wapera uri mangange 1-1, kuchitiwo Bulawayo Chiefs yakakunda Highlanders 1-0 mumutambo wakatambirwa kunhandare yeBabourfields.   Zvichitevera kupera kwemitambo yequarter-final, draw resemi-final rakabva raitwa iro rakaona FC Platinum ichipihwa Herentals kuchiti Black Rhinos ichasangana neBulawayo Chiefs.

headline: AFCON: ‘Tinosvika kure’
text: MUTUNGAMIRIRI wesangano reZimbabwe Football Association Zifa) – Felton Kamambo – anoti chikwata chemaWarriors chine vatambi vakawanda vepamusoro saka vanofanirwa kutamba zvinogutsa kudarika zvavaimboita kare mumutambo weAfrica Cup of Nations (AFCON) uyo uchatanga munguva pfupi iri kutevera.   Mutambo uyu uchatanga nemusi wa21 Chikumi apo MaWarriors achasangana nechikwata cheEgypt icho chichange chiri pamusha. Zvikwata zviviri izvi zviri muboka reGroup A pamwechete nezvimwe zvinoti Democratic Republic of Congo (DRC) neUganda.   Munhorowondo yenhabvu yemaWarriors achienda kuAFCON, chikwata ichi chaingokundirwa kumagroup-stages. Asi, Kamambo anoti boka rakaiswa maWarriors svondo radarika pamberi rakanaka saka chikwata chavo chiri kufanirwa kubata basa sebasa.   “Draw raive rakanakisa chaizvo. Chikwata chedu chiri kufanirwa kutamba zvakanakisa, zvepamusoro kudarika zvachakamboita kare.    Japhet Mparutsa   “Tine chikwata chakanakisa chaizvo chine vatambi vepamusoro vanogona kubata basa sebasa,” anodaro Kamambo.   Vatambi vepamusoro vari muchikwata chemaWarriors vanosanganisira kaputeni Knowledge Musona, Khama Billiat, Marvelous Nakamba, Tinotenda Kadewere naGeorge Chigova.   Japhet “ShortCat” Mparutsa – uyo aimbove mubati wepagedhi weDynamos, Black Rhinos nemaWarriors – anoti mukana mukuru uripo wekuti chikwata chenyika ichi chisvike kure asi hunge chatanga zvakanaka mumutambo wacho neEgypt. Anoti zvakakosha kuti maWarriors awane zvibodzwa pamutambo uyu.   “Kana tikakwanisa kuwana chibodzwa chimwechete kana zvitatu paEgypt, mutambo unenge wavhurika. Asi tikakundwa zvinogona kutiomera nekuti Congo chikwata chakasimba zvikuru,” anodaro ShortCat.   Anoti DRC ichange ine huturu hwekundwa kwayakaitwa nemaWarriors nguva yadarika mumutambo wekurwira tikiti rekuenda kuAFCON.   “Zvasiyana manje nepakurwira kuenda kuAFCON nekuti zvikwata zvese zvichange zviri kumakwishu aya zvichida kuhwina.   “Asi tinogona kupedza tiri pechipiri muboka redu, hunge tikatanga zvakanakisa pamutambo wekutanga uyo tichasangana neEgypt,” anodaro Mparutsa.   Shasha pakutsigira nhabvu – Chris “Romario” Musekiwa – anoti gore rino nderemaWarriors nekudaro anofanira kuita zvinorova kumutambo uyu.    Chris Musekiwa   Anoti pazvikwata zvese zvichasangana nemaWarriors, Egypt chete ndiyo yega ingatyise.   “Draw takariona, rakanakisa chaizvo uye takaritambira. Chikwata chedu chine mukana mukuru wekusvika kure mumutambo uyu.   “DRC ingatityise nekuti inenge ine huturu hwekuikunda kwatakaita pakurwira kuenda kumakwishu aya, asi hedu tinoziva kuti toipedzera.   “Chikuru chinongodiwa kuti tigadzirire zvakasimba kuenda kumutambo uyu chete nekutamba mitambo yehushamwari nezvikwata zvepamusoro,” anodaro.

headline: Bato reCCC Rinokurudzira Veruzhinji Kupfeka Nhumbi dzeYellow seMucherechedzo weKutsigira Nhengo Gumi neNhatu dziri muHusungwa
text: Bato rinopikisa reCitizens Coalition for Change rakurudzira neChishanu vana veZimbabwe kuti vapfeke nhumbi dzeruvara rwe yellow, senzira yekutsigira nhengo dzaro gumi nenhatu dziri muhusungwa mushure mekusungwa dzichipomerwa mhosva yekukonzera mhirizhonga. Nhengo idzi dzinonzi dzakakonzera mhirizhonga kuNyatsime kuChitungwiza zvichitevera kupondwa kwenhengo yeCCC, Muzvare Moreblessing Ali, avo vakazowanikwa mutumbi wavo wakachekwachekwa. Nhengo dzakasungwa dzinosanganisira mutevedzeri wasachigaro vebato uye vari mumiriri weZengeza West muparamende, VaJob Sikhala, pamwe nemumiriri weChitungwiza North, VaGodfrey Sithole. Mutevedzeri wemutauriri weCCC, VaGift Ostalos Siziba vanoti vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vabatane navo pakumira nenhengo dzavo gumi nenhatu idzi, idzo vanoti dziri kungoshungurudzwa sezvo dzakasungwa dzisina mhaka. VaSikhala naVaSithole vakanyimwa mukana wekubvisa mari yechibatiso nedare reHigh Court, mutongi wedare achiti anotyira kuti vakapiwa mukana, zvikuru VaSikhala, vanonopara dzimwe mhosva. VaSikhala ndivo gweta remhuri yaMuzvare Ali.

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kuumba Hwaro hweKubata Mari Dzinobva Kune Vari Kunze
text: Nhengo yeZanu PF, VaNick Mangwana, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kuumba hwaro hunoita kuti ikwanise kubata mari dzinobva kuzvizvarwa zvenyika zviri kunze kwenyika, kuburikidza nekuisa boka revari kunze kwenyika pasi pebazi rimwechete, kwete zviri kuitika pari zvino zvekuti mapazi anodarika mashanu anofunga kuti vari kunze vari pasi pawo. Kurudziro iyi inouya zvichitevera kurudziro yemutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, mukutanga kwesvondo rino vari kuEthiopia yekuti vana veZimbabwe vari kunze kwenyika vabatsire mukuvaka nyika kuburikidza nekutumira mari kumusha pamwe nekuita zvirongwa zvebudiriro. VaMugabe vakapa muenzaniso weEthiopia iyo vakati yakwanisa kuita zvivakwa zvakawanda pamwe nebudirio nekuda kwezvizvarwa zvayo zvakawanda zviri kunze kwenyika. VaMangwana vanotiwo kuti zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze zvikwanisewo kupiwa mikana yakaenzana nevari kumusha, zvinofanirwawo kubatirwa mitero inoenda muhomwe yehurumende, sezvinoitwa nevedzimwe nyika. Asi zvimwe zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zviri kunze kwenyika zvinoti zvinosvibiswa mwoyo nekuda kwekusamira zvakanaka kweupfumi hwenyika, zvematongerwo enyika pamwe nekusajekeswa kwemimwe mitemo yenyika. Nyanzvi mune zveupfumi vachitaura vakazvimirira, VaMasimba Kuchera, vanoti vamwe vanotumira mari kumusha havashandisi mabhanga zvakanyanya nekushaiwa chivimbo nawo. VaKuchera vanotiwo mari inobhadhariswa nemakambani anoshandiswa kutumira mari kumusha yakawanda zvikuru, izvo zvinozoita kuti vanhu vashandise dzimwe nzira dzakaita sekutumira mari nevatyairi vemabhazi nezvimwe zvakadaro. Zvizvarwa zvenyika zviri kunze zvinonzi gore rapera zvakatumira mari inosvika $840 million, iyo inonzi yakabatsira nyika zvakanyanya sezvo iri kunetsekana kuwana mari. No media source currently available

headline: Koshesai vatambi: Bunjira
