text: SHASHA yakambonetsa munhabvu ichitambira CAPS United nechikwata chenyika chemaWarriors – Alois ‘Gazza’ Bunjira – anoti zvakakosha zvikuru kuti nhorowondo yevatambi vakaita mukurumbira munhabvu ichengetedzwe zvakanaka uye pave nehomwe inovabatsira kutanga mabhizimisi apo vanenge vasendeka shangu dzavo dzemutambo uyu.   Gore rino, nyika yarasikirwa nenyanzvi dzakaita mukurumbira munhabvu dzakawanda dzinosanganisira David ‘Yogi’ Mandigora, Misheck ‘Scania’ Chidzambwa, Joe ‘Kode’ Mugabe, Ernest ‘Maphepa’ Sibanda naSimon Sachiti.   Muhurukuro neKwayedza, Gazza sezita raBunjira remadunhurirwa, anoti chekutanga chakakosha kuti pane nenhorowondo yevatambi vose vakatamba nhabvu kare.   Anoti nhorowondo iyi inofanirwa kuchengetedzwa kuitira kuti vechidiki vagokura vachiifundiswa vazive kwakatangira nhabvu yemuno uye vatambi vakaita mukurumbira.   “Zvinosuwisa zvikuru kuti iye zvino ukabvunza vechidiki vari kukura nezvenhorowondo yevatambi vekune dzimwe nyika vanokuudza kuti Pele ndiani uye akatanga kutamba bhora rinhi nezvose zvaakahwina paaitamba nhabvu. Asi ukavabvunza nezvenyanzvi dzakaita mukurumbira muno sanaMandigora vanogona kutadza kutoziva kuti Mandigora wacho ndiani.   “Saka zvakakosha kuti tichengetedze nhorowondo yevatambi vedu vose kusanganisira mavhidhiyo ponyorwa nemabhuku evatambi vedu nekwakabva nhabvu yedu, zvogara zvichirakidzwa munhu wese kuitira kuti tigokwanisa kuyemura kwatakabva nekuti vatambi ava vose vakaunza mufaro kwatiri kwenguva ndefu,” anodaro Bunjira.   Chechipiri, anodaro Bunjira, panofanirwa kuumbwa homwe inobatsira vatambi venhabvu vanenge vasendeka shangu dzavo dzemutambo uyu kuitira kuti vakwanise kutanga mabhindauko akasiyana-siyana anovararamisa.   Anoti kutengera munhu chikafu hakubatsire nekuti chikapera mangwana anodzoka futi achida kutengerwa chimwe.   “Tinoona kazhinji kana mutambi akangosendeka shangu dzake dzenhabvu anobva atokanganikwa kazhinji kacho zvekuti dzimwe dzenguva anozorangarirwa kana achinzi ave kurwara kana kuti asangana nedambudziko muhupenyu hwake.   Saka ngapaumbwe homwe yekuti mwedzi wega-wega anoda kukanda kana $0,50c anongokanda. Mari iyi isazove yekunzi totengera vanhu chikafu, kwete, asi ngaive yekutangisa mabhindauko vatambi vedu vowana zvekuita vari kudzimba dzavo.   “Vakaita mabhindauko hatizombonzwe zvichinzi nhingi arohwa nenhamo, kwete, nekuti ane zvaanenge achiita isuwo tichimutsigira pabasa rake,” anodaro.   Bunjira anoenderera mberi achiti, “Asi chinonetsa manje mafungiro edu atinoita ndiwo akashata nekuti tikaona yaimboive shasha ichitengesa mazai kana matomatisi totanga kumuseka tichiti ari kutambudzika asi isu tichienda muzvitoro zvikuru kunotenga mazai iwayo nematomatisi. Ko kutsigira hama yepedyo kuti asimukirewo pasina kutaura zvakawanda zvakaipei?”

headline: Juventus yodzora Morata
text: kuedza kudzora mutambi weChelsea – Alvaro Morata – zvichitevera kutatarika kwaaita mumwaka wake wekutanga kuStamford Bridge.   Chikwata ichi chiri kuda mutambi uyu nechikwereti mwaka unotevera nekudaro chiri kugadzirira kubhadhara mari inosvika 13 miriyoni paunzi uye chine chivimbo chekuzomutenga zvachose.   Mari inozodirwa mutambi uyu inozosvika ku43 miriyoni paunzi kana chikwata chekuTurin ichi chikada kuzomutenga zvachose mugore ra2019.   Alvaro anoda chaizvo kudzokera kuJuventus uko kwaakatambira kwemakore maviri asati aenda kuReal Madrid iyo yakambomudzora mugore ra2016.   Sekutara kweTuttosoprt, maBlues ari kunzi anoda kutenga Edinson Cavani kubva kuParis Saint-Germain sezvo chikwata chekuFrance ichi chichida kugadzirisa mapepa acho maringe nemashandisirwo emari apo chiri kurwisa nyaya dzeFinancial Fair Play.   Izvi ndizvo zvichavhurira Morata mukana wekudzokera kuJuventus, kozoti PSG neBayern zviri kudawo chizvarwa chekuSpain ichi.   Morata akatamba zvinonwisa mvura kuStamford Bridge izvo zvakamuona achinwisa katanhatu mumitambo minomwe.   Kubva ipapo, mutambi uyu akabva atanga kutatarika zvikuru sezvo akazonwisa kashanu chete kubva mumitambo 22 kuchikwata chaAntonio Conte. – SportsMail Football

headline: Zvizvarwa ZveZimbabwe Zviri Kunze Kwenyika Zvotumira Chikafu Kumusha
text: Apo pasi rose rakacherechedza zuva reWorld Food Day nezuro, zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda kunze kwenyika zvinoti zviri kushanda nesimba kuitira kuti zvibatsire vari kumusha nechikafu chiri kunetsa kuwana kuZimbabwe. Zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinogara nekushanda muBotswana nedzimwe nyika zviri kutenga chikafu pamwe nekutumira mari kumusha kuitira kuti hama neshamwari dziwane chikafu, sezvo zvinhu zvisina kumira zvakanaka munyika. VaCosta Zimhunga, avo vanotyaira mubhazi anofamba pakati peGaborone neKasane muBotswana, vanoti kukwira kwemitengo pamwe nekuoma kwezvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi, kuri kukonzera kuti vanhu vakawanda vashaye chikafu. Chimwe chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaTafadzwa Makamudze, vanoti kusamira zvakanaka kwezvinhu kwava kuita kuti vagare vakatumira chikafu kumusha. Mumwe mudzidzi paUniversity of Botswana, Muzvare Memory Musavengane, vanoti vari kubatanidza zvechikoro nekushanda kuitira kuti vakwanise kubatsira vabereki vavo kumusha. Chimwewo chizvarwa cheZimbabwe, VaRobson Muroiwa, vanoti nzara yapfunya chisero munyika inoda kuti munhu asunge dzichisimba pakuriritira mhuri yake. Mwedzi wakapera, sangano reWorld Food Program rakati vanhu vanodarika miriyoni imwe chete vakatarisana nedambudziko renzara muZimbabwe. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yozeya Mutemo Unobharisa Mazana Mashanu Kune Vanoputira Fodya Paruzhinji
text: Hurongwa hwehurumende hwekuda kudzika mutemo uchakonzera kuti vaputi vefodya vasabvumirwe kuputira paruzhinji hwakonzera mutauro kubva kune veruzhinji munyika. Hurumende ine hurongwa hwekuwunza bhiri kuparamende richange richisungira vaputi vefodya kuti vasaputire fodya pane veruzhinji. Pasi pebhiri iri, munhu anenge abatwa achiputa fodya paruzhinji achange achisungirwa kubhadhara mazana mashanu emadhora semari yefaindi kana kugara mujeri kwemwedzi mitanhatu. Vaputi vefodya vakaita saVaFibion Munhuwa vanogara mumusha weEpworth vanoti havasi kuzofa vakaregedza kuputa fodya kunyangwe mutemo uyu ukadzikwa vachiti vanonzwa parere moyo kana vachinge vaputa fodya. Asi VaNigel Gwekwerere vanoti kuputira fodya paruzhinji kunokanganisa hutano hwevasingapute zvikurusei kuvana nemadzimai akazvitakura nokudaro vanoti vanotambira nemawoko maviri hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu. Izvi zvatsinhirwa naVaMalvern Samhembere vanogara mumusha we Kuwadzana muno muHarare. VaSamhembere vanoti hapana chinovaka muviri chinowanikwa mufodya. Amai Gladys Runyowa vanogara mumusha we Greendale vanoti vanhu vasingapute fodya vazhinji vanobata zvirwere zvakanyanya kudarika vanhu vacho vanenge vachiputa fodya. Asi mugari wekubudiriro, VaClayton Ndlela vati zviri kutaurwa nehurumende hazvina musoro sezvo Zimbabwe iri imwe yedzimwe nyika dzinorima fodya yakawanda pasi rose. VaNdlela vanoti Zimbabwe haifanire kutomborima fodya zvachose kana vasingade kuti fodya iputwe. Zvichakadai, VaAlbert Chidhakwa vanoti faindi iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa kana pakatariswa mari dzemihoro dziri kutambirwa nevanhu vazhinji munyika. Zvataurwa nava chidhakwa zvatsinhirwa naVaTichaona Murandu avo vanogara mumusha weHatcliffe muHarare. VaMurandu vanoti zviri kurongwa nehurumende izvi kuita kwehurumende yapererwa irikuedza kutorera veruzhinji twumari twushoma twunenge twuri muhomwe dzavo. Vanoti kunyangwe hazvo vari munhu asingapute fodya, mari iri kutaurwa nehurumende yakawandisa zvikuru. Zvichakadai, muzvare Faith Musarurwa avo vakakwikwidza musarudzo dzeparamende ku muzarabani vakamirira MDC-T vanoti vari kutambira hurongwa hwehurumende uhwu asi hurumende inofanira kutanga yatara nzvimbo dzinobvumidzwa kuti vanoputa vaputire kwete kungodzika mutemo isati yaongorora zvinhu zvakadai. Makambani anogadzira fodya akatonyorawo pazvipepa zvinenge zvine fodya kuti fodya inogona kukanganisa hutano. Dzimwe nyika dzakawanda pasi rose kusanganisa america hadichabvumidze kuti fodya iputirwe pose-pose. Mukuru anowona nezvezvinodhaka mubazi rezvehutano, amai Dorcas Sithole vakaudza bepanhau reSunday Mail kuti hurumende iri kuedza kudzivirira veruzhinji kuti vasabatwe nezvirwere zvinokonzereswa nefodya vachiti vanhu vakawanda vari kubatwa nezvirwere zvegomarara remumapapu. Amai Sithole vanotiwo bazi ravo rakamirira kupasiswa kwebhiri re national alcohol control policy kuti hurongwa uhwu hutange kushanda. Vanotiwo kudhakwa nekuputa zvakanyanyisa ichange iri mhosva pasi pemutemo uyu kana uchinge wapasiswa. Mutemo uyu uchange uchipawo huwandu hwedoro richabvumidzwa kutengeserwa munhu mumabhawa. Amai Sithole vanotiwo Zimbabwe inofanirwa kuita zvinhu zvakaringana nezvakatarwa nesangano re World Health Organization maererano nekuputwa kwefodya zvichitevera kusaina kwakaitwa ne Zimbabwe muna kurume wegore rino kuve nhengo yebazi re who rinowona nezvekuputwa kwefodya zvine mwero. WHO inoti vanhu mamiriyoni matanhatu vanofa pagore nenyaya yezvirwere zvakanangana nekuputa fodya. No media source currently available

headline: Pasuwa Onyorerana Chibvumirano neZIFA
text: Zimbabwe Footballers Association kana kuti Zifa inonzi yapa murairidzi wemaWarriors Callisto Pasuwa chibvumirano chekuti ashande kwemakore matatu achirairidza chikwata ichi. Pasuwa audza Studio 7 kuti achiri kuongorora chibvumirano ichi. Zvichakadaro, chikwata cheZimbabwe chiri kuenderera mberi negadziriro yacho yemakwikwi e Caf African Nations Championship (Chan) ari kutambirwa kurwanda mwedzi unouya kutanga musi wa16 kusvika musi wa 17 Kukadzi. Zimbabwe iri muGroup D pamwe neZambia, Rwanda neUganda.

headline: Masangano eSADC neAfrican Union Anoyambirwa Pamusoro Pezvirikuitika muSouth Africa
text: Sangano remakanzuru emakereke echi Kristu munyika dziri kuchamhembe kwe Africa, reFellowship of Christian Councils in Southern Africa, kana kuti FOCCISA, rayambira masangano eSADC neAfrican Union kuti asaita zvekutamba nezvirikuitika muSouth Africa asi kuti ashande nesimba kudzivirira zviri kuitika izvi kuti zvisaramba zvichiitika. FOCCISA yati panofanirwa kuve negwara rekuti zvisarambe zvichiitika sezvo kasiri kekutanga vanhu vemu South Africa vachiita mhirizhonga vachiuraya vekunedzimwe nyika. FOCCISA isangano remakanzuru emakereke echiKristu emunyika dzese dziri kuchamhembe kweAfrica. Sangano iri ririkuti vanhu vemunyika dzakasiyana siyana vanoenda kwese kwavanoona kuti vangawana chekuita kuti variritire mhuri dzavo. Sachigaro weFOCCISA, Reverend Doctor Kenneth Mtata, vaudza Studio 7 kuti sangano ravo raudza SADC neAfrican Union kuti dzibatsire nyika dzinevanhu vazhinji vanobuda madziri vachienda kunotsvaka mararamiro kunedzimwe nyika, vachitizve nyika idzi dzinogona kuve nedambudziko rekusagadzikana mune zvematongerwo enyika kana munyaya dzezvehupfumi hwenyika naizvozvo dzinofanirwa kubatsirwa kuti zvinhu zviite zvakanaka mukati madzo. No media source currently available

headline: ‘Covid-19 yaondonga mutambo wenetball’
text: MUTAMBI wenetball wechikwata chenyika chemaGems  Felistas Kwangwa — uyo anove kaputeni — anoti coronavirus yakamisa zvinhu zvakawanda muhupenyu hwake sezvo mutambo uyu uriwo unomuraramisa.   Kwangwa vazhinji vanomuziva ari mumwe wevatambi akatamba netball yainwisa mvura apo maGems akaenda kunokwikwidza kumakwikwi eVitality World Cup Liverpool 2019.   Achidzoka kubva kumutambo uyu, akasvika achitsiva Perpetual Siyachitema ndokugadzwa kuve kaputeni wechikwata ichi.   Kwangwa anoti kusawana mukana wekutamba mutambo uyu unomuraramisa iye pamwe nevatambi vakasiyana, kuri kurwadza uye kudzosera hupenyu hwavo kumashure.   “Zvinhu hazvina hazvo kumira zvakanaka, hatina kumbozvifungidzira kuti coronavirus ndizvo zvaichaita izvi.   Hatina kukanganiswa isu tega, asi pasi rese riri kuchema nechirwere ichi,” anodaro.   Mwedzi uno chikwata chemaGems chaifanirwa kunge chaenda kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo kunyika yeRepublic of Wales asi wakamiswa nekuda kweCovid-19.   “Mwedzi uno tange tichifanirwa kunge taenda kuWales kunokwikwidza kune mumwe mutambo asi zvese zvakaenda mudondo.   Tave kungomirira pachapera coronavirus tozoona kuti tozvifambisa sei.   “Asi iye zvino tiri kuita gadziriro dzedu tiri kudzimba sezvo takangonzi tigare takagadzirira nehutungamiri hwedu nekuti tinogona kunotamba bhora kana ‘lockdown’ ikapera. Ndofunga pane zviri kurongwa,” anodaro Kwangwa.   Parizvino Kwangwa ari kugara kuZvishavane uko anoshanda.   “Ndiri kuZvishavane izvezvi, ndine vamwe vatambi vemaGems vatatu saka tinoita tichimbobatana tichiita gadziriro dzedu pamwechete.   “Vamwe vari kunzvimbo dzakasiyana munyika tinokurukura paWhatsApp tichitumirana mavhidhiyo uye tichirakidzana kugadzirira kwatinenge tichiita,” anodaro Kwangwa.

headline: Paramende Inozeya Bhiri reMitemo yeSarudzo
text: Dare reNational Assembly razeya mutemo wesarudzo weElectoral Amendment Bill uye chibvumirano chemapato ezvematongerwo enyika chekuita sarudzo dzakachena dzisina mhirizhonga, cheElectoral Code of Conduct for Political Parties and Candidates and Other Stakeholders chapinzwawo mubhiri iri kuti chive mumutemo wesarudzo. Bhiri iri rakanangana nekuvanduza mitemo yesarudzo kuti nyika ikwanise kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Zvimwe zviri kudiwa nemapato anopikisa kuti mapato aya avewo nechekuita pamwe nekuongorora kudhindwa kwemagwaro ekuvhotesa kana kuti maballot papers. Mapato aya anodawo kuti mitemo yesarudzo usungire mapato kuti ape mukana wakaenzana kuvanhukadzi nevanhurume pazvinzvimbo zvese zvino kwikwidzwa musarudzo. Chibvumirano chemapato chekuita sarudzo dzakachena icho chapinzwa mumitemo yesarudzo, chinorambidza nyaya dzemhirizhonga uye chinosungira kuti vemapato, vemasangano anoshanda akazvimirira, vanokwikwidza musarudzo vapanane mukana pamwe nekuregawo vamwe vachitaura pfungwa dzavo pamwe nekupinda mumisangano pamadiro. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungurirawo kuti vanhu vapihwe mukana wekuzvishambadza uye chinoti vaye vachazenge vachibvisa kana kubvarurwa zvinyorwa zvevamwe kana kuti maposters, varangwe nemutemo. Chibvumirano ichi chinorambidzawo kutenga vavhoti kana kutyityidzira vanhu kuti vavhotere bato rinenge richida munhu. Chinorambidzawo vemapato kuti vataure zvinenge zvabuda musarudzo zvisati zvaziviswa neZimbabwe Electoral Commission. Mukuru wesangano rePlatform for Youth Development, VaClaris Madhuku, vati danho rekuisa chibvumirano chemapato mumutemo wesarudzo chakanaka chose. VaMadhuku vati sezvo wave mutemo vanenge vautyora vacharangwa. Vati kana mutemo mutsva wesarudzo ukatevedzwa, nyika inogona kuita sarudzo dzakachena. Chibvumirano ichi chinosungirawo vemapato ezvematongerwe enyika kurega vatapi venhau vachipinda mumisangano yawo yekutsvaga rutsigiro pamwe nekuvachengetedza. Mukuru weMedia Institute of Southern Africa – Zimbabwe, VaTabani Moyo, vati vanofara nenyaya yekuti vatapi venhau vachengetedzwe pavenenge vachiita basa ravo. VaMoyo vati vatapi venhau vanogara vachishungurudzwa nemapato ezvematongerwo enyika zvikuru munguva yesarudzo uye mutemo unofanira kubuda nezvirango zvakaomarara kune vanoshungurudza vatapi venhau. Dare richiri kuzeya bhiri iri uye rinotarisirwa kuripasisa chero nguva. No media source currently available

headline: Chenjerai Hove Anorangarirwa Zvine Mutsindo muHarare
text: Vanyori, vana nyanduri, vaimbi pamwe nehama neshamwari dzemushakabvu, VaChenjeral Hove, kubva mativi mana enyika, dzakasangana muHarare nemusi weMugovera manheru dzichipemberera hupenyu hwavo pamwe nemabasa avo munyaya dzekunyora mabhuku nenhetembo. Paive nemufaro mukuru kuQueensade Sports Club uye mhuri yaVaHove inoti yakafara zvikuru kuti shamwari dzavo pamwe nevamwe vavaishanda navo vakaronga mutambo wakadai uyo vakati wakabudirira zvikuru. Mudzimai wamuchakabvu, Amai Tekla Hove, vakatsanangura murume wavo semunhu aive nerudo nemhuri nebasa rake uye vanoti vanotenda chose kuti vakadzisisa vana vavo uye vanokwanisa kurarama pasina dambudziko kunyange baba vavo vasisipo Amai Hove vakati chimwe chinonyanyovafadza rudo rwakaratidzwa neshamwari dzemurume wavo nevamwe vavaishanda navo uye vati izvi zvinoratidza kuti vakasiya vadyara rudo. Mmwe mwana VaHove, Tanatswa, akaudza Studio7 kuti baba vake munhu aive nerudo uye izvi zvakaratidzwa nekuuya nehuwandu kwakaita vanhu, vanyori, shamwari dzavo, vaimbi nevanhuwo zvavo kumutambo wekupemberera hupenyu hwavo nekuvarangarira. Mumwe mwana wavo, Tafadzwa, akatiwo mafariro aita vanhu neMugovera ndozvaigara vachiita nebaba vavo uye zvinorwadzo kuti havasisipo. Mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Human Rights Association, VaOkay Machisa, avo vakaridzawo mimhanzi pamutambo wekurangarira VaHove, vanoti vakaona zvakakodzero kunge varipowo sezvo VaHove vaive mumwe wevanhu vakavamba sangano rinorwira kodzero dzevanhu reZimRights. VaMichael Mabwe, avo vanoitawo nhetembo dzekukurudziro kodzero dzevanhu, vanoti vanorangarira VaHove nemabasa avo uye mabasa avo ndivo akaitawo kuti vapinde mumabasa ekusimudzira kodzero dzevanhu. Munyori wesangao rinomirira vanyori reZimbabwe Writers Association, Memory Chirere, akati mutambo wekurangarira VaHove wakafamba zvakanaka uye zvinoratidza kufamba kwavaiita nevamwe vavo. Vamwe vanyori, vaimbi nananyanduri vakapinda mumutambo weMugovera vanosanganisira, David Mungoshi, Conte Mhlanga, Shimmer Chinodya, Virginia Phiri, Hope Masike nevamwe. VaHove vaive nemukurumbira uye vakahwina mibairo yakwanda yekunyora mabhuku. Mibayiro iyi inosanganisira we Noma Aaward for Publishing in Africa. Vakashayikira kuNorway munaChinkunguru uko vange vave kugara muhupoteri. Asi vakazochengetwa kumusha kwavo kuGokwe. No media source currently available

headline: VaMnangagwa Vanorumbidza Major General Mugoba Vachivaviga kuHeroes Acre
text: Mutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, vaviga gamba renyika, Major General Trust Mugoba, vachiti kushaya kwavo, pamwe nekushaya kwevaimbove mutungamiri wenyika, VaRobert Mugabe, kwasiya nyika yarasikirwa zvikuru. Vachitaura pakuradzikwa kwaVaMugoba, VaMnangagwa vati nyika yakarasikirwa zvikuru svondo rapfuura apo pakashaya VaMugabe naVaMugoba musi mumwe chete. Vati ndufu dzemagamba maviri aya dzinoita kuti veruzhinji varangarire hondo yerusununguko. Vati VaMugoba munhu akakura muchiuto kubvira panguva yehondo uyewo zvichitevera rusununguko muna 1980, vakati izvi ndizvo zvaita kuti varadzikwe paHeroes Acre. VaMnangagwa vati VaMugoba, avo vashaya vaine chigaro chepamusoro muchiuto kuAfrican Union kuEthopia, munhu aiziva kukosha kwerunyararo muAfrica uye zvakakosha kuti runyararo urwu ruchengetedzwe. Vatendawo mauto nekuchentegedza runyararo munyika vachiti hurumende yavo haisi kuzorega vanhu vachiita zvavanoda kukanganisa runyararo nerusununguko hwakaunzwa nevanhu vakaita semushakabvu. VaMnangagwa vati mutemo uchashandisa pane avo vanoda kukanganisa ruranyararo munyika. Vati vanoziva kutambura kuri munyika nekuda kwezvirango zvakatemerwa nyika pamwe nezvirongwa zvekuvandudza uye vari kutora matanho ekugadzirisa izvi. Mutevedzeri wemukuru wedare reSeneti, Retired Major General Mike Nyambuya, avo vakashanda nemushakabvu vati VaMugoba munhu aiziva nekuita basa rake nemazvo. VaMugoba vakashaya vave nechinzvimbo chepamusoro mumauto eAfrica National Union kuEthopia. Vange vave nemakore makumi matanhatu ekuberekwa. No media source currently available

headline: VanaChiremba Vanoti Kuramwa Mabasa Kuri Kuendera Mberi
text: Mubati wehomwe musangano reZimbabwe Hospital Doctors Association Doctor Prince Butau vanoti kuramwa mabasa kwavanachiremba kuchiri kuenderera mberi kunyangwe vari kutarisirwa kuita musangano mangwana kuti votora danho ripi. VaButau vanoti vanachiremba havachina chivimbo nezvinovimbiswa nehurumende zvikuru kana pasina chanyoreranwa pasi. Vati chakachenjedza ndechakatanga sezvo muna 2014 vakambovimbiswa pakashaya chakazobuda. Bepanhau reSunday Mail range raburitsa mashoko ekuti kuramwa mabasa kwapera sezvo hurumende yagadzirisa zvimwe zvichemo zvavanachiremba. Zvichemo izvi zvinosanganisa kushaikwa kwemari muzvipatara uye vanachiremba vanoti vanoda kutambiriswa mari yekuAmerica sezvo mitengo yezvinhu iri kuramba ichiita chamurambamhuru. Hatina kukwanisa kubata gurukota rezvehutano VaObidiah Moyo sezvo vange vasiri kudaira nharembozha yavo. No media source currently available

headline: Hurumende Yokurudzirwa Kushanda neMasangano eVashandi muKushambadza Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Hurumende iri kukurudzirwa kuti ishande nemasangano anomirira vashandi mukushambadza kwairi kuita nhomba inodzivirira Covid-19, kuitira kuti chirongwa chekubaya nhomba ichi chibudirire. Kurudziro iyi inobva kumukuru wesangano reCommunity Workin Gropu on Health, VaIta Rusike, uye inouya panguva iyo vanhu vari kuzvipira kubaiwa nhombaye Sinopharm iripo iye zvino vari kuramba vari vashoma. Bazi rezvehutano rakazivisa kuti vanhu zana negumi nevasere kana kuti 118, ndivo chete vakabaiwa nhomba munyika yose nemusi weChina, izvo zvakasvitsa huwandu hwevanhu vabayiwa nhomba iyi munyika yose pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine gumi nevapfumbamwe, kana kuti 36 019. VaRusike vanoti kana pakasatorwa matanho akasimba nekukasika pakushambadzwa kwenhomba iyi, chirongwa chePhase 2 chichangotanga ichi chinogona kungofanana nechePhase 1, icho chisina kuwana vanhu vakawanda. Asi mukuru ari kutungamira hurongwa hwekurwisana neCovid-19, Dr. Agnes Mahomva, vanoti kubva pakutanga, hurumende yanga ichingoshanda nemapoka ose muhurongwa uhwu saka nekudaro hapana vari kusiiwa kunze. Dr. mahomva vari kukurudzira veruzhinji kuti vatambire chirongwa ichi sechavo, vachitri hurumende iri kuita payo saka zvasarira veruzhinji kuti vapindewo mazviri. Zvichakadaro, hurumende yakazivisawo nemusi weChina kuti vanhu vatatu vakafa nechirwere cheCovid-19, vamwe makumi matatu nevatanhatu vakawanikwa vaine chirwere ichi. Izvi zvakasiya huwandu hwevanhu vabatwa nechirwere ichi kubva zvachatanga hwasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitanhatu zvine mazana matatu nemakumi manomwe nevanomwe, kana kuti 36 377. Huwandu hwevanhu vafa hwakasvikawo pachiuru nemazana mana ane makumi mapfumbamwe nevaviri, kana kuti 1 492. Vanhu vapona kubva kuchirwere ichi vakasvika pazviuru makumi matatu nezvitatu zvine mazana mapfumbamwe nemakumi manomwe nevaviri, kana kuti 33 972. No media source currently available No media source currently available

headline: Zvicherwa neSarudzo Zvinokurukurwa muWashington paHurukuro dzeGlobal Press Institute
text: Sangano reGlobal Press nemusi weChina muWashington D.C., rakakokera hurukuro dzakanangana neZimbabwe munyaya dzekucherwa zviri kunze kwemutemo kwezviwanikwa nemakorokoza, pamwe nesarudzo, idzo dziri kutarisirwa kuitwa munyika gore rino. Hurukuro idzi, idzo dzaive pasi pechirongwa cheGlobal Press Influencer Series, dzakaitirwa paNewseum, pasi pedingindira rekuti “Zimbabweans Take Action”, kana kuti “Vana veZimbabwe Torai Matanho”, uye dzaitsigirwa nemasangano anosanganisira reNewseum Institute, neMetropolitan Group. Vakataura pamusangano uyu vanosanganisira zvizvarwa zveZimbabwe zvinoti mukuru wesangano reZimbabwe Diaspora for Democracy Inc., VaCharles Mutama, Muzvare Wadzanayi Mhute veNew York Times, Muzvare Linda Mujuru veGlobal Press Journal, naMuzvare Cristina Maria Villegas, vanove mukuru anoona nezvezvicherwa musangano rakazvimirira rePACT. Muzvare Villegas vakati munyika dzese dzavakafamba pasi rose, Zimbabwe ndiyo ine zvicherwa zvakawanda asi zvisina anochengetedza nenzira dzingaite kuti zvibatsire veruzhinji. Panyaya yesarudzo, vatauri vose ava vakawirirana kuti mutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa vanogona kukunda musarudzo idzi, vachiti dzichabiridzirwa pachishandiswa mauto. Vatauri ava vakatiwo kunyangwe mapato anopikisa akakunda, havaoni achipiwa mukana wekutonga. Muzvare Mujuru vakati vanoona sekunge VaMnangagwa vachakunda musarudzo, sezvo pasina vanopikisa vakasimba, uye pachiratidza sepasina gwara chairo mumapato anopikisa. No media source currently available

headline: Chabvondoka kuNash Stella Netball
text: zvenetball zvemuzvikoro svondo rinotevera zvichatatsurana mumakwishu eNash Stella Netball 17 and Under Tournament ayo achaitirwa pachikoro chePamushana High School, kuMasvingo.Mutambo uyu uchatanga svondo rinotevera musi weChitatu uchizotarisirwa kuzopera neChishanu.   Mutungamiriri wesangano reNational Association of School Heads (NASH), Johnson Madhuku uyo anove zvakare mukuru wechikoro chePamushana anoti mutambo wegore rino uchanakidza kukunda ngoma kurira sezvo chikwata chavo chine huturu hwekukundwa kwachakaitwa gore radarika apo chakatorerwa mukombe uyo wachainge chine makore akawanda chichirambira nawo. “Gore rino Pamushana tine huturu hukuru nekutorerwa kwatakaitwa mukombe wedu gore radarika. Saka tiri kuvimbisa hondo yega-yega kune zvimwe zvikwata, zvichaonerera gore rino mirai muone.   “Tiri pamusha saka ticharwa semvumba kuti mukombe urambe unesu, usare mupurovhinzi yedu,” anodaro Madhuku.   Zvakadaro, NASH ichashandisa mutambo uyu kusarudza vatambi vachazonomirira nyika kumitambo yeConfederation of School Sports Association of Southern Africa (COSSASA).  “Semakore ese, mutambo uyu ndiwo watinoshandisa kusarudza chikwata chedu chatichazotumira kunokwikwidza kuCOSSASA.   |Saka zvikwata zvese ngazviuye zvitambe netball “Kana uchida kuzotambira nyika mumutambo wenetball unototangira mumitambo iyi ndiko kwatinosarudza vatambi votanga kubikwa kusvika vapinda muchikwata chevakuru. Vamwe vacho vakatotanga kutambira zvikwata zvevakuru vachiri vadiki saka ngavashandise mukana uyu,” anodaro Madhuku.   Farayi Garayi wekambani yeTanganda Tea — iyo iri kukotsvera makwikwi aya — anoti vakazvipira kusimudzira vanasikana vane zvipo mumutambo wenetball.   “Isu neNASH tiri bhande nebhurugwa uye ticharamba tichishanda nesimba tichisimudzira mutambo uyu,” anodaro Garayi.

headline: Hurumende Inoti Zvikoro Zvichavhurwa Mwedzi Uno, Varairidzi Vachiti Zvikoro Hazvina Gadziriro Yakakwana
text: Hurumende yakazivisa neChipiri kuti zvikoro zvave kuzovhurwa muzvikamu zviviri, chikamu chekutanga musiwa 15 Kurume kuchiti chikamu chepiri chiri musi wa 22 Kurume, unove mwedzi uno. Vachitaura mushure memusangano wedare remakurukota, gurukota rezvekuburitswa kwemashoko, Amai Monica Mutsvangwa, vakati vana vari kuita zvidzidzo zvinonyorwa bvunzo gore rino zveGrade 7, Form 4 neForm 6, ndivo vachatanga kuvhura musi wa 15. Vakatiwo varairidzi vari kudzidzisa zvidzidzo zviri muchikamu chekutanga vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 10 mwedzi uno. Amai Mutsvangwa vakati vamwe vana vese vachange vachizovhura musi wa 22 Kurume, uye varairidzi vavo vanofanirwa kunge vave kumabasa avo musi wa 17. Vakati muzvikoro munenge musina mukana wekuti vana vasiye mikaha pakati pavo, vana vachapana mukana wekudzidza nguva dzakasiyanasiyana. Asi vakafannobata chigaro chemunyori mukuru werimwe sangano revarairidzi, reZimbabwe Teachers Association, ZIMTA, VaGoodwell Taderera, vanoti hurumende inofanirwa kutanga yazadzisa matanho anokurudzirwa neWorld Health Organization pamwe nebazi rezvehutano isati yafunga zvekuvhura zvikoro. VaTaderera vanoti sesangano revashandi vanoti varairidzi vanofanirwawo zvakare kupiwa mihoro inovaita kuti vagare pamabasa, kwete zvekuti mudzidzisi anofunga zvekusiya basa ombonokorokoza. No media source currently available Asi mutauriri webazi redzidzo yepasi, VaTaungana Ndoro vakaudza Studio 7 neMuvhuro kuti bazi ravo rakagadzirira kuvhurwa kwezvikoro, uye svondo rapera vakuru vakuru vebazi ravo kusanganisira negurukota redzidzo yepasi VaCain Mathema vaishanyira zvikoro vachiona kuti zvakagadzirira zvakadii kudzivirira kupararira kweCovid-19. Vanoti zvikoro zvavakashanyira zvinosanganisira zvehurumende, zvine vana vanodzidza vachigarapo kana kuti boarding, izvo zvakamboita dambudziko reCovid-19 zvakanyanya, pamwewo nezvakazvimirira. VaNdoro vakati bazi ravo rakagudzikana nezvavakaona muzvikoro. No media source currently available

headline: Vamwe Vatungamiri veMapato Anopikisa Vokurudzira Vanhu Kuti Vabayiwe Nhomba yeCovid-19
text: Mutungamiri webato rinopikisa, reLabour, Economists and Democrats (LEAD), Muzvare Linda Masarira, vanoti vari kukurudzira vana veZimbabwe kuti vasatarisa denda reCovid-19 sedambudziko renyika yeZimbabwe chete izvo zvinozoita kuti varitarise neziso rezvematongerwo enyika. Muzvare Masararira, avo vakave mumwe wevatungamiri vemapato anopikisa vakabatana nemutungamiri wenyika, VaEmmerson Mnangagwa, pakuparurwa kwechikamu chechipiri chekubaiwa kwenhomba yeSinopharm, yekudzivirira Covid-19 kuVictoria Falls nezuro, vanotiwo kunyange hazvo vana veZimbabwe vaine kodzero yekusarudza chakavanakira, zvakakoshawo kuti vasarudze kuzvidzvirira kubva kuchirwere ichi kuburikidza nekubaiwa nhomba iyi. Mutungamiri weMDC-T, VaDouglas Mwonzora, ndemumwe wevatungamiri vanopikisa vakavewo pachiitiko ichi. VaMnangagwa vakatora mukana uyu kubaiwawo nhomba yavo yekutanga, pamwechete negurukota rezvekudzviririrwa kwenyika, Amai Oppah Muchinguri-Kashiri, naMuzvare Masarira. VaMwonzora vakabaiwawo nhomba yavo yepiri kuWilkins muHarare nezuro wakare. No media source currently available

headline: Vashandi veHurumende Vakawanda Voronga Kuramwa Mabasa Svondo Rinouya
text: Zvinhu munyika zvaita manyama amire nerongo sezvo vashandi vehurumende nemakambani ari pasi payo, kana kuti ma parastatals, vari kuramwa mabasa pari zvino, vamwe vacho vachitiwo vachatanga kukanda mapadza pasi svondo rinouya. Masangano azivisa kuti ari kukanda mapadza pasi anosanganisira evarairidzi, vana mukoti, vanachiremba vanodzidzisa kuzvikoro zvepamusoro soro, vashandi veZESA, ZIMRA nemamwe mapazi. Vashandi ava vanoti mari dzavari kutambira hadzichatenge chinhu, izvo zvava kupa kuti varamwe mabasa. Makurukota emakambani ehurumende ose audza Studio 7 kuti itaura negurukota rezvemari, VaMthuli Ncube, avo vange vari kuMozambique kumusangano weUS Africa Summit nemutungamiri wenyika VaEmmerson Mnangagwa. Kunze kwevanoshanda muhurumende, vashandi vemumabhanga vari kutiwo vave kuda kutanga kuramwa mabasa sezvo mari dzave shoma. Kunze kwekudhura kwezvekudya, vamwe vave kubhadharisa mari yedzimba nemadhora ekuAmerica. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi uye vachidzidzisa paNelson Mandela Metropolitan University, Muzvinafundo Gift Mugano, vanoti mari iri kutambirwa nemushandi haikwani zvachose. VaMugano vanoti mushandi wepasi anotoda mari inosvika madhora mazana mapfumbamwe emaRTGS pamwedzi kwete mazana matatu emaRTGS avari kupihwa pari zvino. No media source currently available

headline: Zvinhu Zvoramba Zvichidhura Kunyangwe Hurumende Yakabvumidza Kutengwa kweZvimwe kuSouth Africa neDzimwe Nyika
text: Kunyangwe hazvo hurumende yakabvumidza vanhu kuti vatenge zvinhu kubva kuSouth Africa, Botswana, Mozambique, Zambia nedzimwe nyika ichiti zvichapa kuti mitengo yezvinhu munyika iderere, zvinhu zvinenge zvave kutowedzera mitengo zvimwe nezvikamu mazana mashanu kubva muzana zvapa kuti vanhu vaomerwe nehupenyu zvakanyanya. Sangano reZCTU rinoti kuti zvinhu zvinakire vashandi vave kutoda kuwedzerwa mari inodarika zvikamu mazana matanhatu kubva muzana. Zvinhu zvekudya, michovha, mari dzechikoro dzevana nezvimwe zvawedzerwa mitengo zvakanyanya. Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehupfumi Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze vanotungamira sangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe vanoti chiri kupa kuti zvinhu zvidhure inyaya yekuti vanotenga zvinhu kunze vanotenga mari pamukoto vozodhurisa. Mutemo wekurambidza kutengwa kwezvinhu kunze wakambenge wadzikwa muna 2016 senzira yekusimudzira maindustry munyika. Asi huruemnde gore rapera yakazoti yave kutendera kuti zvimwe zvinhu zvitengwe kunze sezvo yaipomera vemabhizimisi mhosva yekudhurisa zvinhu. No media source currently available

headline: Chirwere cheCovid-19 Chopararira Zvikuru kuMaruwa
text: Nyanzvi munyaya dzezvehutano uye vakambove gurukota rezvehutano muhurumende yemubatanidzwa, Dr Henry Madzorera, vanoti vana vechikoro vari kudzoka kumusha mushure mekuvharwa kwezvikoro ndivo vamwe vari kubatsira kuparardzira chirwere ichi kumaruwa sezvo chirwere ichi chave kunetsa muzvikoro. Mutauriri webazi rezvehutano, VaDonald Mujiri, vakaudza Studio 7 pakupera kwesvondo kuti bazi ravo riri kurwadziwa zvakanyanya nekufa kuri kuramba kuchiita vanhu munyika zvichikonzerwa neCovid-19. Dr Madzorera vanoti hurumende iri kuedza kudzikisa huwandu hwevanhu vari kubatwa nechirwere ichi asi vachiti vanhu kumaruwa vanofanirwa kupihwa ruzivo rwakawanda pamusoro pechirwere ichi sezvo vaimbofunga kuti ichi chirwere chevanhu vemumadhorobha chete. No media source currently available

headline: Covid-19 yanyuka muzvikwata zvePSL
text: PREMIER Soccer League yazivisa kuti Covid-19 yanyuka muzvimwe zvikwata zvayo.   Muchinyorwa chabva kumutauriri wePSL, Kudzai Bare, anoti vagashira mashoko anoti chirwere ichi chanyuka muzvikwata zvakasiyana naizvozvo vari kushanda nemachiremba kuti vagodzivirira kupararira kwacho.   “Tagashira mashoko anoti denda reCovid-19 ranyuka muzvikwata zvedu.   “Kutaura kuno tiri kushanda nenyanzvi dzezveutano nekomiti PSL Sport Medicine nemamwe mapoka kuedza kuona kuti tadzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri.   “Tinokurudzira zvikwata zvose kuti zvitevedzere matanho ose ane chekuita nekudzivirira kupararira kwedenda iri,” anodaro Bare.   Zvakawanda zviri kutevera.

headline: Vanhu Voita Pfungwa Dzinopesana paRwendo rwaVaMnangagwa kuSouth Africa
text: Dzimwe nyanzvi munyaya dzehupfumi pamwe nedzematongerwo enyika dzinoti rwendo rwava Emerson Mnangagwa kuSouth Africa haruna zvarunochinja pamamiriro akaita zvinhu munyaya dzehupfumi. Dzimwe nyanzvi dzinotiwo VaMnangagwa hapana chavangachinja nekuti vange vari nhengo yehurumende yakakanganisa hupfumi hwenyika kwemakore makumi matatu nemanomwe. Asi vamwe vanotiwo VaMnangagwa vanofanira kupiwa nguva yekuti vagadzirise zviri kunetsa munyika. Mukuru wezvirongwa musangano reZimbabwe Network for Social Justice, VaTendai Mbofana, vanoti hapana chekutarisira chinobva murwendo urwu. Izvi zvinopikiswa nemukuru wesangano reLabour and Economic Development Research Institute of Zimbabwe, Doctor Godfrey Kanyenze, avo vanoti VaMnangagwa vanofanira kupiwa nguva yekugadzirisa zvinhu. No media source currently available
